1.1: Allh ke nam se jo rhman o rhim he
1.2: Tعrif allh hi ke lie he jo tmam kaenat ka rb he
1.5: Hm tiri hi عbadt krte hin aor tjhi se mdd mangte hin
1.7: Aun logon ka rasth jn pr to ne anعam frmaia، jo mعtob nhin hoee، jo bhtke hoee nhin hin

2.2: Ih allh ki ktab he، as min koei shk nhin hdait he aun prhiz gar logon ke lie
2.3: Jo ghib pr aiman late hin، nmaz qaem krte hin، jo rzq hm ne aun ko dia he، aus min se khrch krte hin
2.4: Jo ktab tm pr nazl ki gei he (iعni qraan) aor jo ktabin tm se phle nazl ki gei thin an sb pr aiman late hin aor aakhrt pr iqin rkhte hin
2.5: Aise log apne rb ki trf se rah rast pr hin aor ohi flah pane oale hin
2.6: Jn logon ne (ain baton ko tslim krne se) ankar kr dia، aun ke lie iksan he، khoah tm anhin khbrdar kro ia nh kro، bhrhal oh manne oale nhin hin
2.7: Allh ne an ke dlon aor an ke kanon pr mhr lga di he aor an ki aankhon pr prdh pr gia he oh skht sza ke msthq hin
2.8: Bعz log aise bhi hin jo khte hin kh hm allh pr aor aakhrt ke dn pr aiman laee hin، halankh dr hqiqt oh momn nhin hin
2.9: Oh allh aor aiman lane oalon ke sath dhokh bazi kr rhe hin، mgr drasl oh khod apne aap hi ko dhoke min dal rhe hin aor anhin as ka shعor nhin he
2.10: An ke dlon min aik bimari he jse allh ne aor ziadh brha dia، aor jo jhot oh bolte hin، as ki padash min an ke lie drd nak sza he
2.11: Jb kbhi an se kha gia kh zmin pr fsad brpa nh kro to anhon ne ihi kha kh hm to aslah krne oale hin
2.12: Khbrdar! Hqiqt min ihi log mfsd hin mgr anhin shعor nhin he
2.13: Aor jb an se kha gia js trh dosre log aiman laee hin asi trh tm bhi aiman laؤ to anhon ne ihi joab dia "kia hm bioqofon ki trh aiman laein?" khbrdar! Hqiqt min to ih khod bioqof hin، mgr ih jante nhin hin
2.14: Jb ih ahl aiman se mlte hin، to khte hin kh hm aiman laee hin aor jb عlihdgi min apne shitanon se mlte hin، to khte hin kh asl min to hm tmhare sath hin aor an logon se mhz mzaq kr rhe hin
2.15: Allh an se mzaq kr rha he، oh an ki rsi draz kie jata he، aor ih apni srkshi min andhon ki trh bhtkte chle jate hin
2.16: Ih oh log hin jnhon ne hdait ke bdle gmrahi khrid li he، mgr ih soda an ke lie nfع bkhsh nhin he aor ih hrgz shih raste pr nhin hin
2.17: Ain ki msal aisi he jise aik shkhs ne aag roshn ki aor jb aus ne sare mahol ko roshn kr dia to allh ne ain ka nor bsart slb kr lia aor anhin as hal min chhor dia kh tarikion min anhin kchh nzr nhin aata
2.18: Ih bhre hin، gonge hin، andhe hin، ih ab nh pltin ge
2.19: Ia phr an ki msal ion smjho kh aasman se zor ki barsh ho rhi he aor as ke sath andhiri ghta aor krk chmk bhi he، ih bjli ke krake sn kr apni janon ke khof se kanon min anglian tho nse lite hin aor allh ain mnkrin hq ko hr trf se ghire min lie hoee he
2.20: Chmk se an ki halt ih ho rhi he kh goia عnqrib bjli ain ki bsart auchk le jaee gi jb zra kchh roshni anhin mhsos hoti he to ais min kchh dor chl lite hin aor jb an pr andhira chha jata he to khr e ho jate hin allh chahta to an ki smaعt aor bsart balkl hi salb kr lita، iqinaan oh hr chiz pr qadr he
2.21: Logo! Bndgi akhtiar kro apne aus rb ki jo tmhara aor tm se phle jo log ho gzre hin aun sb ka khalq he، tmhare bchne ki toqع aisi sort hoskti he
2.22: Ohi to he jis ne tmhare lie zmin ka frsh bchhaia، aasman ki chht bnaei، aopr se pani brsaia aor as ke zriعe se hr trh ki pidaoar nkal kr tmhare lie rzq bhm phnchaia ps jb tm ih jante ho to dosron ko allh ka md mqabl nh thiraؤ
2.23: Aor agr tmhin ais amr min shk he kh ih kta b jo hm ne apne bnde pr atari he، ih hmari he ia nhin، toas ke mannd aik hi sort bna laؤ، apne sare hm noaؤn ko bla lo، aik allh ko chhor kr baqi js js ki chaho، mdd le lo، agr tm sche ho
2.24: To ih kam kr ke dkhaؤ، likn agr tm ne aisa nh kia aor iqinaan kbhi nhin krskte، to dro as aag se js ka aindhn bnin ge ansan aor pthr، jo mhia ki gei he mnkrin hq ke lie
2.25: Aor ae pighmbrؐ، jo log as ktab pr aiman le aaein aor (as ke mtabq) apne عml drst kr lin، anhin khosh khbri de do kh aun ke lie aise bagh hin، jn ke niche nhrin bhti hon gi an baghon ke phl sort min dnia ke phlon se mlte jlte honge jb koei phl anhin khane ko dia jaee ga، to oh khin ge kh aise hi phl as se phle dnia min hm ko die jate the an ke lie ohan pakizh bioian hongi، aor oh ohan hmishh rhin ge
2.26: Han، allh as se hrgz nhin shrmata kh mchhr ia as se bhi hqir tr ksi chiz ki tmsilin de jo log hq bat ko qbol krne oale hin، oh anhi tmsilon ko dikh kr jan lite hin kh ih hq he jo an ke rb hi ki trf se aaia he، aor jo manne oale nhin hin، oh anhin sn kr khne lgte hin kh aisi tmsilon se allh ko kia srokar? As trh allh aik hi bat se bhton ko gmrahi min mbtla kr dita he aor bhton ko rah rast dkha dita he aor gmrahi min oh anhi ko mbtla krta he، jo fasq hin
2.27: Allh ke عhd ko mzbot bandh line ke bعd tor dite hin allh ne jse jorne ka hkm dia he ause katte hin، aor zmin min fsad brpa krte hin hqiqt min ihi log nqsan athane oale hin
2.28: Tm allh ke sath kfr ka roih kise akhtiar krte ho halankh tm be jan the، as ne tm ko zndgi عta ki، phr ohi tmhari jan slb kre ga، phr ohi tmhin dobarh zndgi عta kre ga، phr asi ki trf tmhin plt kr jana he
2.29: Ohi to he، js ne tmhare lie zmin ki sari chizin pid a kin، phr aopr ki trf tojh frmaei aor sat aasman astoar kie aor oh hr chiz ka عlm rkhne oala he
2.30: Phr zra as oqt ka tsor kro jb tmhare rb ne frshton se kha tha kh "min zmin min aik khlifh bnane oala hon" anhon ne عrz kia: "kia aap zmin min ksi aise ko mqr r krne oale hin، jo as ke antzam ko bgar de ga aor khonrizian kre ga aap ki hmd o sna ke sath tsbih aor aap ke lie tqdis to hm kr hi rhe hin" frmaia: "min janta hon jo kchh tm nhin jante"
2.31: As ke bعd allh ne aadmؑ ko sari chizon ke nam skhaee، phr anhin frshton ke samne pish kia aor frmaia "agr tmhara khial shih he (kh ksi khlifh ke tqrr se antzam bgr jaee ga) to zra an chizon ke nam btaؤ"
2.32: Anhon ne عrz kia: "nqs se pak to aap hi ki zat he، hm to bs atna hi عlm rkhte hin، jtna aap ne hm ko de dia he hqiqt min sb kchh janne aor smjhne oala aap ke soa koei nhin"
2.33: Phr allh ne aadmؑ se kha: "tm ainhin ain chizon ke nam btaؤ" jb as ne an ko aun sb ke nam bta die، to allh ne frmaia: "min ne tm se kha nh tha kh min aasmanon aor zmin ki oh sari hqiqtin janta hon jo tm se mkhfi hin، jo kchh tm zahr krte ho، oh bhi mjhe mعlom he aor jo kchh tm chhpate ho، ase bhi min janta hon"
2.34: Phr jb hm ne frshton ko hkm dia kh aadmؑ ke aage jhk jaؤ، to sb jhk gee، mgr ablis ne ankar kia oh apni braei ke ghmnd min pr gia aor nafrmanon min shaml ho gia
2.35: Phr hm ne aadmؑ se kha kh "tm aor tmhari bioi، donon jnt min rho aor ihan bfraght jo chaho khaؤ، mgr as drkht ka rukh nh krna، ornh zalmon min shmar ho ge"
2.36: Aakhr kar shitan ne an donon ko as drkht ki trghib de kr hmare hkm ki piroi se hta dia aor anhin aus halt se nkloa kr chhora، js min oh the hm ne hkm dia kh، "ab tm sb ihan se atr jaؤ، tm aik dosre ke dshmn ho aor tmhin aik khas oqt tk zmin thirna aor ohin gzr bsr krna he"
2.37: As oqt aadmؑ ne apne rb se chnd klmat sikh kr tobh ki، js ko as ke rb ne qbol kr lia، kionkh oh bra mعaf krne oala aor rhm frmane oala he
2.38: Hm ne kha kh، "tm sb ihan se atr jaؤ phr jo miri trf se koei hdait tmhare pas phnche، to jo log mir i hdait ki piroi krin ge، an ke lie ksi khof aor rnj ka moqع nh hoga
2.39: Aor jo as ko qbol krne se ankar krin ge aor hmari aaiat ko jhtlaein ge، oh aag min jane oale log hin، jhan oh hmishh rhin ge"
2.40: Ae bni asraeil! Zra khial kro miri as nعmt ka jo min ne tm ko عta ki thi، mire sath tmhara jo عhd tha ause tm pora kro، to mira jo عhd tmhare sath tha ause min pora kron ga aor mjh hi se tm dro
2.41: Aor min ne jo ktab bhiji he as pr aiman laؤ ih aus ktab ki taeid min he jo tmhare pas phle se mojod thi، lhaza sb se phle tm hi as ke mnkr nh bn jaؤ thori qimt pr miri aaiat ko nh bich dalo ao r mire ghzb se bcho
2.42: Batl ka rng chrha kr hq ko mshtbh nh bnaؤ aor nh jante bojhte hq ko chhpane ki koshsh kro
2.43: Nmaz qaem kro، zkoaۃ do aor jo log mire aage jhk rhe hin aun ke sath tm bhi jhk jaؤ
2.44: Tm dosron ko to niki ka rasth akhtiar krne ke lie khte ho، mgr apne aap ko bhol jate ho? Halankh tm ktab ki tlaot krte ho kia tm عql se balkl hi kam nhin lite?
2.45: Sbr aor nmaz se mdd lo، bishk nmaz aik skht mshkl kam he
2.46: Mgr an frman brdar bndon ke lie mshkl nhin he jo smjhte hin kh aakhr kar anhin apne rb se mlna aor asi ki trf plt kr jana he
2.47: Ae bni asraeil! Iad kro miri aus nعmt ko، js se min ne tmhin noaza tha aor as bat ko kh min ne tmhin dnia ki sari qomon pr fzilt عta ki thi
2.48: Aor dro aus dn se jb koei ksi ke zra kam nh aaee ga، nh ksi ki trf se sfarsh qbol hogi، nh ksi ko fdih le kr chhora jaee ga، aor nh mjrmon ko khin se mdd ml ske gi
2.49: Iad kro oh oqt، jb hm ne tm ko frعonion ki ghlami se njat bkhshi aunhon ne tmhin skht عzab min mbtla kr rkha tha، tmhare lrkon ko zbh krte the aor tmhari lrkion ko zndh rhne dite the aor as halt min tmhare rb ki trf se tmhari bri aazmaesh thi
2.50: Iad kro oh oqt، jb hm ne smndr phar kr tmhare lie rasth bnaia، phr as min se tmhin bkhirit gzroa dia، phr ohin tmhari aankhon ke samne frعonon ko ghrqab kia
2.51: Iad kro، jb hm ne mosiaؑ ko chalis shbanh roz ki qrardad pr blaia، to as ke pichhe tm bchhre ko apna mعbod bna bithe aus oqt tm ne bri ziadti ki thi
2.52: Mgr as pr bhi hm ne tmhin mعaf kr dia kh shaid ab tm shkr gzar bno
2.53: Iad kro kh (thik as oqt jb tm ih zlm kr rhe the) hm ne mosiaؑ ko ktab aor frqan عta ki takh tm as ke zriعe se sidha rasth pasko
2.54: Iad kro jb mosiaؑ (ih nعmt lite hoee plta، to aus) ne apni qom se kha kh "logo، tm ne bchhre ko mعbod bna kr apne aopr skht zlm kia he، lhaza tm log apne khalq ke hzor tobh kro aor apni janon ko hlak kro، asi min tmhare khalq ke nzdik tmhari bhtri he" aus oqt tmhare khalq ne tmhari tobh qbol kr li kh oh bra mعaf krne oala aor rhm frmane oala he
2.55: Iad kro jb tm ne mosiaؑ se kha tha kh hm tmhare khne ka hrgz iqin nh krin ge، jb tk kh apni aankhon se عlanih khda ko (tm se klam krte) nh dikh lin as oqt tmhare dikhte dikhte aik zbrdst saعqe ne tm ko aa lia
2.56: Tm be jan ho kr gr chke the، mgr phr hm ne tm ko jila athaia، shaid kh as ahsan ke bعd tm shkr gzar bn jaؤ
2.57: Hm ne tm pr abr ka saih kia، mn osloia ki ghza tmhare lie frahm ki aor tm se kha kh jo pak chizin hm ne tmhin bkhshi hin، aunhin khaؤ، mgr tmhare aslaf ne jo kchh kia، oh hm pr zlm nh tha، blkh anhon ne aap apne hi aopr zlm kia
2.58: Phr iad kro jb hm ne kha tha kh، "ih bsti jo tmhare samne he، as min dakhl ho jaؤ، as ki pidaoar js trh chaho، mze se khaؤ، mgr bsti ke droaze min sjdh riz hote ho ee dakhl hona aor khte jana htۃ htۃ، hm tmhari khtaؤn se dr gzr krin ge aor niko karon ko mzid fzl o krm se noazin ge"
2.59: Mgr jo bat khi gei thi، zalmon ne ause bdl kr kchh aor kr dia aakhr kar hm ne zlm krne oalon pr aasman se عzab nazl kia ih sza thi an nafrmanion ki، jo oh kr rhe the
2.60: Iad kro، jb mosiaؑ ne apni qom ke lie pani ki dعa ki to hm ne kha kh flan chtan pr apna عsa maro chnanchh as se barh chshme phot nkle aor hr qbile ne jan lia kh konsi jgh as ke pani line ki he aus oqt ih hdait kr di gei thi kh allh ka dia hoa rzq khaؤ pio، aor zmin min fsad nh philate phro
2.61: Iad kro، jb tm ne kha tha kh، "ae mosiaؑ، hm aik hi trh ke khane pr sbr nhin krskte apne rb se dعa kro kh hmare lie zmin ki pidaoar sag، trkari، khira، kkri، gihon، lhsn، piaz، dal oghirh pida kre" to mosiaؑ ne kha: "kia aik bhtr chiz ke bjaee tm adnia drje ki chizin lina chahte ho? Achha، ksi shhri aabadi min ja rho jo kchh tm mangte ho، ohan ml jaee ga" aakhr kar nobt ihan tk phnchi kh zlt o khoari aor psti o bd hali aun pr mslt ho gei aor oh allh ke ghzb min ghr gee ih ntijh tha as ka kh oh allh ki aaiat se kfr krne lge aor pighmbron ko nahq qtl krne lge ih ntijh tha an ki nafrmanion ka aor as bat ka kh oh hdod shrع se nkl nkl jate the
2.62: Iqin jano kh nbi عrbi ko manne oale hon ia ihodi، عisaei hon ia sabi، jo bhi allh aor rozi aakhr pr aiman laee ga aor nik عml kre ga، aus ka ajr as ke rb ke pas he aor as ke lie ksi khof aor rnj ka moqع nhin he
2.63: Iad kro oh oqt، jb hm ne tuor ko tm pr atha kr tm se pkhth عhd lia tha aor kha tha kh "jo ktab hm tmhin de rhe hin ase mzboti ke sath thamna aor jo ahkam o hdaiat as min drj hin anhin iad rkhna asi zriعe se toqع ki jaskti he kh tm tqoia ki rosh pr chl sko ge"
2.64: Mgr as ke bعd tm apne عhd se phir gee as pr bhi allh ke fzl aor as ki rhmt ne tmhara sath nh chhora، ornh tm kbhi ke tbah ho chke hote
2.65: Phr tmhin apni qom ke aun logon ka qsh to mعlom hi he jnhon ne sbt ka qanon tora tha hm ne anhin khh dia kh bndr bn jaؤ aor as hal min rho kh hr trf se tm pr dhtkar phtkar pre
2.66: As trh hm ne aun ke anjam ko aus zmane ke logon aor bعd ki aane oali nslon ke lie عbrt aor drne oalon ke lie nsiht bna kr chhora
2.67: Phr oh oaqعh iad kro، jb mosiaؑ ne apne qom se kha kh، allh tmhin aik gaee zbh krne ka hkm dita he khne lge kia tm hm se mzaq krte ho? Mosiaؑ ne kha، min as se khda ki pnah mangta hon kh jahlon ki si batin kron
2.68: Bole achha، apne rb se drkhoast kro kh oh hmin gaee ki kchh tfsil btaee mosiaؑ ne kha، allh ka arshad he kh oh aisi gaee honi chahie jo nh borhi ho nh bchhia، blkh aost عmr ki ho lhaza jo hkm dia jata he as ki tعmil kro
2.69: Phr khne lge apne rb se ih aor pochh do kh aus ka rng kisa ho mosiaؑ ne kha oh frmata he zrd rng ki gaee honi chahie، js ka rng aisa shokh ho kh dikhne oalon ka ji khosh ho jaee
2.70: Phr bole apne rb se saf saf pochh kr btaؤ kisi gaee mtlob he، hmin as ki tعin min ashtbah ho gia he allh ne chaha، to hm as ka pth palin ge
2.71: Mosiaؑ ne joab dia: allh khta he kh oh aisi gaee he js se khdmt nhin li jati، nh zmin jotti he nh pani khinchti he، shih salm aor be dagh he، as pr oh pkar athe kh han، ab tm ne thik pth btaia he phr anhon ne ase zbh kia، ornh oh aisa krte mعlom nh hote the
2.72: Aor tmhin iad he oh oaqعh jb tm ne aik shkhs ki jan li thi، phr as ke bare min jhgrne aor aik dosre pr qtl ka alzam thopne lge the aor allh ne fislh kr lia tha kh jo kchh tm chhpate ho، ase khol kr rkh de ga
2.73: Aus oqt hm ne hkm dia kh mqtol ki lash ko as ke aik hse se zrb lgaؤ dikho as trh allh murdon ko zndgi bkhshta he aor tmhin apni nshanian dkhata he takh tm smjho
2.74: Mgr aisi nshanian dikhne ke bعd bhi aakhr kar tmhare dl skht hogee، pthron ki trf skht، blkh skhti min kchh an se bhi brhe hoee، kionkh pthron min se to koei aisa bhi hota he js min se chshme phot bhte hin، koei phtta he aor as min se pani nkl aata he aor koei khda ke khof se lrz kr gr bhi prta he allh tmhare krtoton se be khbr nhin he
2.75: Ae mslmano! Ab kia ain logon se tm ih toqع rkhte ho kh tmhari dعot pr aiman le aaein ge? Halankh an min se aik groh ka shioh ih rha he kh allh ka klam sna aor phr khob smjh bojh kr dansth as min thrif ki
2.76: (mhmd rsol allhﷺ pr) aiman lane oalon se mlte hin to khte hin kh hm bhi anhin mante hin، aor jb aaps min aik dosre se tkhlie ki bat chit hoti he to khte hin kh be oqof hogee ho? Ain logon ko oh batin btate ho jo allh ne tm pr kholi hin takh tmhare rb ke pas tmhare mqable min anhin hujtّ? Min pish krin
2.77: Aor kia ih jante nhin hin kh jo kchh ih chhpate hin aor jo kchh zahr krte hin، allh ko sb baton ki khbr he
2.78: An min aik dosra groh amّion ka he، jo ktab ka to عlm rkhte nhin، bs apni be bniad amidon aor aarzoؤn ko lie bithe hin aor mhz ohm o gman pr chle ja rhe hin
2.79: Ps hlakt aor tbahi he aun logon ke lie jo apne hathon se shrع ka noshth lkhte hin، phr logon se khte hin kh ih allh ke pas se aaia hoa he takh as ke mعaoze min thora sa faedh hasl kr lin an ke hathon ka lkha bhi an ke lie tbahi ka saman he aor an ki ih kmaei bhi an ke lie mojb hlakt
2.80: Oh khte hin kh dozkh ki aag hmin hrgz chhone oali nhin ailّa ih kh chnd roz ki sz a ml jaee to ml jaee ain se pochho، kia tm ne allh se koei عhd le lia he، js ki khlaf orzi oh nhin krskta? Ia bat ih he kh tm allh ke zme dal kr aisi batin khh dite ho jn ke mtعlq tmhin عlm nhin he kh aus ne an ka zmh lia he? Aakhr tmhin dozkh ki aag kion nh chhoee gi?
2.81: Jo bhi bdi kmaee ga aor apni khta kari ke chkr min pra rhe ga، oh dozkhi he ao r dozkh hi min oh hmishh rhe ga
2.82: Aor jo log aiman laein ge aor nik عml krin ge ohi jnti hin aor jnt min oh hmishh rhin ge
2.83: Iad kro، asraeil ki aolad se hm ne pkhth عhd lia tha kh allh ke soa ksi ki عbadt nh krna، man bap ke sath، rshte daron ke sath، itimon aor mskinon ke sath nik slok krna، logon se bhli bat khna، nmaz qaem krna aor zkoaۃ dina، mgr thore aadmion ke so a tm sb as عhd se phr gee aor ab tk phr e hoee ho
2.84: Phr zra iad kro، hm ne tm se mzbot عhd lia tha kh aaps min aik dosre ka khon nh bhana aor nh aik dosre ko ghr se be ghr krna tm ne as ka aqrar kia tha، tm khod as pr goah ho
2.85: Mgr aaj ohi tm ho kh apne bhaei bndon ko qtl krte ho، apni bradri ke kchh logon ko be khanman kr dite ho، zlm o ziadti ke sath an ke khlaf jthe bndian krte ho، aor jb oh lraei min pkre hoee tmhare pas aate hin، to an ki rhaei ke lie fdih ka lin din krte ho، halankh anhin an ke ghron se nkalna hi sre se tm pr hram tha to kia tm ktab ke aik hse pr aiman late ho aor dosre hse ke sath kfr krte ho phr tm min se jo log aisa krin، an ki sza as ke soa aor kia he kh dnia ki zndgi min zlil o khoar ho kr rhin aor aakhrt min shdid trin عzab ki trf phir die jaein? Allh an hrkat se be khbr nhin he، jo tm kr rhe ho
2.86: Ih oh log hin jnhon ne aakhrt bich kr dnia ki zndgi khrid li he، lhaza nh ain ki sza min koei tkhfif hogi aor nh anhin koei mdd phnch ske gi
2.87: Hm ne mosiaؑ ko ktab di، as ke bعd pe dr pe rsol bhije، aakhr kar عisiaؑ abn mrimؑ ko roshn nshanian de kr bhija aor roh pak se as ki mdd ki phr ih tmhara kia dhng he kh jb bhi koei rsol tmhari khoahshat nfs ke khlaf koei chiz le kr tmhare pas aaia، to tm ne as ke mqable min srkshi hi ki، ksi ko jhtlaia aor ksi ko qtl kr dala
2.88: Oh khte hin، hmare dl mhfoz hin nhin، asl bat ih he kh an ke kfr ki ojh se an pr allh ki phtkar pri he، as lie oh km hi aiman late hin
2.89: Aor ab jo aik ktab allh ki trf se an ke pas aaei he، as ke sath an ka kia brtaؤ he? Baojod ih kh oh as ktab ki tsdiq krti he jo an ke pas phle se mojo d thi، baojod ih kh as ki aamd se phle oh khod kfar ke mqable min fth o nsrt ki dعaein manga krte the، mgr jb oh chiz aa gei، jse oh phchan bhi gee to، anhon ne ase manne se ankar kr dia khda ki lعnt ain mnkrin pr
2.90: Kisa bra zriعh he js se ih apne nfs ki tsli hasl krte hin kh jo hdait allh ne nazl ki he، as ko qbol krne se srf ais zd ki bna pr ankar kr rhe hin kh allh ne apne fzl (ohi o rsalt) se apne js bnde ko khod chaha، noaz dia! Lhaza ab ih ghzb balaee ghzb ke msthq hogee hin aor aise kafron ke lie skht aamiz sza mqrr he
2.91: Jb aun se kha jata he kh jo kchh allh ne nazl kia he as pr aiman laؤ، to oh khte hin "hm to srf aus chiz pr aiman late hin، jo hmare han (iعni nsl asraeil) min atri he" as daere ke bahr jo kchh aaia he، ase manne se oh ankar krte hin، halankh oh hq he aor aus tعlim ki tsdiq o taeid kr rha he jo an ke han phle se mojod thi achha، an se kho: agr tm as tعlim hi pr aiman rkhne oale ho jo tmhare han aaei thi، to as se phle allh ke aun pighmbron ko (jo khod bni asraeil min pida hoee the) kion qtl krte rhe?
2.92: Tmhare pas mosiؑa kisi kisi roshn nshanion ke sath aaia phr bhi tm aise zalm the kh as ke pith morte hi bchhre ko mعbod bna bithe
2.93: Phr zra aus misaq ko iad kro، jo tuor ko tmhare aopr atha kr hm ne tm se lia tha hm ne takid ki thi kh jo hdaiat hm de rhe hin، an ki skhti ke sath pabndi kro aor kan lga kr sno tmhare aslaf ne kha kh hm ne sn lia، mgr manin ge nhin aor an ki batl prsti ka ih hal tha kh dlon min an ke bchhra hi bsa hoa tha kho: agr tm momn ho، to عjib aiman he، jo aisi bri hrkat ka tmhin hkm dita he
2.94: Ain se kho kh agr oaqعi allh ke nzdik aakhrt ka ghr tmam ansanon ko chhor kr srf tmhare hi lie mkhsos he، tb to tmhin chahie kh mot ki tmna kro، agr tm apne as khial min sche ho
2.95: Iqin jano kh ih kbhi as ki tmna nh krin ge، as lie kh apne hathon jo kchh kma kr anhon ne ohan bhija he، as ka aqtza ihi he (kh ih ohan jane ki tmna nh krin) allh an zalmon ke hal se khob oaqf he
2.96: Tm anhin sb se brh kr jine ka hris paؤ ge htia kh ih as mعamle min mshrkon se bhi brhe hoee hin an min se aik aik shkhs ih chahta he kh ksi trh hzar brs jie، halankh lmbi عmr bhrhal ause عzab se to dor nhin phink skti jise kchh aعmal ih kr rhe hin، allh to anhin dikh hi rha he
2.97: Ain se kho kh jo koei jbril se عdaot rkhta ho، ase mعlom hona chahie kh jbril ne allh ke aizn se ih qraan tmhare qlb pr nazl kia he، jo phle aaei hoei ktabon ki tsdiq o taeid krta he aor aiman lane oalon ke lie hdait aor kamiabi ki bshart bn kr aaia he
2.98: (agr jbril se an ki عdaot ka sbb ihi he، to khh do kh) jo allh aor as ke frshton aor as ke rsolon aor jbril aor mikaeil ke dshmn hin، allh an kafron ka dshmn he
2.99: Hm ne tmhari trf aisi aaiat nazl ki hin jo saf saf hq ka azhar kr ne oali hin aor an ki piroi se srf ohi log ankar krte hin، jo fasq hin
2.100: Kia hmishh aisa hi nhin hota rha he kh jb anhon ne koei عhd kia، to an min se aik nh aik groh ne ase zror hi bala ee taq rkh dia? Blkh an min se aksr aise hi hin، jo sche dl se aiman nhin late
2.101: Aor jb an ke pas allh ki trf se koei rsol as ktab ki tsdiq o taeid krta hoa aaia jo an ke han phle se mojod thi، to ain ahl ktab min se aik groh ne ktab allh ko as trh ps psht dala، goia kh oh kchh jante hi nhin
2.102: Aor lge aun chizon ki piroi krne، jo shia tin، slimanؑ ki sltnt ka nam le kr pish kia krte the، halankh slimanؑ ne kbhi kfr nhin kia، kfr ke mrtkb to oh shiatin the jo logon ko jado gri ki tعlim dite the oh pichhe pre aus chiz ke jo babl min do frshton، harot o marot pr nazl ki gei thi، halankh oh (frshte) jb bhi ksi ko as ki tعlim dite the، to phle saf tor pr mtnbh kr dia krte the kh "dikh، hm mhz aik aazmaesh hin، to kfr min mbtla nh ho" phr bhi ih log aun se oh chiz sikhte the، js se shohr aor bioi min jdaei dal din zahr tha kh azni alahi ke bghir oh as zriعe se ksi ko bhi zrr nh phncha skte the، mgras ke baojod oh aisi chiz sikhte the jo khod an ke lie nfع bkhsh nhin، blkh nqsan d h thi aor anhin khob mعlom tha kh jo as chiz ka khridar bna، as ke lie aakhrt min koei hsh nhin ktni bri mtaع thi js ke bdle anhon ne apni janon ko bich dala، kash anhin mعlom hota!
2.103: Agr oh aiman aor tqoia akhtiar krte، to allh ke han as ka jo bdlh mlta، oh an ke lie ziadh bhtr tha، kash aunhin khbr hoti
2.104: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho: raaعinaa nh kha kro، blkh aunzrnaa kho aor tojh se bat ko sno، ih kafr to عzab alim ke msthq hin
2.105: Ih log jnhon ne dعot hq ko qbol krne se ankar kr dia he، khoah ahl ktab min se hon ia mshrk hon، hrgz ih psnd nhin krte kh tmhare rb ki trf se tm pr koei bhlaei nazl ho، mgr allh js ko chahta he، apni rhmt ke lie chn lita he aor oh bra fzl frmane oala he
2.106: Hm apni js aait ko mnsokh kr dite hin ia buhla dite hin، as ki jgh as se bhtr le aate hin ia km az km oisi hi kia tm jante nhin ho kh allh hr chiz pr qdrt rkhta he?
2.107: Kia tmhin khbr nhin he kh zmin aor aasman ki frmanroaei allh hi ke lie he aor as ke soa koei tmhari khbr giri krne aor tmhari mdd krne oala nhin he?
2.108: Phr kia tm apne rsol se as qsm ke soalat aor mtalbh krna chahte ho، jise as se phle mosiaؑ se kie ja chke hin? Halankh js shkhs ne aiman ki rosh ko kfr ki rosh se bdl lia oh rah rast se bhtk gia
2.109: Ahl ktab min se aksr log ih chahte hin kh ksi trh tmhin aiman se phir kr phr kfr ki trf plta le jaein agrchh hq an pr zahr ho chka he، mgr apne nfs ke hsd ki bna pr tmhare lie an ki ih khoahsh he as ke joab min tm عfo o dr gzr se kam lo ihan tk kh allh khod hi apna fislh nafz kr de mtmen rho kh allh tعalia hr chiz pr qdrt rkhta he
2.110: Nmaz qaem kro aor zkoaۃ do tm apni عaqbt ke lie jo bhlaei kma kr aage bhijo ge، allh ke han ase mojod paؤ ge jo kchh tm krte ho، oh sb allh ki nzr min he
2.111: An ka khna he kh koei shkhs jnt min nh jaee ga jb tk kh oh ihodi nh ho (ia عisaeion ke khial ke mtabq) عisaei nh ho ih an ki tmnaein hin an se kho، apni dlil pish kro، agr tm apne dعoe min sche ho
2.112: Drasl nh tmhari kchh khsosit he، nh ksi aor ki hq ih he kh jo bhi apni hsti ko allh ki ataعt min sonp de aor عmlaan nik rosh pr chle، as ke lie as ke rb ke pas aus ka ajr he aor aise logon ke lie ksi khof ia rnj ka koei moqع nhin
2.113: Ihodi khte hin: عisaeion ke pas kchh nhin عisaei khte hin: ihodion ke pas kchh nhin halankh donon hi ktab prhte hin aor asi qsm ke dعoe an logon ke bhi hin، jn ke pas ktab ka عlm nhin he ih akhtlafat jn min ih log mbtla hin، an ka fislh allh qiamt ke roz kr de ga
2.114: Aoras shkhs se brh kr zalm kon hoga jo allh ke mعbdon min as ke nam ki iad se roke aor an ki oirani ke drpe ho? Aise log as qabl hin kh an ki عbadt gahon min qdm nh rkhin aor agr ohan jaein bhi، to drte hoee jaein an ke lie to dnia min rsoaei he aor aakhrt min عzab عzim
2.115: Mshrq aor mghrb sb allh ke hin js trf bhi tm rkh kro ge، asi trf allh ka rkh he allh bri osعt oala aor sb kchh janne oala he
2.116: An ka qol he kh allh ne ksi ko bita bnaia he allh pak he an baton se asl hqiqt ih he kh zmin aor aasmanon ki tmam mojodat as ki mlk hin، sb ke sb as ke mtiع frman hin
2.117: Oh aasmanon aor zmin ka mojd he aor js bat ka oh fislh krta he، as ke lie bs ih hkm dita he kh "ho ja" aor oh ho jati he
2.118: Nadan khte hin kh allh khod hm se bat kion nhin krta ia koei nshani hmare pas kion nhin aati? Aisi hi batin ain se phle log bhi kia krte the ain sb (agle pchhle gmrahon) ki zhnitin aik jisi hin iqin lane oalon ke lie to hm nshanian saf saf nmaian kr chke hin
2.119: (as se brh kr nshani kia hogi kh) hm ne tm ko عlm hq ke sath khosh khbri dine oala or drane oala bna kr bhija ab jo log jhnm se rshth jor chke hin، an ki trf se tm zmh dar o joab dh nhin ho
2.120: Ihodi aor عisaei tm se hrgz razi nh hon ge، jb tk tm an ke triqe pr nh chlne lgo saf khh dokh rasth bs ohi he، jo allh ne btaia he ornh agraus عlm ke bعd، jo tmhare pas aa chka he، tm ne aun ki khoahshat ki piroi ki، to allh ki pkr se bchane oala koei dost aor mdd gar tmhare lie nhin he
2.121: Jn logon ko hm ne ktab di he، oh ause as trh prhte hin jisa kh prhne ka hq he oh as pr sche dl se aiman late hin aor joas ke sath kfr ka roih akhtiar krin، ohi asl min nqsan athane oale hin
2.122: Ae bni asraeil! Iad kro miri oh nعmt، js se min ne tmhin noaz a tha، aor ih kh min ne tmhin dnia ki tmam qomon pr fzilt di thi
2.123: Aor dro aus dn se، jb koei ksi ke zra kam nh aaee ga، nh ksi se fdih qbol kia jaee ga، nh koei sfarsh hi aadmi ko faedh de gi، aor nh mjrmon ko khin se koei mdd phnch ske gi
2.124: Iad kro kh jb abrahimؑ ko as ke rb ne chnd baton min aazma ia aor oh aun sb min pora atr gia، to as ne kha: "min tjhe sb logon ka pishoa bnane oala hon" abrahimؑ ne عrz kia: "aor kia miri aolad se bhi ihi oعdh he?" as ne joab dia: "mira oعdh zalmon se mtعlq nhin he"
2.125: Aor ih kh hm ne as ghr (kعbe) ko logon ke lie mrkz aor amn ki jgh qrar dia tha aor logon ko hkm dia tha kh abrahimؑ jhan عbadt ke lie khra hota he as mqam ko mstql jaee nmaz bna lo aor abrahimؑ aor a smaعil ko takid ki thi kh mire ghr ko toaf aor aعtkaf aor rkoع aor sjdh krne oalon ke lie pak rkho
2.126: Aor ih kh abrahimؑ ne dعa ki: "ae mire rb، as shhr ko amn ka shhr bna de، aor as ke bashndon min jo allh aor aakhrt ko manin، anhin hr qsm ke phlo n ka rzq de" joab min as ke rb ne frmaia: "aor jo nh mane ga، dnia ki chnd rozh zndgi ka saman tomin ause bhi don ga mgr aakhrkar ause عzab jhnm ki trf ghsiton ga، aor oh bd trin thkana he"
2.127: Aor iad kro abrahimؑ aor asmaعilؑ jb as ghr ki dioarin atha rhe the، to dعa krte jate the: "ae hmare rb، hm se ih khdmt qbol frma le، to sb ki snne aor sb kchh janne oala he
2.128: Ae rb، hm donon ko apna mslm (mutiع frman) bna، hmari nsl se aik aisi qom atha، jo tiri mslm ho، hmin apni عbadt ke triqe bta، aor hmari kotahion se dr gzr frma، to bra mعaf krne oala aor rhm frmane oala he
2.129: Aor ae rb، an logon min khod anhin ki qom se aik aisa rsol atha eio، jo anhin tiri aaiat snaee، an ko ktab aor hkmt ki tعlim de aor an ki zndgian snoare to bra mqtdr aor hkim he"
2.130: Ab kon he، jo abrahimؑ ke triqe se nfrt kre? Js ne khod apne aap ko hmaqt o jhalt min mbtla kr lia ho، as ke so a kon ih hrkt krskta he? Abrahimؑ to oh shkhs he، js ko hm ne dnia min apne kam ke lie chun lia tha aor aakhrt min as ka shmar salhin min hoga
2.131: As ka hal ih tha kh jb as ke rb ne as se kha: "mslm ho ja"، to as ne foraan kha: "min malk kaenat ka "mslm" ho gia"
2.132: Asi triqe pr chlne ki hdait as ne apni aolad ko ki thi aor asi ki osit iعqobؑ apni aolad ko kr gia as ne kha tha kh: "mire bcho! Allh ne tmhare lie ihi din psnd kia he lhaza mrte dm tk mslm hi rhna"
2.133: Phr kia tm as oqt mojod the، jb iعqobؑ as dnia se rkhst ho rha tha?as ne mrte oqt apne bchon se pochha: "bcho! Mire bعd tm ks ki bndgi kro ge?" an sb ne joab dia: "hm asi aik khda ki bndgi krin ge jse aap ne aor aap ke bzrgon abrahimؑ، asmaعilؑ aor ashaqؑ ne khda mana he aor hm ausi ke mslm hin"
2.134: Oh kchh log the، jo gzr gee jo kchh anhon ne kmaia، oh aun ke lie he aor jo kchh tm kmaؤ ge، oh tmhare lie he tm se ih nh pochha jaee ga kh oh kia krte the
2.135: Ihodi khte hin: ihodi ho to rah rast paؤ ge عisaei khte hin: عisaei ho، to hdait mle gi ain se kho: "nhin، blkh sb ko chhor kr abrahimؑ ka triqh aor abrahimؑ mshr ko n min se nh tha"
2.136: Mslmano! Kho kh: "hm aiman laee allh pr aor as hdait pr jo hmari trf nazl hoei he aor jo abrahimؑ، asmaعilؑ، ashaqؑ، iعqobؑ aor aolad iعqobؑ ki trf nazl hoei thi aor jo mosiaؑ aor عisiaؑ aor dosre tmam pighmbron ko aun ke rb ki trf se di gei thi hm an ke drmian koei tfriq nhin krte aor hm allh ke mslm hin"
2.137: Phr agr oh ausi trh aiman laein، js trh tm laee ho، to hdait pr hin، aor agras se mnh phirin، to khli bat he kh oh ht dhrmi min pr gee hin lhaza atminan rkho kh aun ke mqable min allh tmhari hmait ke lie kafi he oh sb kchh snta aor janta he
2.138: Kho: "allh ka rng akhtiar kro as ke rng se achha aor ks ka rng hoga? Aor hm ausi ki bndgi krne oale log hin"
2.139: Ae nbiؐ! Ain se kho: "kia tm allh ke bare min hm se jhgrte ho?halankh ohi hmara rb bhi he aor tmhara rb bhi hmare aعmal hmare lie hin، tmhare aعmal tmhare lie، aor hm allh hi ke lie apni bndgi ko khals kr chke hin
2.140: Ia phr kia tma ra khna ih he kh abrahimؑ، asmaعilؑ، ashaqؑ، iعqobؑ aor aolad iعqobؑ sb ke sb ihodi the ia nsrani the? Kho: "tm ziadh jante ho ia allh? Aus shkhs se bra zalm aor kon hoga js ke zme allh ki trf se aik goahi ho aor oh ause chhpaee? Tmhari hrkat se allh ghafl to nhin he
2.141: Oh kchh log the، jo gzr chke aun ki kmaei aun ke lie thi aor tmhari kmaei tmhare lie tm se aun ke aعmal ke mtعlq soal nhin hoga"
2.142: Nadan log zror khin ge : ainhin kia hoa kh phle ih js qble ki trf rkh kr ke nmaz prhte the، as se ikaik phr gee? Ae nbi، an se kho: "mshrq aor mghrb sb allh ke hin allh jse chahta he، sidhi rah dkha dita he
2.143: Aor aisi trh to hm ne tmhin aik "amt ost" bnaia he takh tm dnia ke logon pr goah ho aor rsol tm pr goah ho phle js trf tm rkh krte the، as ko to hm ne srf ih dikhne ke lie qblh mqrr kia tha kh kon rsol ki piroi krta he aor kon alta phr jata he ih mعamlh tha to bra skht، mgr aun logon ke lie kchh bhi skht nh sabt hoa، jo allh ki hdait se fiz iab the allh tmhare as aiman ko hrgz zaeع nh kre ga، iqin jano kh oh logon ke hq min nhait shfiq o rhim he
2.144: Ih tmhare mnh ka bar bar aasman ki trf athna hm dikh rhe hin lo، hm ausi qble ki trf tmhin phire dite hin، jse tm psnd krte ho msjd hram ki trf rukh phir do ab jhan khin tm ho، ausi ki trf mnh kr ke nmaz prha kro ih log jnhin ktab di gei thi، kho b jante hin kh (thoil qblh ka) ih hkm an ke rb hi ki trf se he aor br hq he، mgra s ke baojod jo kchh ih kr rhe hin، allh as se ghafl nhin he
2.145: Tm an ahl ktab ke pas khoah koei nshani le aaؤ، mmkn nhin kh ih tmhare qble ki piroi krne lgin، aor nh tmhare lie ih mmkn he kh an ke qble ki piroi kro، aor an min se koei groh bhi dosre ke qble ki piroi ke lie tiar nhin he، ao r agr tm ne as عlm ke bعd jo tmhare pas aa chka he، an ki khoahshat ki piroi ki، to iqinaan tmhara shmar zalmon min hoga
2.146: Jn logon ko hm ne ktab di he، oh ais mqam ko (jse qblh bnaia gia he) aisa phchante hin، jisa apni aolad ko phchante hin mgr an min se aik groh jante bojhte hq ko chhpa rha he
2.147: Ih qtعi aik amr hq he tmhare rb ki trf se، lhaza as ke mtعlq tm hrgz ksi shk min nh pro
2.148: Hr aik ke lie aik rukh he، js ki trf oh mrta he ps bhla eion ki trf sbqt kro jhan bhi tm ho ge، allh tmhin pa le ga aus ki qdrt se koei chiz bahr nhin
2.149: Tmhara gzr js mqam se bhi ho، ohin apna rukh (nmaz ke oqt) msjd hram ki trf phir do، kionkh ih tmhare rb ka balkl hq fislh he aor allh tm logon ke aعmal se be khbr nhin he
2.150: Aor jhan se bhi tmhara gzr ho، apna rukh msjd hram ki trf phira kro، aor jhan bhi tm ho، ausi ki trf mnh kr ke nma z prho takh logon ko tmhare khlaf koei hjt nh mle han jo zalm hin، aun ki zban ksi hal min bnd nh hogi to aun se tm nh dro، blkh mjh se dro aor as lie kh min tm pr apni nعmt pori kr don aor as toqع pr kh mire as hkm ki piroi se tm asi trh flah ka rasth paؤ ge
2.151: Js trh (tmhin ais chiz se flah nsib hoei kh) min ne tmhare drmian khod tm min se aik rsol bhija، jo tmhin miri aaiat snata he، tmhari zndgion ko snoarta he، tmhin ktab aor hkmt ki tعlim dita he، aor tmhin oh batin skhata he، jo tm nh jante the
2.152: Lhaza tm mjhe iad rkho، min tmhin iad rkhon ga aor mira shkr ada kro، kfran nعmt nh kro
2.153: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، sbr aor nmaz se mdd lo allh sbr krne oalon ke sath he
2.154: Aor jo log allh ki rah min mare jaein، anhin murdh nh kho، aise log to hqiqt min zndh hin، mgr tmhin an ki zndgi ka shعor nhin hota
2.155: Aor hm zror tmhin khof o khtr، faqh kshi، jan o mal ke nqsanat aor aamdnion ke ghate min mbtla kr ke tmhari aazmaesh krin ge
2.156: Ain halat min jo log sbr krin aor jb koei msibt pre، to khin kh: "hm allh hi ke hin aor allh hi ki trf hmin plt kr jana he"
2.157: Anhin khosh khbri de do an pr an ke rb ki trf se bri عnaiat hon gi، aus ki rhmt aun pr saih kre gi aor aise hi log rast rao hin
2.158: Iqinaan sfa aor maroh، allh ki nshanion min se hin lhaza jo shkhs bit allh ka hj ia عmrh kre، as ke lie koei gnah ki bat nhin kh oh ain donon pharion ke drmian sعi kr le aor jo brza o rghbt koei bhlaei ka kam kre ga، allh ko as ka عlm he ao r oh as ki qdr krne oala he
2.159: Jo log hmari nazl ki hoei roshn tعlimat aor hdaiat ko chhpate hin، draan halikh hm anhin sb ansanon ki rhnmaei ke lie apni ktab min bian kr chke hin، iqin jano kh allh bhi an pr lعnt krta he aor tmam lعnt krne oale bhi aun pr lعnt bhijte hin
2.160: Albth jo as rosh se baz aa jaein aor apne trz عml ki aslah kr lin aor jo kchh chhpate the، ause bian krne lgin، aun ko min mعaf kr don ga aor min bra dr gzr krne oala aor rhm krne oala hon
2.161: Jn logon ne kfr ka roih akhtiar kia aor kfr ki halt hi min jan di، an pr allh aor frshton aor tmam ansanon ki lعnt he
2.162: Asi lعnt zdgi ki halt min oh hmishh rhin ge، nh aun ki sz amin tkhfif hogi aor nh anhin phr koei dosri mhlt di jaee gi
2.163: Tmhara khda aik hi khda he، aus rhman aor rhim ke soa koei aor khda nhin he
2.164: (ais hqiqt ko phchanne ke lie agr koei nshani aor عlamt drka rhe to) jo log عql se kam lite hin aun ke lie aasmanon aor zmin ki sakht min، rat aor dn ke pihm aik dosre ke bعd aane min، aun kshtion min joa nsan ke nfع ki chizin lie hoee driaؤn aor smndron min chlti phrti hin، barsh ke aus pani min jse allh aopr se brsata he phr as ke zriعe se zmin ko zndgi bkhshta he aor apne aisi antzam ki bdolt zmin min hr qsm ki jan dar mkhloq philata he، hoaؤn ki grdsh min، aor aun badlon min jo aasman aor zmin ke drmian tabع frman bna kr rkhe gee hin، be shmar nshanian hin
2.165: (mgr ohdt khdaondi pr dlalt krne oale ain khle khle aasar ke hote hoee bhi) kchh log aise hin jo allh ke soa dosron ko as ka hmsr aor mdmqabl bnate hin aor aun ke aise groidh hin jise allh ke sath groidgi honi chahie halankh aiman rkhne oale log sb se brh kr allh ko mhbob rkhte hin kash، jo kchh عzab ko samne dikh kr anhin suojhne oala he oh aaj hi ain zalmon ko sojh jaee kh sari taqtin aor sare akhtiarat allh hi ke qbze min hin aor ih kh allh sza dine min bhi bht skht he
2.166: Jb oh sza de ga as oqt kifit ih hogi kh ohi pishoa aor rhnma، jn ki dnia min piroi ki gei thi، apne piroؤn se be tعlqi zahr krin ge، mgr sza pa kr rhin ge aor an ke sare asbab o osael ka slslh kt jaee ga
2.167: Aor oh log jo dnia min aun ki piroi krte the، khin ge kh kash hm ko phr aik moqع dia jata to js trh aaj ih hm se bizari zahr kr rhe hin، hm ain se bizar ho kr dkha dite ion allh ain logon ke oh aعmal jo ih dnia min kr rhe hin، an ke samne ais trh laee ga kh ih hsrton aor pshimanion ke sath hath mlte rhin ge mgr aag se nklne ki koei rah nh paein ge
2.168: Logo! Zmin min jo hlal aor pak chizin hin anhin khaؤ aor shitan ke btaee hoee raston pr nh chlo oh tmhara khla dshmn he
2.169: Tmhin bdi aor fhsh ka hkm dita he aor ih skhata he kh tm allh ke nam pr oh batin kho jn ke mtعlq tmhin عlm nhin he kh oh allh ne frmaei hin
2.170: An se jb kha jata he kh allh ne jo ahkam nazl kie hin aun ki piroi kro to joab dite hin kh hm to asi triqe ki piroi krin ge js pr hm ne apne bap dada ko paia he achha agr an ke bap dada ne عql se kchh bhi kam nh lia ho aor rah rast nh paei ho to kia phr bhi ih anhin ki piroi kie chle jaein ge?
2.171: Ih log jnhon ne khda ke btaee hoee triqe pr chlne se ankar kr dia he ain ki halt balkl aisi he jise chroaha janoron ko pkarta he aor oh hank pkar ki sda ke soa kchh nhin snte ih bhre hin، gonge hin، andhe hin، as lie koei bat an ki smjh min nhin aati
2.172: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، agr tm hqiqt min allh ki bndgi krne oale ho to jo pak chizin hm ne tmhin bkhshi hin aunhin be tklf khaؤ aor allh ka shkr ada kro
2.173: Allh ki trf se agr koei pabndi tm pr he to oh ih he kh murdar nh khaؤ، khon se aor sor ke gosht se prhiz kro aor koei chiz nh khaؤ js pr allh ke soa ksi aor ka nam lia gia ho han jo shkhs mjbori ki halt min ho aor oh an min se koei chiz kha le bghir as ke kh oh qanon shkni ka aradh rkhta ho ia zrort ki hd se tjaoz kr e، to as pr kchh gnah nhin، allh bkhshne oala aor rhm krne oala he
2.174: Hq ih he kh jo log aun ahkam ko chhpate hin jo allh ne apni ktab min naz l kie hin aor thore se dunioi faedon pra nhin bhint chrhate hin، oh drasl apne pit aag se bhr rhe hin qiamt ke roz allh hrgz an se bat nh kre ga، nh aunhin pakizh thiraee ga، aor aun ke lie drdnak sza he
2.175: Ih oh log hin jnhon ne hdait ke bdle zlalt khridi aor mghfrt ke bdle عzab mol le lia kisa عjib he an ka hoslh kh jhnm ka عzab brdasht krne ke lie tiar hin
2.176: Ih sb kchh as ojh se hoa kh allh ne to thik thik hq ke mtabq ktab nazl ki thi mgr jn logon ne ktab min akhtlaf nkale oh apne jhgron min hq se bht dor nkl gee
2.177: Niki ih nhin he kh tm ne apne chhre mshrq ki trf kr lie ia mghrb ki trf، blkh niki ih he kh aadmi allh ko aor iom aakhr aor mlaekh ko aor allh ki nazl ki hoei ktab aor as ke pighmbron ko dl se mane aor allh ki mhbt min apna dl psnd mal rshte daron aor itimon pr، mskinon ao rmsafron pr، mdd ke lie hath philane oalon pr aor ghlamo n ki rhaei pr khrch kre، nmaz qaem kre aor zkoaۃ de aor nik oh log hin kh jb عhd krin to ause ofa krin، aor tngi o msibt ke oqt min aor hq o batl ki jng min sbr krin ih hin rastbaz log aor ihi log mtqi hin
2.178: A e logo jo aiman laee ho، tmhare lie qtl ke mqdmon min qsas ka hkm lkh dia gia he aazad aadmi ne qtl kia ho to as aazad hi se bdlh lia jaee، ghlam qatl ho to oh ghlam hi qtl kia jaee، aor عort ais jrm ki mrtkb ho toa s عort hi se qsas lia jaee han agr ksi qatl ke sath as ka bhaei kchh nrmi krne ke lie tiar ho، to mعrof triqe ke mtabq khon bha ka tsfih hona chahie aor qatl ko lazm he kh rasti ke sath khon bha ada kre ih tmhare rb ki trf se tkhfif aor rhmt he as pr bhi jo ziadti kre، as ke lie drdnak sza he
2.179: عql o khrd rkhne oalo! Tmhare lie qsas min zndgi he aumid he kh tm as qanon ki khlaf orzi se prhiz kro ge
2.180: Tm pr frz kia gia he kh jb tm min se ksi ki mot ka oqt aaee aor oh apne pichhe mal chhor rha ho، to oaldin aor rshth daron ke lie mعrof triqe se osit kre ih hq he mtqi logon pr
2.181: Phr jnhon ne osit sni aor bعd min ause bdl dala، toa s ka gnah an bdlne oalon pr hoga allh sb kchh snta aor janta he
2.182: Albth js ko ih andishh ho kh osit krne oale ne nadansth ia qsdaan hq tlfi ki he، aor phr mعamle se tعlq rkhne oalon ke drmian oh aslah kre، to as pr kchh gnah nhin he، allh bkhshne oala aor rhm frmane oala he
2.183: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، tm pr roze frz kr die gee، js trh tm se phle anbia ke piroؤn pr frz kie gee the as se toqع he kh tm min tqoia ki sft pida hogi
2.184: Chnd mqrr dnon ke roze hin agr tm min se koei bimar ho، ia sfr pr ho to dosre dnon min atni hi tعdad pori kr le aor jo log rozh rkhne ki qdrt rkhte hon (phr nh rkhin) to oh fdih din aik roze ka fdih aik mskin ko khana khlana he aor jo apni khoshi se kchh ziadh bhlaei kre to ih asi ke lie bhtr he likn agr tm smjho، to tmhare hq min achha ihi he kh rozh rkho
2.185: Rmzan oh mhinh he، js min qraan nazl kia gia jo ansanon ke lie srasr hdait he aor aisi oazh tعlimat pr mshtml he، jo rah rast dkhane oali aor hq o batl ka frq khol kr rkh dine oali hin lhaza ab se jo shkhs as mhine ko paee، aus ko lazm he kh ais pore mhine ke roze rkhe aor jo koei mriz ho ia sfr pr ho، to oh dosre dnon min rozon ki tعdad pori kre allh tmhare sath nrmi krna chahta he، skhti krna nhin chahta as lie ih triqh tmhin btaia ja rha he takh tm rozon ki tعdad pori krsko aor js hdait se allh ne tmhin srfraz kia he، aus pr allh ki kbria ei ka azhar o aعtraf kro aor shkr gzar bno
2.186: Aor ae nbiؐ، mire bnde agr tm se mire mtعlq pochhin، to aunhin bta do kh min an se qrib hi hon pkarne oala jb mjhe pkarta he، min aus ki pkar snta aor joab dita hon lhaza anhin chahie kh miri dعot pr lbik khin aor mjh pr aiman laein ih bat tm aunhin sna do، shaid kh oh rah rast palin
2.187: Tmhare lie rozon ke zmane min raton ko apni bioion ke pas jana hlal kr dia gia he oh tmhare lie lbas hin aor tm aun ke lie allh ko mعlom ho gia kh tm log chpke chpke apne aap se khiant kr rhe the، mgr au s ne tmhara qsor mعaf kr dia aor tm se drgzr frmaia ab tm apni bioion ke sath shb bashi kro aor jo ltf allh ne tmhare lie jaez kr dia he، ause hasl kro niz raton ko khaؤ pio ihan tk kh tm ko siahi shb ki dhari se spidhٔ sbh ki dhari nmaian nzr aa jaee tb ih sb kam chhor kr rat tk apna rozh pora kro aor jb tm msjdon min mعtkf ho، to bioion se mbashrt nh kro ih allh ki bandhi hoei hdin hin، an ke qrib nh phtkna ais trh allh apne ahkam logon ke lie bsraht bian krta he، toqع he kh oh ghlt roie se bchin ge
2.188: Aor tm log nh to aaps min aik dosre ke mal naroa triqh se khaؤ aor nh hakmon ke aage an ko as ghrz ke lie pish kro kh tmhin dosron ke mal ka koei hsh qsdaan zalmanh triqe se khane ka moqع ml jaee
2.189: Log tm se chand ki ghtti brhti sorton ke mtعlq pochhte hin kho: ih logon ke lie tarikhon ki tعin ki aor hj ki عlamtin hin niz an se kho: ih koei niki ka kam nhin he kh apne ghron min pichhe ki trf dakhl hote ho niki to asl min ih he kh aadmi allh ki narazi se bche lhaza tm apne ghron min droaze hi se aaia kro albth allh se drte rho shaid kh tmhin flah nsib ho jaee
2.190: Aor tm allh ki rah min aun logon se lro، jo tm se lrte hin، mgr ziadti nh kro kh allh ziadti krne oalon ko psnd nhin krta
2.191: An se lro jhan bhi tmhara aun se mqablh pish aaee aor anhin nkalo jhan se anhon ne tm ko nkala he، as lie kh qtl agrchh bra he، mgr ftnh as se bhi ziadh bra he aor msjd hram ke qrib jb tk oh tm se nh lrin، tm bhi nh lro، mgr jb oh ohan lrne se nh chuokin، to tm bhi be tklf anhin maro kh aise kafron ki ihi sza he
2.192: Phr agr oh baz aa jaein، to jan lo kh allh mعaf krne oala aor rhm frmane oala he
2.193: Tm an se lrte rho ihan tk kh ftnh baqi nh rhe aor din allh ke lie ho jaee phr agr oh baz aa jaein، to smjh lo kh zalmon ke soa aor ksi pr dst drazi roa nhin
2.194: Mah hram ka bdlh hram hi he aor tmam hrmton ka lhaz brabri ke sath hoga lhaza jotm pr dst drazi kre، tm bhi asi trh as pr dst drazi kro albth allh se drte rho aor jan rkho kh allh anhin logon ke sath he، jo as ki hdod torne se prhiz krte hin
2.195: Allh ki rah min khrch kro aor apne hathon apne aap ko hlakt min nh dalo ahsan ka triqh akhtiar kro kh allh mhsno n ko psnd krta he
2.196: Allh ki khoshnodi ke lie jb hj aor عmre ki nit kro، to ause pora kro aor agr khin ghr jaؤ to jo qrbani misr aaee، allh ki jnab min pish kro aor apne sr nh mondo jb tk kh qrbani apni jgh nh phnch jaee mgr jo shkhs mriz ho ia js ke sr min koei tklif ho aor as bna pr apna sr mndoa le، to ause chahie kh fdie ke tor pr roze rkhe ia sdqh de ia qrbani kre phr agr tmhin amn nsib ho jaee (aor tm hj se phle mke phnch jaؤ)، to jo shkhs tm min se hj ka zmanh aane tk عmre ka faedh athaee، oh hsb mqdor qrbani de، aor a gr qrbani misr nh ho، to tin roze hj ke zmane min aor sat ghr phnch kr، ais trh pore ds roze rkh le ih rعait aun logon ke lie he، jn ke ghr bar msjd hram ke qrib nh hon allh ke ain ahkam ki khlaf orzi se bcho aor khob jan lo kh allh skht sza dine oala he
2.197: Hj ke mhine sb ko mعlom hin jo shkhs an mqrr mhinon min hj ki nit kre، ause khbrdar rhna chahie kh hj ke doran as se koei shhoani fعl، koei bd عmli، koei lraei jhgre ki bat srzd nh ho aor jo nik kam tm kro ge، oh allh ke عlm min hoga sfr hj ke lie zad rah sath le jaؤ، aor sb se bhtr zad rah prhizgari he ps ae hosh mndo! Mir i na frmani se prhiz kro
2.198: Aor agr hj ke sath sath apne rb ka fzl bhi tlash krte jaؤ، to as min koei mzaeqh nhn phr jb عrfat se chlo، to mshعr hram (mzdlfh) ke pas thir kr allh ko iad kro aor aus trh iad kro، js ki hdait as ne tmhin di he، ornh as se phle tm log bhtke hoee the
2.199: Phr jhan se sb log pltte hin ohin se tm bhi plto aor allh se mعafi chaho، iqinaan oh mعaf krne oala aor rhm frmane oala he
2.200: Phr jb apne hj ke arkan ada kr chko، to js trh phle apne aaba o ajdad ka zkr krte the، aus trh ab allh ka zkr kro، blkh as se bhi brh kr (mgr allh ko iad krne oale logon min bhi bht frq he) aun min se koei to aisa he، jo khta he kh ae hmare rb، hmin dnia hi min sb kchh dide aise shkhs ke lie aakhrt min koei hsh nhin
2.201: Aor koei khta he kh ae hmare rb! Hmin dnia min bhi bhlaei de aor aakhrt min bhi bhlaei aor aag ke عzab se hmin bcha
2.202: Aise log apni kmaei ke mtabq (donon jgh) hsh paein ge aor allh ko hsab chkate kchh dir nhin lgti
2.203: Ih gnti ke chnd roz hin، jo tmhin allh ki iad min bsr krne chahiin phr jo koei jldi kr ke do hi dn min oaps ho gia to koei hrj nhin، aor jo kchh dir ziadh thir kr plta to bhi koei hrj nhin bshr tikh ih dn as ne tqoia ke sath bsr kie ho allh ki nafrmani se bcho aor khob jan rkho kh aik roz as ke hzor min tmhari pishi hone oali he
2.204: Ansanon min koei to aisa he، js ki batin dnia ki zndgi min tmhin bht bhli mعlom hoti hin، aor apni nik niti pr oh bar bar khd a ko goah thira ta he، mgr hqiqt min oh bd trin dshmn hq hota he
2.205: Jb ause aqtdar hasl ho jata he، to zmin min aus ki sari dor dhop as lie hoti he kh fsad philaee، khiton ko ghart kre aor nsl ansani ko tbah kre halan kh allh (jse oh goah bna rha tha) fsad ko hrgz psnd nhin krta
2.206: Aor jb as se kha jata he kh allh se dr، to apne oqar ka khial aus ko gnah pr jma dita he aise shkhs ke lie to bs jhnm hi kafi he aor oh bht bra thkana he
2.207: Dosri trf ansanon hi min koei aisa bhi he، jo rza ee alahi ki tlb min apni jan khpa dita he aor aise bndon pr allh bht mhrban he
2.208: Ae aiman lane oalo! Tm pore ke pore aslam min aa jaؤ aor shitan ki piroi nh kro kh oh tmhara khla dshmn he
2.209: Jo saf saf hdaiat tmhare pa s aa chki hin، agr an ko pa line ke bعd phr tm ne lghz sh khaei، to khob jan rkho kh allh sb pr ghalb aor hkim o dana he
2.210: (ain sari nsihton aor hdaiton ke bعd bhi log sidhe nh hon، to) kia ab oh ais ke mntzr hin kh allh badlon ka chtr lgaee frshton ke pre sa th lie khod samne aa mojod ho aor fislh hi kr dala jaee? Aakhr kar sare mعamlat pish to allh hi ke hzor hone oale hin
2.211: Bni asraeil se pochho: kisi khli khli nshanian hm ne aunhin dkhaei hin (aor phr ih bhi anhin se pochh lo kh) allh ki nعmt pane ke bعd jo qom as ko shqaot se bdlti he ause allh kisi skht szadita he
2.212: Jn logon ne kfr ki rah akhtiar ki he، aun ke lie dnia ki zndgi bri mhbob o dl psnd bna di gei he aise log aiman ki rah akhtiar krne oalon ka mzaq arate hin، mgr qiamt ke roz prhiz gar log hi aun ke mqable min عali mqam hon ge rha dnia ka rzq، to allh ko akhtiar he، jse chahe be hsab de
2.213: Abtda min sb log aik hi triqh pr the (phr ih halt baqi nh rhi aor akhtlafat ronma hoee) tb allh ne nbi bhije jo rast roi pr bshart dine oale aor kj roi ke ntaej se drane oale the، aor aun ke sath ktab br hq nazl ki takh hq ke bare min logon ke drmian jo akhtlafat ronma hogee the، an ka fislh kre (aor an akhtlafat ke ronma hone ki ojh ih nh thi kh abtda min logon ko hq btaia nhin gia tha nhin،) akhtlaf aun logon ne kia، jnhin hq ka عml dia chka tha aunhon ne roshn hdaiat pa line ke bعd mhz as ke lie hq ko chhor kr mkhtlf triqe nkale kh oh aaps min ziadti krna chahte the ps jo log anbia pr aiman le aaee، anhin allh ne apne azn se aus hq ka rasth dkha dia، js min logon ne akhtlaf kia tha allh jse chahta he، rah rast dkha dita he
2.214: Phr kia tm logon ne ih smjh rkha he kh ionhi jnt ka dakhlh tmhin ml jaee ga، halankh abhi tm pr oh sb kchh nhin gzra he، jo tm se phle aiman lane oalon pr gzr chka he? Aun pr skhtian gzrin، msibtin aaein، hla mare gee، htia kh oqt karsol aor as ke sathi ahl aiman chikh athe kh allh ki mdd kb aaee gi aus oqt anhin tsli di gei kh han allh ki mdd qrib he
2.215: Log pochhte hin kh hm kia khrch krin? Joab do kh jo mal bhi tm khrch kro apne oaldin pr، rshte daron pr، itimon aor mskinon aor msafron pr khrch kro aor jo bhlaei bhi tm kro ge، allh as se bakhbr hoga
2.216: Tmhin jng ka hkm dia gia he aor oh tmhin nagoar he hoskta he kh aik chiz tmhin nagoar ho aor ohi tmhare lie bhtr ho aor hoskta he kh aik chiz tmhin psnd ho aor ohi tmhare lie bri ho allh janta he، tm nhin jante
2.217: Log pochhte hin mah hram min lrna kisa he? Kho: ais min lr na bht bra he، mgr rah khda se logon ko rokna aor allh se kfr krna aor msjd hram ka rasth khda prston pr bnd krna aor hrm ke rhne oalon ko ohan se nkalna allh ke nzdik ais se bhi ziadh bra he aor ftnh khonrizi se shdid tr he oh to tm se lre hi jaein ge htia kh agr aun ka bs chle، to tmhin ais din se phra le jaein (aor ih khob smjh lo kh) tm min se jo koei as din se phre ga aor kfr ki halt min jan de ga، as ke aعmal dnia aor aakhrt donon min zaeع ho jaein ge aise sb log jhnmi hin aor hmishh jhnm hi min rhin ge
2.218: Bkhla f ais ke jo log aiman laee hin aor jnhon ne khda ki rah min apna ghr bar chhora aor jhad kia he، oh rhmt alahi ke jaez amidoar hin aor allh an ki lghzshon ko mعaf krne oala aor apni rhmt se anhin noazne oala he
2.219: Pochhte hin: shrab aor joee ka kia hkm he? Kho: an donon chizon min bri khrabi he agrchh an min logon ke lie kchh mnafع bhi hin، mgr an ka gnah aun ke faede se bht ziadh he pochhte hin: hm rah khda min kia khrch krin? Kho: jo kchh tmhari zrort se ziadh ho as trh allh tmhare lie saf saf ahkam bian krta he، shaid kh tm dnia aor aakhrt donon ki fkr kro
2.220: Pochhte hin: itimon ke sath kia mعamlh kia jaee? Kho: js trz عml min an ke lie bhlaei ho، ohi akhtiar krna bhtr he agr tm apna aor aun ka khrch aor rhna shna mshtrk rkho، to as min koei mzaeqh nhin aakhr oh tmhare bhaei bnd hi to hin braei krne oale aor bhlaei krne oale، donon ka hal allh pr roshn he allh chahta to as mعamle min tm pr skhti krta، mgr oh sahb akhtiar hone ke sath sahb hkmt bhi he
2.221: Tm mshrk عorton se hrgz nkah nh krna، jb tk kh oh aiman nh le aaein aik momn londi mshrk shrif zadi se bhtr he، agrchh oh tmhin bht psnd ho aor apni عorton ke nkah mshrk mrdon se kbhi nh krna، jb tk kh oh aiman nh le aaein aik momn ghlam mshrk shrif se bhtr he agrchh oh tmhin bht psnd ho ih log tmhin aag ki trf blate hin aor allh apne azn se tm ko jnt aor mghfrt ki trf blata he، aor oh apne ahkam oazh tor pr logon ke samne bian krta he، toqع he kh oh sbq lin ge aor nsiht qbol krin ge
2.222: Pochhte hin: hiz ka kia hkm he? Kho: oh aik gndgi ki halt he as min عorton se alg rho aor an ke qrib nh jaؤ، jb tk kh oh pak saf nh ho jaein phr jb oh pak ho jaein، to aun ke pas jaؤ aus trh jisa kh allh ne tm ko hkm dia he allh aun logon ko psnd krta he، jo bdi se baz rhin aor pakizgi akhtiar krin
2.223: Tmhari عortin tmhari khitian hin tmhin akhtiar he، js trh chaho، apni khiti min jaؤ، mgr apne mstqbl ki fkr kro aor allh ki narazi se bcho khob jan lo kh tmhin aik dn aus se mlna he aor ae nbiؐ! Jo tmhari hdaiat ko man lin anhin flah o sعadt ka msrdh sna do
2.224: Allh ke nam ko aisi qsmin khane ke lie astعmal nh kro، jn se mqsod niki aor tqoia aor bnd gan khda ki bhlaei ke kamon se baz rhna ho allh tmhari sari batin sn rha he aor sb kchh janta he
2.225: Jo be mعni qsmin tm bla aradh kha lia krte ho، aun pr allh grft nhin krta، mgr jo qsmin tm sche dl se khate ho، aun ki baz prs oh zror kre ga allh bht dr gzr krne oala aor brdbar he
2.226: Jo log apni عorton se tعlq nh rkhne ki qsm kha bithe hin، aun ke lie char mhine ki mhlt he agr anhon ne rjoع kr lia، to allh mعaf krne oala aor rhim he
2.227: Aor agr aunhon ne tlaq hi ki than li ho to jane rhin kh allh sb kchh snta aor janta he
2.228: Jn عorton ko tlaq di gei ho، oh tin mrtbh aiam mahoari aane tk apne aap ko roke rkhin aor aun ke lie ih jaez nhin he kh allh ne aun ke rhm min jo kchh khlq frmaia ho، ause chhpaein aunhin hrgz aisa nh krna chahie، agr oh allh aor roz aakhr pr aiman rkhti hin aun ke shohr tعlqat drst kr line pr aamadh hon، to oh ais عdt ke doran aunhin phr apni zojit min oaps le line ke hq dar hin عorton ke lie bhi mعrof triqe pr oise hi hqoq hin، jise mrdon ke hqoq aun pr hin albth mrdon ko aun pr aik drjh hasl he aor sb pr allh ghalb aqtdar rkhne oala aor hkim o dana mojod he
2.229: Tlaq do bar he phr ia to sidhi trh عort ko rok lia jaee ia bhle triqe se as ko rkhst kr dia jaee aor rkhst kr te hoee aisa krna tmhare lie jaez nhin he kh jo kchh tm anhin de chke ho، aus min se kchh oaps le lo albth ih sort mstsnia he kh zojin ko allh ke hdod pr qaem nh rh skne ka andishh ho aisi sort min agr tmhin ih khof ho kh oh donon hdod alahi pr qaem nh rhin ge، to aun donon ke drmian ih mعamlh ho jane min mzaeqh nhin kh عort apne shohr ko kchh mعaozh de kr عlihdgi hasl kr le ih allh ke mqrr krdh hdod hin، ain se tjaoz nh kro aor jo log hdod alahi se tjaoz krin، ohi zalm hin
2.230: Phr agr (do barh tlaq dine ke bعd shohr ne عort ko tisri bar) tlaq de di to oh عort phr as ke lie hlal nh hogi، alّa ih kh as ka nkah ksi dosre shkhs se ho aor oh ase tlaq dide tb agr phla shohr aor ih عort donon ih khial krin kh hdod alahi pr qaem rhin ge، to an ke lie aik dosre ki trf rjo ع kr line min koei mzaeqh nhin ih allh ki mqrr krdh hdin hin، jnhin oh aun logon ki hdait ke lie oazh kr rha he، jo (as ki hdod ko torne ka anjam) jante hin
2.231: Aor jb tm عorton ko tlaq de do aor an ki عdt pori hone ko aa jaee، to ia bhle triqe se anhin rok lo ia bhle triqe se rkhst kr do mhz stane ki khatr anhin nh roke rkhna ih ziadti hogi aor jo aisa kre ga، oh dr hqiqt aap apne hi aopr zlm kre ga allh ki aaiat ka khil nh bnaؤ bhol nh jaؤ kh allh ne ks nعmt عzmia se tmhin srfraz kia he oh tmhin nsiht krta he kh jo ktab aor hkmt aus ne tm pr nazl ki he، as ka ahtram mlhoz rkho allh se dro aor khob jan lo kh allh ko hr bat ki khbr he
2.232: Jb tm apni عorton ko tlaq de chko aor oh apni عdt pori kr lin، to phr as min manع nh ho kh oh apne zir tjoiz shohron se nkah kr lin، jb kh oh mعrof triqe se bahm mnakht pr razi hon tmhin nsiht ki jati he kh aisi hrkt hrgz nh krna، agr tm allh aor roz aakhr pr aiman lane oale ho tmhare lie shaesth aor pakizh triqh ihi he kh as se baz rho allh janta he، tm nhin jante
2.233: Jo bap chahte hon kh an ki aola d pori mdt rzaعt tk dodh pie، to maein apne bchon ko kaml do sal dodh plaein ais sort min bche ke bap ko mعrof triqe se anhin khana kpra dina hoga mgr ksi pr as ki osعt se brh kr bar nh dalna chahie nh to man ko ais ojh se tklif min dala jaee kh bchh as ka he، aor nh bap hi ko as ojh se tng kia jaee kh bchh as ka he dodh plane oali ka ih hq jisa bche ke bap pr he oisa hi as ke oars pr bhi he likn agr friqin bahmi rzamndi aor mshore se dodh chhrana chahin، to aisa krne min koei mzaeqh nhin aor agr tmhara khial apni aolad ko ksi ghir عort se dodh ploane ka ho، to as min bhi koei hrj nhin bshr tikh as ka jo kchh mعaozh te kro، oh mعrof triqe pr ada kr do allh se dro aor jan rkho kh jo kchh tm krte ho، sb allh ki nzr min he
2.234: Tm min se jo log mr jaein، aun ke pichhe agr aun ki bioian zndh hon، to oh apne aap ko char mhine، ds dn roke rkhin phr jb an ki عdt pori ho jaee، to anhin akhtiar he، apni zat ke mعamle min mعrof triqe se jo chahin، krin tm pr as ki koei zmh dari nhin allh tm sb ke aعmal se bakhbr he
2.235: Zmanh عdt min khoah tm aun bioh عorton ke sath mngni ka aradh ashare knaie min zahr kr do، khoah dl min chhpaee rkho، donon sorton min koei mzaeqh nhin allh janta he kh aun ka khial to tmhare dl min aaee ga hi mgr dikho! Khfih عhd o piman nh krna agr koei bat krni he، to mعrf triqe se kro aor عqd nkah bandhne ka fislh aus oqt tk nh kro، jb tk kh عdt pori nh ho jaee khob smjh lo kh allh tmhare dlon ka hal tk janta he lhaza as se dro aor ih bhi jan lo kh allh brdbar he، chhoti chhoti baton se drgzr frmata he
2.236: Tm pr kchh gna h nhin، agr apni tm عorton ko tlaq de do qbl as ke kh hath lgane ki nobt aaee ia mhr mqrr ho as sort min aunhin kchh nh kchh dina zror chahie khosh hal aadmi apni mqdrt ke mtabq aor ghrib apni mqdrt ke mtabq mعrof triqh se de ih hq he nik aadmion pr
2.237: Aor agr tm ne hath lgane se phle tlaq di he، likn mhr mqrr kia ja chka ho، to as sort min nsf mhr dina hoga ih aor bat he kh عort nrmi brte (aor mhr nh le) ia oh mrd، js ke akhtiar min عqd nkah he، nrmi se kam le (aor pora mhr dide)، aor tm (iعni mrd) nrmi se kam lo، to ih tqoia se ziadh mnasbt rkhta he aaps ke mعamlat min fiazi ko nh bholo tmhare aعmal ko allh dikh rha he
2.238: Apni nmazon ki nghdasht rkho، khsosaan aisi nmaz ki jo mhasn sloaۃ ki ja mع ho allh ke aage as trh khre ho، jise fr man brdar ghlam khr e hote hin
2.239: Bdamni ki halt ho، to khoah pidl ho، khoah soar، js trh mmkn ho، nmaz prho aor jb amn misr aajaee، to allh ko aus triqe se iad kro، jo aus ne tmhin skha dia he، js se tm phle na oaqf the
2.240: Tm min se jo logon ofat paein aor pichhe bioian chhor rhe hon، aun ko chahie kh apni bioion ke hq min ih osit kr jaein kh aik sal tk an ko nan o nfqh dia jaee aor oh ghr se nh nkali jaein phr agr oh khod nkl jaein، to apni zat ke mعamle min mعrof triqe se oh jo kchh bhi krin، as ki koei zmh dari tm pr nhin he allh sb pr ghalb aqtdar rkhne oala aor hkim o dana he
2.241: Aisi trh jn عorton ko tlaq di gei ho، anhin bhi mnasb tor pr kchh nh kchh de kr rkhst kia jaee ih hq he mtqi logon pr
2.242: Ais trh allh apne ahkam tmhin saf saf btata he amid he kh tm smjh bojh kr kam kro ge
2.243: Tm ne aun logon ke hal pr bhi kchh ghor kia، jo mot ke dr se apne ghr bar chhor kr nkle the aor hzaron ki tعdad min the? Allh ne aun se frmaia: mr jaؤ phr aus ne aun ko dobarh zndgi bkhshi hqiqt ih he kh allh ansan pr bra fzl frmane oala he mgr aksr log shkr ada nhin krte
2.244: Mslmano! Allh ki rah min jng kro aor khob jan rkho kh allh snne oala aor janne oala he
2.245: Tm min kon he jo allh ko qrz hsn de takh allh ause kei gna brha chrha kr oaps kre? Ghtana bhi allh ke akhtiar min he aor brhana bhi، aor ausi ki trf tmhin plt kr jana he
2.246: Phr tm ne aus mعamle pr bhi ghor kia، jo mosiaؑ ke bعd srdaran bni asraeil ko pish aaia tha? Aunhon ne apne nbi se kha: hmare lie aik badshah mqrr kr do takh hm allh ki rah min jng krin nbi ne pochha: khin aisa to nh hoga kh tm ko lraei ka hkm dia jaee aor phr tm nh lro oh khne lge : bhla ih kise ho skta he kh hm rah khda min nh lrin، jbkh hmin apne ghron se nkal dia gia he aor hmare bal bche hm se jda kr die gee hin mgr jb an ko jng ka hkm dia gia، to aik qlil tعdad ke soa oh sb pith mor gee، aor allh an min se aik aik zalm ko janta he
2.247: Aun ke nbi ne an se kha kh allh ne talot ko tmhare lie badshah mqrr kia he ih sn kr oh bole : "hm pr badshah bnne ka oh kise hqdar ho gia? Aus ke mqable min badshahi ke hm ziadh msthq hin oh to koei bra ma l dar aadmi nhin he" nbi ne joab dia: "allh ne tmhare mqable min asi ko mntkhb kia he aor as ko dmaghi o jsmani donon qsm ki ahlitin fraoani ke sath عta frmaei hin aor allh ko akhtiar he kh apna mlk jse chahe de، allh bri osعt rkhta he aor sb kchh aus ke عlm min he"
2.248: As ke sath aun ke nbi ne aun ko ih bhi btaia kh "khda ki trf se aus ke badshah mqrr hone ki عlamt ih he kh as ke عhd min oh sndoq tmhin oaps ml jaee ga، js min tmhare rb ki trf se tmhare lie skon qlb ka saman he، js min aal mosiaؑ aor aal haron ke chhore hoee tbrkat hin، aor js ko as oqt frshte snbhale hoee hin agr tm momn ho، to ih tmhare lie bht bri nshani he
2.249: Phr jb talot lshkr le kr chla، to aus ne kha: "aik dria pr allh ki trf se tmhari aazmaesh hone oali he joas ka pani pie ga، oh mira sathi nhin mira sathi srf oh he jo as se pias nh bjhaee، han aik aadh chlo koei pi le، to pi le" mgr aik groh qlil ke soa oh sb as dria se sirab hoee phr jb talot aor as ke sathi mslman dria par kr ke aage brhe، to aunhon ne talot se khh dia kh aaj hm min jalot aor as ke lshkron ka mqablh krne ki taqt nhin he likn jo log ih smjhte the kh anhin aik dn allh se mlna he، anhon ne kha: "barha aisa hoa he kh aik qlil groh allh ke azn se aik bre groh pr ghalb aagia he allh sbr krne oalon ka sathi he"
2.250: Aor jb oh jalot aor as ke lshkron ke mqablh pr nkle، to anhon ne dعa ki: "ae hmare rb hm pr sbr ka fizan kr، hmare qdm jma de aor as kafr groh pr hmin fth nsib kr"
2.251: Aakhr ka r allh ke azn se aunhon ne kafron ko mar bhgaia aor daؤdؑ ne jalot ko qtl kr dia aor allh ne ase sltnt aor hkmt se noaza aor jn jn chizon ka chaha، as ko عlm dia agr as trh allh ansanon ke aik groh ko dosre groh ke zriعe htata nh rhta، to zmin ka nzam bgr jata، likn dnia ke logon pr allh ka bra fzl he (kh oh ais trh dfع fsad ka antzam krta rhta he)
2.252: Ih allh ki aaiat hin، jo hm thik thik tm ko sna rhe hin aor tm iqinaan an logon min se ho، jo rsol bna kr bhije gee hin
2.253: Ih rsol (jo hmari trf se ansanon ki hdait pr mamor hoee) hm ne an ko aik dosre se brh chrh kr mrtbe عta kie an min koei aisa tha js se khda khod hm klam hoa، ksi ko as ne dosri hisiton se blnd drje die، aor aakhr min عisia abn mrimؑ ko roshn nshanian عta kin aor roh pak se as ki mdd ki agr allh chahta، to mmkn nh tha kh ain rsolon ke bعd jo log roshn nshanian dikh chke the، oh aaps min lrte mgr (allh ki mshit ih nh thi kh oh logon ko jbraan akhtlaf se roke، as ojh se) anhon ne bahm akhtlaf kia، phr koei aiman laia aor ksi ne kfr ki rah akhtiar ki han، allh chahta، to oh hrgz nh lrte، mgr allh jo chahta he krta he
2.254: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، jo kchh mal mtaع hm ne tm ko bkhsha he، as min se khrch kro، qbl as ke kh oh dn aaee، js min nh khrido frokht hogi، nh dosti kam aaee gi aor nh sfarsh chle gi aor zalm asl min ohi hin، jo kfr ki rosh akhtiar krte hin
2.255: Allh، oh zndh jaoid hsti، jo tmam kaenat ko snbhale hoee he، aus ke soa koei khda nhin he oh nh sota he aor nh ause aongh lgti he zmin aor aasmanon min jo kchh he، ausi ka he kon he jo aus ki jnab min aus ki ajazt ke bghir sfarsh kr ske? Jo kchh bndon ke samne he ase bhi oh janta he aor jo kchh aun se aojhl he، as se bhi oh oaqf he aor aus ki mعlomat min se koei chiz aun ki grft adrak min nhin aaskti alّa ih kh ksi chiz ka عlm oh khod hi aun ko dina chahe aus ki hkomt aasmanon aor zmin pr chhaei hoei he aor aun ki nghbani as ke lie koei thka dine oala kam nhin he bs ohi aik bzrg o brtr zat he
2.256: Din ke mعamle min koei zor zbrdsti nhin he shih bat ghlt khialat se a lg chhant kr rkh di gei he ab jo koei taghot ka ankar kr ke allh pr aiman le aaia، aus ne aik aisa mzbot shara tham lia، jo kbhi totne oala nhin، aor allh (js ka shara as ne lia he) sb kchh snne aor janne oala he
2.257: Jo log aiman late hin، aun ka hami o mddgar allh he aor oh an ko tarikion se roshni min nkal lata he aor jo log kfr ki rah akhtiar krte hin، aun ke hami o mdd gar taghot hin aor oh anhin roshni se tarikion ki trf khinch le jate hin ih aag min jane oale log hin، jhan ih hmishh rhin ge
2.258: Kia tm ne aus shkhs ke hal pr ghor nhin kia، js ne abrahimؑ se jhgra kia tha? Jhgra ais bat pr kh abrahimؑ ka rb kon he، aor as bna pr kh as shkhs ko allh ne hkomt de rkhi thi jb abrahimؑ ne kha kh "mira rb oh he، js ke akhtiar min zndgi aor mot he، to aus ne joab dia: "zndgi aor mot mire akhtiar min he"abrahimؑ ne kha: "achha، allh sorj ko mshrq se nkalta he، to zra ause mghrb se nkal la" ih sn kr oh mnkr hq shshdr rh gia، mgr allh zalmon ko rah rast nhin dkhaia krta
2.259: Ia phr msal ke tor pr aus shkhs ko dikho، js ka gzr aik aisi bsti pr hoa، jo apni chhton pr aondhi gri pri thi aus ne kha: "ih aabadi، jo hlak ho chki he، ase allh ks trh dobarh zndgi bkhshe ga?" as pr allh ne as ki roh qbz kr li aor oh sobrs tk murdh pra rha phr allh ne ase dobarh zndgi bkhshi aor as se pochha: "btaؤ، ktni mdt pre rhe ho?" aus ne kha: "aik dn ia chnd ghnte rha hon ga" frmaia: "tm pr so brs aisi halt min gzr chke hin ab zra apne khane aor pani ko dikho kh as min zra tghir nhin aaia he dosri trf zra apne gdhe ko bhi dikho (kh ais ka pnjr tk bosid h ho rha he) aor ih hm ne as lie kia he kh hm tmhin logon ke lie aik nshani bna dina chahte hin phr dikho kh hdion ke ais pnjr ko hm ks trh atha kr gosht post as pr chrhate hin" as trh jb hqiqt as ke samne balkl nmaian ho gei، to as ne kha: "min janta hon kh allh hr chiz pr qdrt rkhta he"
2.260: Aor oh oaqعh bhi pish nzr rhe، jb abrahimؑ ne kha tha kh: "mire malk، mjhe dkha de، to murdon ko kise zndh krta he" frmaia: "kia to aiman nhin rkhta?" aus ne عrz kia "aiman to rkhta hon، mgr dl ka atminan drkar he" frmaia: "achha to char prnde le aor an ko apne se manos kr le phr an ka aik aik jz aik aik phar pr rkh de phr an ko pkar، oh tire pas dore chle aaein ge khob jan le kh allh nhait ba aqtdar aor hkim he"
2.261: Jo log apne mal allh ki rah min srf krte hin، aun ke khrch ki msal aisi he، jise aik danh boia jaee aor as se sat balin nklin aor hr bal min so dane hon aisi trh allh js ke عml ko chahta he، afzoni عta frmata he oh frakh dst bhi he aor عlim bhi
2.262: Jo log apne mal allh ki rah min khrch krte hin aor khrch kr ke phr ahsan jtate، nh dkh dite hin، aun ka ajr aun ke rb ke pas he aor an ke lie ksi rnj aor khof ka moqع nhin
2.263: Aik mitha bol aor ksi nagoar bat pr zra si chshm poshi aus khirat se bhtr he، js ke pichhe dkh ho allh be niaz he aor brdbari aus ki sft he
2.264: Ae aiman lane oalo! Apne sdqat ko ahsan jta kr aor dkh de kr aus shkhs ki trh khak min nh mla do، jo apna mal mhz logon ke dkhane ko khrch krta he aor nh allh pr aima n rkhta he، nh aakhrt pr aus ke khrch ki msal aisi he، jise aik chtan thi، js pr mti ki thh jmi hoei thi as pr jb zor ka minh brsa، to sari mti bhh gei aor saf chtan ki chtan rh gei aise log apne nzdik khirat kr ke jo niki kmate hin، as se kchh bhi aun ke hath nhin aata، aor kafron ko sidhi rah dkhana allh ka dstor nhin he
2.265: Bkhla f ais ke jo lo g apne mal mhz allh ki rza joei ke lie dl ke pore sbat o qrar ke sath khrch krte hin، an ke khrch ki msal aisi he، jise ksi sth mrtfع pr aik bagh ho agr zor ki bar sh ho jaee to do gna phl laee، aor agr zor ki barsh nh bhi ho to aik hlki phoar hi aus ke lie kafi ho jaee tm jo kchh krte ho، sb allh ki nzr min he
2.266: Kia tm min se koei ih psnd krta he kh as ke pas aik hra bhra bagh ho، nhron se sirab، khjoron aor angoron aor hrqsm ke phlon se lda hoa، aor oh عin aus oqt aik tiz bgole ki zd min aa kr jhls jaee، jbkh oh khod borha ho aor as ke km sn bche abhi ksi laeq nh hon? As trh allh apni batin tmhare samne bian krta he، shaid kh tm ghor o fkr kro
2.267: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، jo mal tm ne kmaee hin aor jo kchh hm ne zmin se tmhare lie nkala he، aus se bhtr hsh rah khda min khrch kro aisa nh ho kh as ki rah min dine ke lie bri se bri chiz chhantne ki koshsh krne lgo، halankh ohi chiz agr koei tmhin de، to tm hrgz ause lina goara nh kro ge alّa ih kh as ko qbol krne min tm aghmaz brt jaؤ tmhin jan lina chahie kh allh be niaz he aor bhtrin sfat se mtsf he
2.268: Shitan tmhin mflsi se drata he aor shrmnak trz عml akhtiar krne ki trghib dita he، mgr allh tmhin apni bkhshsh aor fzl ki amid dlata he allh bra frakh dst aor dana he
2.269: Js ko chahta he hkmt عta krta he، aor js ko hkmt mli، ause hqiqt min bri dolt ml gei ain baton se srf ohi log sbq lite hin، jo danshmnd hin
2.270: Tm ne jo kchh bhi khrch kia ho aor jo nzr bhi mani ho، allh ko aus ka عlm he، aor zalmon ka koei mddgar nhin
2.271: Agr apne sdqat عlanih do، to ih bhi achha he، likn agr chhpa kr hajt mndon ko do، to ih tmhare hq min ziadh bhtr he tmhari bht si braeian ais trz عml se mho ho jati hin aor jo kchh tm krte hoee allh ko bhr hal aus ki khbr he
2.272: Logon ko hdait bkhsh dine ki zme dari tm pr nhin he hdait to allh hi jse chahta he bkhshta he aor khirat min jo mal tm khrch krte ho oh tmhare apne lie bhla he aakhr tm asi lie to khrch krte ho kh allh ki rza hasl ho to jo kchh mal tm khirat min khrch kro ge، as ka pora pora ajr tmhin dia jaee ga aor tmhari hq tlfi hrgz nh hogi
2.273: Khas tor pr mdd ke msthq oh tng dst log hin jo allh ke kam min aise ghr gee hin kh apni zati ksb mعash ke lie zmin min koei dor dhop nhin krskte an ki khod dari dikh kr naoaqf aadmi gman krta he kh ih khosh hal hin tm an ke chhron se an ki androni halt phchan skte ho mgr oh aise log nhin hin kh logon ke pichhe pr kr kchh mangin aun ki aعant min jo kchh mal tm khrch kro ge oh allh se poshidh nh rhe ga
2.274: Jo lo g apne mal shb o roz khle aor chhpe khrch krte hin an ka ajr an ke rb ke pas he aor aun ke lie ksi khof aor rnj ka mqam nhin
2.275: Mgr jo log sod khate hin، au n ka hal aus shkhs ka sa hota he، jse shitan ne chho kr baؤla kr dia ho aor as halt min aun ke mbtla hone ki ojh ih he kh oh khte hin: "tjart bhi to aakhr sod hi jisi chiz he"، halankh allh ne tjart ko hlal kia he aor sod ko hram lhaza js shkhs ko as ke rb ki trf se ih nsiht phnche aor aaendh ke lie oh sod khori se baz aa jaee، to jo kchh oh phle kha chka، so kha chka، as ka mعamlh allh ke hoale he aor jo ais hkm ke bعd phr asi hrkt ka aعadh kre، oh jhnmi he، jhan oh hmishh rhe ga
2.276: Allh sod ka mth mar dita he aor sdqat ko nsho o nma dita he aor allh ksi nashkre bd عml ansan ko psnd nhin krta
2.277: Han، jo log aiman le aaein aor nik عml krin aor nmaz qaem krin aor zkoaۃ din، aun ka ajr be shk an ke rb ke pas he aor an ke lie ksi khof aor rnj ka moqع nhin
2.278: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، khda se dro aor jo kchh tmhara sod logon pr baqi rh gia he، ase chhor do، agr oaqعi tm aiman laee ho
2.279: Likn agr tm ne aisa nh kia، to aagah ho jaؤ kh allh aor aske rsol ki trf se tmhare khlaf aعlan jng he ab bhi tobh kr lo (aor sod chhor do) to apna asl srmaih line ke tm hq dar ho nh tm zlm kro، nh tm pr zlm kia jaee
2.280: Tmhara qrz dar tng dst ho، to hath khlne tk ause mhlt do، aor jo sdqh kr do، to ih tmhare lie ziadh bhtr he، agr tm smjho
2.281: As dn ki rsoaei o msibt se bcho، jbkh tm allh ki trf oaps ho ge، ohan hr shkhs ko as ki kmaei hoei niki ia bdi ka pora pora bdlh ml jaee ga aor ksi pr zlm hrgz nh hoga
2.282: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، jb ksi mqrr mdt ke lie tm aaps min qrz ka lin din kro، to ase lkh lia kro friqin ke drmian ansaf ke sath aik shkhs dstaoiz thrir kre jse allh ne lkhne prhne ki qablit bkhshi ho، ase lkhne se ankar nh krna chahie oh lkhe aor amla oh shkhs kraee js pr hq aata he (iعni qrz line oala)، aor ause allh، apne rb se drna chahie kh jo mعamlh te hoa ho as min koei kmi bishi nh kre likn agr qrz line oala khod nadan ia zعif ho، amla nh kra skta ho، toas ka oli ansaf ke sath amla kraee phr apne mrdon se do aadmion ki as pr goahi kra lo aor agr do mrd nh hon to aik mrd aor do عortin hon takh aik bhol jaee، to dosri ase iad dla de ih goah aise logon min se hone chahiin، jn ki goahi tmhare drmian mqbol ho goahon ko jb goah bnne ke lie kha jaee، to anhin ankar nh krna chahie mعamlh khoah chhota ho ia bra، miعad ki tعin ke sath as ki dstaoiz lkhoa line min tsahl nh kro allh ke nzdik ih triqh tmhare lie ziadh mbni br ansaf he، as se shhadt qaem hone min ziadh sholt hoti he، aor tmhare shkok o shbhat min mbtla hone ka amkan km rh jata he han jo tjarti lin din dst bdst tm log aaps min krte ho، as ko nh lkha jaee to koei hrj nhin، mgr tjarti mعamle te krte oqt goah kr lia kro katb aor goah ko staia nh jaee aisa kro ge، to gnah ka artkab kro ge allh ke ghzb se bcho oh tm ko shih triq عml ki tعlim dita he aor ase hr chiz ka عlm he
2.283: Agr tm sfr ki halt min ho aor dstaoiz lkhne ke lie koei katb nh mle، to rhn balqbz pr mعamlh kro agr tm min se koei shkhs dosre pr bhrosh kr ke as ke sath koei mعamlh kre، to js pr bhrosh kia gia he، ase chahie kh amant ada kre aor allh، apne rb se dre aor shhadt hrgz nh chhpaؤ jo shhadt chhpata he، as ka dl gnah min aalodh he aor allh tmhare aعmal se be khbr nhin he
2.284: Aasmanon aor zmin min jo kchh he، sb allh ka he tm apne dl ki batin khoah zahr kro ia chhpaؤ allh bhrhal an ka hsab tm se le le ga phr ase akhtiar he، jse chahe، mعaf kr de aor jse chahe، sza de oh hr chiz pr qdrt rkhta he
2.285: Rsol aus hdait pr aiman laia he jo as ke rb ki trf se as pr nazl hoei he aor jo log ais rsol ke manne oale hin، anhon ne bhi as hdait ko dl se tslim kr lia he ih sb allh aor as ke frshton aoras ki ktabon aor as ke rsolon ko mante hin aor an ka qol ih he kh: "hm allh ke rsolon ko aik dosre se alg nhin krte، hm ne hkm sna aor ataعt qbol ki malk! Hm tjh se khta bkhshi ke talb hin aor hmin tiri hi trf pltna he"
2.286: Allh ksi mtnfs pr aus ki mqdrt se brh kr zmh dari ka bojh nhin dalta hr shkhs ne jo niki kmaei he، as ka phl asi ke lie he aor jo bdi smiti he، as ka obal asi pr he (aiman lane oalo! Tm ion dعa kia kro) ae hmare rb! Hm se bhol chok min jo qsor ho jaein، an pr grft nh kr malk! Hm pr oh bojh nh dal، jo to ne hm se phle logon pr dale the prordgar! Js bar ko athane ki taqt hm min nhin he، oh hm pr nh rkh، hmare sath nrmi kr، hm se dr gzr frma، hm pr rhm kr، to hmara molia he، kafron ke mqable min hmari mdd kr

3.2: Allh، oh zndh jaoid hsti، jo nzam kaenat ko snbhale hoee he، hqiqt min aus ke soa koei khda nhin he
3.3: Aus ne tm pr ih ktab nazl ki he، jo hq le kr aaei he aor aun ktabon ki tsdiq kr rhi he jo phle se aaei hoei thin as se phle oh ansanon ki hdait ke lie torat aor anjil nazl kr chka he
3.4: Aor as ne oh ksoti atari he (jo hq aor batl ka frq d khane oali he) ab jo log allh ke framin ko qbol krne se ankar krin، an ko iqinaan skht sza mle gi allh be pnah taqt ka malk he aor braei ka bdlh dine oala he
3.5: Zmin aor aasman ki koei chiz allh se poshidh nhin
3.6: Ohi to he jo tmhari maؤn ke pit min tmhari sortin، jisi chahta he، bnata he aus zbrdst hkmt oale ke soa koei aor khda nhin he
3.7: Ohi khda he، js ne ih ktab tm pr nazl ki he ais ktab min do trh ki aaiat hin: aik mhkmat، jo ktab ki asl bniad hin aor dosri mtshabhat jn logon ke dlo n min tirh he، oh ftne ki tlash min hmishh mtshabhat hi ke pichhe pre rhte hin aor aun ko mعni phnane ki koshsh kia krte hin، halankh an ka hqiqi mfhom allh ke soa koei nhin janta bkhla f ais ke jo log عlm min pkhth kar hin، oh khte hin kh "hmara aun pr aiman he، ih sb hmare rb hi ki trf se hin" aor sch ih he kh ksi chiz se shih sbq srf danshmnd log hi hasl krte hin
3.8: Oh allh se dعa krte rhte hin kh: "prordgar! Jb to hmin sidhe rsth pr lga chka he، to phr khin hmare dlon ko kji min mbtla nh kr dijio hmin apne khzanh fiz se rhmt عta kr kh to hi fiaz hqiqi he
3.9: Prordgar! To iqinaan sb logon ko aik roz jmع krne oala he، js ke aane min koei shbh nhin to hrgz apne oعde se tlne oala nhin he"
3.10: Jn logon ne kfr ka roih akhtiar kia he، anhin allh ke mqable min nh aun ka mal kchh kam de ga، nh aolad oh dozkh ka aindhn bn kr rhin ge
3.11: Aun ka anjam oisa hi hoga، jisa frعon ke sathion aor aun se phle ke nafrmanon ka ho chka he kh aunhon ne aaiat alahi ko jhtlaia، ntijh ih hoa kh allh ne an ke gnahon pr anhin pkr lia aor hq ih he kh allh skht sza dine oala he
3.12: Ps ae mhmdؐ! Jn logon ne tmhari dعot ko qbol krne se ankar kr dia he، aun se khh do kh qrib he oh oqt، jb tm mghlob ho jaؤ ge aor jhnm ki trf hanke jaؤ ge aor jhnm bra hi bra thkana he
3.13: Tmhare lie aun do grohon min aik nshan عbrt tha، jo (bdr min) aik dosre se nbrd aazma hoee aik groh allh ki rah min lr rha tha aor dosra groh kafr tha dikhne oale bchshm sr dikh rhe the kh kafr groh momn groh se do chnd he mgr (ntije ne sabt kr dia kh) allh apni fth o nsrt se js ko chahta he، mdd dita he didhٔ bina rkhne oalon ke lie as min bra sbq poshidh he
3.14: Logon ke lie mrghobat nfs، عortin، aola d، sone chandi ke dhir، chidh ghore، moishi ao r zrعi zminin bri khosh aaend bna di gei hin، mgr ih sb dnia ki chnd rozh zndgi ke saman hin hqiqt min jo bhtr thkana he، oh to allh ke pas he
3.15: Kho: min tmhin btaؤn kh an se ziadh achhi chiz kia he? Jo log tqoia ki rosh akhtiar krin، aun ke lie an ke rb ke pa s bagh hin، jn ke niche nhrin bhti hon gi، ohan anhin hmishgi ki zndgi hasl hogi، pakizh bioian an ki rfiq hon gi aor allh ki rza se oh srfraz hon ge allh apne bndon ke roie pr ghri nzr rkhta he
3.16: Ih oh log hin، jo khte hin kh "malk! Hm aiman laee، hmari khtaؤn se dr gzr frma aor hmin aatsh dozkh se bcha le"
3.17: Ih log sbr krne oale hin، rastbaz hin، frmanbrdar aor fiaz hin aor rat ki aakhri ghrion min allh se mghfrt ki dعaein manga krte hin
3.18: Allh ne khod shhadt di he kh as ke soa koei khda nhin he، ao r (ihi shhadt) frshton aor sb ahl عlm ne bhi di he oh ansaf pr qaem he aus zbrdst hkim ke soa fi aloaqع koei khda nhin he
3.19: Allh ke nzdik din srf aslam he as din se ht kr jo mkhtlf triqe aun logon ne akhtiar kie، jnhin ktab di gei thi، aun ke ais trz عml ki koei ojh as ke soa nh thi kh anhon ne عlm aa jane ke bعd aaps min aik dosre pr ziadti krne ke lie aisa kia aor jo koei allh ke ahkam o hdaiat ki ataعt se ankar kr de، allh ko as se hsab lite kchh dir nhin lgti he
3.20: Ab agr ih log tm se jhgra krin، toa n se kho: "min ne aor mire piroؤn ne to allh ke aage sr tslim khm kr dia he" phr ahl ktab aor ghir ahl ktab donon se pochho: "kia tm ne bhi as ki ataعt o bndgi qbol ki?" agr ki to oh rah rast pa gee، aor agr as se mnh mora to tm pr srf pigham phncha dine ki zmh dari thi aage allh khod apne bndon ke mعamlat dikhne oala he
3.21: Jo log allh ke ahkam o hdaiat ko manne se ankar krte hin aor as ke pighmbron ko nahq qtl krte hin aor aise logon ki jan ke drpe ho jate hin، jo khlq khda min عdl o rasti ka hkm dine ke lie athin، an ko drd nak sza ki khosh khbri sna do
3.22: Ih oh log hin jn ke aعmal dnia aor aakhrt donon min zaeع hogee، aor an ka mddgar koei nhin he
3.23: Tm ne dikha nhin jn logon ko ktab ke عlm min se kchh hsh mla he، aun ka hal kia he?aunhin jb ktab alahi ki trf blaia jata he takh oh aun ke drmian fislh kre، to an min se aik friq as se phlo thi krta he aor as fisle ki trf aane se mnh phir jata he
3.24: An ka ih trz عml as ojh se he kh oh khte hin "aatsh dozkh to hmin ms tk nh kre gi aor agr dozkh ki sza hm ko mle gi bhi to bs chnd roz" aun ke khod sakhth عqidon ne aun ko apne din ke mعamle min bri ghlt fhmion min dal rkha he
3.25: Mgr kia bne gi aun pr jb hm anhin aus roz jmع krin ge js ka aana iqini he? As roz hr shkhs ko as ki kmaei ka bdlh pora pora de dia jaeiga aor ksi pr zlm nh hoga
3.26: Kho! Khdaia! Mulk ke malk! To jse chahe، hkomt de aor jse chahe، chhin le jse chahe، عzt bkhshe aor js ko chahe، zlil kr de bhlaei tire akhtiar min he bishk to hr chiz pr qadr he
3.27: Rat ko dn min prota hoa le aata he aor dn ko rat min jandar min se be jan ko nkalta he aor be jan min se jandar ko aor jse chahta he، be hsab rzq dita he
3.28: Momnin ahl aiman ko chhor kr kafron ko apna rfiq aor dost hrgz nh bnaein jo aisa kre ga as ka allh se koei tعlq nhin han ih mعaf he kh tm an ke zlm se bchne ke lie bzahr aisa trz عml akhtiar kr jaؤ mgr allh tmhin apne aap se drata he aor tmhin asi ki trf plt kr jana he
3.29: Ae nbiؐ! Logon ko khbrdar kr do kh tmhare dlon min jo kchh he، ause khoah tm chhpaؤ ia zahr kro، allh bhrhal ase janta he، zmin o aasman ki koei chiz as ke عlm se bahr nhin he aor aus ka aqtdar hr chiz pr haoi he
