3.30: Oh dn aane oala he، jb hr nfs apne kie ka phl hazr paee ga khoah aus ne bhlaei ki ho ia braei as roz aadmi ih tmna kre ga kh kash abhi ih dn as se bht dor hota! Allh tmhin apne aap se drata he aor oh apne bndon ka nhait khir khoah he
3.31: Ae nbiؐ! Logon se khh do kh، "agr tm hqiqt min allh se mhbt rkhte ho، to mir i piroi akhtiar kro، allh tm se mhbt kre ga aor tmhari khtaؤn se drgzr frmaee ga oh bra mعaf krne oala aor rhim he"
3.32: Aun se kho kh "allh aor rsol ki ataعt qbol kr lo" phr tm agr oh tmhari dعot qbol nh krin، to iqinaan ih mmkn nhin he kh allh aise logon se mhbt kre، jo as ki aor as ke rsol ki ataعt se ankar krte hon
3.33: Allh ne aadmؑ aor nohؑ aor aal abrahim aor aal عmran ko tmam dnia oalon pr trjih de kr (apni rsalt ke lie) mntkhb kia tha
3.34: Ih aik slsle ke log the، jo aik dosre ki nsl se pida hoee the allh sb kchh snta aor janta he
3.35: (oh aus oqt sn rha tha) jb عmran ki عort khh rhi thi kh، "mire prordgar! Min as bche ko jo mire pit min he tiri nzr krti hon، oh tire hi kam ke lie oqf hoga miri as pishksh ko qbol frma to snne aor janne oala he"
3.36: Phr jb oh bchi as ke han pida hoei to as ne kha "malk! Mire han to lrki pida ho gei he halankh jo kchh as ne jna tha، allh ko as ki khbr thi aor lrka lr ki ki trh nhin hota khir، min ne as ka nam mrimؑ rkh dia he aor min ase aor as ki aaendh nsl ko shitan mrdod ke ftne se tiri pnah min diti hon"
3.37: Aakhrkar as ke rb ne as lrki ko bkhoshi qbol frma lia، ause bri achhi lrki bna kr athaia aor zkriaؑ koa s ka srprst bna dia zkriaؑ jb kbhi as ke pas mhrab min jata to as ke pas kchh nh kchh khane pine ka saman pata pochhta mrimؑ! Ih tire pa s khan se aaia? Oh joab diti allh ke pas se aaia he، allh jse chahta he be hsab dita he
3.38: Ih hal dikh kr zkriaؑ ne apne rb ko pkara "prordgar! Apni qdrt se mjhe nik aolad عta kr to hi dعa snne oala he"
3.39: Joab min frshton ne aaoaz di، jb kh oh mhrab min khra nmaz prh rha tha، kh "allh tjhe ihiiaؑ ki khosh khbri dita he oh allh ki trf se aik frman ki tsdiq krne o ala bn kr aaee ga as min srdari o bzrgi ki shan hogi kmal drjh ka zabt hoga nbot se srfraz hoga aor salhin min shmar kia jaee ga"
3.40: Zkriaؑ ne kha، "prordgar! Bhla mire han lrka khan se hoga، min to borha ho chka hon aor miri bioi banjh he" joab mla، "aisa hi hoga، allh jo chahta he krta he"
3.41: عrz kia "malk! Phr koei nshani mire lie mqrr frma de" kha، "nshani ih he kh tm tin dn tk logon se asharh ke soa koei bat chit nh kro ge (ia nh krsko ge) ais doran min apne rb ko bht iad krna aor sbh o sham as ki tsbih krte rhna"
3.42: Phr oh oqt aaia jb mrimؑ se frshton ne aakr kha، "ae mrimؑ! Allh ne tjhe brgzidh kia aor pakizgi عta ki aor tmam dnia ki عorton pr tjh ko trjih de kr apni khdmt ke lie chn lia
3.43: Ae mrimؑ! Apne rb ki tabع frman bn kr rh، as ke aage sr bsjod ho، aor jo bnde as ke hzor jhkne oale hin an ke sath to bhi jhk ja"
3.44: Ae mhmdؐ! Ih ghib ki khbrin hin jo hm tm ko ohi ke zriعh se bta rhe hin، ornh tm aus oqt ohan mojod nh the jb hikl ke khadm ih fislh krne ke lie kh mrimؑ ka sr prst kon ho apne apne qlm phink rhe the، aor nh tm aus oqt hazr the، jb aun ke drmian jhgra brpa tha
3.45: Aor jb frshton ne kha، "ae mrimؑ! Allh tjhe apne aik frman ki khosh khbri dita he aus ka nam msih عisia abn mrim hoga، dnia aor aakhrt min mعzz hoga، allh ke mqrb bndon min shmar kia jaee ga
3.46: Logon se ghoare min bhi klam kre ga aor bri عmr ko phnch kr bhi، aor oh aik mrd salh hoga"
3.47: Ih sn kr mrimؑ boli، "prordgar! Mire han bchh khan se hoga، mjhe to ksi shkhs ne hath tk nhin lgaia" joab mla، "aisa hi hoga، allh jo chahta he pida krta he oh jb ksi kam ke krne ka fislh frmata he to bs khta he kh ho ja aor oh ho jata he"
3.48: (frshton ne phr slsleh klam min kha) "aor allh ause ktab aor hkmt ki tعlim de ga، torat aor anjil ka عlm skhaee ga
3.49: Aor bni asraeil ki trf apna rsol mqrr kre ga" (aor jb oh bhisit rsol bni asraeil ke pas aaia to as ne kha) "min tmhare rb ki trf se tmhare pas nshani le kr aaia hon min tmhare samne mti se prnde ki sort min aik mjsmh bnata hon aor as min phonk marta hon، oh allh ke hkm se prndh bn jata he min allh ke hkm se madr zad andhe aor korhi ko achha krta hon aor murde ko zndh krta hon min tmhin btata hon kh tm kia khate ho aor kia apne ghron min zkhirh kr ke rkhte ho as min tmhare lie kafi nshani he agr tm aiman lane oale ho
3.50: Aor min aus tعlim o hdait ki tsdiq krne oala bn kr aaia hon jo torat min se ais oqt mire zmanh min mojod he aoras lie aaia hon kh tmhare lie bعz aun chizon ko hlal kr don jo tm pr hram kr di gei hin dikho، min tmhare rb ki trf se tmhare pas nshani le kr aaia hon، lhaza allh se dro aor mir i ataعt kro
3.51: Allh mira rb bhi he ao r tmhara rb bhi، lhaza tm ausi ki bndgi akhtiar kro، ihi sidha rasth he"
3.52: Jb عisiaؑ ne mhsos kia kh bni asraeil kfr o ankar pr aamadh hin to as ne kha "kon allh ki rah min mira mdd gar hota he?" hoarion ne joab dia، "hm allh ke mddgar hin، hm allh pr aiman laee، goah rho kh hm mslm (allh ke aage sr ataعt jhka dine oale) hin
3.53: Malk! Jo frman to ne nazl kia he hm ne ase man lia aor rsol ki piroi qbol ki، hmara nam goahi dine oalon min lkh le"
3.54: Phr bni asraeil (msih ke khlaf) khfih tdbirin krne lge joab min allh ne bhi apni khfih tdbir ki aor aisi tdbiron min allh sb se brh kr he
3.55: (oh allh ki khfih tdbir hi thi) jb aus ne kha kh، "ae عisiaؑ! Ab min tjhe oaps le lon ga aor tjh ko apni trf atha lon ga aor jnhon ne tira ankar kia he aun se (iعni an ki mعit se aor an ke gnde mahol min an ke sath rhne se) tjhe pak kr don ga aor tiri piroi krne oalon ko qiamt tk an logon pr baladst rkhon ga jnhon ne tira ankar kia he phr tm sb ko aakhr mire pas aana he، aus oqt min aun baton ka fislh kr don ga jn min tmhare drmian akhtlaf hoa he
3.56: Jn logon ne kfr o ankar ki rosh akhtiar ki he anhin dnia aor aakhrt donon min skht sza don ga aor oh koei mddgar nh paein ge
3.57: Aor jnhon ne aiman aor nik عmli ka roih akhtiar kia he anhin aun ke ajr pore pore de die jaein ge aor khob jan le kh zalmon se allh hrgz mhbt nhin krta"
3.58: Ih aaiat aor hkmt se lbriz tzkre hin jo hm tmhin sna rhe hin
3.59: Allh ke nzdik عisiaؑ ki msal aadmؑ ki si he kh allh ne ase mti se pida kia aor hkm dia kh ho ja aor oh ho gia
3.60: Ih asl hqiqt he jo tmhare rb ki trf se btaei ja rhi he aor tm an logon min shaml nh ho jo as min shk krte hin
3.61: Ih عlm aa jane ke bعd ab koei as mعamlh min tm se jhgra kre to ae mhmdؐ! As se kho، "aaؤ hm aor tm khod bhi aa jaein aor apne apne bal bchon ko bhi le aaein aor khd a se dعa krin kh jo jhota ho aus pr khda ki lعnt ho"
3.62: Ih balkl shih oaqعat hin، aor hqiqt ih he kh allh ke soa koei khdaond nhin he، aor oh allh hi ki hsti he js ki taqt sb se bala aor js ki hkmt nzam عalm min kar frma he
3.63: Ps agr ih log (ais shrt pr mqablh min aane se) mnh morin to (aun ka mfsd hona saf khl jaee ga) aor allh to mfsdon ke hal se oaqf hi he
3.64: Kho، "ae ahl ktab! Aaؤ aik aisi bat ki trf jo hmare aor tmhare drmian iksan he ih kh hm allh ke soa ksi ki bndgi nh krin، as ke sath ksi ko shrik nh thiraein، aor hm min se koei allh ke soa ksi ko apna rb nh bna le" as dعot ko qbol krne se agr oh mnh morin to saf khh do kh goah rho، hm to mslm (srf khda ki bndgi o ataعt krne oale) hin
3.65: Ae ahl ktab! Tm abrahimؑ ke bare min hm se kion jhgra krte ho? Torat aor anjil to abrahimؑ ke bعd hi nazl hoei hin phr kia tm atni bat bhi nhin smjhte
3.66: Tm log jn chizon ka عlm rkhte ho aun min to khob bhsin kr chke، ab an mعamlat min kion bhs krne chle ho jn ka tmhare pas kchh bhi عlm nhin allh janta he، tm nhin jante
3.67: Abrahimؑ nh ihodi tha nh عisaei، blkh oh aik mslm ikso tha aor oh hrgz mshrkon min se nh tha
3.68: Abrahimؑ se nsbt rkhne ka sb se ziadh hq agr ksi ko phnchta he to aun logon ko phnchta he jnhon ne as ki piroi ki aor ab ih nbi aor as ke manne oale ais nsbt ke ziadh hq dar hin allh srf aunhi ka hami o mddgar he jo aiman rkhte hon
3.69: (ae aiman lane oalo) ahl ktab min se aik groh chahta he kh ksi trh tmhin rah rast se hta de، halankh dr hqiqt oh apne soa ksi ko gmra hi min nhin dal rhe hin mgr anhin as ka shعor nhin he
3.70: Ae ahl ktab! Kion allh ki aaiat ka ankar krte ho halankh tm khod an ka mshahdh kr rhe ho?
3.71: Ae ahl ktab! Kion hq ko batl ka rng chrha kr mshtbh bnate ho? Kion jante bojhte hq ko chhpate ho?
3.72: Ahl ktab min se aik groh khta he kh as nbi ke manne oalon pr jo kchh nazl hoa he as pr sbh aiman laؤ aor sham ko as se ankar kr do، shaid as trkib se ih log apne aiman se phr jaein
3.73: Niz ih log aaps min khte hin kh apne mzhb oale ke soa ksi ki bat nh mano ae nbiؐ! An se khh do kh، "asl min hdait to allh ki hdait he aor ih ausi ki din he kh ksi ko ohi kchh de dia jaee jo kbhi tm ko dia gia tha، ia ih kh dosron ko tmhare rb ke hzor pish krne ke lie tmhare khlaf qoi hjt ml jaee" ae nbiؐ! An se kho kh، "fzl o shrf allh ke akhtiar min he، jse chahe عta frmaee oh osiع alnzr he aor sb kchh janta he
3.74: Apni rhmt ke lie js ko chahta he mkhsos kr lita he aor as ka fzl bht bra he"
3.75: Ahl ktab min koei to aisa he kh agr tm as ke aعtmad pr mal o dolt ka aik dhir bhi de do to oh tmhara mal tmhin ada kr de ga، aor ksi ka hal ih he kh agr tm aik dinar ke mعamlh min bhi as pr bhrosh kro to oh ada nh kre ga alّa ih kh tm as ke sr pr soar ho jaؤ aun ki as akhlaqi halt ka sbb ih he kh oh khte hin، "amion (ghir ihodi logon) ke mعamlh min hm pr koei moakhzh nhin he" aor ih bat oh mhz jhot ghr kr allh ki trf mnsob krte hin، halankh anhin mعlom he kh allh ne aisi koei bat nhin frmaei he aakhr kion aun se baz prs nh hogi?
3.76: Jo bhi apne عhd ko pora kre ga aor braei se bch kr rhe ga oh allh ka mhbob bne ga، kionkh prhiz gar log allh ko psnd hin
3.77: Rhe oh log jo allh ke عhd aor apni qsmon ko thori qimt pr bich dalte hin، to an ke lie aakhrt min koei hsh nhin، allh qiamt ke roz nh aun se bat kre ga nh aun ki trf dikhe ga aor nh anhin pak kre ga، blkh aun ke lie to skht drdnak sza he
3.78: Aun min kchh log aise hin jo ktab prhte hoee as trh zban ka alt phir krte hin kh tm smjho jo kchh oh prh rhe hin oh ktab hi ki عbart he، halankh oh ktab ki عbart nhin hoti، oh khte hin kh ih jo kchh hm prh rhe hin ih khda ki trf se he، halankh oh khda ki trf se nhin hota، oh jan bojh kr jhot bat allh ki trf mnsob kr dite hin
3.79: Ksi ansan ka ih kam nhin he kh allh to as ko ktab aor hkm aor nbot عta frmaee aor oh logon se khe kh allh ke bjaee tm mire bnde bn jaؤ oh to ihi khe ga kh sche rbani bno jisa kh as ktab ki tعlim ka tqaza he jse tm prhte aor prhate ho
3.80: Oh tm se hrgz ih nh khe ga kh frshton ko ia pighmbron ko apna rb bna lo kia ih mmkn he kh aik nbi tmhin kfr ka hkm de jb kh tm mslm ho?
3.81: Iad kro، allh ne pighmbron se عhd lia tha kh، "aaj hm ne tmhin ktab aor hkmt o dansh se noaza he، kl agr koei dosra rsol tmhare pas ausi tعlim ki tsdiq krta hoa aaee jo phle se tmhare pas mojod he، to tm ko as pr aiman lana hoga aor as ki mdd krni hogi" ih arshad frma kr allh ne pochha، "kia tm ais ka aqrar krte ho aor as pr miri trf se عhd ki bhari zmh dari athate ho?" aunhon ne kha han hm aqrar krte hin allh ne frmaia، "achha to goah rho aor min bhi tmhare sath goah hon
3.82: As ke bعd jo apne عhd se phr jaee ohi fasq he"
3.83: Ab kia ih log allh ki ataعt ka triqh (din allh) chhor kr koei aor triqh chahte hin? Halankh aasman o zmin ki sari chizin char o na char allh hi ki tabع frman (mslm) hin aor ausi ki trf sb ko pltna he?
3.84: Ae nbiؐ! Kho kh "hm allh ko mante hin، aus tعlim ko mante hin jo hm pr nazl ki gei he، aun tعlimat ko bhi mante hin jo abrahimؑ، asmaعilؑ، ashaqؑ، iعqobؑ aor aolad iعqobؑ pr nazl hoei thin aor aun hdaiat pr bhi aiman rkhte hin jo mosiaؑ aor عisiaؑ aor dosre pighmbron ko aun ke rb ki trf se di gein hm an ke drmian frq nhin krte aor hm allh ke tabع frman (mslm) hin"
3.85: As frman brdari (aslam) ke soa jo shkhs koei aor triqh akhtiar krna chahe as ka oh triqh hrgz qbol nh kia jaee ga aor aakhrt min oh nakam o namrad rhe ga
3.86: Kise hoskta he kh allh aun logon ko hdait bkhshe jnhon ne nعmt aiman pa line ke bعd phr kfr akhtiar kia halankh oh khod as bat pr goahi de chke hin kh ih rsol hq pr he aor an ke pas roshn nshanian bhi aa chki hin allh zalmon ko to hdait nhin dia krta
3.87: An ke zlm ka shih bdlh ihi he kh an pr allh aor frshton aor tmam ansanon ki phtkar he
3.88: Aisi halt min oh hmishh rhin ge، nh an ki sza min tkhfif hogi aor nh anhin mhlt di jaee gi
3.89: Albth oh log bch jaein ge jo ais ke bعd tobh kr ke apne trz عml ki aslah kr lin، allh bkhshne oala aor rhm frmane oala he
3.90: Mgr jn logon ne aiman lane ke bعd kfr akhtiar kia، phr apne kfr min brhte chle gee an ki tobh bhi qbol nh hogi، aise log to pke gmrah hin
3.91: Iqin rkho، jn logon ne kfr akhtiar kia aor kfr hi ki halt min jan di aun min se koei agr apne aap ko sza se bchane ke lie roee zmin bhr kr bhi sona fdih min de to ause qbol nh kia jaee ga aise logon ke lie drdnak sza tiar he aor o h apna koei mddgar nh paein ge
3.92: Tm niki ko nhin phnch skte jb tk kh apni oh chizin (khda ki rah min) khrch nh kro jnhin tm عziz rkhte ho، aor jo kchh tm khrch kro ge allh as se be khbr nh hoga
3.93: Khane ki ih sari chizin (jo shriعt mhmdiؐ min hlal hin) bni asraeil ke lie bhi hlal thin، albth bعz chizin aisi thin jnhin toraۃ ke nazl kie jane se phle asraeil ne khod apne aopr hram kr lia tha an se kho، agr tm (a pne aعtraz min) sche ho to laؤ toraۃ aor pish kro as ki koei عbart
3.94: As ke bعd bhi jolo g apni jhoti ghri hoei batin allh ki trf mnsob krte rhin o hi dr hqiqt zalm hin
3.95: Kho، allh ne jo kchh frmaia he sch frmaia he، tm ko ikso ho kr abrahimؑ ke triqh ki piroi krni chahie، aor abrahimؑ shrk krne oalon min se nh tha
3.96: Be shk sb se phli عbadt gah jo ansanon ke lie tعmir hoei oh ohi he jo mkh min oaqع he as ko khir o brkt di gei thi aor tmam jhan oalon ke lie mrkz hdait bnaia gia tha
3.97: As min khli hoei nshanian hin، abrahimؑ ka mqam عbadt he، aoras ka hal ih he kh jo ais min dakhl hoa mamon ho gia logon pr allh ka ih hq he kh jo as ghr tk phnchne ki asttaعt rkhta ho oh as ka hj kre، aor jo koei as hkm ki piroi se ankar kre to ase mعlom ho jana chahie kh allh tmam d nia oalon se be niaz he
3.98: Kho، ae ahl ktab! Tm kion allh ki batin manne se ankar krte ho? Jo hrktin tm kr rhe ho allh sb kchh dikh rha he
3.99: Kho، ae ahl ktab! Ih tmhari kia rosh he kh jo allh ki bat manta he ause bhi tm allh ke rasth se rokte ho aor chahte ho kh oh tirhi rah chle، halankh tm khod (as ke rah rast hone pr) goah ho tmhari hrkton se allh ghafl nhin he
3.100: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، agr tm ne ain ahl ktab min se aik groh ki bat mani to ih tmhin aiman se phr kfr ki trf phir le jaein ge
3.101: Tmhare lie kfr ki trf jane ka ab kia moqع baqi he jb kh tm ko allh ki aaiat snaei ja rhi hin aor tmhare drmian as ka rsolؐ mojod he? Jo allh ka damn mzboti ke sath thame ga oh zror rah rast pale ga
3.102: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، allh se dro jisa kh as se drne ka hq he tm ko mot nh aaee mgr as hal min kh tm mslm ho
3.103: Sb ml kr allh ki rsi ko mzbot pkr lo aor tfrqh min nh pro allh ke aus ahsan ko iad rkho jo as ne tm pr kia he tm aik dosre ke dshmn the، aus ne tmhare dl jor die aor as ke fzl o krm se tm bhaei bhaei bn gee tm aag se bhre hoee aik grhe ke knare khre the، allh ne tm ko as se bcha lia as trh allh apni nshanian tmhare samne roshn krta he shaid kh ain عlamton se tmhin apni flah ka sidha rasth nzr aa jaee
3.104: Tm min kchh log to aise zror hi rhne chahiin jo niki ki trf blaein، bhlaei ka hkm din، aor braeion se rokte rhin jo log ih kam krin ge ohi flah paein ge
3.105: Khin tm aun logon ki trh nh ho jana jo frqon min bt gee aor khli khli oazh hdaiat pane ke bعd phr akhtlafat min mbtla hoee jnhon ne ih rosh akhtiar ki oh aus rozskht sza paein ge
3.106: Jbkh kchh log srkh ro hon ge aor kchh logon ka mnh kala hoga، jn ka mnh kala hoga (an se kha jaee ga kh) nعmt aiman pane ke bعd bhi tm ne kafranh roih akhtiar kia? Achha to ab ais kfran nعmt ke slh min عzab ka mzh chkho
3.107: Rhe oh log jn ke chhre roshn hon ge to aun ko allh ke damn rhmt min jgh mle gi aor hmishh oh asi halt min rhin ge
3.108: Ih allh ke arshadat hin jo hm tmhin thik thik snarhe hin kionkh allh dnia oalon pr zlm krne ka koei aradh nhin rkhta
3.109: Zmin o aasman ki sari chizon ka malk allh he aor sare mعamlat allh hi ke hzor pish hote hin
3.110: Ab dnia min oh bhtrin groh tm ho jse ansanon ki hdait o aslah ke lie midan min laia gia he tm niki ka hkm dite ho، bdi se rokte ho aor allh pr aiman rkhte ho ih ahl ktab aiman late to anhi ke hq min bhtr tha agrchh an min kchh log aiman dar bhi paee jate hin mgr ain ke bishtr afrad nafrman hin
3.111: Ih tmhara kchh bgar nhin skte، ziadh se ziadh bs kchh sta skte hin agr ih tm se lrin ge to mqablh min pith dkhaein ge، phr aise be bs hon ge kh khin se ain ko mdd nh mle gi
3.112: Ih jhan bhi paee gee ain pr zlt ki mar hi pri، khin allh ke zmh ia ansanon ke zmh min pnah ml gei to ih aor bat he ih allh ke ghzb min ghr chke hin، an pr mhtaji o mghlobi mslt kr di gei he، aor ih sb kchh srf as ojh se hoa he kh ih allh ki aaiat se kfr krte rhe aor anhon ne pighmbron ko nahq qtl kia ih an ki nafrmanion aor ziadtion ka anjam he
3.113: Mgr sare ahl ktab iksan nhin hin an min kchh log aise bhi hin jo rah rast pr qaem hin، raton ko allh ki aaiat prhte hin aor aske aage sjdh riz hote hin
3.114: Allh aor roz aakhrt pr aiman rkhte hin، niki ka hkm dite hin، braeion se rokte hin aor bhlaei ke kamon min srgrm rhte hin ih salh log hin
3.115: Aor jo niki bhi ih krin ge as ki na qdri nh ki jaee gi، allh prhizgar logon ko khob janta he
3.116: Rhe oh log jnhon ne kfr ka roih akhtiar kia to allh ke mqablh min an ko nh an ka mal kchh kam de ga nh aolad، oh to aag min jane oale log hin aor aag hi min hmishh rhin ge
3.117: Jo kchh oh apni as dnia ki zndgi min khrch kr rhe hin aus ki msal aus hoa ki si he js min pala ho aor oh aun logon ki khiti pr chle jnhon ne apne aopr zlm kia he aor ase brbad kr ke rkh de allh ne an pr zlm nhin kia dr hqiqt ih khod apne aopr zlm kr rhe hin
3.118: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، apni jmaعt ke logon ke soa dosron ko apna raz dar nh bnaؤ oh tmhari khrabi ke ksi moqع se faedh athane min nhin chokte tmhin js chiz se nqsan phnche ohi an ko mhbob he an ke dl ka bghz an ke mnh se nkla prta he aor jo kchh oh apne sinon min chhpaee hoee hin oh as se shdid tr he hm ne tmhin saf saf hdaiat de di hin، agr tm عql rkhte ho (to an se tعlq rkhne min ahtiat brto ge)
3.119: Tm an se mhbt rkhte ho mgr oh tm se mhbt nhin rkhte halankh tm tmam ktb aasmani ko mante ho jb oh tm se mlte hin to khte hin kh hm ne bhi (tmhare rsol aor tmhari ktab ko) man lia he، mgr jb jda hote hin to tmhare khlaf an ke ghiz o ghzb ka ih hal hota he kh apni anglian chbane lgte hin an se khh do kh apne ghsh min aap jl mro allh dlon ke chhpe hoee raz tk janta he
3.120: Tmhara bhla hota he to an ko bra mعlom hota he، aor tm pr koei msibt aati he to ih khosh hote hin mgr an ki koei tdbir tmhare khlaf kargr nhin hoskti bshrtikh tm sbr se kam lo aor allh se dr kr kam krte rho jo kchh ih kr rhe hin allh aus pr haoi he
3.121: (ae pighmbrؐ! Mslmanon ke samne aus moqع ka zkr kro) jb tm sbh soire apne ghr se nkle the aor (ahd ke midan min) mslmanon ko jng ke lie ja bja mamor kr rhe the allh sari batin snta he aor oh nhait bakhbr he
3.122: Iad kro jb tm min se do groh bzdli d khane pr aamadh hogee the، halankh allh an ki mdd pr mojod tha aor momnon ko allh hi pr bhrosh rkhna chahie
3.123: Aakhr as se phle jng bdr min allh tmhari mdd kr chka tha halankh as oqt tm bht kmzor the lhaza tm ko chahie kh allh ki nashkr i se bcho، amid he kh ab tm shkr gzar bno ge
3.124: Iad kro jb tm momnon se khh rhe the، "kia tmhare lie ih bat kafi nhin kh allh tin hzar frshte atar kr tmhari mdd kre?"
3.125: Be shk، agr tm sbr kro aor khda se drte hoee kam kro to js aan dshmn tmhare aopr chrh kr aaein ge ausi aan tmhara rb (tin hzar nhin) panch hzar sahb nshan frshton se tmhari mdd kre ga
3.126: Ih bat allh ne tmhin as lie bta di he kh tm khosh ho jaؤ aor tmhare dl mtmen ho jaein fth o nsrt jo kchh bhi he allh ki trf se he jo bri qot oala aor dana o bina he
3.127: (aor ih mdd oh tmhin as lie de ga) takh kfr ki rah chlne oalon ka aik bazo kat de، ia an ko aisi zlil shkst de kh oh namradi ke sath pspa ho jaein
3.128: (ae pighmbrؐ) fislh ke akhtiarat min tmhara koei hsh nhin، allh ko akhtiar he chahe anhin mعaf kre، chahe sza de kionkh oh zalm hin
3.129: Zmin aor aasmanon min jo kchh he as ka malk allh he، js ko chahe bkhsh de aor js ko chahe عzab de، o h mعaf krne oala aor rhim he
3.130: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، ih brhta aor chrhta sod khana chhor do aor allh se dro، amid he kh flah paؤ ge
3.131: Aus aag se bcho jo kafron ke lie mhia ki gei he
3.132: Aor allh aor rsol ka hkm man lo، toqع he kh tm pr rhm kia jaee ga
3.133: Dor kr chlo au s rah pr jo tmhare rb ki bkhshsh aor aus jnt ki trf jati he js ki osعt zmin aor aasmanon jisi he، aor oh aun khda trs logon ke lie mhia ki gei
3.134: Jo hr hal min apne mal khrch krte hin khoah bd hal hon ia khosh hal، jo ghse ko pi jate hin aor dosron ke qsor mعaf kr dite hin aise nik log allh ko bht psnd hin
3.135: Aor jn ka hal ih he kh agr kbhi koei fhsh kam an se srzd ho jata he ia ksi gnah ka artkab kr ke oh apne aopr zlm kr bithte hin to mعaan allh anhin iad aa jata he aor as se oh apne qsoron ki mعafi chahte hin kionkh allh ke soa aor kon he jo gnah mعaf krskta ho ao r oh didh o dansth apne kie pr asrar nhin krte
3.136: Aise logon ki jza an ke rb ke pas ih he kh oh an ko mعaf kr de ga aor aise baghon min anhin dakhl kre ga jn ke niche nhrin bhti hongi aor ohan oh hmishh rhin ge kisa achha bdlh he nik عml krne oalon ke lie
3.137: Tm se phle bht se dor gzr chke hin، zmin min chl phr kr dikh lo kh aun logon ka kia anjam hoa jnhon ne (allh ke ahkam o hdaiat ko) jhtlaia
3.138: Ih logon ke lie aik saf aor srih tnbih he aor jo allh se drte hon aun ke lie hdait aor nsiht
3.139: Dl shksth nh ho، ghm nh kro، tm hi ghalb rho ge agr tm momn ho
3.140: A is oqt agr tmhin chot lgi he to as se phle aisi hi chot tmhare mkhalf friq ko bhi lg chki he ih to zmanh ke nshib o fraz hin jnhin hm logon ke drmian grdsh dite rhte hin tm pr ih oqt a s lie laia gia kh allh dikhna chahta tha kh tm min sche momn kon hin، aor an logon ko chhant lina chahta tha jo oaqعi (rasti ke) goah hon kionkh zalm log allh ko psnd nhin hin
3.141: Aor oh as aazmaesh ke zriعh se momnon ko alg chhant kr kafron ki srkobi kr dina chahta tha
3.142: Kia tm ne ih smjh rkha he kh ionhi jnt min chle jaؤ ge halankh abhi allh ne ih to dikha hi nhin kh tm min kon oh log hin jo as ki rah min janin lrane oale aor as ki khatr sbr krne oale hin
3.143: Tm to mot ki tmnaein kr rhe the! Mgr ih aus oqt ki bat thi jb mot samne nh aaei thi، lo ab oh tmhare samne aa gei aor tm ne ause aankhon dikh lia
3.144: Mhmdؐ as ke soa kchh nhin kh bs aik rsol hin، aun se phle aor rsol bhi gzr chke hin، phr kia agr oh mr jaein ia qtl kr die jaein to tm log alte paؤn phr jaؤ ge? Iad rkho! Jo alta phre ga oh allh ka kchh nqsan nh kre ga، albth jo allh ke shkr gzar bnde bn kr rhin ge anhin oh as ki jza de ga
3.145: Koei zi roh allh ke azn ke bghir nhin mrskta mot ka oqt to lkha hoa he jo shkhs soab dnia ke aradh se kam kre ga as ko hm dnia hi min se din ge، aor jo soab aakhrt ke aradh se kam kre ga oh aakhrt ka soab paee ga aor shkr krne oalon ko hm aun ki jza zror عta krin ge
3.146: Ais se phle ktne hi nbi aise gzr chke hin jn ke sath ml kr bht se khda prston ne jng ki allh ki rah min jo msibtin aun pr prin an se oh dl shksth nhin hoee، anhon ne kmzori nhin dkhaei، oh (batl ke aage) srngon nhin hoee aise hi sabron ko allh psnd krta he
3.147: An ki dعa bs ih thi kh، "ae hmare rb! Hmari ghltion aor kotahion se drgzr frma، hmare kam min tire hdod se jo kchh tjaoz ho gia ho ause mعaf kr de، hmare qdm jma de aor kafron ke mqablh min hmari mdd kr"
3.148: Aakhrkar allh ne an ko dnia ka soab bhi dia aor as se bhtr soab aakhrt bhi عta kia allh ko aise hi nik عml log psnd hin
3.149: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، agr tm aun logon ke asharon pr chlo ge jnhon ne kfr ki rah akhtiar ki he to oh tm ko alta phir le jaein ge aor tm namrad ho jaؤ ge
3.150: (aun ki batin ghlt hin) hqiqt ih he kh allh tmhara hami o mddgar he aor oh bhtrin mdd krne oala he
3.151: عnqrib oh oqt aane oala he jb hm mnkrin hq ke dlon min rعb btha din ge، as lie kh aunhon ne allh ke sath aun ko khdaei min shrik thiraia he jn ke shrik hone pr allh ne koei snd nazl nhin ki aun ka aakhri thkana jhnm he aor bht hi bri he oh qiam gah jo aun zalmon ko nsib hogi
3.152: Allh ne (taeid o nsrt ka) jo oعdh tm se kia tha oh to aus ne pora kr dia abtda min aus ke hkm se tm hi aun ko qtl kr rhe the mgr jb tm ne kmzori dkhaei aor apne kam min bahm akhtlaf kia، aor jonhi kh oh chiz allh ne tmhin dkhaei js ki mhbt min tm grftar the (iعni mal ghnimt) tm apne srdar ke hkm ki khlaf orzi kr bithe as lie kh tm min se kchh log dnia ke talb the aor kchh aakhrt ki khoahsh rkhte the tb allh ne tmhin kafron ke mqablh min pspa kr dia takh tmhari aazmaesh kre aor hq ih he kh allh ne phr bhi tmhin mعaf hi kr dia kionkh momnon pr allh bri nzr عnait rkhta he
3.153: Iad kro jb tm bhage chle ja rhe the، ksi ki trf plt kr dikhne tk ka hosh tmhin nh tha، aor rsolؐ tmhare pichhe tm ko pkar rha tha aus oqt tmhari as rosh ka bdlh allh ne tmhin ih dia kh tm ko rnj pr rnj die takh aaendh ke lie tmhin ih sbq mle kh jo kchh tmhare hath se jaee ia jo msibt tm pr nazl ho as pr mlol nh ho allh tmhare sb aعmal se bakhbr he
3.154: As ghm ke bعd phr allh ne tm min se kchh logon pr aisi atminan ki si halt tari kr di kh oh aonghne lge mgr aik dosra groh، js ke lie sari ahmit bs apne mfad hi ki thi، allh ke mtعlq trh trh ke jahlanh gman krne lga jo srasr khlaf hq the ih log ab khte hin kh، "as kam ke chlane min hmara bhi koei hsh he?" an se kho "(ksi ka koei hsh nhin) ais kam ke sare akhtiarat allh ke hath min hin" drasl ih log apne dlon min jo bat chhpaee hoee hin ause tm pr zahr nhin krte an ka asl mtlb ih he kh، "agr (qiadt ke) akhtiarat min hmara kchh hsh hota to ihan hm nh mare jate" an se khh do kh، "agr tm apne ghron min bhi hote to jn logon ki mot lkhi hoei thi oh khod apni qtl gahon ki trf nkl aate" aor ih mعamlh jo pish aaia، ih to as lie tha kh jo kchh tmhare sinon min poshidh he allh ause aazma le aor jo khot tmhare dlon min he ause chhant de، allh dlon ka hal khob janta he
3.155: Tm min se jo log mqablh ke dn pith phir gee the aun ki a is lghzsh ka sbb ih tha kh an ki bعz kmzorion ki ojh se shitan ne aun ke qdm dgmga die the allh ne anhin mعaf kr dia، allh bht drgzr krne oala aor brdbar he
3.156: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، kafron ki si batin nh kro jn ke عziz o aqarb agr kbhi sfr pr jate hin ia jng min shrik hote hin (aor ohan ksi hadsh se do char ho jate hin) to oh khte hin kh agr oh hmare pas hote to nh mare jate aor nh qtl hote allh as qsm ki baton ko an ke dlon min hsrt o andoh ka sbb bna dita he، ornh drasl marne aor jilane oala to allh hi he aor tmhari hrkat pr ohi ngran he
3.157: Agr tm allh ki rah min mare jaؤ ia mr jaؤ to allh ki jo rhmt aor bkhshsh tmhare hsh min aaee gi oh aun sari chizon se ziadh bhtr he jnhin ih log jmع krte hin
3.158: Aor khoah tm mro ia mare jaؤ bhr hal tm sb ko smt kr jana allh hi ki trf he
3.159: (ae pighmbrؐ) ih allh ki bri rhmt he kh tm ain logon ke lie bht nrm mzaj oaqع hoee ho ornh agr khin tm tnd kho aor sng dl hote to ih sb tmhare grdo pish se chht jate ain ke qsor mعaf kr do، ain ke hq min dعa ee mghfrt kro، aor din ke kam min an ko bhi shrik mshorh rkho، phr jb tmhara عzm ksi raee pr msthkm ho jaee to allh pr bhrosh kro، allh ko oh log psnd hin jo ausi ke bhrose pr kam krte hin
3.160: Allh tmhari mdd pr ho to koei taqt tm pr ghalb aane oali nhin، aor oh tmhin chhor de، to as ke bعd kon he jo tmhari mdd krskta ho? Ps jo sche momn hin an ko allh hi pr bhrosh rkhna chahie
3.161: Ksi nbi ka ih kam nhin hoskta kh oh khiant kr jaee aor jo koei khiant kre to oh apni khiant smit qiamt ke roz hazr ho jaee ga، phr hr mtnfs ko as ki kmaei ka pora pora bdlh ml jaee ga aor ksi pr kchh zlm nh hoga
3.162: Bhla ih kise hoskta he kh jo shkhs hmishh allh ki rza pr chlne oala ho oh aus shkhs ke se kam kre jo allh ke ghzb min ghr gia ho aor js ka aakhri thkana jhnm ho jo bdtrin thkana he?
3.163: Allh ke nzdik donon qsm ke aadmion min bdrjha frq he aor allh sb ke aعmal pr nzr rkhta he
3.164: Drhqiqt ahl aiman pr to allh ne ih bht bra ahsan kia he kh aun ke drmian khod anhi min se aik aisa pighmbr athaia jo as ki aaiat anhin snata he، aun ki zndgion ko snoarta he aor aun ko ktab aor danaei ki tعlim dita he، halankh as se phle ihi log srih gmrahion min pre hoee the
3.165: Aor ih tmhara kia hal he kh jb tm pr msibt aa pri to tm khne lge ih khan se aaei? Halankh (jng bdr min) as se d o gni msibt tmhare hathon (friq mkhalf pr) pr chki he ae nbiؐ! Ain se kho، ih msibt tmhari apni laei hoei he، allh hr chiz pr qadr he
3.166: Jo nqsan lraei ke dn tmhin phncha oh allh ke azn se tha aor as lie tha kh allh dikh le tm min se momn kon hin
3.167: Aor mnafq kon، oh mnafq kh jb aun se kha gia aaؤ، allh ki rah min jng kro ia km az km (apne shhr ki) mdafعt hi kro، to khne lge agr hmin عlm hota kh aaj jng hogi to hm zror sath chlte ih bat jb oh khh rhe the aus oqt oh aiman ki nsbt kfr se ziadh qrib the oh apni zbanon se oh batin khte hin jo an ke dlon min nhin hotin، aor jo kchh oh dlon min chhpate hin allh ase khob janta he
3.168: Ih ohi log hin jo khod to bithe rhe ao ran ke jo bhaei bnd lrne gee aor mare gee an ke mtعlq anhon ne khh dia kh a groh hmari bat man lite to nh mare jate an se kho agr tm apne qol min sche ho to khod tmhari mot jb aaee ause tal kr dkha dina
3.169: Jo log allh ki rah min qtl hoee hin anhin mrdh nh smjho، oh to hqiqt min zndh hin، apne rb ke pas rzq pa rhe hin
3.170: Jo kchh allh ne apne fzl se anhin dia he aus pr khosh o khrm hin، aor mtmen hin kh jo ahl aiman anke pichhe dnia min rh gee hin aor abhi ohan nhin phnche hin an ke lie bhi ksi khof aor rnj ka moqع nhin he
3.171: Oh allh ke anعam aor as ke fzl pr shadan o frhan hin aor an ko mعlom ho chka he kh allh momnon ke ajr ko zaeع nhin krta
3.172: Jn logon ne zkhm khane ke bعd bhi allh aor rsol ki pkar pr lbik kha aun min jo ashkhas nikokar aor prhiz gar hin aun ke lie bra ajr he
3.173: Aor oh jn se logon ne kha kh، "tmarre khlaf bri fojin jmع hoei hin، aun se dro"، to ih sn kr an ka aiman aor brh gia aor aunhon ne joab dia kh hmare lie allh kafi he aor ohi bhtrin karsa z he
3.174: Aakhr kar oh allh tعalia ki nعmt aor fzl ke sath plt aaee، an ko ksi qsm ka zrr bhi nh phncha aor allh ki rza pr chlne ka shrf bhi anhin hasl ho gia، allh bra fzl frmane oala he
3.175: Ab tmhin mعlom ho gia kh oh drasl shitan tha jo apne doston se khoah mkhoah dra rha tha lhaza aaendh tm ansanon se nh drna، mjh se drna agr tm hqiqt min sahb aiman ho
3.176: (ae pighmbrؐ) jo log aaj kfr ki rah min bri dor dhop kr rhe hin an ki srgrmian tmhin aazrdh nh krin، ih allh ka kchh bhi nh bgar skin ge allh ka aradh ih he kh aun ke lie aakhrt min koei hsh nh rkhe، aor balaakhr an ko skht sza mlne oali he
3.177: Jo log aiman ko chhor kr kfr ke khridar bne hin oh iqinaan allh ka koei nqsan nhin kr rhe hin، aun ke lie drd nak عzab tiar he
3.178: Ih dhil jo hm anhin die jate hin as ko ih kafr apne hq min bhtri nh smjhin، hm to anhin as lie dhil de rhe hin kh ih khob bar gnah smit lin، phr aun ke lie skht zlil krne oali sza he
3.179: Allh momnon ko as halt min hrgz nh rhne de ga js min tm as oqt paee jate ho oh pak logon ko napak logon se alg kr ke rhe ga mgr allh ka ih triqh nhin he kh tm ko ghib pr mtlع kr de ghib ki batin btane ke lie to oh apne rsolon min js ko chahta he mntkhb kr lita he lhaza (amor ghib ke bare min) allh aor as ke rsol pr aiman rkho agr tm aiman aor khda trsi ki rosh pr chlo ge to tm ko bra ajr mle ga
3.180: Jn logon ko allh ne apne fzl se noaza he aor phr oh bkhl se kam lite hin oh as khial min nh rhin kh ih bkhili an ke lie achhi he nhin، ih an ke hq min nhait bri he jo kchh oh apni knjosi se jmع kr rhe hin ohi qiamt ke roz an ke gle ka toq bn jaee ga zmin aor aasmanon ki miras allh hi ke lie he aor tm jo kchh krte ho allh as se bakhbr he
3.181: Allh ne aun logon ka qol sna jo khte hin kh allh fqir he aor hm ghni hin an ki ih batin bhi hm lkh lin ge، aor as se phle jo oh pighmbron ko nahq qtl krte rhe hin oh bhi an ke namh aعmal min sbt he (jb fislh ka oqt aaee ga aus oqt) hm an se khin ge kh lo، ab عzab jhnm ka mza chkho
3.182: Ih tmhare apne hathon ki kmaei he، allh apne bndon ke lie zalm nhin he
3.183: Jo log khte hin "allh ne hm ko hdait kr di he kh hm ksi ko rsol tslim nh krin jb tk oh hmare samne aisi qrbani nh kre jse (ghib se aakr) aag kha le "، aun se kho، "tmhare pas mjh se phle bht se rsol aa chke hin jo bht si roshn nshanian laee the aor oh nshani bhi laee the js ka tm zkr krte ho، phr agr (aiman lane ke lie ih shrt pish krne min) tm sche ho to aun rsolon ko tm ne kion qtl kia?"
3.184: Ab ae mhmdؐ! Agr ih log tmhin jhtlate hin to bht se rsol tm se phle jhtlaee ja chke hin jo khli khli nshanian aor shife aor roshni bkhshne oali ktabin laee the
3.185: Aakhr kar hr shkhs ko mrna he aor tm sb apne apne pore ajr qiamt ke roz pane oale ho kamiab drasl oh he jo ohan aatsh dozkh se bch jaee aor jnt min dakhl kr dia jaee rhi ih dnia، to ih mhz aik zahr frib chiz he
3.186: Mslmano! Tmhin mal aor jan donon ki aazmaeshin pish aa kr rhin gi، aor tm ahl ktab aor mshrkin se bht si tklif dh batin sno ge agr an sb halat min tm sbr aor khda trsi ki rosh pr qaem rho to ih bre hoslh ka kam he
3.187: Ain ahl ktab ko oh عhd bhi iad dlaؤ jo allh ne an se lia tha kh tmhin ktab ki tعlimat ko logon min philana hoga، anhin poshidh rkhna nhin hoga mgr anhon ne ktab ko ps psht dal dia aor thori qimt pr ause bich dala ktna bra karobar he jo ih kr rhe hin
3.188: Tm aun logon ko عzab se mhfoz nh smjho jo apne krtoton pr khosh hin aor chahte hin kh aise kamon ki tعrif aunhin hasl ho jo fi aloaqع anhon ne nhin kie hin hqiqt min an ke lie drd nak sza tiar he
3.189: Zmin aor aasman ka malk allh he aor as ki qdrt sb pr haoi he
3.190: Zmin aor aasmanon ki pidaesh min aor rat aor dn ke bari bari se aane min aun hosh mnd logon ke lie bht nshanian hin
3.191: Jo athte، bithte aor litte، hr hal min khda ko iad krte hin aor aasman o zmin ki sakht min ghor o fkr krte hin (oh be akhtiar bo l athte hin) "prordgar! Ih sb kchh to ne fzol aor be mqsd nhin bnaia he، to pak he as se kh عbs kam kre ps ae rb! Hmin dozkh ke عzab se bcha le
3.192: To ne jse dozkh min dala ase dr hqiqt bri zlt o rsoaei min dal dia، aor phr aise zalmon ka koei mdd gar nh hoga
3.193: Malk! Hm ne aik pkarne oale ko sna jo aiman ki trf blata tha aor khta tha kh apne rb ko mano hm ne as ki dعot qbol kr li، ps ae hmare aaqa! Jo qsor hm se hoee hin an se drgzr frma، jo braeian hm min hin anhin dor kr de aor hmara khatmh nik logon ke sath kr
3.194: Khdaonda! Jo oعde to ne apne rsolon ke zriعh se kie hin aun ko hmare sath pora kr aor qiamt ke dn hmin rsoaei min nh dal، be shk to apne oعde ke khlaf krne oala nhin he"
3.195: Joab min an ke rb ne frmaia، "min tm min se ksi ka عml zaeع krne oala nhin hon khoah mrd ho ia عort، tm sb aik dosre ke hm jns ho lhaza jn logon ne miri khatr apne otn chhore aor jo mir i rah min apne ghron se nkale gee aor staee gee aor mire lie lre aor mare gee aun ke sb qsor min mعaf kr don ga aor anhin aise baghon min dakhl kron ga jn ke niche nhrin bhti hon gi ih aun ki jza he allh ke han aor bhtrin jza allh hi ke pas he"
3.196: Ae nbiؐ! Dnia ke mlkon min khda ke nafrman logon ki chlt phrt tmhin ksi dhoke min nh dale
3.197: Ih mhz chnd rozh zndgi ka thora sa ltf he، phr ih sb jhnm min jaein ge jo bdtrin jaee qrar he
3.198: Brعks as ke jo log apne rb se drte hoee zndgi bsr krte hin an ke lie aise bagh hin jn ke niche nhrin bhti hin، an baghon min oh hmishh rhin ge، allh ki trf se ih saman ziaft he an ke lie، aor jo kchh allh ke pas he nik logon ke lie ohi sb se bhtr he
3.199: Ahl ktab min bhi kchh log aise hin jo allh ko mante hin، as ktab pr aiman late hin jo tmhari trf bhiji gei he aoraus ktab prbhi aiman rkhte hin jo as se phle khod an ki trf bhiji gei thi، allh ke aage jhke hoee hin، aor allh ki aaiat ko thori si qimt pr bich nhin dite an ka ajr an ke rb ke pas he aor allh hsab chkane min dir nhin lgata
3.200: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، sbr se kam lo، batl prston ke mqablh min pa mrdi dkhaؤ، hq ki khdmt ke lie kmr bsth rho، aor allh se drte rho، amid he kh flah paؤ ge

4.1: Logo! Apne rb se dro js ne tm ko aik jan se pida kia aor ausi jan se as ka jora bnaia aor an donon se bht mrd o عort dnia min phila die aus khda se dro js ka oasth de kr tm aik dosre se apne hq mangte ho، aor rshth o qrabt ke tعlqat ko bgarne se prhiz kro iqin jano kh allh tm pr ngrani kr rha he
4.2: Itimon ke mal aun ko oaps do، achhe mal ko bre mal se nh bdl lo، aor aun ke mal apne mal ke sath mla kr nh kha jaؤ، ih bht bra gnah he
4.3: Aor agr tm itimon ke sath be ansafi krne se drte ho to jo عortin tm ko psnd aaein aun min se do do، tin tin، char char se nkah krlo likn agr tmhin andishh ho kh aun ke sath عdl nh kr sko ge to phr aik hi bioi kro ia aun عorton ko zojit min laؤ jo tmhare qbzh min aaei hin، be ansafi se bchne ke lie ih ziadh qrin soab he
4.4: Aor عorton ke mhr khosh dli ke sath (frz jante hoee) ada kro، albth agr oh khod apni khoshi se mhr ka koei hsh tmhin mعaf kr din to ause tm mze se kha skte ho
4.5: Aor apne oh mal jnhin allh ne tmhare lie qiam zndgi ka zriعh bnaia he، nadan logon ke hoalh nh kro، albth anhin khane aor phnne ke lie do aor anhin nik hdait kro
4.6: Aor itimon ki aazmaesh krte rho ihan tk kh oh nkah ke qabl عmr ko phnch jaein phr agr tm aun ke andr ahlit paؤ to aun ke mal aun ke hoale kr do aisa kbhi nh krna kh hd ansaf se tjaoz kr ke ais khof se aun ke mal jldi jldi kha jaؤ kh oh bre ho kr apne hq ka mtalbh krin ge itim ka jo srprst mal dar ho oh prhiz gari se kam le aor jo ghrib ho oh mعrof triqh se khaee phr jb aun ke mal aun ke hoale krne lgo to logon ko as pr goah bna lo، aor hsab line ke lie allh kafi he
4.7: Mrdon ke lie aus mal min hsh he jo man bap aor rshth daron ne chhora ho، aor عorton ke lie bhi aus mal min hsh he jo man bap aor rshth daron ne chhora ho، khoah thora ho ia bht، aor ih hsh (allh ki trf se) mqrr he
4.8: Aor jb tqsim ke moqع pr knbh ke log aor itim aor mskin aaein to as mal min se an ko bhi kchh do aor aun ke sath bhle manson ki si bat kro
4.9: Logon ko as bat ka khial kr ke drna chahie kh agr oh khod apne pichhe be bs aolad chhorte to mrte oqt anhin apne bchon ke hq min kise kchh andishe lahq hote ps chahie kh oh khda ka khof krin aor rasti ki bat krin
4.10: Jo log zlm ke sath itimon ke mal khate hin dr hqiqt oh apne pit aag se bhrte hin aor oh zror jhnm ki bhrkti hoei aag min jhonke jaein ge
4.11: Tmhari aolad ke bare min allh tmhin hdait krta he kh: mrd ka hsh do عorton ke brabr he، agr (mit ki oars) do se zaed lrkian hon to anhin trke ka do thaei dia jaee، aor agr aik hi lrki oars ho to aadha trkh as ka he agr mit sahb aolad ho toas ke oaldin min se hr aik ko trke ka chhta hsh mlna chahie aor agr oh sahb aolad nh ho aor oaldin hi as ke oars ho n to man ko tisra hsh dia jaee aor agr mit ke bhaei bhn bhi hon to man chhte hsh ki hq dar hogi (ih sb hse aus oqt nkale jaein) jbkh osit jo mit ne ki ho pori kr di jaee aor qrz jo aus pr ho ada kr dia jaee tm nhin jante kh tmhare man bap aor tmhari aolad min se kon blhaz nfع tm se qrib tr he ih hse allh ne mqrr kr die hin، aor allh iqinaan sb hqiqton se oaqf aor sari mslhton ka janne oala he
4.12: Aor tmhari bioion ne jo kchh chhora ho as ka aadha hsh tmhin mle ga agr oh be aolad hon، ornh aolad hone ki sort min trkh ka aik chothaei hsh tmhara he jbkh osit jo anhon n ne ki ho pori kr di jaee، aor qrz jo aunhon ne chhora ho ada kr dia jaee aor oh tmhare trkh min se chothaei ki hq dar hon gi agr tm be aolad ho، ornh sahb aolad hone ki sort min aun ka hsh aathoan hoga، bعd as ke kh jo osit tm ne ki ho oh pori kr di jaee aor jo qrz tm ne chhora ho oh ada kr dia jaee aor agr oh mrd ia عort (js ki miras tqsim tlb he) be aolad bhi ho aor as ke man bap bhi zndh nh hon، mgr as ka aik bhaei ia aik bhn mojod ho to bhaei aor bhn hr aik ko chhta hsh mle ga، aor bhaei bhn aik se ziadh hon to kl trkh ke aik thaei min oh sb shrik hon ge، jbkh osit jo ki gei ho pori kr di jaee، aor qrz jo mit ne chhora ho ada kr dia jaee، bshr tikh oh zrr rsan nh ho ih hkm he allh ki trf se aor allh dana o bina aor nrm kho he
4.13: Ih allh ki mqrr ki hoei hdin hin jo allh aor aus ke rsol ki ataعt kre ga ause allh aise baghon min dakhl kre ga jn ke niche nhrin bhti hon gi aor an baghon min oh hmishh rhe ga aor ihi bri kamiabi he
4.14: Aor jo allh aor aus ke rsol ki nafrmani kre ga aor as ki mqrr ki hoei hdon se tjaoz kr jaee ga ause allh aag min dale ga js min oh hmishh rhe ga aor as ke lie rsoa kn sza he
4.15: Tmhari عorton min se jo bd kari ki mrtkb hon aun pr apne min se char aadmion ki goahi lo، aor agr char aadmi goahi de din to an ko ghron min bnd rkho ihan tk kh anhin mot aa jaee ia allh aun ke lie koei rasth nkal de
4.16: Aor tm min se jo as fعl ka artkab krin aun donon ko tklif do، phr agr oh tobh krin aor apni aslah kr lin to anhin chhor do kh allh bht tobh qbol krne oala aor rhm frmane oala he
4.17: Han ih jan lo kh allh pr tobh ki qbolit ka hq aunhi logon ke lie he jo nadani ki ojh se koei bra fعl kr gzrte hin aor as ke bعd jldi hi tobh kr lite hin aise logon pr allh apni nzr عnait se phr mtojh ho jata he aor allh sari baton ki khbr rkhne oala aor hkim o dana he
4.18: Mgr tobh aun logon ke lie nhin he jo bre kam kie chle jate hin ihan tk kh jb an min se ksi ki mot oqt aa jata he aus oqt oh khta he kh ab min ne tobh ki، aor asi trh tobh aun ke lie bhi nhin he jo mrte dm tk kafr rhin a ise logon ke lie to hm ne drd nak sza tiar kr rkhi he
4.19: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، tmhare lie ih hlal nhin he kh zbrdsti عorton ke oars bn bitho aor nh ih hlal he kh anhin tng kr ke aus mhr ka kchh hsh ara line ki koshsh kro jo tm anhin de chke ho han agr oh ksi srih bd chlni ki mrtkb ho n (to zror tmhin tng krne ka hq he) an ke sath bhle triqh se zndgi bsr kro agr oh tmhin napsnd hon to ho skta he kh aik chiz tmhin psnd nh ho mgr allh ne ausi min bht kchh bhlaei rkh di ho
4.20: Aor agr tm aik bioi ki jgh dosri bioi le aane ka aradh hi kr lo to khoah tm ne ause dhir sa mal hi kion nh dia ho، as min se kchh oaps nh lina kia tm ause bhtan lga kr aor srih zlm kr ke oaps lo ge?
4.21: Aor aakhr tm ause ks trh le lo ge jb kh tm aik dosre se ltf ando z ho chke ho aor oh tm se pkhth عhd le chki hin?
4.22: Aor jn عorton se tmhare bap nkah kr chke hon aun se hrgz nkah nh kro، mgr jo phle ho chka so ho chka dr hqiqt ih aik be hiaei ka fعl he، napsndidh he aor bra chln he
4.23: Tm pr hram ki gein tmhari maein، bitian، bhnin، phophian، khalaein، bhtijian، bhanjian، aor tmhari oh maein jnhon ne tm ko dodh plaia ho، aor tmhari dodh shrik bhnin، aor tmhari bioion ki maein، aor tmhari bioion ki lrkian jnhon ne tmhari godon min prorsh paei he aun bioion ki lrkian jn se tmhara tعlq zn o sho ho chka ho ornh agr (srf nkah hoa ho aor) tعlq zn o sho nh hoa ho to (a nhin chhor kr an ki lrkion se nkah kr line min) tm pr koei moakhzh nhin he aor tmhare aun biton ki bioian jo tmhari slb se hon aor ih bhi tm pr hram kia gia he kh aik nkah min do bhnon ko jmع kro، mgr jo phle ho gia so ho gia، allh bkhshne oala aor rhm krne oala he
4.24: Aor oh عortin bhi tm pr hram hin jo ksi dosre ke nkah min hon (mhsnat) albth aisi عortin as se mstsnia hin jo (jng min) tmhare hath aaein ih allh ka qanon he js ki pabndi tm pr lazm kr di gei he ain ke masoa jtni عortin hin anhin apne amoal ke zriعh se hasl krna tmhare lie hlal kr dia gia he، bshr tikh hsar nkah min aun ko mhfoz kro، nh ih kh aazad shhot rani krne lgo phr jo azdoaji zndgi ka ltf tm an se athaؤ as ke bdle aun ke mhr btor frz ada kro، albth mhr ki qrardad ho jane ke bعd aaps ki rzamndi se tmhare drmian agr koei smjhoth ho jaee to as min koei hrj nhin، allh عlim aor dana he
4.25: Aor jo shkhs tm min se atni mqdrt nh rkhta ho kh khandani mslman عorton (mhsnat) se nkah kr ske ase chahie kh tmhari aun londion min se ksi ke sath nkah kr le jo tmhare qbzh min hon aor momnh hon allh tmhare aimanon ka hal khob janta he، tm sb aik hi groh ke log ho، lhaza aun ke srprston ki ajazt se aun ke sath nkah kr lo aor mعrof triqh se aun ke mhr ada kr do، takh oh hsar nkah min mhfoz (mhsnat) ho kr rhin، aazad shhot rani krti phrin aor nh chori chhpe aashnaeian krin phr jb oh hsar nkah min mhfoz ho jaein aor as ke bعd ksi bd chlni ki mrtkb hon to an pr aus sz a ki bh nsbt aadhi sza he jo khandani عorton (mhsnat) ke lie mqrr he ih sholt tm min se aun logon ke lie pida ki gei he jn ko shadi nh krne se bnd tqoia ke tot jane ka andishh ho likn agr tm sbr kro to ih tmhare lie bhtr he، aor allh bkhshne oala aor rhm frmane oala he
4.26: Allh chahta he kh tm pr aun triqon ko oazh kre aor aunhi triqon pr tmhin chlaee jn ki piroi tm se phle gzre hoee slha, krte the oh apni rhmt ke sath tmhari trf mtojh hone ka aradh rkhta he، aor oh عlim bhi he aor dana bhi
4.27: Han، allh to tm pr rhmt ke sath tojh krna chahta he mgr jo log khod apni khoahshat nfs ki piroi kr rhe hin oh chahte hin kh tm rah rast se ht kr dor nkl jaؤ
4.28: Allh tm pr se pabndion ko hlka krna chahta he kionkh ansan kmzor pida kia gia he
4.29: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، aaps min aik dosre ke mal batl triqon se nh khaؤ، lin din hona chahie aaps ki rzamndi se aor apne aap ko qtl nh kro iqin mano kh allh tmhare aopr mhrban he
4.30: Jo shkhs zlm o ziadti ke sath aisa kre ga aus ko hm zror aag min jhonkin ge aor ih allh ke lie koei mshkl kam nhin he
4.31: Agr tm aun bre bre gnahon se prhiz krte rho jn se tmhin mnع kia ja rha he to tmhari chhoti moti braeion ko hm tmhare hsab se saqt kr din ge aor tm ko عzt ki jgh dakhl krin ge
4.32: Aor jo kchh allh ne tm min se ksi ko dosron ke mqablh min ziadh dia he as ki tmna nh kro jo kchh mardon ne kmaia he aus ke mtabq an ka hsh he aor jo kchh عorton ne kmaia he as ke mtabq aun ka hsh han allh se as ke fzl ki dعa mangte rho، iqinaan allh hr chiz ka عlm rkhta he
