5.1: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، bndshon ki pori pabndi kro tmhare lie moishi ki qsm ke sb janor hlal kie gee، soaee aun ke jo aage chl kr tm ko btaee jaein ge likn ahram ki halt min shkar ko apne lie hlal nh kr lo، be shk allh jo chahta he hkm dita he
5.2: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، khd a prsti ki nshanion ko be hrmt nh kro nh hram mhinon min se ksi ko hlal kr lo، nh qrbani ke janoron pr dst drazi kro، nh aun janoron pr hath dalo jn ki grdnon min nzr khdaondi ki عlamt ke tor pr pte pre hoee hon، nh aun logon ko chhiro jo apne rb ke fzl aor as ki khoshnodi ki tlash min mkan mhtrm (kعbh) ki trf ja rhe hon han jb ahram ki halt khtm ho jaee to shkar tm krskte ho aor dikho، aik groh ne jo tmhare lie msjd hram ka rasth bnd kr dia he toas pr tmhara ghsh tmhin atna mshtعl nh kr de kh tm bhi an ke mqablh min naroa ziadtian krne lgo nhin! Jo kam niki aor khda trsi ke hin an min sb se tعaon kro aor jo gnah aor ziadti ke kam hin an min ksi se tعaon nh kro allh se dro، as ki sz a bht skht he
5.3: Tm pr hram kia gia murdar، khon، suor ka gosht، oh janor jo khda ke soa ksi aor ke nam pr zbh kia gia ho، oh jo ghla ght kr، ia chot kha kr، ia blndi se gr kr، ia tkr kha kr mra ho، ia jse ksi drnde ne phara ho soaee as ke jse tm ne zndh pakr zbh kr lia aor oh jo ksi aasta ne pr zbh kia gia ho niz ih bhi tmhare lie najaez he kh panson ke zriعh se apni qsmt mعlom kro ih sb afعal fsq hin aaj kafron ko tmhare din ki trf se pori maiosi ho chki he lhaza tm aun se nh dro blkh mjh se dro aaj min ne tmhare din ko tmhare lie mkml kr dia he aor apni nعmt tm pr tmam kr di he aor tmhare lie aslam ko tmhare din ki hisit se qbol kr lia he (lhaza hram o hlal ki jo qiod tm pr عaed kr di gei hin aun ki pabnd i kro) albth jo shkhs bhok se mjbor ho kr aun min se koei chiz kha le، bghir as ke kh gnah ki trf as ka milan ho to bishk allh mعaf krne oala aor rhm frmane oala he
5.4: Log pochhte hin kh an ke lie kia hlal kia gia he، kho tmhare lie sari pak chizin hlal kr di gei hin aor jn shkari janoron ko tm ne sdhaia ho jn ko khda ke die hoee عlm ki bna pr tm shkar ki tعlim dia krte ho oh js janor ko tmhare lie pkr rkhin as ko bhi tm khaskte ho، albth as pr allh ka nam le lo aor allh ka qanon torne se dro، allh ko hsab lite kchh dir nhin lgti
5.5: Aaj tmhare lie sari pak chizin hlal kr di gei hin ahl ktab ka khana tmhare lie hlal he aor tmhara khana aun ke lie aor mhfoz عortin bhi tmhare lie hlal hin khoah oh ahl aiman ke groh se hon ia aun qomon min se jn ko tm se phle ktab di gei thi، bshr tikh tm aun ke mhr ada kr ke nkah min aun ke mhafz bno، nh ih kh aazad shhot rani krne lgo ia chori chhpe aashnaeian kro aor jo ksi ne aiman ki rosh pr chlne se ankar kia to as ka sara karnamh zndgi zaeع ho jaee ga aor oh aakhrt min dioalih hoga
5.6: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، jb tm nmaz ke lie atho to chahie kh apne mnh aor hath khnion tk dho lo، sron pr hath phir lo aor paؤn tkhnon tk dho lia kro agr jnabt ki halt min ho to nha kr pak ho jaؤ agr bimar ho ia sfr ki halt min ho ia tm min se koei shkhs rfع hajt kr ke aaee ia tm ne عorton ko hath lgaia ho، aor pani nh mle، to pak mti se kam lo، bs aus pr hath mar kr apne mnh aor hathon pr phir lia kro allh tm pr zndgi ko tng nhin krna chahta، mgr oh chahta he kh tmhin pak kre aor apni nعmt tm pr tmam kr de، shaid kh tm shkr gzar bno
5.7: Allh ne tm ko jo nعmt عta ki he as ka khial rkho aor aus pkhth عhd o piman ko nh bholo jo aus ne tm se lia he، iعni tmhara ih qol kh، "hm ne sna aor ataعt qbol ki" allh se dro، allh dlon ke raz tk janta he
5.8: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho! Allh ki khatr rasti pr qaem rhne oale aor ansaf ki goahi dine oale bno ksi groh ki dshmni tm ko atna mshtعl nh kr de kh ansaf se phr jaؤ عdl kro، ih khda trsi se ziadh mnasbt rkhta he allh se dr kr kam krte rho، jo kchh tm krte ho allh aus se pori trh bakhbr he
5.9: Jo log aiman laein aor nik عml krin، allh ne an se oعdh kia he kh an ki khtaؤn se drgzr kia jaee ga aor anhin bra ajr mle ga
5.10: Rhe oh log jo kfr krin aor allh ki aaiat ko jhtlaein، to oh dozkh min jane oale hin
5.11: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، allh ke aus ahsan ko iad kro jo aus ne (abhi hal min) tm pr kia he، jbkh aik groh ne tm pr dst drazi ka aradh kr lia tha mgr allh ne aun ke hath tm pr athne se rok die allh se dr kr kam krte rho، aiman rkhne oalon ko allh hi pr bhrosh krna chahie
5.12: Allh ne bni asraeil se pkhth عhd lia tha aor an min barh nqib mqrr kie the aor an se kha tha kh "min tmhare sath hon، agr tm ne nmaz qaem rkhi aor zkoaۃ di aor mire rsolon ko mana aor an ki mdd ki aor apne khda ko achha qrz dite rhe to iqin rkho kh min tmhari braeian tm se zael kr don ga aor tm ko aise baghon min dakhl kron ga jn ke niche nhrin bhti hon gi، mgras ke bعd js ne tm min se kfr ki rosh akhtiar ki to dr hqiqt aus ne soa, alsbil gm kr di"
5.13: Phr ih aun ka apne عhd ko tor dalna tha js ki ojh se hm ne an ko apni rhmt se dor phink dia aor an ke dl skht kr die ab an ka hal ih he kh alfaz ka alt phir kr ke bat ko khin se khin le jate hin، jo tعlim anhin di gei thi aus ka bra hsh bhol chke hin، aor aaee dn tmhin an ki ksi nh ksi khiant ka pth chlta rhta he an min se bht km log as عib se bche hoee hin (ps jb ih ais hal ko phnch chke hin to jo shrartin bhi ih krin oh an se عin mtoqع hin) lhaza anhin mعaf kro aor an ki hrkat se chshm poshi krte rho، allh aun logon ko psnd krta he jo ahsan ki rosh rkhte hin
5.14: Aisi trh hm ne aun logon se bhi pkhth عhd lia tha jnhon ne kha tha kh hm "nsaria" hin، mgr an ko bhi jo sbq iad kraia gia tha as ka aik bra hsh aunhon ne framosh kr dia aakhr kar hm ne an ke drmian qiamt tk ke lie dshmni aor aaps ke bghz o عnad ka bij bo dia، aor zror aik oqt aaee ga jb allh anhin btaee ga kh oh dnia min kia bnate rhe hin
5.15: Ae ahl ktab! Hmara rsol tmhare pas aa gia he jo ktab alahi ki bht si aun baton ko tmhare samne khol rha he jn pr tm prdh dala krte the، aor bht si baton se drgzr bhi kr jata he tmhare pas allh ki trf se roshni aa gei he aor aik aisi hq nma ktab
5.16: Js ke zriعh se allh tعalia aun logon ko jo as ki rza ke talb hin slamti ke triqe btata he aor apne azn se aun ko andhiron se nkal kr ajale ki trf lata he aor rah rast ki trf an ki rhnmaei krta he
5.17: Iqinaan kfr kia aun logon ne jnhon ne kha msih abn mrim hi khda he ae mhmdؐ! An se kho kh agr khda msih abn mrim ko aor as ki man aor tmam zmin oalon ko hlak kr dina chahe to ks ki mjal he kh aus ko ais arade se baz rkh ske? Allh to zmin aor aasmanon ka aor aun sb chizon ka malk he jo zmin aor aasmanon ke drmian paei jati hin، jo kchh chahta he pida krta he aor as ki qdrt hr chiz pr haoi he
5.18: Ihod aor nsaria khte hin kh hm allh ke bite aor as ke chhite hin an se pochho، phr oh tmhare gnahon pr tmhin sza kion dita he? Dr hqiqt tm bhi oise hi ansan ho jise aor ansan khda ne pida kie hin oh jse chahta he mعaf krta he aor jse chahta he sza dita he zmin aor aasman aor an ki sari mojodat as ki milk hin، aor asi ki trf sb ko jana he
5.19: Ae ahl ktab! Hmara ih rsol aise oqt tmhare pas aaia he aor din ki oazh tعlim tmhin de rha he jbkh rsolon ki aamd ka slslh aik mdt se bnd tha، takh tm ih nh khh sko kh hmare pas koei bshart dine oala aor drane oala nhin aaia so dikho! Ab oh bshart dine aor drane oala aa gia aor allh hr chiz pr qadr he
5.20: Iad kro jb mosiaؑ ne apni qom se kha tha kh "ae miri qom ke logo! Allh ki aus nعmt ka khial kro jo as ne tmhin عta ki thi aus ne tm min nbi pida kie، tm ko frman roa bnaia، aor tm ko oh kchh dia jo dnia min ksi ko nh dia tha
5.21: Ae bradran qom! As mqds srzmin min dakhl ho jaؤ jo allh ne tmhare lie lkh di he، pichhe nh hto ornh nakam o namrad plto ge"
5.22: Anhon ne joab dia "ae mosiaؑ! Ohan to bre zbrdst log rhte hin، hm ohan hrgz nh jaein ge jb tk oh ohan se nkl nh jaein han agr oh nkl gee to hm dakhl hone ke lie tiar hin"
5.23: Aun drne oalon min do shkhs aise bhi the jn ko allh ne apni nعmt se noaza tha aunhon ne kha kh "an jbaron ke mqablh min droaze ke andr ghs jaؤ، jb tm andr phnch jaؤ ge to tm hi ghalb rho ge allh pr bhrosh rkho agr tm momn ho"
5.24: Likn aunhon ne phr ihi kha kh "ae mosiaؑ! Hm to ohan kbhi nh jaein ge jb tk oh ohan mojod hin bs tm aor tmhara rb، donon jaؤ aor lro، hm ihan bithe hin"
5.25: As pr mosiaؑ ne kha "ae mire rb، mire akhtiar min koei nhin mgr ia miri apni zat ia mira bhaei، ps to hmin ain nafrman logon se alg kr de"
5.26: Allh ne joab dia "achha to oh mlk chalis sal tk ain pr hram he، ih zmin min mare mare phrin ge، ain nafrmanon ki halt pr hrgz trs nh khaؤ"
5.27: Aor zra anhin aadmؑ ke do biton ka qsh bhi be km o kast sna do jb aun donon ne qrbani ki to an min se aik ki qrbani qbol ki gei aor dosre ki nh ki gei aus ne kha "min tjhe mar dalon ga" as ne joab dia "allh to mtqion hi ki nzrin qbol krta he
5.28: Agr to mjhe qtl krne ke lie hath athaee ga to min tjhe qtl krne ke lie hath nh athaؤn ga، min allh rb alعalmin se drta hon
5.29: Min chahta hon kh mira aor apna gnah to hi smit le aor dozkhi bn kr rhe zalmon ke zlm ka ihi thik bdlh he"
5.30: Aakhr kar as ke nfs ne apne bhaei ka qtl as ke lie aasan kr dia aor oh ase mar kr aun logon min shaml ho gia jo nqsan athane oale hin
5.31: Phr allh ne aik koa bhija jo zmin khodne lga takh ause btaee kh apne bhaei ki lash kise chhpaee ih dikh kr oh bola afsos mjh pr! Min as koe jisa bhi nh hoska kh apne bhaei ki lash chhpane ki tdbir nkal lita as ke bعd oh apne kie pr bht pchhta ia
5.32: Asi ojh se bni asraeil pr hm ne ih frman lkh dia tha kh "js ne ksi ansan ko khon ke bdle ia zmin min fsad philane ke soa ksi aor ojh se qtl kia as ne goia tmam ansanon ko qtl kr dia aor js ne ksi ki jan bchaei aus ne goia tmam ansanon ko zndgi bkhsh di" mgr aun ka hal ih he kh hmare rsol pe dr pe an ke pas khli khli hdaiat le kr aaee phr bhi an min bksrt log zmin min ziadtian krne oale hin
5.33: Jo log allh aor as ke rsol se lrte hin aor zmin min as lie tg o do krte phrte hin kh fsad brpa krin aun ki sza ih he kh qtl kie jaein، ia soli pr chrhaee jaein، ia aun ke hath aor paؤn mkhalf smton se kat dale jaein، ia oh jla otn kr die jaein، ih zlt o rsoaei to aun ke lie dnia min he aor aakhrt min aun ke lie as se bri sza he
5.34: Mgr jo log tobh kr lin qbl as ke kh tm an pr qabo paؤ tmhin mعlom hona chahie kh allh mعaf krne oala aor rhm frmane oala he
5.35: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، allh se dro aor aus ki jnab min bar iabi ka zriعh tlash kro aor as ki rah min jdojhd kro، shaid kh tmhin kamiabi nsib ho jaee
5.36: Khob jan lo kh jn logon ne kfr ka roih akhtiar kia he، agr aun ke qbzh min sari zmin ki dolt ho aor atni hi aor as ke sath، aor oh chahin kh ase fdih min de kr roz qiamt ke عzab se bch jaein، tb bhi oh an se qbol nh ki jaee gi aor anhin drd nak sza ml kr rhe gi
5.37: Oh chahin ge kh dozkh ki aag se nkl bhagin mgr nh nkl skin ge aor anhin qaem rhne oala عzab dia jaee ga
5.38: Aor chor، khoah عort ho ia mrd، donon ke hath kat do، ih aun ki kmaei ka bdlh he aor allh ki trf se عbrtnak sza allh ki qdrt sb pr ghalb he aor oh dana o bina he
5.39: Phr jo zlm krne ke bعd tobh kre aor apni aslah kr le to allh ki nzr عnait phr as pr mael ho jaee gi، allh bht drgzr krne oala aor rhm frmane oala he
5.40: Kia tm jante nhin ho kh allh zmin aor aasmanon ki sltnt ka malk he? Jse chahe sza de aor jse chahe mعaf kr de، oh hr chiz ka akhtiar rkhta he
5.41: Ae pighmbrؐ! Tmhare lie baعs rnj nh hon oh log jo kfr ki rah min bri tiz gami dkha rhe hin khoah oh aun min se hon jo mnh se khte hin hm aiman laee mgr dl aun ke aiman nhin laee، ia aun min se hon jo ihodi bn gee hin، jn ka hal ih he kh jhot ke lie kan lgate hin، aor dosre logon ki khatr، jo tmhare pas kbhi nhin aaee، sn gn lite phrte hin، ktab allh ke alfaz ko aun ka shih mhl mtعin hone ke baojod asl mعni se phirte hin، aor logon se khte hin kh agr tmhin ih hkm dia jaee to mano nhin to nh mano jse allh hi ne ftnh min dalne ka aradh kr lia ho to as ko allh ki grft se bchane ke lie tm kchh nhin krskte، ih oh log hin jn ke dlon ko allh ne pak krna nh chaha، an ke lie dnia min rsoaei he aor aakhrt min skht sza
5.42: Ih jhot snne oale aor hram ke mal khane oale hin، lhaza agr ih tmhare pas (apne mqdmat le kr) aaein to tmhin akhtiar dia jata he kh chaho an ka fislh kro ornh ankar kr do ankar kr do to ih tmhara kchh bgar nhin skte، aor fislh kro to phr thik thik ansaf ke sath kro kh allh ansaf krne oalon ko psnd krta he
5.43: Aor ih tmhin kise hakm bnate hin jbkh an ke pas toraۃ mojod he js min allh ka hkm lkha hoa he aor phr ih as se mnh mor rhe hin? Asl bat ih he kh ih log aiman hi nhin rkhte
5.44: Hm ne toraۃ nazl ki js min hdait aor roshni thi sare nbi، jo mslm the، ausi ke mtabq ain ihodi bn jane oalon ke mعamlat ka fislh krte the، aor aisi trh rbani aor ahbar bhi (asi pr fislh ka mdar rkhte the) kionkh anhin ktab allh ki hfazt ka zmh dar bnaia gia tha aor oh as pr goah the ps (ae groh ihod!) tm logon se nh dro blkh mjh se dro aor miri aaiat ko zra zra se mعaoze le kr bichna chhor do jo log allh ke nazl krdh qanon ke mtabq fislh nh krin ohi kafr hin
5.45: Toraۃ min hm ne ihodion pr ih hkm lkh dia tha kh jan ke bdle jan، aankh ke bdle aankh، nak ke bdle nak، kan ke bdle kan، dant ke bdle dant، aor tmam zkhmon ke lie brabr ka bdlh phr jo qsas ka sdqh kr de to oh as ke lie kfarh he aor jo log allh ke nazl krdh qanon ke mtabq fislh nh krin ohi zalm hin
5.46: Phr hm ne an pighmbron ke bعd mrimؑ ke bite عisiaؑ ko bhija toraۃ min se jo kchh as ke samne mojod tha oh as ki tsdiq krne oala tha aor hm ne as ko anjil عta ki js min rhnmaei aor roshni thi aor oh bhi toraۃ min se jo kchh aus oqt mojod tha aus ki tsdiq krne oali thi aor khda trs logon ke lie srasr hdait aor nsiht thi
5.47: Hmara hkm tha kh ahl anjil as qanon ke mtabq fislh krin jo allh ne as min nazl kia he aor jo log allh ke nazl krdh qanon ke mtabq fislh nh krin ohi fasq hin
5.48: Phr ae mhmdؐ! Hm ne tmhari trf ih ktab bhiji jo hq le kr aaei he aor alktab min se jo kchh as ke aage mojod he aus ki tsdiq krne oali aor as ki mhafz o nghban he lhaza tm khda ke nazl krdh qanon ke mtabq logon ke mعamlat ka fislh kro aor jo hq tmhare pas aaia he aus se mnh mor kr an ki khoahshat ki piroi nh kro hm ne tm min se hr aik ke lie aik shriعt aor aik rah عml mqrr ki agrchh tmhara khda chahta to tm sb ko aik amt bhi bna skta tha، likn aus ne ih ais lie kia kh jo kchh aus ne tm logon ko dia he as min tmhari aazmaesh kre lhaza bhlaeion min aik dosre se sbqt le jane ki koshsh kro aakhr kar tm sb ko khda ki trf plt kr jana he، phr oh tmhin asl hqiqt bta de ga js min tm akhtlaf krte rhe ho
5.49: Ps ae mhmdؐ! Tm allh ke nazl krdh qanon ke mtabq ain logon ke mعamlat ka fislh kro aor an ki khoahshat ki piroi nh kro hoshiar rho kh ih log tm ko ftnh min dal kr aus hdait se zrh brabr mnhrf nh krne paein jo khda ne tmhari trf nazl ki he phr agr ih as se mnh morin to jan lo kh allh ne ain ke bعz gnahon ki padash min an ko mbtlaee msibt krne ka aradh hi kr lia he، aor ih hqiqt he kh ain logon min se aksr fasq hin
5.50: (agr ih khda ke qanon se mnh morte hin) to kia phr jahlit ka fislh chahte hin? Halankh jo log allh pr iqin rkhte hin an ke nzdik allh se bhtr fislh krne oala koei nhin he
5.51: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho! Ihodion aor عisaeion ko apna rfiq nh bnaؤ، ih aaps hi min aik dosre ke rfiq hin aor agr tm min se koei an ko apna rfiq bnata he to as ka shmar bhi phr anhi min he، iqinaan allh zalmon ko apni rhnmaei se mhrom kr dita he
5.52: Tm dikhte ho kh jn ke dlon min nfaq ki bimari he oh aunhi min dor dhop krte phrte hin khte hin "hmin dr lgta he kh khin hm ksi msibt ke chkr min nh phns jaein" mgr bعid nhin kh allh jb tmhin fislh kn fth bkhshe ga ia apni trf se koei aor bat zahr kre ga to ih log apne ais nfaq pr jse ih dlon min chhpaee hoee hin nadm hon ge
5.53: Aor aus oqt ahl aiman khin ge "kia ih ohi log hin jo allh ke nam se kri kri qsmin kha kr iqin dlate the kh hm tmhare sath hin?" an ke sb aعmal zaeع hogee aor aakhr kar ih nakam o namrad ho kr rhe
5.54: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، agr tm min se koei apne din se phrta he (to phr jaee) allh aor bht se log aise pida kr de ga jo allh ko mhbob hon ge aor allh aun ko mhbob hoga، jo momnon pr nrm aor kfar pr skht hon ge، jo allh ki rah min jdojhd krin ge aor ksi mlamt krne oale ki mlamt se nh drin ge ih allh ka fzl he، jse chahta he عta krta he allh osiع zraeع ka malk he aor sb kchh janta he
5.55: Tmhare rfiq to hqiqt min srf allh aor allh ka rsol aor oh ahl aiman hin jo nmaz qaem krte hin، zkoaۃ dite hin aor allh ke aage jhkne oale hin
5.56: Aor jo allh aor as ke rsol aor ahl aiman ko apna rfiq bna le ause mعlom ho kh allh ki jmaعt hi ghalb rhne oali he
5.57: A e logo jo aiman laee ho، tmhare pish ro ahl ktab min se jn logon ne tmhare din ko mzaq aor tfrih ka saman bna lia he، aunhin aor dosre kafron ko apna dost aor rfiq nh bnaؤ allh se dro agr tm momn ho
5.58: Jb tm nmaz ke lie mnadi krte ho to oh as ka mzaq arate aor as se khilte hin as ki ojh ih he kh oh عql nhin rkhte
5.59: Ain se kho، "ae ahl ktab! Tm js bat pr hm se bgre ho oh as ke soa aor kia he kh hm allh pr aor din ki aus tعlim pr aiman le aaee hin jo hmari trf nazl hoei he aor hm se phle bhi nazl hoei thi، aor tm min se aksr log fasq hin?"
5.60: Phr kho "kia min aun logon ki nshandhi kron jn ka anjam khda ke han fasqon ke anjam se bhi bdtr he? Oh jn pr khda ne lعnt ki، jn pr aus ka ghzb tota، jn min se bndr aor sor bnaee gee، jnhon ne taghot ki bndgi ki an ka drjh aor bhi ziadh bra he aor oh saoaa, alsّbil se bht ziadh bhtke hoee hin"
5.61: Jb ih tm logon ke pas aate hin to khte hin kh hm aiman laee، halankh kfr lie hoee aaee the aor kfr hi lie hoee oaps gee aor allh khob janta he jo kchh ih dlon min chhpaee hoee hin
5.62: Tm dikhte ho kh an min se bksrt log gnah aor zlm o ziadti ke kamon min dor dhop krte phrte hin aor hram ke mal khate hin bht bri hrkat hin jo ih kr rhe hin
5.63: Kion ain ke عulma, aor mshaekh anhin gnah pr zban kholne aor hram khane se nhin rokte? Iqinaan bht hi bra karnamh zndgi he jo oh tiar kr rhe hin
5.64: Ihodi khte hin allh ke hath bndhe hoee hin bandhe gee an ke hath، aor lعnt pri ain pr aus bkoas ki bdolt jo ih krte hin allh ke hath to kshadh hin، js trh chahta he khrch krta he hqiqt ih he kh jo klam tmhare rb ki trf se tm pr nazl hoa he oh an min se aksr logon ki srkshi o batl prsti min alte azafh ka mojb bn gia he، aor (as ki padash min) hm ne an ke drmian qiamt tk ke lie عdaot aor dshmni dal di he jb kbhi ih jng ki aag bhrkate hin allh aus ko thnda kr dita he ih zmin min fsad philane ki sعi kr rhe hin mgr allh fsad brpa krne oalon ko hrgz psnd nhin krta
5.65: Agr (ais srkshi ke bjaee) ih ahl ktab aiman le aate aor khda trsi ki rosh akhtiar krte to hm ain ki braeian ain se dor kr dite aor an ko nعmt bhri jnton min phnchate
5.66: Kash anhon ne toraۃ aor anjil aor aun dosri ktabon ko qaem kia hota jo ain ke rb ki trf se ain ke pas bhiji gei thin aisa krte to ain ke lie aopr se rzq brsta aor niche se ablta agrchh ain min kchh log rast ro bhi hin likn an ki aksrit skht bd عml he
5.67: Ae pighmbrؐ! Jo kchh tmhare rb ki trf se tm pr nazl kia gia he oh logon tk phncha do agr tm ne aisa nh kia to as ki pighmbri ka hq ada nh kia allh tm ko logon ke shr se bchane oala he iqin rkho kh oh kafron ko (tmhare mqablh min) kamiabi ki rah hrgz nh dkhaee ga
5.68: Saf khh do kh "ae ahl ktab! Tm hrgz ksi asl pr nhin ho jb tk kh toraۃ aor anjil aor aun dosri ktabon ko qaem nh kro jo tmhare rb ki trf se nazl ki gei hin" zror he kh ih frman jo tm pr nazl kia gia he an min se aksr ki srkshi aor ankar ko aor ziadh brha de ga mgr ankar krne oalon ke hal pr kchh afsos nh kro
5.69: (iqin jano kh ihan ajarh ksi ka bhi nhin he) mslman ho n ia ihodi، sabi ho n ia عisaei، jo bhi allh aor roz aakhr pr aiman laee ga aor nik عml kre ga be shk as ke lie nh ksi khof ka mqam he nh rnj ka
5.70: Hm ne bni asraeil se pkhth عhd lia aor aun ki trf bht se rsol bhije، mgr jb kbhi an ke pas koei rsol aun ki khoahshat nfs ke khlaf kchh le kr aaia to ksi ko anhon ne jhtlaia aor ksi ko qtl kr dia
5.71: Aor apne nzdik ih smjhe kh koei ftnh ronma nh hoga، as lie andhe aor bhre bn gee phr allh ne aunhin mعaf kia to aun min se aksr log aor ziadh andhe aor bhre bnte chle gee allh aun ki ih sb hrkat dikhta rha he
5.72: Iqinaan kfr kia aun logon ne jnhon ne kha kh allh msih abn mrim hi he halankh msih ne kha tha kh "ae bni asraeil! Allh ki bndgi kro jo mira rb bhi he aor tmhara rb bhi" js ne allh ke sath ksi ko shrik thiraia aus pr allh ne jnt hram kr di aor aus ka thkana jhnm he aor aise zalmon ka koei mdd gar nhin
5.73: Iqinaan kfr kia aun logon ne jnhon ne kha kh allh tin min ka aik he، halankh aik khda ke soa koei khda nhin he agr ih log apni ain baton se baz nh aaee to an min se js js ne kfr kia he aus ko drd nak sza di jaee gi
5.74: Phr kia ih allh se tobh nh krin ge aor as se mعafi nh mangin ge? Allh bht drgzr frmane oala aor rhm krne oala he
5.75: Msih abn mrimؑ ais ke soa kchh nhin kh bs aik rsol tha، aus se phle aor bhi bht se rsol gzr chke the، as ki man aik rastbaz عort thi، aor oh donon khana khate the، dikho hm ks trh an ke samne hqiqt ki nshanian oazh krte hin، phr dikho ih kdhr alte phr e jate hin
5.76: Ain se kho، kia tm allh ko chhor kr aus ki prstsh krte ho jo nh tmhare lie nqsan ka akhtiar rkhta he nh nfع ka? Halankh sb ki snne oala aor sb kchh janne oala to allh hi he
5.77: Kho، ae ahl ktab! Apne din min nahq ghlo nh kro aor au n logon ke tkhilat ki piroi nh kro jo tm se phle khod gmrah hoee aor bhton ko gmrah kia، aor "saoaa, alsّbil" se bhtk gee
5.78: Bni asraeil min se jn logon ne kfr ki rah akhtiar ki aun pr daؤdؑ aor عisia abn mrimؑ ki zban se lعnt ki gei kionkh oh srksh hogee the aor ziadtian krne lge the
5.79: Aunhon ne aik dosre ko bre afعal ke artkab se rokna chhor dia tha، bra trz عml tha jo aunhon ne akhtiar kia
5.80: Aaj tm aun min bksrt aise log dikhte ho jo (ahl aiman ke mqablh min) kfar ki hmait o rfaqt krte hin iqinaan bht bra anjam he js ki tiari aun ke nfson ne aun ke lie ki he، allh aun pr ghzb nak ho gia he aor oh daemi عzab min mbtla hone oale hin
5.81: Agr fi aloaqع ih log allh aor pighmbrؐ aor aus chiz ke manne oale hote jo pighmbr pr nazl hoei thi to kbhi (ahl aiman ke mqable min) kafron ko apna rfiq nh bnate mgr an min se to bishtr log khda ki ataعt se nkl chke hin
5.82: Tm ahl aiman ki عdaot min sb se ziadh skht ihod aor mshrkin ko paؤ ge، aor aiman lane oalon ke lie dosti min qrib tr aun logon ko pa ؤ ge jnhon ne kha tha kh hm nsaria hin ih ais ojh se kh an min عbadt gzar عalm aor tark aldnia fqir paee jate hin aor aun min ghror nfs nhin he
5.83: Jb oh as klam ko snte hin jo rsol pr atra he to tm dikhte ho kh hq shnasi ke asr se aun ki aankhin aansoؤn se tr ho jati hin oh bol athte hin kh "prordgar! Hm aiman laee، hmara nam goahi dine oalon min lkh le"
5.84: Aor oh khte hin kh "aakhr kion nh hm allh pr aiman laein aor jo hq hmare pas aaia he ause kion nh man lin jbkh hm ais bat ki khoahsh rkhte hin kh hmara rb hmin salh logon min shaml kre?"
5.85: Aun ke ais qol ki ojh se allh ne aun ko aisi jntin عta kin jn ke niche nhrin bhti hin aor oh an min hmishh rhin ge ih jza he nik roih akhtiar krne oalon ke lie
5.86: Rhe oh log jnhon ne hmari aaiat ko manne se ankar kia aor anhin jhtlaia، to oh jhnm ke msthq hin
5.87: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، jo pak chizin allh ne tmhare lie hlal ki hin anhin hram nh kr lo aor hd se tjaoz nh kro، allh ko ziadti krne oale skht napsnd hin
5.88: Jo kchh hlal o tib rzq allh ne tm ko dia he ause kha ؤ pio aor aus khda ki nafrmani se bchte rho js pr tm aiman laee ho
5.89: Tm log jo mhml qsmin kha lite ho aun pr allh grft nhin krta، mgr jo qsmin tm jan bojh kr khate ho aun pr zror tm se moakhzh kre ga (aisi qsm torne ka) kfarh ih he kh ds mskinon ko oh aost drje ka khana khlaؤ jo tm apne bal bchon ko khlate ho، ia anhin kpre phnaؤ، ia aik ghlam aazad kro، aor jo as ki asttaعt nh rkhta ho oh tin dn ke roze rkhe ih tmhari qsmon ka kfarh he jbkh tm qsm kha kr tor do apni qsmon ki hfazt kia kro as trh allh apne ahkam tmhare lie oazh krta he shaid kh tm shkr ada kro
5.90: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، ih shrab aor joa aor ih aastane aor panse، ih sb gnde shitani kam hin، an se prhiz kro، amid he kh tmhin flah nsib hogi
5.91: Shitan to ih chahta he kh shrab aor joee ke zriعh se tmhare drmian عdaot aor bghz dal de aor tmhin khda ki iad se aor nmaz se rok de phr kia tm an chizon se baz rho ge?
5.92: Allh aor aus ke rsol ki bat mano aor baz aa jaؤ، likn agr tm ne hkm عdoli ki to jan lo kh hmare rsol pr bs saf saf hkm phncha dine ki zmh dari thi
5.93: Jo log aiman le aaee aor nik عml krne lge anhon ne phle jo kchh khaia pia tha as pr koei grft nh hogi bshrtikh oh aaendh aun chizon se bche rhin jo hram ki gei hin aor aiman pr sabt qdm rhin aor achhe kam krin، phr js js chiz se roka jaee as se rkin aor jo frman alahi ho ause manin، phr khda trsi ke sath nik roih rkhin allh nik krdar logon ko psnd krta he
5.94: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، allh tmhin aus shkar ke zriعh se skht aazmaesh min dale ga jo balkl tmhare hathon aor nizon ki zd min hoga، ih dikhne ke lie kh tm min se kon as se ghaebanh drta he، phr js ne as tnbih ke bعd allh ki mqrr ki hoei hd se tjaoz kia aus ke lie drd nak sza he
5.95: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho! Ahram ki halt min shkar nh maro، aor agr tm min se koei jan bojh kr aisa kr gzre to jo janor as ne mara ho ausi ke hm plh aik janor ause moishion min se nzr dina hoga js ka fislh tm min se do عadl aadmi krin ge، aor ih nzranh kعbh phnchaia jaee ga، ia nhin to ais gnah ke kfarh min chnd mskinon ko khana khlana hoga، iaas ke bqdr roze rkhne hon ge، takh oh apne kie ka mzh chkhe phle jo ho chka ause allh ne mعaf kr dia، likn ab agr ksi ne as hrkt ka aعadh kia to as se allh bdlh le ga، allh sb pr ghalb he aor bdlh line ki taqt rkhta he
5.96: Tmhare lie smndr ka shkar aor as ka khana hlal kr dia gia، jhan tm thiro ohan bhi ause kha skte ho aor qafle ke lie zad rah bhi bnaskte ho albth khshki ka shkar jb tk ahram ki halt min ho، tm pr hram kia gia he ps bcho aus khda ki nafrmani se js ki pishi min tm sb ko ghir kr hazr kia jaee ga
5.97: Allh ne mkan mhtrm، kعbh ko logon ke lie (ajtmaعi zndgi ke) qiam ka zriعh bnaia aor mah hram aor qrbani ke janoron aor qladon ko bhi (ais kam min mعaon bna dia) takh tmhin mعlom ho jaee kh allh aasmanon ao r zmin ke sb halat se bakhbr he aor ause hr chiz ka عlm he
5.98: Khbrdar ho jaؤ! Allh sza dine min bhi skht he aor as ke sath bht drgzr aor rhm bhi krne oala he
5.99: Rsol pr to srf pigham phncha dine ki zmh dari he، aage tmhare khle aor chhpe sb halat ka janne oala allh he
5.100: Ae pighmbrؐ! Ain se khh do kh pak aor napak bhr hal iksan nhin hin khoah napak ki bhta t tmhin ktna hi frifth krne oali ho، ps ae logo jo عql rkhte ho! Allh ki nafrmani se bchte rho، amid he kh tmhin flah nsib hogi
5.101: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، aisi batin nh pochha kro jo tm pr zahr kr di jaein to tmhin nagoar hon، likn agr tm anhin aise oqt pochho ge jb kh qraan nazl ho rha ho to oh tm pr khol di jaein gi ab tk jo kchh tm ne kia ause allh ne mعaf kr dia، oh drgzr krne oala aor brd bar he
5.102: Tm se phle aik groh ne aisi qsm ke soalat kie the، phr oh log anhi baton ki ojh se kfr min mbtla hogee
5.103: Allh ne nh koei bahiirh mqrr kia he nh saebh aor nh osilh aor nh ham mgr ih kafr allh pr jhoti thmt lgate hin aor an min se aksr be عql hin (kh aise ohmiat ko man rhe hin)
5.104: Aor jb an se kha jata he kh aaؤ aus qanon ki trf jo allh ne nazl kia he aor aaؤ pighmbrؐ ki trf to oh joab dite hin kh hmare lie to bs ohi triqh kafi he js pr hm ne apne bap dada ko paia he kia ih bap dada hi ki tqlid kie chle jaein ge khoah oh kchh nh jante hon aor shih rasth ki anhin khbr hi nh ho?
5.105: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، apni fkr kro، ksi dosre ki gmrahi se tmhara kchh nhin bgrta agr tm khod rah rast pr ho، allh ki trf tm sb ko plt kr jana he، phr oh tmhin bta de ga kh tm kia krte rhe ho
5.106: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، jb tm min se ksi ki mot ka oqt aa jaee aor oh osit kr rha ho to as ke lie shhadt ka nsab ih he kh tmhari jmaعt min se do sahb عdl aadmi goah bnaee jaein، ia agr tm sfr ki halt min ho aor ohan mot ki msibt pish aa jaee to ghir mslmon hi min se do goah le lie jaen phr agr koei shk pr jaee to nmaz ke bعd donon goahon ko (msjd min) rok lia jaee aor oh khda ki qsm kha kr khin kh "hm ksi zati faede ke عoz shhadt bichne oale nhin hin، aor khoah koei hmara rshth dar hi kion nh ho (hm as ki rعait krne oale nhin) aor nh khda oaste ki goahi ko hm chhpane oale hin، agr hm ne isa kia to gnah garon min shmar hon ge"
5.107: Likn agr pth chl jaee kh an donon ne apne aap ko gnah min mbtla kia he to phr an ki jgh do aor shkhs jo an ki bh nsbt shhadt dine ke lie ahl tr hon an logon min se khre hon jn ki hq tlfi hoei ho، aor oh khda ki qsm kha kr khin kh "hmari shhadt aun ki shhadt se ziadh br hq he aor hm ne apne goahi min koei ziadti nhin ki he، agr hm aisa krin to zalmon min se hon ge"
5.108: As triqh se ziadh toqع ki jaskti he kh log thik thik shhadt din ge، ia km az km as bat hi ka khof krin ge kh an ki qsmon ke bعd ddsri qsmon se khin an ki trdid nh ho jaee allh se dro aor sno، allh nafrmani krne oalon ko apni rhnmaei se mhrom kr dita he
5.109: Js roz allh sb rsolon ko jmع kr ke po chhe ga kh tmhin kia joab dia gia he، to oh عrz krin ge kh hmin kchh عlm nhin، aap hi tmam poshidh hqiqton ko jante hin
5.110: Phr tsor kro as moqع ka jb allh frmaee ga kh "ae mrim ke bite عisiaؑ! Iad kr miri as nعmt ko jo min ne tjhe aor tiri man ko عta ki thi، min ne roh pak se tiri mdd ki، to ghoare min bhi logon se bat krta tha aor bri عmr ko phnch kr bhi، min ne tjh ko ktab aor hkmt aor torat aor anjil ki tعlim di، to mire hkm se mti ka ptla prnde ki shkl ka bnata aor as min phonkta tha aor oh mire hkm se prndh bn jata tha، to madr zad andhe aor korhi ko mire hkm se achha krta tha، to murdon ko mire hkm se nkalta tha، phr jb to bni asraeil ke pas srih nshanian le kr phncha aor jo log an min se mnkr hq the anhon ne kha kh ih nshanian jado gri ke soa aor kchh nhin hin to min ne hi tjhe aun se bchaia
5.111: Aor jb min ne hoarion ko asharh kia kh mjh pr aor mire rsol pr aiman laؤ tb aunhon ne kha kh "hm aiman laee aor goah rho kh hm mslm hin"
5.112: (hoarion ke slslh min) ih oaqعh bhi iad rhe kh jb hoarion ne kha ae عisia abn mrim! Kia aap ka rb hm pr aasman se khane ka aik khoan atar skta he? To عisiaؑ ne kha allh se dro agr tm momn ho
5.113: Aunhon ne kha hm bs ih chahte hin kh as khoan se khana khaein aor hmare dl mtmen hon aor hmin mعlom ho jaee kh aap ne jo kchh hm se kha he oh sch he aor hm as pr goah hon
5.114: As pr عisia abn mrim ne dعa ki "khdaia! Hmare rb! Hm pr aasman se aik khoan nazl kr jo hmare lie aor hmare aglon pchhlon ke lie khoshi ka moqع qrar paee aor tiri trf se aik nshani ho، hm ko rzq de aor to bhtrin razq he"
5.115: Allh ne joab dia "min aus ko tm pr nazl krne oala ho n، mgr as ke bعd jo tm min se kfr kre ga ase min aisi sza don ga jo dnia min ksi ko nh di hogi"
5.116: Ghrz jb (ih ahsanat iad dla kr) allh frmaee ga kh "ae عisia abn mrim! Kia to ne logon se kha tha kh khda ke soa mjhe aor miri man ko bhi khda bna lo?" to oh joab min عrz kre ga kh "sbhan allh! Mira ih kam nh tha kh oh bat khta js ke khne ka mjhe hq nh tha، agr min ne aisi bat khi hoti، to aap ko zror عlm hota، aap jante hin jo kchh mire dl min he aor min nhin janta jo kchh aap ke dl min he، aap to sari poshidh hqiqton ke عalm hin
5.117: Min ne aun se aus ke soa kchh nhin kha js ka aap ne hkm dia tha، ih kh allh ki bndgi kro jo mira rb bhi he aor tmhara rb bhi min ausi oqt tk an ka ngran tha jb tk kh min an ke drmian tha jb aap ne mjhe oaps bla lia to aap an pr ngran the aor aap to sari hi chizon pr ngran hin
5.118: Ab agr aap anhin sza din to oh aap ke bnde hin aor agr mعaf kr din to aap ghalb aor dana hin"
5.119: Tb allh frmaee ga "ih oh dn he js min schon ko aun ki schaei nfع diti he، an ke lie aise bagh hin jn ke niche nhrin bhh rhi hin، ihan oh hmishh rhin ge، allh an se razi hoa aor oh allh se، ihi bri kamiabi he"
5.120: Zmin aor aasmanon aor tmam mojodat ki padshahi allh hi ke lie he aor oh hr chiz pr qdrt rkhta he

6.1: Tعrif allh ke lie he js ne zmin aor aasman bnaee، roshni aor tarikian pida kin phr bhi oh log jnhon ne dعot hq ko manne se ankar kr dia he dosron ko apne rb ka hmsr thira rhe hin
6.2: Ohi he js ne tm ko mti se pida kia، phr tmhare lie zndgi ki aik mdt mqrr kr di، aor aik dosri mdt aor bhi he joas ke han te shdh he mgr tm log ho kh shk min pre hoee ho
6.3: Ohi aik khda aasmanon min bhi he aor zmin min bhi، tmhare khle aor chhpe sb hal janta he aor jo braei ia bhlaei tm kmate ho as se khob oaqf he
6.4: Logon ka hal ih he kh an ke rb ki nshanion min se koei nshani aisi nhin jo an ke samne aaei ho aor anhon ne as se mnh nh mor lia ho
6.5: Chnanchh ab jo hq an ke pas aaia to ase bhi anhon ne jhtla dia achha، js chiz ka oh ab tk mzaq arate rhe hin عnqrib as ke mtعlq kchh khbrin anhin phnchin gi
6.6: Kia anhon ne dikha nhin kh an se phle ktni aisi qomon ko hm hlak kr chke hin jn ka apne apne zmanh min dor dorh rha he? Aun ko hm ne zmin min oh aqtdar bkhsha tha jo tmhin nhin bkhsha he، an pr hm ne aasman se khob barshin brsaein aor an ke niche nhrin bha din، (mgr jb anhon ne kfran nعmt kia to) aakhr kar hm ne an ke gnahon ki padash min anhin tbah kr dia aor an ki jgh dosre dor ki qomon ko athaia
6.7: Ae pighmbrؐ! Agr hm tmhare aopr koei kaghz min lkhi lkhaei ktab bhi atar dite aor log ase apne hathon se chho kr bhi dikh lite tb bhi jnhon ne hq ka ankar kia he oh ihi khte kh ih to srih jado he
6.8: Khte hin kh as nbi pr koei frshth kion nhin atara gia agr khin hm ne frshth atar dia hota to ab tk kbhi ka fislh ho chka hota، phr anhin koei mhlt nh di jati
6.9: Aor agr hm frshte ko atarte tb bhi ase ansani shkl hi min atarte aor as trh anhin ausi shbh min mbtla kr dite js min ab ih mbtla hin
6.10: Ae mhmdؐ! Tm se phle bhi bht se rsolon ka mzaq araia ja chka he، mgr an mzaq arane oalon pr aakhr kar ohi hqiqt mslt ho kr rhi js ka oh mzaq arate the
6.11: Ain se kho، zra zmin min chl phr kr dikho jhtlane oalon ka kia anjam hoa he
6.12: An se pochho، aasmanon aor zmin min jo kchh he oh ks kahe?kho sb kchh allh hi ka he، as ne rhm o krm ka shioh apne aopr lazm kr lia he (asi lie oh nafrmanion aor srkshion pr tmhin jldi se nhin pkr lita)، qiamt ke roz oh tm sb ko zror jmع kre ga، ih balkl aik ghir mshtbh hqiqt he، mgr jn logon ne apne aap ko khod tbahi ke khtre min mbtla kr lia he oh ase nhin mante
6.13: Rat ke andhire aor dn ke ajale min jo kchh thira hoa he، sb allh ka he aor oh sb kchh snta aor janta he
6.14: Kho، allh ko chhor kr kia min ksi aor ko apna sr prst bna lon? Aus khda ko chhor kr jo zmin o aasman ka khalq he aor jo rozi dita he rozi lita nhin he? Kho، mjhe to ihi hkm dia gia he kh sb se phle min aus ke aage sr tslim khm kron (aor takid ki gei he kh koei shrk krta he to kre) to bhrhal mshrkon min shaml nh ho
6.15: Kho، agr min apne rb ki nafrmani kron to drta hon kh aik bre (khofnak) dn mjhe sza bhgtni pre gi
6.16: Aus dn jo sza se bch gia as pr allh ne bra hi rhm kia aor ihi nmaian kamiabi he
6.17: Agr allh tmhin ksi qsm ka nqsan phnchaee to as ke soa koei nhin jo tmhin as nqsan se bcha ske، aor agr oh tmhin ksi bhlaei se bhrh mnd kre to oh hr chiz pr qadr he
6.18: Oh apne bndon pr kaml akhtiarat rkhta he aor dana aor bakhbr he
6.19: An se pochho، ks ki goahi sb se brh kr he?kho، mire aor tmhare drmian allh goah he، aor ih qraan miri trf bzriعh ohi bhija gia he takh tmhin aor js js ko ih phnche، sb ko mtnbh kr don kia oaqعi tm log ih shhadt de skte ho kh allh ke sath dosre khda bhi hin? Kho، min to as ki shhadt hrgz nhin de skta kho، khda to ohi aik he aor min as shrk se qtعi bizar hon js min tm mbtla ho
6.20: Jn logon ko hm ne ktab di he oh as bat ko as trh ghir mshtbh tor pr phchante hin jise an ko apne biton ke phchanne min koei ashtbah pish nhin aata mgr jnhon ne apne aap ko khod khsare min dal dia he oh aise nhin mante
6.21: Aor aus shkhs se brh kr zalm kon hoga jo allh pr jhota bhtan lgaee، ia allh ki nshanion ko jhtlaee? Iqinaan aise zalm kbhi flah nhin pa skte
6.22: Js roz hm an sb ko aktha krin ge aor mshrkon se pochhin ge kh ab oh tmhare thiraee hoee shrik khan hin jn ko tm apna khda smjhte the
6.23: To oh ais ke soa koei ftnh nh atha skin ge kh (ih jhota bian din kh) ae hmare aaqa! Tiri qsm hm hrgz mshr k nh the
6.24: Dikho، aus oqt ih ks trh apne aopr aap jhot ghrin ge، aor ohan aun ke sare bnaoti mعbod gm ho jaein ge
6.25: An min se bعz log aise hin jo kan lga kr tmhari bat snte hin mgr hal ih he kh hm ne aun ke dlon pr prde dal rkhe hin jn ki ojh se oh as ko kchh nhin smjhte aor an ke kanon min grani dal di he (kh sb kchh snne pr bhi kchh nhin snte) oh khoah koei nshani dikh lin، as pr aiman la kr nh din ge hd ih he kh jb oh tmhare pas aa kr tm se jhgrte hin to an min se jn logon ne ankar ka fislh kr lia he oh (sari batin snne ke bعd) ihi khte hin kh ih aik dastan parinh ke soa kchh nhin
6.26: Oh as amr hq ko qbol krne se logon ko rokte hin aor khod bhi as se dor bhagte hin (oh smjhte hin kh as hrkt se oh tmhara kchh bgar rhe hin) halankh drasl oh kho d apni hi tbahi ka saman kr rhe hin mgr anhin as ka shعor nhin he
6.27: Kash tm as oqt an ki halt dikh skte jb oh dozkh ke knare khre kie jaein ge as oqt oh khin ge kh kash koei sort aisi ho kh hm dnia min phr oaps bhije jaein aor apne rb ki nshanion ko nh jhtlaein aor aiman lane oalon min shaml hon
6.28: Dr hqiqt ih ba t oh mhz as ojh se khin ge kh js hqiqt pr anhon ne prdh dal rkha tha oh as oqt be nqab ho kr an ke samne aa chki hogi، ornh agr anhin sabq zndgi ki trf oaps bhija jaee to phr ohi sb kchh krin js se anhin mnع kia gia he، oh to hin hi jhote (as lie apni as khoahsh ke azhar min bhi jhot hi se kam lin ge)
6.29: Aaj ih log khte hin kh zndgi jo kchh bhi he bs ihi dnia ki zndgi he aor hm mrne ke bعd hrgz dobarh nh athaee jaein ge
6.30: Kash oh mnzr tm dikh sko jb ih apne rb ke samne khre kie jaein ge as oqt an ka rb an se pochhe ga "kia ih hqiqt nhin he?" ih khin ge "han ae hmare rb! Ih hqiqt hi he" oh frmaee ga "achha! To ab apne ankar hqiqt ki padash min عzab ka mza chkho"
6.31: Nqsan min pr gee oh log jnhon ne allh se apni mlaqat ki atlaع ko jhot qrar dia jb achank oh ghri aa jaee gi to ihi log khin ge "afsos! Hm se as mعamlh min kisi tqsir hoei" aor ain ka hal ih hoga kh apni pithon pr apne gnahon ka bojh lade hoee hon ge dikho! Kisa bra bojh he jo ih atha rhe hin
6.32: Dnia ki zndgi to aik khil aor aik tmasha he، hqiqt min aakhrt hi ka mqam aun logon ke lie bhtr he jo zian kari se bchna chahte hin، phr kia tm log عql se kam nh lo ge?
6.33: Ae mhmdؐ! Hmin mعlom he kh jo batin ih log bnate hin an se tmhin rnj hota he، likn ih log tmhin nhin jhtlate blkh ih zalm drasl allh ki aaiat ka ankar kr rhe hin
6.34: Tm se phle bhi bht se rsol jhtlaee ja chke hin، mgr as tkzib pr aor aun aziton pr jo anhin phnchaei gein، anhon ne sbr kia، ihan tk kh anhin hmari mdd phnch gei allh ki baton ko bdlne ki taqt ksi min nhin he، aor pchhle rsolon ke sath jo kchh pish aaia as ki khbrin tmhin phnch hi chki hin
6.35: Tahm agr an logon ki be rkhi tm se brdasht nhin hoti to agr tm min kchh zor he to zmin min koei srng dhondo ia aasman min sirhi lgaؤ aor an ke pas koei nshani lane ki koshsh kro agr allh chahta to an sb ko hdait pr jmع kr skta tha، lhaza nadan mt bno

6.117: Dr hqiqt tmhara rb ziadh bhtr janta he kh kon aus ke raste se hta hoa he aor kon sidhi rah pr he
6.118: Phr agr tm log allh ki aaiat pr aiman rkhte ho to js janor pr allh ka nam lia gia ho aus ka gosht khaؤ
6.119: Aakhr kia ojh he kh tm oh chiz nh khaؤ js pr allh ka nam lia gia ho، halankh jn chizon ka astعmal halt aztrar ke soa dosri tmam halton min allh ne hram kr dia he aun ki tfsil oh tmhin bta chka he bksrt logon ka hal ih he kh عlm ke bghir mhz apni khoahshat ki bna pr gmrah kn batin krte hin، an hd se gzrne oalon ko tmhara rb khob janta he
6.120: Tm khle gnahon se bhi bcho aor chhpe gnahon se bhi، jo log gnah ka aktsab krte hin oh apni as kmaei ka bdlh pakr rhin ge
6.121: Aor js janor ko allh ka nam le kr zbh nh kia gia ho as ka gosht nh khaؤ، aisa krna fsq he shiatin apne sathion ke dlon min shkok o aعtrazat alqa krte hin takh oh tm se jhgra krin likn agr tm ne aun ki ataعt qbol kr li to iqinaan tm mshrk ho
6.122: Kia oh shkhs jo phle murdh tha phr hm ne ase zndgi bkhshi aor as ko oh roshni عta ki js ke ajale min oh logon ke drmian zndgi ki rah te krta he aus shkhs ki trh ho skta he jo tarikion min pra hoa ho aor ksi trh aun se nh nklta ho? Kafron ke lie to asi trh an ke aعmal khoshnma bna die gee hin
6.123: Aor asi trh hm ne hr bsti min as ke bre bre mjrmon ko lga dia he kh ohan apne mkr o frib ka jal philaein drasl oh apne frib ke jal min aap phnste hin، mgr aunhin as ka shعor nhin he
6.124: Jb an ke samne koei aait aati he to oh khte hin "hm nh manin ge jb tk kh oh chiz khod hm ko nh di jaee jo allh ke rsolon ko di gei he" allh ziadh bhtr janta he kh apni pighambri ka kam ks se le aor ks trh le qrib he oh oqt jb ih mjrm apni mkarion ki padash min allh ke han zlt aor skht عzab se do char hon ge
6.125: Ps (ih hqiqt he kh) jse allh hdait bkhshne ka aradh krta he aus ka sinh aslam ke lie khol dita he aor jse gmrahi min dalne ka aradh krta he aus ke sine ko tng kr dita he aor aisa bhinchta he kh (aslam ka tsor krte hi) ause ion mعlom hone lgta he kh goia as ki roh aasman ki trf proaz kr rhi he ais trh allh (hq se frar aor nfrt ki) napaki aun logon pr mslt kr dita he jo aiman nhin late
6.126: Halankh ih rasth tmhare rb ka sidha rasth he aor as ke nshanat aun logon ke lie oazh kr die gee hin jo nsiht qbol krte hin
6.127: Aun kilie aun ke rb ke pas slamti ka ghr he aor oh an ka sr prst he aus shih trz عml ki ojh se jo anhon ne akhtiar kia
6.128: Js roz allh an sb logon ko ghir kr jmع kre ga، as roz oh jnon se khtab kr ke frmaee ga kh "a e groh jn! Tm ne noع ansani pr khob hath saf kia" ansanon min se jo aun ke rfiq the oh عrz krin ge "prordgar! Hm min se hr aik ne dosre ko kho b astعmal kia he، aor ab hm aus oqt pr aa phnche hin jo to ne hmare lie mqrr kr dia tha" allh frmaee ga "achha ab aag tmhara thkana he، as min tm hmishh rho ge" a"s se bchin ge srf ohi jnhin allh bchana chahe ga، be shk tmhara rb dana aor عlim he
6.129: Dikho، as trh hm (aakhr t min) zalmon ko aik dosre ka sathi bnaein ge aus kmaei ki ojh se jo oh (dnia min aik dosre ke sath ml kr) krte the
6.130: (as moqع pr allh an se pochhe ga kh) "ae groh jn oans، kia tmhare pas khod tm hi min se oh pighmbr nhin aaee the jo tm ko miri aaiat snate aor ais dn ke anjam se drate the?" oh khin ge "han، hm apne khlaf khod goahi dite hin" aaj dnia ki zndgi ne ain logon ko dhoke min dal rkha he، mgr aus oqt oh khod apne khlaf goahi din ge kh oh kafr the
6.131: (ih shhadt aun se as lie li jaee gi kh ih sabt ho jaee kh) tmhara rb bstion ko zlm ke sath tbah krne oala nh tha jbkh an ke bashnde hqiqt se na oaqf hon
6.132: Hr shkhs ka drjh aus ke عml ke lhaz se he aor tmhara rb logon ke aعmal se be khbr nhin he
6.133: Tmhara rb be niaz he aor mhrbani as ka shioh he agr o h chahe to tm logon ko le jaee aor tmhari jgh dosre jn logon ko chahe le aaee js trh aus ne tmhin kchh aor logon ki nsl se athaia he
6.134: Tm se js chiz ka oعdh kia ja rha he oh iqinaan aane oali he aor tm khda ko عajz kr dine ki taqt nhin rkhte
6.135: Ae mhmdؐ! Khh do kh logo! Tm apni jgh عml krte rho aor min bhi apni jgh عml kr rha hon، عnqrib tmhin mعlom ho jaee ga kh anjam kar ks ke hq min bhtr hota he، bhr hal ih hqiqt he kh zalm kbhi flah nhin pa skte
6.136: Ain logon ne allh ke lie khod ausi ki pida ki hoei khition aor moishion min se aik hsh mqrr kia he aor khte hin ih allh ke lie he، bzعm khod، aor ih hmare thiraee hoee shrikon ke lie phr jo hsh an ke thiraee hoee shrikon ke lie he oh to allh ko nhin phnchta mgr jo allh ke lie he oh an ke shrikon ko phnch jata he kise bre fisle krte hin ih log!
6.137: Aor asi trh bht se mshrkon ke lie an ke shrikon ne apni aolad ke qtl ko khoshnma bna dia he takh an ko hlakt min mbtla krin aor an pr an ke din ko mshtbh bna din agr allh chahta to ih aisa nh krte، lhaza anhin chhor do kh apni aftra prdaz ion min lge rhin
6.138: Khte hin ih janor aor ih khit mhfoz hin، a nhin srf ohi log kha skte hin jnhin hm khlana chahin، halankh ih pabndi an ki khod sakhth he phr kchh janor hin jn pr soari aor bar brdari hram kr di gei he aor kchh janor hin jn pr allh ka nam nhin lite، aor ih sb kchh anhon ne allh pr aftra kia he، عnqrib allh anhin an aftra prdaz ion ka bdlh de ga
6.139: Aor khte hin kh jo kchh an janoron ke pit min he ih hmare mrdon ke lie mkhsos he aor hmari عorton pr hram، likn agr oh murdh ho to donon as ke khane min shrik ho skte hin ih batin jo anhon ne ghr li hin an ka bdlh allh anhin de kr rhe ga iqinaan oh hkim he aor sb baton ki ase khbr he
6.140: Iqinaan khsare min pr gee oh log jnhon ne apni aolad ko jhalt o nadani ki bna pr qtl kia aor allh ke die hoee rzq ko allh pr aftra prdazi kr ke hram thira lia iqinaan oh bhtk gee aor hrgz oh rah rast pane oalon min se nh the
6.141: Oh allh hi he js ne trh trh ke bagh aor takstan aor nkhlstan pida kie، khitian agaein jn se qsm qsm ke makolat hasl hote hin، ziton aor anar ke drkht pida kie jn ke phl sort min mshabh aor mze min mkhtlf hote hin khaؤ an ki pidaoar jb kh ih phlin، aor allh ka hq ada kro jb as ki fsl kato، aor hd se nh gzro kh allh hd se gzrne oalon ko psnd nhin krta
6.142: Phr ohi he js ne moishion min se oh janor bhi pida kie jn se soari o bar brdari ka kam lia jata he aor oh bhi jo khane aor bchhane ke kam aate hin khaؤ aun chizon min se jo allh ne tmhin bkhshi hin aor shitan ki piro i nh kro kh oh tmhara khla dshmn he
6.143: Ih aath nr o madh hin، do bhir ki qsm se aor do bkri ki qsm se، ae mhmdؐ! An se pochho kh allh ne aun ke nr hram kie hin ia madh، ia oh bche jo bhiron aor bkrion ke pit min hon? Thik thik عlm ke sath mjhe btaؤ agr tm sche ho
6.144: Aor asi trh do aont ki qsm se hin aor do gaee ki qsm se pochho، ain ke nr allh ne hram kie hin ia madh، ia oh bche jo aontni aor gaee ke pit min hon? Kia tm aus oqt hazr the jb allh ne an ke hram hone ka hkm tmhin dia tha? Phr aus shkhs se brh kr zalm aor kon hoga jo allh ki trf mnsob kr ke jhoti bat khe takh عlm ke bghir logon ki ghlt rah nmaei kre iqinaan allh aise zalmon ko rah rast nhin dkhata
6.145: Ae mhmdؐ! An se kho kh jo ohi tmhare pas aaei he as min to min koei chiz aisi nhin pata jo ksi khane oale pr hram ho، ala ih kh oh murdar ho، ia bhaia hoa khon ho، iasor ka gosht ho kh oh napak he، ia fsq ho kh allh ke soa ksi aor ke nam pr zbh kia gia ho phr jo shkhs mjbori ki halt min (koei chiz ain min se kha le) bghir as ke kh oh nafrmani ka aradh rkhta ho aor bghir as ke kh oh hd zrort se tjaoz kre، to iqinaan tmhara rb dr gzr se kam line oala aor rhm frmane oala he
6.146: Aor jn logon ne ihodit akhtiar ki an pr hm ne sb nakhn oale janor hram kr die the، aor gaee aor bkri ki chrbi bhi bjz aus ke jo aun ki pith ia aun ki aanton se lgi hoei ho ia hdi se lgi rh jaee ih hm ne an ki srkshi ki sza aunhin di thi aor ih jo kchh hm khh rhe hin balkl sch khh rhe hin
6.147: Ab agr oh tmhin jhtlaein to an se khh do kh tmhare rb ka damn rhmt osiع he aor mjrmon se as ke عzab ko phira nhin jaskta
6.148: Ih mshrk log (tmhari an baton ke joab min) zror khin ge kh "agr allh chahta to nh hm shrk krte aor nh hmare bap dada، aor nh hm ksi chiz ko hram thrate" aisi hi batin bna bna kr ain se phle ke logon ne bhi jhtlaia tha ihan tk kh aakhr kar hmare عzab ka mza anhon ne chkh lia an se kho "kia tmhare pas koei عlm he jse hmare samne pish krsko? Tm to mhz gman pr chl rhe ho aor nri qias aaraeian krte ho"
6.149: Phr kho (tmhari as hjt ke mqablh min) "hqiqt rs hjt to allh ke pas he، be shk agr allh chahta to tm sb ko hdait de dita"
6.150: An se kho kh "laؤ apne oh goah jo as bat ki shhadt din kh allh hi ne ain chizon ko hram kia he" phr agr oh shhadt de din to tm an ke sath shhadt nh dina، aor hrgz aun logon ki khoahshat ke pichhe nh chlna jnhon ne hmari aaiat ko jhtlaia he، aor jo aakhrt ke mnkr hin، aor jo dosron ko apne rb ka hmsr bnate hin
6.151: Ae mhmdؐ! An se kho kh aaؤ min tmhin snaؤn tmhare rb ne tm pr kia pabndian عaed ki hin: ih kh as ke sath ksi ko shrik nh kro، aor oaldin ke sath nik slok kro، aor apni aolad ko mflsi ke dr se qtl nh kro، hm tmhin bhi rzq dite hin aor a n ko bhi din ge aor be shrmi ki baton ke qrib bhi nh jaؤ khoah oh khli hon ia chhpi aor ksi jan ko jse allh ne mhtrm thiraia he hlak nh kro mgr hq ke sath ih batin hin jn ki hdait as ne tmhin ki he، shaid kh tm smjh bojh se kam lo
6.152: Aor ih kh itim ke mal ke qrib nh jaؤ mgr aise triqh se jo bhtrin ho، ihan tk kh oh apne sn rshd ko phnch jaee aor nap tol min pora ansaf kro، hm hr shkhs pr zmh dari ka atna hi bar rkhte hin jtna as ke amkan min he، aor jb bat kho ansaf ki kho khoah mعamlh apne rshth dar hi ka kion nh ho، aor allh ke عhd ko pora kro an baton ki hdait allh ne tmhin ki he shaid kh tm nsiht qbol kro
6.153: Niz as ki hdait ih he kh ihi mira sidha rasth he lhaza tm asi pr chlo aor dosre raston pr nh chlo kh oh as ke raste se hta kr tmhin pragndh kr din ge ih he oh hdait jo tmhare rb ne tmhin ki he، shaid kh tm kj roi se bcho
6.154: Phr hm ne mosiaؑ ko ktab عta ki thi jo bhlaei ki rosh akhtiar krne oale ansan pr nعmt ki tkmil aor hr zrori chiz ki tfsil aor srasr hdait aor rhmt thi (aor as lie bni asraeil ko di gei thi kh) shaid log apne rb ki mlaqat pr aiman laein
6.155: Aor asi trh ih ktab hm ne nazl ki he، aik brkt oali ktab ps tm ais ki piroi kro aor tqoia ki rosh akhtiar kro، bعid nhin kh tm pr rhm kia jaee
6.156: Ab tm ih nhin khh skte kh ktab to hm se phle ke do grohon ko di gei thi، aor hm ko kchh khbr nh thi kh oh kia prhte prhate the
6.157: Aor ab tm ih bhanh bhi nhin krskte kh agr hm pr ktab nazl ki gei hoti to hm an se ziadh rast ro sabt hote tmhare pas tmhare rb ki trf se aik dlil roshn aor hdait aor rhmt aa gei he، ab as se brh kr zalm kon hoga jo allh ki aaiat ko jhtlaee aor an se mnh more jo log hmari aaiat se mnh morte hin anhin as ro grdani ki padash min hm bdtrin sza de kr rhin ge
6.158: Kia ab log as ke mntzr hin kh an ke samne frshte aa khre hon، ia tmhara rb khod aa jaee، ia tmhare rb ki bعz srih nshanian nmodar ho jaein? Js roz tmhare rb ki bعz mkhsos nshanian nmodar ho jaein gi phr ksi aise shkhs ko as ka aiman kchh faedh nh de ga jo phle aiman nh laia ho ia js ne apne aiman min koei bhlaei nh kmaei ho ae mhmdؐ! An se khh do kh achha، tm antzar kro، hm bhi antzar krte hin
6.159: Jn logon ne apne din ko tkre tkre kr dia aor groh groh bn gee iqinaan an se tmhara kchh oasth nhin، an ka mعamlh to allh ke sprd he، ohi an ko btaee ga kh anhon ne kia kchh kia he
6.160: Jo allh ke hzor niki le kr aaee ga as ke lie ds gna ajr he، aor jo bdi le kr aaee ga as ko atna hi bdlh dia jaee ga jtna as ne qsor kia he، aor ksi pr zlm nh kia jaee ga
6.161: Ae mhmdؐ! Kho mire rb ne baliqin mjhe sidha rasth dkha dia he، balkl thik din js min koei tirh nhin، abrahimؑ ka triqh jse ikso ho kr aus ne akhtiar kia tha aor oh mshrkon min se nh tha
6.162: Kho، miri nmaz، mire tmam mrasm عbodit، mira jina aor mira mrna، sb kchh allh rb alعalmin ke lie he
6.163: Js ka koei shrik nhin asi ka mjhe hkm dia gia he aor sb se phle sr ataعt jhkane oala min hon
6.164: Kho، kia min allh ke soa koei aor rb tlash kron halan kh ohi hr chiz ka rb he? Hr shkhs jo kchh kmata he as ka zmh dar oh khod he، koei bojh athane oala dosre ka bojh nhin athata، phr tm sb ko apne rb ki trf pltna he، aus oqt oh tmhare akhtlafat ki hqiqt tm pr khol de ga
6.165: Ohi he js ne tm ko zmin ka khlifh bnaia، aor tm min se bعz ko bعz ke mqablh min ziadh blnd drje die، takh jo kchh tm ko dia he asi min tmhari aazmaesh kre be shk tmhara rb sza dine min bhi bht tiz he aor bht drgzr krne aor rhm frmane oala bhi he

7.2: Ih aik ktab he jo tmhari trf nazl ki gei he، ps ae mhmdؐ، tmhare dl min as se koei jhjk nh ho as ke atarne ki ghrz ih he kh tm as ke zriعh se (mnkrin ko) draؤ aor aiman lane oale logon ko iad dhani ho
7.3: Logo، jo kchh tmhare rb ki trf se tm pr nazl kia gia he aus ki piroi kro aor apne rb ko chhor kr dosre srprston ki piroi nh kro mgr tm nsiht km hi mante ho
7.4: Ktni hi bstian hin jnhin hm ne hlak kr dia aun pr hmara عzab achank rat ke oqt tot pra، ia dn dhare aise oqt aaia jb oh aaram kr rhe the
7.5: Aor jb hmara عzab aun pr aa gia to an ki zban pr ais ke soa koei sda nh thi kh oaqعi hm zalm the
7.6: Ps ih zror ho kr rhna he kh hm aun logon se baz prs krin، jn ki trf hm ne pighmbr bhije hin aor pighmbron se bhi pochhin (kh aunhon ne pigham rsani ka frz khan tk anjam dia aor anhin as ka kia joab mla)
7.7: Phr hm khod por e عlm ke sath srgzsht an ke aage pish kr din ge، aakhr hm khin ghaeb to nhin the
7.8: Aor ozn as roz عin hq hoga jn ke plre bhari hon ge ohi flah paein ge
7.9: Aor jn ke plre hlke rhin ge ohi apne aap ko khsare min mbtla krne oale hon ge kionkh oh hmari aaiat ke sath zalmanh brtaؤ krte rhe the
7.10: Hm ne tmhin zmin min akhtiarat ke sath bsaia aor tmhare lie ihan saman zist frahm kia، mgr tm log km hi shkr gzar hote ho
7.11: Hm ne tmhari tkhliq ki abtda ki، phr tmhari sort bnaei، phr frshton se kha aadmؑ ko sjdh kro as hkm pr sb ne sjdh kia mgr ablis sjdh krne oalon min shaml nh hoa
7.12: Pochha، "tjhe ks chiz ne sjdh krne se roka jb kh min ne tjh ko hkm dia tha?" bola، "min aus se bhtr hon، to ne mjhe aag se pida kia he aor ause mti se"
7.13: Frmaia، "achha to ihan se niche atr tjhe hq nhin he kh ihan braei ka ghmnd kre nkl ja kh dr hqiqt to an logon min se he jo khod apni zlt chahte hin"
7.14: Bola، "mjhe aus dn tk mhlt de jb kh ih sb dobarh athaee jaein ge"
7.16: Bola، "achha to js trh to ne mjhe gmrahi min mbtla kia min bhi ab tiri sidhi rah pr
7.17: Ain ansanon ki ghat min lga rhon ga، aage aor pichhe، daein aor baein، hr trf se ain ko ghiron ga aor to an min se aksr ko shkr gzar nh paee ga"
7.18: Frmaia، " nkl ja ihan se zlil aor thkraia hoa iqin rkh kh ain min se jo tiri piroi krin ge، tjh smit an sb se jhnm ko bhr don ga
7.19: Aor ae aadmؑ، to aor tiri bioi، donon as jnt min rho، jhan js chiz ko tmhara ji chahe khaؤ، mgr as drkht ke pas nh phtkna ornh zalmon min se ho jaؤ ge"
7.20: Phr shitan ne aun ko bhkaia takh an ki shrmgahin jo aik dosre se chhpaei gei thin an ke samne khol de as ne an se kha، "tmhare rb ne tmhin jo as drkht se roka he as ki ojh ais ke soa kchh nhin he kh khin tm frshte nh bn jaؤ، ia tmhin hmishgi ki zndgi hasl nh ho jaee
7.21: Aor as ne qsm kha kr an se kha kh min tmhara scha khir khoah hon
7.22: As trh dho ka de kr oh an donon ko rfth rfth apne dhb prle aaia aakhrkar jb anhon ne as drkht ka mza chkha to an ke str aik dosre ke samne khl gee aor apne jsmon ko jnt ke pton se dhankne lge tb an ke rb ne anhin pkara، " kia min ne tmhin as drkht se nh roka tha aor nh kha tha kh shitan tmhara khla dshmn he?"
7.23: Donon bol athe، "ae rb، hm ne apne aopr stm kia، ab agr to ne hm se dr gzr nh frmaia aor rhm nh kia to iqinaan hm tbah ho jaein ge"
7.24: Frmaia، "atr jaؤ، tm aik dosre ke dshmn ho، aor tmhare lie aik khas mdt tk zmin hi min jaee qrar aor saman zist he"
7.25: Aor frmaia، "ohin tm ko jina aor ohin mrna he aor asi min se tm ko aakhrkar nkala jaee ga"
7.26: Ae aolad aadm، hm ne tm pr lbas nazl kia he kh tmhare jsm ke qabl shrm hson ko dhanke aor tmhare lie jsm ki hfazt aor zint ka zriعh bhi ho، aor bhtrin lbas tqoia ka lbas he ih allh ki nshanion min se aik nshani he، shaid kh log as se sbq lin
7.27: Ae bni aadm، aisa nh ho kh shitan tmhin phr ausi trh ftne min mbtla kr de js trh as ne tmhare oaldin ko jnt se nkloaia tha aor a n ke lbas an pr se atroa die the takh an ki shrmgahin aik dosre ke samne khole oh aor as ke sathi tmhin aisi jgh se dikhte hin jhan se tm anhin nhin dikh skte ain shiatin ko hm ne aun logon ka srprst bna dia he jo aiman nhin late
7.28: Ih log jb koei shrmnak kam krte hin to khte hin hm ne apne bap dada ko asi triqh pr paia he aor allh hi ne hmin aisa krne ka hkm dia he ain se kho allh be hiaei ka hkm kbhi nhin dia krta kia tm allh ka nam le kr oh batin khte ho jn ke mtعlq tmhin عlm nhin he (oh allh ki trf se hin)?
7.29: Ae mhmdؐ، an se kho، mire rb ne to rasti o ansaf ka hkm dia he، aor as ka hkm to ih he kh hr عbadt min apna rkh thik rkho aor ausi ko pkaro apne din ko as ke lie khals rkh kr js trh aus ne tmhin ab pida kia he asi trh tm phr pida kie jaؤ ge
7.30: Aik groh koto as ne sidha rasth dkha dia he، mgr dosre groh pr gmrahi chspan ho kr rh gei he، kionkh anhon ne khda ke bjaee shiatin ko apna sr prst bna lia he aor oh smjh rhe hin kh hm sidhi rah pr hin
7.31: Ae bni aadm، hr عbadt ke moqع pr apni zint se aarasth rho aor khaؤ pio aor hd se tjaoz nh kro، allh hd se brhne oalon ko psnd nhin krta
7.32: Ae mhmdؐ، an se kho ks ne allh ki aus zint ko hram kr dia jse allh ne apne bndon ke lie nkala tha aor ks ne khda ki bkhshi hoei pak chizin mmnoع kr din? Kho، ih sari chizin dnia ki zndgi min bhi aiman lane oalon ke lie hin، aor qiamt ke roz to khalstaan anhi ke lie hon gi ais trh hm apni batin saf saf bian krte hin aun logon ke lie jo عlm rkhne oale hin
7.33: Ae mhmdؐ، ain se kho kh mire rb ne jo chizin hram ki hin oh to ih hin: be shrmi ke kam khoah khle hon ia chhpe aor gnah aor hq ke khlaf ziadti aor ih kh allh ke sath tm ksi ko shrik kro js ke lie aus ne koei snd nazl nhin ki aor ih kh allh ke nam pr koei aisi bat kho js ke mtعlq tmhin عlm nh ho kh oh hqiqt min asi ne frmaei he
7.34: Hr qom ke lie mhlt ki aik mdt mqrr he، phr jb ksi qom ki mdt aan pori hoti he to aik ghri bhr ki takhir o tqdim bhi nhin hoti
7.35: (aor ih bat allh ne aaghaz tkhliq hi min saf frma di thi kh) ae bni aadm، iad rkho، agr tmhare pas khod tm hi min se aise rsol aaein jo tmhin miri aaiat sna rhe hon، to jo koei nafrmani se bche ga aor apne roih ki aslah kr le ga as ke lie ksi khof aor rnj ka moqع nhin he
7.36: Aor jo log hmari aaiat ko jhtlaein ge aor an ke mqablh min srkshi brtin ge ohi ahl dozkh hon ge jhan oh hmishh rhin ge

7.134: Jb kbhi aun pr bla nazl ho jati to khte "ae mosiaؑ، tjhe apne rb ki trf se jo mnsb hasl he as ki bna pr hmare hq min dعa kr، agr ab ke to hm pr se ih bla tloa de to hm tiri bat man lin ge aor bni asraeil ko tire sath bhij din ge"

7.136: Tb hm ne aun se antqam lia aor anhin smndr min ghrq kr dia kionkh anhon ne hmari nshanion ko jhtlaia tha aor aun se be proa ho gee the
7.137: Aor aun ki jgh hm ne aun logon ko jo kmzor bna kr rkhe gee the، aus srzmin ke mshrq o mghrb ka oars bna dia jse hm ne brkton se mala mal kia tha as trh bni asraeil ke hq min tire rb ka oعdh khir pora hoa kionkh aunhon ne sbr se kam lia tha aor frعon aor as ki qom ka oh sb kchh brbad kr dia gia jo oh bnate aor chrhate the
7.138: Bni asraeil ko hm ne smndr se gzar dia، phr oh chle aor raste min aik aisi qom pr aun ka gzr hoa jo apne chnd bton ki groidh bni hoei thi khne lge، "ae mosiaؑ، hmare lie bhi koei aisa mعbod bna de jise ain logon ke mعbod hin" mosiaؑ ne kha "tm log bri nadani ki batin krte ho
7.139: Ih log js triqh ki piroi kr rhe hin oh to brbad hone oala he aor jo عml oh kr rhe hin oh srasr batl he"
7.140: Phr mosiaؑ ne kha "kia min allh ke soa koei aor mعbod tmhare lie tlash kron? Halankh oh allh hi he js ne tmhin dnia bhr ki qomon pr fzilt bkhshi he
7.141: Aor (allh frmata he) oh oqt iad kro jb hm ne frعon oalon se tmhin njat di jn ka hal ih tha kh tmhin skht عzab min mbtla rkhte the، tmhare biton ko qtl krte aor tmhari عorton ko zndh rhne dite the aor as min tmhare rb ki trf se tmhari bri aazmaesh thi
7.142: Hm ne mosiaؑ ko tis shb o roz ke lie (koh sina pr) tlb kia aor bعd min ds dn ka aor azafh kr dia، ais trh aus ke rb ki mqrr krdh mdt pore chalis dn ho gei mosiaؑ ne chlte hoee apne bhaei haronؑ se kha kh "mire pichhe tm miri qom min miri janshini krna aor thik kam krte rhna aor bgar pida krne oalon ke triqe pr nh chlna"
7.143: Jb oh hmare mqrr kie hoee oqt pr phncha aor as ke rb ne as se klam kia to as ne altja ki kh "ae rb، mjhe iaraee nzr de kh min tjhe dikhon" frmaia "to mjhe nhin dikh skta han zra samne ke phar ki trf dikh، agr oh apni jgh qaem rh jaee to albth to mjhe dikh ske ga" chnanchh as ke rb ne jb phar pr tjli ki to ase rizh rizh kr dia aor mosiaؑ ghsh kha kr gr pra jb hosh aaia to bola "pak he tiri zat، min tire hzor tobh krta hon aor sb se phla aiman lane oala min hon"
7.144: Frmaia "ae mosiaؑ، min ne tmam logon pr trjih de kr tjhe mntkhb kia kh mir i pighmbri kre aor mjh se hm klam ho ps jo kchh min tjhe don ase le aor shkr bjala"
7.145: As ke bعd hm ne mosiaؑ ko hr shعbh zndgi ke mtعlq nsiht aor hr phlo ke mtعlq oazh hdait tkhtion pr lkh kr de di aor as se kha: "ain hdaiat ko mzbot hathon se snbhal aor apni qom ko hkm de kh an ke bhtr mfhom ki piroi krin عnqrib min tmhin fasqon ke ghr dkhaؤn ga
7.146: Min apni nshanion se aun logon ki ngahin phir don ga jo bghir ksi hq ke zmin min bre bnte hin، oh khoah koei nshani dikh lin kbhi as pr aiman nh laein ge، agr sidha rasth aun ke samne aaee to ase akhtiar nh krin ge aor agr titrha rasth nzr aaee to as pr chl prin ge، as lie kh anhon ne hmari nshanion ko jhtlaia aor an se be proaei krte rhe
7.147: Hmari nshanion ko js ksi ne jhtlaia aor aakhrt ki pishi ka ankar kia aus ke sare aعmal zaeع ho gee kia log ais ke soa kchh aor jza pa skte hin kh jisa krin oisa bhrin?"
7.148: Mosiaؑ ke pichhe as ki qom ke logon ne apne zioron se aik bchhre ka ptla bna lia js min se bil ki si aaoaz nklti thi kia aunhin nzr nh aata tha kh oh nh an se bolta he nh ksi mعamlh min an ki rhnmaei krta he? Mgr phr bhi aunhon ne ase mعbod bna lia aor oh skht zalm the
7.149: Phr jb an ki frib khordgi ka tlsm tot gia ao r aunhon ne dikh lia kh dr hqiqt oh gmrah ho gee hin to khne lge kh "agr hmare rb ne hm pr rhm nh frmaia aor hm se drgzr nh kia to hm brbad ho jaein ge"
7.150: Adhr se mosiaؑ ghse aor rnj min bhra hoa apni qom ki trf plta aate hi as ne kha "bht bri janshini ki tm logon ne mire bعd! Kia tm se atna sbr nh hoa kh apne rb ke hkm ka antzar kr lite?" aor tkhtian phink din aor apne bha ei (haronؑ) ke sr ke bal pkr kr ase khincha haronؑ ne kha "ae miri man ke bite، ain logon ne mjhe dba lia aor qrib tha kh mjhe mar dalte ps to dshmnon ko mjh pr hnsne ka moqع nh de aor as zalm groh ke sath mjhe nh shaml kr"
7.151: Tb mosiaؑ ne kha "ae rb، mjhe aor mire bhaei ko mعaf kr aor hmin apni rhmt min dakhl frma، to sb se brh kr rhim he"
7.152: (joab min arshad hoa kh) "jn logon ne bchhre ko mعbod bnaia oh zror apne rb ke ghzb min grftar ho kr rhin ge aor dnia ki zndgi min zlil hon ge jhot ghrne oalon ko hm aisi hi sza dite hin
7.153: Aor jo log bre عml krin phr tobh kr lin aor aiman le aaein to iqinaan ais tobh o aiman ke bعd tira rb drgzr aor rhm frmane oala he"
7.154: Phr jb mosiaؑ ka ghsh thnda hoa to as ne oh tkhtian atha lin jn ki thrir min hdait aor rhmt thi aun logon ke lie jo apne rb se drte hin
7.155: Aor aus ne apni qom ke str aadmion ko mntkhb kia takh oh (aus ke sath) hmare mqrr kie hoee oqt pr hazr hon jb ain logon ko aik skht zlzle ne aa pkra to mosiaؑ ne عrz kia "ae mire srkar، aap chahte to phle hi ain ko aor mjhe hlak krskte the kia aap aus qsor min jo hm min se chnd nadanon ne kia tha hm sb ko hlak kr din ge? Ih to aap ki dali hoei aik aazmaesh thi js ke zriعh se aap jse chahte hin gmrahi min mbtla kr dite hin aor jse chahte hin hdait bkhsh dite hin hmare sr prst to aap hi hin ps hmin mعaf kr dijie aor hm pr rhm frmaeie، aap sb se brh kr mعaf frmane oale hin
7.156: Aor hmare lie as dnia ki bhlaei bhi lkh dijie aor aakhrt ki bhi، hm ne aap ki trf rjoع kr lia" joab min arshad hoa "sza to min jse chahta hon dita hon، mgr miri rhmt hr chiz pr chhaei hoei he، aor ause min aun logon ke hq min lkhon ga jo nafrmani se prhiz krin ge، zkoaۃ din ge aor miri aaiat pr aiman laein ge"
7.157: (ps aaj ih rhmt aun logon ka hsh he) jo ais pighmbr، nbi ami ki piroi akhtiar krin js ka zkr aunhin apne han torat aor anjil min lkha hoa mlta he oh anhin niki ka hkm dita he، bdi se rokta he، an ke lie pak chizin hlal ao r napak chizin hram krta he، aor an pr se oh bojh atarta he jo aun pr lde hoee the aor oh bndshin kholta he jn min oh jkre hoee the lhaza jo log as pr aiman laein aor as ki hmait aor nsrt krin aor aus roshni ki piroi akhtiar krin jo as ke sath nazl ki gei he، ohi flah pane oale hin
7.158: Ae mhmdؐ، kho kh "ae ansano، min tm sb ki trf aus khda ka pighmbr hon jo zmin aor aasmanon ki badshahi ka malk he، aus ke soa koei khda nhin he، ohi zndgi bkhshta he aor ohi mot dita he، ps aiman laؤ allh pr aor as ke bhije hoee nbi aumi pr jo allh aor as ke arshadat ko manta he، aor piroi akhtiar kro aus ki، amid he kh tm rah rast pa lo ge"
7.159: Mosiaؑ ki qom min aik groh aisa bhi tha jo hq ke mtabq hdait krta aor hq hi ke mtabq ansaf krta tha
7.160: Aor hm ne as qom ko barh ghranon min tqsim kr ke anhin mstql grohon ki shkl de di thi aor jb mosiaؑ se as ki qom ne pani manga to hm ne as ko asharh kia kh flan chtan pr apni lathi maro chnanchh as chtan se ikaik barh chshme phot nkle aor hr groh ne apne pani line ki jgh mtعin kr li hm ne aun pr badl ka saih kia aor aun pr mn o sloia atara khaؤ oh pak chizin jo hm ne tm ko bkhshi hin mgr as ke bعd anhon ne jo kchh kia to hm pr zlm nhin kia blkh aap apne hi aopr zlm krte rhe
7.161: Iad kro oh oqt jb an se kha gia tha kh ais bsti min ja kr bs jaؤ aor as ki pidaoar se hsb mnsha rozi hasl kro aor htۃ htۃ khte jaؤ aor shhr ke droaze min sjdh riz hote hoee dakhl ho، hm tmhari khtaein mعaf krin ge aor nik roih rkhne oalon ko mzid fzl se noazin ge"
7.162: Mgr jo log aun min se zalm the aunhon ne aus bat ko jo aun se khi gei thi bdl dala، aor ntijh ih hoa kh hm ne an ke zlm ki padash min an pr aasman se عzab bhij dia
7.163: Aor zra ain se au s bsti ka hal bhi pochho jo smndr ke knare oaqع thi ainhin iad dlaؤ oh oaqعh kh ohan ke log sbt (hfth) ke dn ahkam alahi ki khlaf orzi krte the aor ih kh mchhlian sbt hi ke dn abhr abhr kr sth pr aun ke samne aati thin aor sbt ke soa baqi dnon min nhin aati thin ih as lie hota tha kh hm an ki nafrmanion ki ojh se an ko aazmaesh min dal rhe the
7.164: Aor anhin ih bhi iad laؤ kh jb aun min se aik groh ne dosre groh se kha tha kh "tm aise logon ko kion nsiht krte ho jnhin allh hlak krne oala ia skht sza dine oala he " to anhon ne joab dia tha kh "hm ih sb kchh tmhare rb ke hzor apni mعzrt pish krne ke lie krte hin aor as amid pr krte hin kh shaid ih log as ki nafrmani se prhiz krne lgin"
7.165: Aakhrkarjb oh aun hdaiat ko balkl hi framosh kr gee jo anhin iad kraei gei thin to hm ne aun logon ko bcha lia jo braei se rokte the aor baqi sb logon ko jo zalm the an ki nafrmanion pr skht عzab min pkr lia
7.166: Phr jb oh pori srkshi ke sath ohi kam kie chle gee js se anhin roka gia tha، to hm ne kha kh bndr ho jaؤ zlil aor khoar
7.167: Aor iad kro jbkh tmhare rb ne aعlan kr dia kh "oh qiamt tk brabr aise log bni asraeil pr mslt krta rhe ga jo an ko bdtrin عzab din ge،" iqinaan tmhara rb sza dine min tiz dst he aor iqinaan oh dr gzr aor rhm se bhi kam line oala he
7.168: Hm ne an ko zmin min tkre tkre kr ke bht si qomon min tqsim kr dia kchh log an min nik the aor kchh a s se mkhtlf aor hm an ko achhe aor bre halat se aazmaesh min mbtla krte rhe kh shaid ih plt aaein
7.169: Phr agli nslon ke bعd aise na khlf log an ke janshin hoee jo ktab alahi ke oars ho kr aisi dniaee dni ke faede smitte hin aor khh dite hin kh toqع he hmin mعaf kr dia jaee ga، aor agr ohi mtaع dnia phr samne aati he to phr lpk kr ase le lite hin kia an se ktab ka عhd nhin lia ja chka he kh allh ke nam pr ohi bat khin jo hq ho? Aor ih khod prh chke hin jo ktab min lkha he aakhrt ki qiam gah to khda trs logon ke lie hi bhtr he، kia tm atni si bat nhin smjhte?
7.170: Jo log ktab ki pabndi kr te hin aor jnhon ne nmaz qaem rkhi he، iqinaan aise nik krdar logon ka ajr hm zaeع nhin krin ge
7.171: Anhin oh oqt bhi kchh iad he jbkh hm ne phar ko hla kr an pr as trh chha dia tha kh goia oh chhtri he aor ih gman kr rhe the kh oh an pr aa pre ga aor aus oqt hm ne an se kha tha kh jo ktab hm tmhin de rhe hin ase mzboti ke sath thamo aor jo kchh as min lkha he ase iad rkho، toqع he kh tm ghlt roi se bche rho ge
7.172: Aor ae nbi، logon ko iad dlaؤ oh oqt jbkh tmhare rb ne bni aadm ki pshton se an ki nsl ko nkala tha aor anhin khod an ke aopr goah bnate hoee pochha tha "kia min tmhara rb nhin hon?" anhon ne kha "zror aap hi hmare rb hin، hm as pr goahi dite hin" ih hm ne as lie kia kh khin tm qiamt ke roz ih nh khh do kh "hm to as bat se be khbr the،"
7.173: Ia ih nh khne lgo kh "shrk ki abtda to hmare bap dada ne hm se phle ki thi aor hm bعd ko an ki nsl se pida hoee، phr kia aap hmin aus qsor min pkrte hin jo ghlt kar logon ne kia tha"
7.174: Dikho، ais trh hm nshanian oazh tor pr pish krte hin aor as lie krte hin kh ih log plt aaein
7.175: Aor ae mhmdؐ، ain ke samne aus shkhs ka hal bian kro js ko hm ne apni aaiat ka عlm عta kia tha mgr oh an ki pabndi se nkl bhaga aakhrkar shitan as ke pichhe pr gia ihan tk kh oh bhtkne oalon min shaml ho kr rha
7.176: Agr hm chahte to ase aun aaiton ke zriعh se blndi عta krte، mgr oh to zmin hi ki trf jhk kr rh gia aor apni khoahsh nfs hi ke pichhe pra rha، lhaza as ki halt kte ki si ho gei kh tm as pr hmlh kro tb bhi zban ltkaee rhe aor ase chhor do tb bhi zban ltkaee rhe ihi msal he aun logon ki jo hmari aaiat ko jhtlate hin tm ih hkaiat ain ko snate rho، shaid kh ih kchh ghor o fkr krin
7.177: Bri hi bri msal he aise logon ki jnhon ne hmari aaiat ko jhtlaia، aor oh aap apne hi aopr zlm krte rhe hin
7.178: Jse allh hdait bkhshe bs ohi rah rast pata he aor js ko allh apni rhnmaei se mhrom kr de ohi nakam o namrad ho kr rhta he
7.179: Aor ih hqiqt he kh bht se jn aor ansan aise hin jn ko hm ne jhnm hi ke lie pida kia he an ke pas dl hin mgr oh an se sochte nhin an ke pas aankhin hin mgr oh an se dikhte nhin an ke pas kan hin mgr oh an se snte nhin oh janoron ki trh hin blkh an se bhi ziadh gee gzre، ih oh log hin jo ghflt min kho ee gee hin
7.180: Allh achhe namon ka msthq he، as ko achhe hi namon se pkaro aor aun logon ko chhor do jo as ke nam rkhne min rasti se mnhrf ho jate hin jo kchh oh krte rhe hin as ka bdlh oh pakr rhin ge
7.181: Hmari mkhloq min aik groh aisa bhi he jo thik thik hq ke mtabq hdait aor hq hi ke mtabq ansaf krta he
7.182: Rhe oh log jnhon ne hmari aaiat ko jhtla dia he، to anhin hm btdrij aise triqh se tbahi ki trf le jaein ge kh anhin khbr tk nh hogi
7.183: Min an ko dhil de rha hon، miri chal ka koei tor nhin he
7.184: Aor kia ain logon ne kbhi socha nhin? Ain ke rfiq pr jnon ka koei asr nhin he oh to aik khbrdar he jo (bra anjam samne aane se phle) saf saf mtnbh kr rha he
7.185: Kia an logon ne aasman o zmin ke antzam pr kbhi ghor nhin kia aor ksi chiz ko bhi jo khda ne pida ki he aankhin khol kr nhin dikha? Aor kia ih bhi anhon ne nhin socha kh shaid ain ki mhlt zndgi pori hone ka oqt qrib aa lga ho? Phr aakhr pighmbrؐ ki ais tnbih ke bعd aor konsi bat aisi ho skti he js pr ih aiman laein?
7.186: Js ko allh rhnmaei se mhrom kr de aus ke lie phr koei rhnma nhin he، aor allh ainhin ain ki srkshi hi min bhtkta hoa chhore dita he
7.187: Ih log tm se pochhte hin kh aakhr oh qiamt ki ghri kb nazl hogi? Kho "as ka عlm mire rb hi ke pas he ause apne oqt pr ohi zahr kre ga aasmanon aor zmin min oh bra skht oqt hoga oh tm pr achank aa jaee ga" ih log as ke mtعlq tm se as trh pochhte hin goia kh tm as ki khoj min lge hoee ho kho "as ka عlm to srf allh ko he mgr aksr log as hqiqt se na oaqf hin"
7.188: Ae mhmdؐ، an se kho "min apni zat ke lie ksi nfع aor nqsan ka akhtiar nhin rkhta، allh hi jo kchh chahta he oh ho ta he aor agr mjhe ghib ka عlm hota to min bht se faede apne lie hasl kr lita aor mjhe kbhi koei nqsan nh phnchta min to mhz aik khbrdar krne oala aor khosh khbri snane oala hon aun logon ke lie jo miri bat manin"
7.189: Oh allh hi he js ne tmhin aik jan se pida kia aor asi ki jns se as ka jora bnaia takh as ke pas skon hasl kre phr jb mrd ne عort ko dhank lia to ase aik khfif sa hml rh gia jse lie lie oh chlti phrti rhi phr jb oh bojhl ho gei to donon ne ml kr allh، apne rb se dعa ki kh agr to ne hm ko achha sa bchh dia to hm tire shkr gzar hon ge
7.190: Mgr jb allh ne an ko aik shih o salm bchh de dia to oh as ki ais bkhshsh o عnait min dosron ko as ka shrik thirane lge allh bht blnd o brtr he an mshrkanh baton se jo ih log krte hin
7.191: Kise nadan hin ih log kh aun ko khda ka shrik thirate hin jo ksi chiz ko bhi pida nhin krte blkh khod pida kie jate hin
7.192: Jo nh an ki mdd kr skte hin aor nh aap apni mdd hi pr qadr hin
7.193: Agr tm anhin sidhi rah pr aane ki dعot do to oh tmhare pichhe nh aaein، tm khoah anhin pkaro ia khamosh rho، donon sorton min tmhare lie iksan hi rhe
7.194: Tm log khda ko chhor kr jnhin pkarte ho oh to mhz bnde hin jise tm bnde ho an se dعaein mang dikho، ih tmhari dعaؤn ka joab din agr an ke bare min tmhare khialat shih hin
7.195: Kia ih paؤn rkhte hin kh an se chlin? Kia ih hath rkhte hin kh an se pkrin? Kia ih aankhin rkhte hin kh an se dikhin? Kia ih kan rkhte hin kh an se snin? Ae mhmdؐ، an se kho kh "bla lo apne thiraee hoee shrikon ko phr tm sb ml kr mire khlaf tdbirin kro aor mjhe hrgz mhlt nh do
7.196: Mira hami o nasr oh khda he js ne ih ktab nazl ki he aor oh nik aadmion ki hmait krta he
7.197: Bkhlaf ais ke tm jnhin khda ko chhor kr pkarte ho oh nh tmhari mdd krskte hin aor nh khod apni mdd hi krne ke qabl hin
7.198: Blkh agr tm anhin sidhi rah pr aane ke lie kho to oh tmhari bat sn bhi nhin skte bzahr tm ko aisa nzr aata he kh oh tmhari trf dikh rhe hin mgr fi aloaqع oh kchh bhi nhin dikhte"
7.199: Ae nbiؐ، nrmi o drgzr ka triqh akhtiar kro، mعrof ki tlqin kie jaؤ، aor jahlon se nh aljho
7.200: Agr kbhi shitan tmhin aksaee to allh ki pnah mango، oh sb kchh snne aor janne oala he
7.201: Hqiqt min jo lo g mtqi hin aun ka hal to ih hota he kh kbhi shitan ke asr se koei bra khial agr anhin chho bhi jata he to oh foraan chokne ho jate hin aor phr anhin saf nzr aane lgta he kh an ke lie shih triq kar kia he
7.202: Rhe an ke (iعni shiatin ke) bhaei bnd، to oh anhin an ki kj roi min khinche lie chle jate hin aor anhin bhtkane min koei ksr atha nhin rkhte
7.203: Ae nbiؐ، jb tm ain logon ke samne koei nshani (iعni mعjzh) pish nhin krte to ih khte hin kh tm ne apne lie koei nshani kion nh antkhab kr li? An se kho "min to srf aus ohi ki piroi krta hon jo mire rb ne miri trf bhiji he ih bsirt ki roshnian hin tmhare rb ki trf se aor hdait aor rhmt he aun logon ke lie jo aise qbol krin
7.204: Jb qraan tmhare samne prha jaee to ase tojh se sno aor khamosh rho، shaid kh tm pr bhi rhmt ho jaee"
7.205: Ae nbiؐ، apne rb ko sbh o sham iad kia kro dl hi dl min zari aor khof ke sath aor zban se bhi hlki aaoaz ke sath tm an logon min se nh ho jaؤ jo ghflt min pre hoee hin
7.206: Jo frshte tmhare rb ke hzor tqrb ka mqam rkhte hin oh kbhi apni braei ke ghmnd min aa kr as ki عbadt se mnh nhin morte aor as ki tsbih krte hin، aor as ke aage jhke rhte hin

8.1: Tm se anfal ke mtعlq pochhte hin? Kho “ih anfal to allh aor aus ke rsuolؐ ke hin، ps tm log allh se dro aor apne aaps ke tعlqat drst kro aor allh aor aus ke rsolؐ ki ataعt kro agr tm momn ho"
8.2: Schّe ahl aiman to oh log hin jn ke dl allh ka zkr sun kr lrz jate hin aor jb allh ki aaiat an ke samne prhi jati hin to an ka aiman brh jata he aor oh apne rb pr aعtmad rkhte hin
8.3: Jo nmaz qaem krte hin aor jo kchh hm ne an ko dia he as min se (hmari rah min) khrch krte hin
8.4: Aise hi log hqiqi momn hin an ke lie an ke rb ke pas bre drje hin qsoron se drgzr he aor bhtrin rzq he
8.5: (ais mal ghnimt ke mعamlh min bhi oisi hi sort pish aa rhi he jisi aus oqt pish aaei thi jbkh) tira rb tjhe hq ke sath tire ghr se nkal laia tha aor momnon min se aik groh ko ih skht nagoar tha
8.6: Oh as hq ke mعamlh min tjh se jhgr rhe the dran hale kh oh saf saf nmaian ho chka tha an ka hal ih tha kh goia oh aankhon dikhe mot ki trf hanke ja rhe hin
8.7: Iad kro oh moqع jb kh allh tm se oعdh kr rha tha kh donon grohon min se aik tmhin mil jaee ga tm chahte the kh kmzor groh tmhin mle mgr allh ka aradh ih tha kh apne arshadat se hq ko hq kr dkhaee aor kafron ki jr kat de
8.8: Takh hq hq ho kr rhe aor batl batl ho jaee khoah mjrmon ko ih ktna hi nagoar ho
8.9: Aor oh moqع iad kro jbkh tm apne rb se friad kr rhe the joab min as ne frmaia kh min tmhari mdd ke lie pe dr pe aik hzar frshte bhij rha hon
8.10: Ih bat allh ne tmhin srf as lie bta di kh tmhin khoshkhbri ho aor tmhare dl as se mtmen ho jaein، ornh mdd to jb bhi hoti he allh hi ki trf se hoti he، iqinaan allh zbrdst aor dana he
8.11: Aor oh oqt jbkh allh apni trf se ghnodgi ki shkl min tm pr atminan o be khofi ki kifit tari kr rha tha، aor aasman se tmhare aopr pani brsa rha tha takh tmhin pak kre aor tm se shitan ki dali hoei njast duor kre aor tmhari hmt bndhaee aor as ke zriعh se tmhare qdm jma de
8.12: Aor oh oqt jbkh tmhara rb frshton ko asharh kr rha tha kh “min tmhare sath hon، tm ahli aiman ko sabt qdm rkho، min abhi an kafron ke dlon min ruعb dale dita hon، ps tm an ki grdnon pr zrb aor jor jor pr chot lgaؤ"
8.13: Ih as lie kh an logon ne allh aor as ke rsolؐ ka mqablh kia aor jo allh aor as ke rsolؐ ka mqablh kre allh as ke lie nhait skht gir he
8.14: Ih he tm logon ki sza، ab as ka mza chkho، aor tmhin mعlom ho kh hq ka ankar krne oalon ke lie dozkh ka عzab he
8.15: Ae aiman lane oalo، jb tm aik lshkr ki sort min kfar se dochar ho to an ke mqablh min pith nh phiro
8.16: Js ne aise moqع pr pith phiri، ala ih kh jngi chal ke tor pr aisa kre ia ksi duosri foj se ja mlne ke lie، to oh allh ke ghzb min ghir jaee ga، aus ka thkanh jhnm hoga، aor oh bht buri jaee bazgsht he
8.17: Ps hqiqt ih he kh tm ne anhin qtl nhin kia blkh allh ne an ko qtl kia aor to ne nhin phinka blkh allh ne phinka (aor momnon ke hath jo ais kam min astعmal kie gee) to ih as lie tha kh allh momnon ko aik bhtrin aazmaesh se kamiabi ke sath gzar de، iqinaan allh sunne oala aor janne oala he
8.18: Ih mعamlh to tmhare sath he aor kafron ke sath mعamlh ih he kh allh an ki chalon ko kmzor krne oala he
8.19: (ain kafron se khh do) “agr tm fislh chahte the to lo، fislh tmhare samne aa gia ab baz aa jaؤ to tmhare hi lie bhtr he، ornh phr plt kr asi hmaqt ka aعadh kro ge to hm bhi asi sza ka aعadh krin ge aor tmhari jmعit، khoah oh ktni hi ziadh ho، tmhare kchh kam nh aa ske gi allh momnon ke sath he"
8.20: Ae aiman lane oalo، allh aor aus ke rsuol ki ataعt kro aor hkm sunne ke bعd as se srtabi nh kro
8.21: Aun logon ki trh nh ho jaؤ jnhon ne kha kh hm ne suna halankh oh nhin sunte
8.22: Iqinaan khda ke nzdik bdtrin qsm ke janor oh bhre gonge log hin jo عql se kam nhin lite
8.23: Agr allh ko mعlom hota kh an min kchh bhi bhlaei he to oh zror anhin sunne ki tofiq dita (likn bhlaei ke bghir) agr oh an ko sunoata to oh be rukhi ke sath mnh phir jate
8.24: Ae aiman lane oalo، allh aor as ke rsol ki pkar pr lbik kho jbkh rsuol tmhin as chiz ki trf bulaee jo tmhin zndgi bkhshne oali he، aor jan rkho kh allh aadmi aor as ke dl ke drmian hael he aor asi ki trf tm smite jaؤ ge
8.25: Aor bcho aus ftne se js ki shamt mkhsos tor pr srf aunhi logon tk mhdod nh rhe gi jnhon ne tm min se gnah kia ho aor jan rkho kh allh skht sza dine oala he
8.26: Iad kro oh oqt jbkh tm thore the، zmin min tm ko be zor smjha jata tha، tm drte rhte the kh khin log tmhin mta nh din phr allh ne tm ko jaee pnah mhia kr di، apni mdd se tmhare hath mzbuot kie aor tmhin achha rzq phnchaia، shaid kh tm shkr gzar bno
8.27: Ae aiman lane oalo، jante buojhte allh aor as ke rsuolؐ ke sath khiant nh kro، apni amanton min ghdari ke mrtkb nh ho
8.28: Aor jan rkho kh tmhare mal aor tmhari aolad hqiqt min samani aazmaesh hin aor allh ke pas ajr dine ke lie bht kchh he
8.29: Ae aiman lane oalo، agr tm khda trsi akhtiar kro ge to allh tmhare lie ksoti bhm phncha de ga aor tmhari buraeion ko tm se duor kr de ga، aor tmhare qsor mعaf kr de ga allh bra fzl frmane oala he
8.30: Oh oqt bhi iad krne ke qabl he jbkh mnkrini hq tire khlaf tdbirin soch rhe the kh tjhe qid kr din ia qtl kr dalin ia jla otn kr din oh apni chalin chl rhe the aor allh apni chal chl rha tha aor allh sb se bhtr chal chlne oala he
8.31: Jb an ko hmari aaiat snaei jati thin to khte the kh “han sun lia hm ne، hm chahin to aisi hi batin hm bhi bna skte hin، ih to ohi purani khanian hin jo phle se log khte chle aa rhe hin "
8.32: Aor oh bat bhi iad he jo aunhon ne khi thi kh “khdaia agr ih oaqعi hq he aor tiri trf se he to hm pr aasman se pthr brsa de ia koei drd nak عzab hm pr le aa"
8.33: Aus oqt to allh an pr عzab nazl krne oala nh tha jbkh to an ke drmian mojod tha aor nh allh ka ih qaعdh he kh log astghfar kr rhe hon aor oh an ko عzab dide
8.34: Likn ab kion nh oh an pr عzab nazl kre jbkh oh msjd hram ka rasth rok rhe hin، halankh oh as msjd ke jaez mtoli nhin hin as ke jaez mtoli to srf ahli tqoia hi ho skte hin mgr aksr log as bat ko nhin jante
