8.35: Bit allh ke pas an logon ki nmaz kia hoti he، bs sitian bjate aor talian pitte hin ps ab lo، ais عzab ka mzh chkho apne aus ankari hq ki padash min jo tm krte rhe ho
8.36: Jn logon ne hq ko manne se ankar kia he oh apne mal khda ke raste se rokne ke lie srf kr rhe hin aor abhi aor khrch krte rhin ge mgr aakhr kar ihi koshshin an ke lie pchhtaoe ka sbb bnin gi، phr oh mghlob hon ge، phr ih kafr jhnm ki trf ghir laee jaein ge
8.37: Takh allh gndgi ko pakizgi se chhant kr alg kre aor hr qsm ki gndgi ko mla kr aktha kre phr as plnde ko jhnm min jhonk de ihi log asli dioalie hin
8.38: Ae nbiؐ، an kafron se kho kh agr ab bhi baz aa jaein to jo kchh phle ho chka he as se drgzr kr lia jaee ga، likn agr ih asi pchhli rosh ka aعadh krin ge to gzshth qomon ke sath jo kchh ho chka he oh sb ko mعlom he
8.39: Ae aiman lane oalo، an kafron se jng kro ihan tk kh ftnh baqi nh rhe aor din pora ka pora allh ke lie ho jaee phr agr oh ftnh se ruk jaein to an ke aعmal ka dikhne oala allh he
8.40: Aor agr oh nh manin to jan rkho kh allh tmhara srprst he aor oh bhtrin hami o mdd gar he
8.41: Aor tmhin mعlom ho kh jo kchh mal ghnimt tm ne hasl kia he as ka panchoan hsh allh aor as ke rsuolؐ aor rshth daron aor itimon aor mskinon aor msafron ke lie he agr tm aiman laee ho allh pr aor as chiz pr jo fisle ke roz، iعni donon fojon ki mdbhir ke dn، hm ne apne bnde pr nazl ki thi، (to ih hsh bkhoshi ada kro) allh hr chiz pr qadr he
8.42: Iad kro oh oqt jbkh tm oadi ke ais janb the aor oh duosri janb praؤ dale hoee the aor qaflh tm se niche (sahl) ki trf tha agr khin phle se tmhare aor an ke drmian mqablh ki qrardad ho chki hoti to tm zror as moqع pr phlo thi kr jate، likn jo kchh pish aaia oh as lie tha kh js bat ka fislh allh kr chka tha ase zhuor min le aaee takh jse hlak hona he oh dlil roshn ke sath hlak ho aor jse zndh rhna he oh dlil roshn ke sath zndh rhe، iqinaan khda sunne oala aor janne oala he
8.43: Aor iad kro oh oqt jbkh ae nbiؐ، khda aun ko tmhare khoab min thora dkha rha tha، agr khin oh tmhin aun ki tعdad ziadh dkha dita to zror tm log hmt har jate aor lraei ke mعamlh min jhgra shroع kr dite، likn allh hi ne ais se tmhin bchaia، iqinaan oh sinon ka hal tk janta he
8.44: Aor iad kro jb kh mqable ke oqt khda ne tm logon ki ngahon min dshmnon ko thora dkhaia aor an ki ngahon min tmhin km kr ke pish kia، takh jo bat honi thi ause allh zhuor min le aaee، aor aakhr kar sare mعamlat allh hi ki trf rjoع krte hin
8.45: Ae aiman lane oalo، jb ksi groh se tmhara mqablh ho to sabt qdm rho aor allh ko ksrt se iad kro، toqع he kh tmhin kamiabi nsib ho gi
8.46: Aor allh aor as ke rsuol ki ataعt kro aor aaps min jhgro nhin ornh tmhare andr kmzori pida ho jaee gi aor tmhari hoa akhr jaee gi sbr se kam lo، iqinaan allh sbr krne oalon ke sath he
8.47: Aor aun logon ke se rng dhng nh akhtiar kro jo apne ghron se aitrate aor logon ko apni shan dkhate hoee nkle aor jn ki rosh ih he kh allh ke raste se rokte hin jo kchh oh kr rhe hin oh allh ki grft se bahr nhin he
8.48: Zra khial kro as oqt ka jb kh shitan ne an logon ke krtot an ki ngahon min khoshnma bna kr dkhaee the aor an se kha tha kh aaj koei tm pr ghalb nhin aa skta aor ih kh min tmhare sath hon mgr jb donon grohon ka aamna samna hoa to oh aulte paؤn phr gia aor khne lga kh mira tmhara sath nhin he، min oh kchh dikh rha hon jo tm log nhin dikhte، mjhe khda se dr lgta he aor khda bri skht sza dine oala he
8.49: Jb kh mnafqin aor oh sb log jn ke dlon ko rog lga hoa he، khh rhe the kh an logon ko to ain ke din ne khbt min mbtla kr rkha he halankh agr koei allh pr bhrosh kre to iqinaan allh bra zbrdst aor dana he
8.50: Kash tm aus halt ko dikh skte jbkh frshte mqtol kafron ki ruohin qbz kr rhe the oh an ke chhron aor an ke kolhon pr zrbin lgate jate the aor khte jate the “lo ab jlne ki sza bhgto
8.51: Ih oh jza he js ka saman tmhare apne hathon ne pishgi mhia kr rkha tha، ornh allh to apne bndon pr zlm krne oala nhin he "
8.52: Ih mعamlh an ke sath ausi trh pish aaia js trh aali frعon aor an se phle ke duosre logon ke sath pish aata rha he kh anhon ne allh ki aaiat ko manne se ankar kia aor allh ne an ke gnahon pr anhin pkr lia allh qot rkhta he aor skht sza dine oala he
8.53: Ih allh ki ais snt ke mtabq hoa kh oh ksi nعmt ko jo as ne ksi qom ko عta ki ho as oqt tk nhin bdlta jb tk kh oh qom khod apne trzi عml ko nhin bdl diti allh sb kchh snne aor janne oala he
8.54: Aali frعon aor an se phle ki qomon ke sath jo kchh pish aaia oh aisi zabth ke mtabq tha anhon ne apne rb ki aaiat ko jhtlaia tb hm ne an ke gnahon ki padash min anhin hlak kia aor aal frعon ko ghrq kr dia ih sb zalm log the
8.55: Iqinaan allh ke nzdik zmin pr chlne oali mkhloq min sb se bdtr oh log hin jnhon ne hq ko manne se ankar kr dia phr ksi trh oh ase qbol krne pr tiar nhin
8.56: (khsosaan) an min se oh log jn ke sath to ne mعahdh kia phr oh hr moqع pr as ko torte hin aor zra khda ka khof nhin krte
8.57: Ps agr ih log tmhin lraei min ml jaein to an ki aisi khbr lo kh an ke bعd jo duosre log aisi rosh akhtiar krne oale hon an ke hoas bakhth ho jaein toqع he kh kh bd عhdon ke ais anjam se oh sbq lin ge
8.58: Aor agr kbhi tmhin ksi qom se khiant ka andishh ho to as ke mعahde ko عlanih as ke aage phink do، iqinaan allh khaenon ko psnd nhin krta
8.59: Mnkrini hq as ghlt fhmi min nh rhin kh oh bazi le gee، iqinaan oh hm ko hra nhin skte
8.60: Aor tm log، jhan tk tmhara bs chle، ziadh se ziadh taqt aor tiar bndhe rhne oale ghore aun ke mqablh ke lie mhia rkho takh as ke zriعh se allh ke aor apne dshmnon ko aor an duosre aعdaء ko khof zdh kro jnhin tm nhin jante mgr allh janta he allh ki rah min jo kchh tm khrch kro ge as ka pora pora bdl tmhari trf pltaia jaee ga aor tmhare sath hrgz zlm nh hoga
8.61: Aor ae nbiؐ، agr dshmn slh o slamti ki trf mael hon to tm bhi as ke lie aamadh ho jaؤ aor allh pr bhrosh kro، iqinaan ohi snne aor janne oala he
8.62: Aor agr oh dhoke ki nit rkhte hon to tmhare lie allh kafi he ohi to he js ne apni mdd se aor momnon ke zriعh se tmhari taeid ki
8.63: Aor momnon ke dl aik duosre ke sath jor die tm roee zmin ki sari dolt bhi khrch kr dalte to ain logon ke dl nh jor skte the mgr oh allh he js ne an logon ke dl jore، iqinaan oh bra zbrdst aor dana he
8.64: Ae nbiؐ، tmhare lie aor tmhare piro ahli aiman ke lie to bs allh kafi he
8.65: Ae nbiؐ، momnon ko jng pr aubharo agr tm min se bis aadmi sabr hon to oh do so pr ghalb aaein ge aor agr so aadmi aise hon to mnkrin hq min se hzar aadmion pr bhari rhin ge kionkh oh aise log hin jo smjh nhin rkhte
8.66: Achha، ab allh ne tmhara bojh hlka kia aor ase mعlom hoa kh abhi tm min kmzori he، ps agr tm min se so aadmi sabr hon to oh do so pr aor hzar aadmi aise hon to do hzar pr allh ke hkm se ghalb aaein ge، aor allh an logon ke sath he jo sbr krne oale hin
8.67: Ksi nbi ke lie ih ziba nhin he kh as ke pas qidi hon jb tk kh oh zmin min dshmnon ko achhi trh kchl nh de tm log dnia ke faede chahte ho، halankh allh ke pishi nzr aakhrt he، aor allh ghalb aor hkim he
8.68: Agr allh ka noshth phle nh lkha ja chka hota to jo kchh tm logon ne lia he as ki padash min tm ko bri sza di jati
8.69: Ps jo kchh tm ne mal hasl kia he ase khaؤ kh oh hlal aor pak he aor allh se drte rho iqinaan allh drgzr krne oala aor rhm frmane oala he
8.70: Ae nbiؐ، tm logon ke qbzh min jo qidi hin an se kho agr allh ko mعlom hoa kh tmhare dlon min kchh khir he to oh tmhin aus se brh chrh kr de ga jo tm se lia gia he aor tmhari khtaein mعaf kre ga، allh drgzr krne oala aor rhm frmane oala he
8.71: Likn agr oh tire sath khiant ka aradh rkhte hin to as se phle oh allh ke sath khiant kr chke hin، chnanchh asi ki sza allh ne anhin di kh oh tire qabo min aa gee، allh sb kchh janta aor hkim he
8.72: Jn logon ne aiman qbol kia aor hjrt ki aor allh ki rah min apni janin lraein aor apne mal khpaee، aor jn logon ne hjrt krne oalon ko jgh di aor an ki mdd ki، ohi drasl aik dosre ke oli hin rhe oh log jo aiman to le aaee mgr hjrt kr ke (daralaslam min) aa nhin gee to an se tmhara olait ka koei tعlq nhin he jb tk kh oh hjrt kr ke nh aa jaein han agr oh din ke mعamlh min tm se mdd mangin to an ki mdd krna tm pr frz he، likn ksi aisi qom ke khlaf nhin js se tmhara mعahdh ho jo kchh tm krte ho allh ase dikhta he
8.73: Jo log mnkri hq hin oh aik dosre ki hmait krte hin agr tm ih nh kro ge to zmin min ftnh aor bra fsad brpa ho ga
8.74: Jo log aiman laee aor jnhon ne allh ki rah min ghr bar chhore aor jdojhd ki aor jnhon ne pnah di aor mdd ki ohi sche momn hin an ke lie khtaؤn se drgzr he aor bhtrin rzq he
8.75: Aor jo log bعd min aiman laee aor hjrt kr ke aa gee aor tmhare sath ml kr jdojhd krne lge oh bhi tm hi min shaml hin mgr allh ki ktab min khon ke rshth dar aik dosre ke ziadh hqdar hin، iqinaan allh hr chiz ko janta he

9.1: Aعlan brat he allh aor as ke rsol ki trf se aun mshrkin ko jn se tm ne mعahde kie the
9.2: Ps tm log mlk min char mhine aor chl phr lo aor jan rkho kh tm allh ko عajz krne oale nhin ho، aor ih kh allh mnkrin hq ko rsoa krne oala he
9.3: Atlaع عam he allh aor as ke rsol ki trf se hj akbr ke dn tmam logon ke lie kh allh mshrkin se bri alzmh he aor aus ka rsol bhi ab agr tm log tobh kr lo to tmhare hi lie bhtr he aor jo mnh phirte ho to khob smjh lo kh tm allh ko عajz krne oale nhin ho aor ae nbiؐ، ankar krne oalon ko skht عzab ki khoshkhbri sna do
9.4: Bjz aun mshrkin ke jn se tm ne mعahd e kie phr anhon ne apne عhd ko pora krne min tmhare sath koei kmi nhin ki aor nh tmhare khlaf ksi ki mdd ki، to aise logon ke sath tm bhi mdt mعahdh tk ofa kro kionkh allh mtqion hi ko psnd krta he
9.5: Ps jb hram mhine gzr jaein to mshrkin ko qtl kro jhan paؤ aor anhin pkro aor ghiro aor hr ghat min aun ki khbr line ke lie bitho phr agr oh tobh kr lin aor nmaz qaem krin aor zkoaۃ din to anhin chhor do allh drgzr krne oala aor rhm frmane oala he
9.6: Aor agr mshrkin min se koei shkhs pnah mang kr tmhare pas aana chahe (takh allh ka klam sne) to ause pnah de do ihan tk kh oh allh ka klam sn le phr ause as ke mamn tk phncha do ih as lie krna chahie kh ih log عlm nhin rkhte
9.7: Ain mshrkin ke lie allh aor as ke rsol ke nzdik koei عhd aakhr kise hoskta he? Bjz aun logon ke jn se tm ne msjd hram ke pas mعahdh kia tha، to jb tk oh tmhare sath sidhe rhin tm bhi an ke sath sidhe rho kionkh allh mtqion ko psnd krta he
9.8: Mgr ain ke soa dosre mshrkin ke sath koei عhd kise hoskta he jbkh aun ka hal ih he kh tm pr qabo pa jaein to nh tmhare mعamlh min ksi qrabt ka lhaz krin nh ksi mعahdh ki zmh dari ka oh apni zbanon se tm ko razi krne ki koshsh krte hin mgr dl an ke ankar krte hin aor an min se aksr fasq hin
9.9: Anhon ne allh ki aaiat ke bdle thori si qimt qbol kr li phr allh ke raste min sdrah bn kr khre ho gee bht bre krtot the jo ih krte rhe
9.10: Ksi momn ke mعamlh min nh ih qrabt ka lhaz krte hin aor nh ksi عhd ki zmh dari ka aor ziadti hmishh anhi ki trf se hoei he
9.11: Ps agr ih tobh kr lin aor nmaz qaem krin aor zkoaۃ din to tmhare dini bhaei hin aor janne oalon ke lie hm apne ahkam oazh kie dite hin
9.12: Aor agr عhd krne ke bعd ih phr apni qsmon ko tor dalin aor tmhare din pr hmle krne shroع kr din to kfr ke عlmbrdaron se jng kro kionkh an ki qsmon ka aعtbar nhin shaid kh (phr tloar hi ke zor se) oh baz aaein ge
9.13: Kia tm nh lro ge aise logon se jo apne عhd torte rhe hin aor jnhon ne rsol ko mlk se nkal dine ka qsd kia tha aor ziadti ki abtda krne oale ohi the? Kia tm an se drte ho? Agr tm momn ho to allh ais ka ziadh msthq he kh as se dro
9.14: An se lro، allh tmhare hathon se an ko sza dloaee ga aor anhin zlil o khoar kre ga aor an ke mqablh min tmhari mdd kre ga aor bht se momnon ke dl thnde kre ga
9.15: Aor an ke qlob ki jln mta de ga، aor jse chahe ga tobh ki tofiq bhi de ga allh sb kchh janne oala aor dana he
9.16: Kia tm logon ne ih smjh rkha he kh ionhi chhor die jaؤ ge halankh abhi allh ne ih to dikha hi nhin kh tm min se kon oh log hin jnhon ne (as ki rah min) jan fshani ki aor allh aor rsol aor momnin ke soa ksi ko jgri dost nh bnaia، jo kchh tm krte ho allh as se bakhbr he
9.17: Mshrkin ka ih kam nhin he kh oh allh ki msjdon ke mjaor o khadm bnin draan halikh apne aopr oh khod kfr ki shhadt de rhe hin an ke to sare aعmal zaeع ho gee aor jhnm min anhin hmishh rhna he
9.18: Allh ki msjdon ke aabad kar (mjaor o khadm) to ohi log hoskte hin jo allh aor roz aakhr ko manin aor nma z qaem krin، zkoaۃ din aor allh ke soa ksi se nh drin anhi se ih toqع he kh sidhi rah chlin ge
9.19: Kia tm logon ne hajion ko pani plane aor msjd hram ki mjaori krne ko as shkhs ke kam ke brabr thira lia he jo aiman laia allh pr aor roz aakhr pr aor js ne janfshani ki allh ki rah min? Allh ke nzdik to ih donon brabr nhin hin aor allh zalmon ki rhnmaei nhin krta
9.20: Allh ke han to anhi logon ka drjh bra he jo aiman laee aor jnhon ne as ki rah min ghr bar chhore aor jan o mal se jhad kia ohi kamiab hin
9.21: An ka rb anhin apni rhmt aor khoshnodi aor aisi jnton ki bshart dita he jhan an ke lie paeidar عish ke saman hin
9.22: An min oh hmishh rhin ge iqinaan allh ke pas khdmat ka slh dine ko bht kchh he
9.23: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، apne bapon aor bhaeion ko bhi apna rfiq nh bnaؤ agr oh aiman pr kfr ko trjih din tm min se jo an ko rfiq bnaein ge ohi zalm hon ge
9.24: Ae nbiؐ، khh do kh agr tmhare bap aor tmhare bite، aor tmhare bhaei، aor tmhari bioian aor tmhare عziz o aqarb aor tmhare oh mal jo tm ne kma ee hin، aor tmhare oh karobar jn ke mand pr jane ka tm ko khof he aor tmhare oh ghr jo tm ko psnd hin، tm ko allh aor as ke rsol aor as ki rah min jhad se عziz tr hin to antzar kro ihan tk kh allh apna fislh tmhare samne le aaee، aor allh fasq logon ki rhnmaei nhin kia krta
9.25: Allh as se phle bht se moaqع pr tmhari mdd kr chka he abhi ghzoh hnin ke roz (aus ki dstgiri ki shan tm dikh chke ho) as roz tmhin apni ksrt tعdad ka ghrh tha mgr oh tmhare kchh kam nh aaei aor zmin apni osعt ke baojod tm pr tng ho gei aor tm pith phir kr bhag nkle
9.26: Phr allh ne apni skint apne rsol pr aor momnin pr nazl frmaei aor oh lshkr atare jo tm ko nzr nh aate the aor mnkrin hq ko sza di kh ihi bdlh he aun logon ke lie jo hq ka ankar krin
9.27: Phr (tm ih bhi dikh chke ho kh) as trh sza dine ke bعd allh js ko chahta he tobh ki tofiq bhi bkhsh dita he، allh dr gzr krne oala aor rhm frmane oala he
9.28: Ae aiman lane oalo، mshrkin napak hin lhaza as sal ke bعd ih msjd hram ke qrib nh phtkne paein aor agr tmhin tng dsti ka khof he to bعid nhin kh allh chahe to tmhin a pne fzl se ghni kr de، allh عlim o hkim he
9.29: Jng kro ahl ktab min se aun logon ke khlaf jo allh aor roz aakhr pr aiman nhin late aor jo kchh allh aor as ke rsol ne hram qrar dia he ase hram nhin krte aor din hq ko apna din nhin bnate (an se lro) ihan tk kh oh apne hath se jzih din aor chhote bn kr rhin
9.30: Ihodi khte hin kh عzir allh ka bita he، aor عisaei khte hin kh msih allh ka bita he ih be hqiqt batin hin jo oh apni zbanon se nkalte hin aun logon ki dikha dikhi jo an se phle kfr min mbtla hoee the khda ki mar ain pr، ih khan se dhokh khar he hin
9.31: Anhon ne apne عlmaء aor droishon ko allh ke soa apna rb bna lia he aor asi trh msih abn mrim ko bhi halankh an ko aik mعbod ke soa ksi ki bndgi krne ka hkm nhin dia gia tha، oh js ke soa koei msthq عbadt nhin، pak he oh an mshrkanh baton se jo ih log krte hin
9.32: Ih log chahte hin kh allh ki roshni ko apni phonkon se bjha din mgr allh apni roshni ko mkml kie bghir manne oala nhin he khoah kafron ko ih ktna hi nagoar ho
9.33: Oh allh hi he js ne apne rsol ko hdait aor din hq ke sath bhija he takh ase pori jns din pr ghalb kr de khoah mshrkon ko ih ktna hi nagoar ho
9.34: Ae aiman lane oalo، ain ahl ktab ke aksr عlmaء aor droishon ka hal ih he kh oh logon ke mal batl triqon se khate hin aor anhin allh ki rah se rokte hin drdnak sza ki khosh khbri do an ko jo sone aor chandi jmع kr ke rkhte hin aor anhin khda ki rah min khrch nhin krte
9.35: Aik dn aaee ga kh asi sone chandi pr jhnm ki aag dhkaei jaee gi aor phr asi se an logon ki pishanion aor phloؤn aor pithon ko dagha jaee ga ih he oh khzanh jo tm ne apne lie jmع kia tha، lo ab apni smiti hoei dolt ka mzh chkho
9.36: Hqiqt ih he kh mhinon ki tعdad jb se allh ne aasman o zmin ko pida kia he allh ke noshte min barh hi he، aor an min se char mhine hram hin ihi thik zabth he lhaza an char mhinon min apne aopr zlm nh kro aor mshrkon se sb ml kr lro js trh oh sb ml kr tm se lrte hin aor jan rkho kh allh mtqion hi ke sath he
9.37: Nsi to kfr min aik mzid kafranh hrkt he js se ih kafr log gmrahi min mbtla kie jate hin ksi sal aik mhine ko hlal kr lite hin aor ksi sal aus ko hram kr dite hin، takh allh ke hram kie hoee mhinon ki tعdad pori bhi kr din aor allh ka hram kia hoa hlal bhi kr lin an ke bre aعmal an ke lie khoshnma bna die gee hin aor allh mnkrin hq ko hdait nhin dia krta
9.38: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، tmhin kia ho gia kh jb tm se allh ki rah min nklne ke lie kha gia to tm zmin se chmt kr rh gee? Kia tm ne aakhrt ke mqablh min dnia ki zndgi ko psnd kr lia? Aisa he to tmhin mعlom ho kh dnioi zndgi ka ih sb srosaman aakhrt min bht thora nkle ga
9.39: Tm nh atho ge to khda tmhin drdnak sza de ga، aor tmhari jgh ksi aor groh ko athaee ga، aor tm khda ka kchh bhi nh bgar sko ge، oh hr chiz pr qdrt rkhta he
9.40: Tm ne agr nbiؐ ki mdd nh ki to kchh proa nhin، allh aus ki mdd as oqt kr chka he jb kafron ne ase nkal dia tha، jb oh srf do min ka dosra tha، jb oh donon ghar min the، jb oh apni sathi se khh rha tha kh "ghm nh kr، allh hmare sath he" aus oqt allh ne as pr apni trf se skon qlb nazl kia aor as ki mdd aise lshkron se ki jo tm ko nzr nh aate the aor kafron ka bol nicha kr dia aor allh ka bol to aoncha hi he، allh zbrdst aor dana o bina he
9.41: Nklo، khoah hlke ho ia bojhl، aor jhad kro allh ki rah min apne malon aor apni janon ke sath، ih tmhare lie bhtr he agr tm jano
9.42: Ae nbiؐ، agr faedh shl alhsol hota aor sfr hlka hota to oh zror tmhare pichhe chlne pr aamadh ho jate، mgr an pr to ih rasth bht kthn ho gia ab oh khda ki qsm kha kha kr khin ge kh agr hm chl skte to iqinaan tmhare sath chlte oh apne aap ko hlakt min dal rhe hin allh khob janta he kh oh jhote hin
9.43: Ae nbiؐ، allh tmhin mعaf kre، tm ne kion anhin rkhst de di? (tmhin chahie tha kh khod rkhst nh dite) takh tm pr khl jata kh kon log sche hin aor jhoton ko bhi tm jan lite
9.44: Jo log allh aor roz aakhr pr aiman rkhte hin oh to kbhi tm se ih drkhoast nh krin ge kh anhin apni jan o mal ke sath jhad krne se mعaf rkha jaee allh mtqion ko khob janta he
9.45: Aisi drkhoastin to srf ohi log krte hin jo allh aor roz aakhr pr aiman nhin rkhte، jn ke dlon min shk he aor oh apne shk hi min mtrdd ho rhe hin
9.46: Agr oaqعi an ka aradh nklne ka hota to oh as ke lie kchh tiari krte likn allh ko an ka athna psndhi nh tha، as lie as ne anhin sst kr dia aor khh dia kh bith rho bithne oalon ke sath
9.47: Agr oh tmhare sath nklte to tmhare andr khrabi ke soa ksi chiz ka azafh nh krte oh tmhare drmian ftnh prdazi ke lie dor dhop krte، aor tmhare groh ka hal ih he kh abhi aus min bht se aise log mojod hin jo aun ki batin kan lga kr snte hin، allh ain zalmon ko khob janta he
9.48: As se phle bhi ain logon ne ftnh angizi ki koshshin ki hin aor tmhin nakam krne ke lie ih hr trh ki tdbiron ka alt phir kr chke hin ihan tk kh an ki mrzi ke khlaf hq aa gia aor allh ka kam ho kr rha
9.49: An min se koei he jo khta he kh "mjhe rkhst de dijie aor mjh ko ftne min nh dalie" sn rkho! Ftne hi min to ih log pre hoee hin aor jhnm ne an kafron ko ghir rkha he
9.50: Tmhara bhla hota he to anhin rnj hota he aor tm pr koei msibt aati he to ih mnh phir kr khosh khosh pltte hin aor khte jate hin kh achha hoa hm ne phle hi apna mعamlh thik kr lia tha
9.51: An se kho "hmin hrgz koei (braei ia bhlaei) nhin phnchti mgr oh jo allh ne hmare lie lkh di he allh hi hmara molia he، aor ahl aiman ko asi pr bhrosh krna chahie"
9.52: An se kho، "tm hmare mعamlh min js chiz ke mntzr ho oh as ke soa aor kia he kh do bhlaeion min se aik bhlaei he aor hm tmhare mعamlh min js chiz ke mntzr hin oh ih he kh allh khod tm ko sza dita he ia hmare hathon dloata he? Achha to ab tm bhi antzar kro aor hm bhi tmhare sath mntzr hin"
9.53: An se kho "tm apne mal khoah razi khoshi khrch kro ia bkraht، bhr hal oh qbol nh kie jaein ge kionkh tm fasq log ho"
9.54: An ke die hoee mal qbol nh hone ki koei ojh as ke soa nhin he kh anhon ne allh aor as ke rsol se kfr kia he، nmaz ke lie aate hin to ksmsate hoee aate hin aor rah khda min khrch krte hin to badl nakhoasth khrch krte hin
9.55: Ain ke mal o dolt aor an ki ksrt aolad ko dikh kr dhokh nh khaؤ، allh to ih chahta he kh ainhi chizon ke zriعh se an ko dnia ki zndgi min bhi mbtlaee عzab kre aor ih jan bhi din to ankar hq hi ki halt min din
9.56: Oh khda ki qsm kha kha kr khte hin kh hm tmhi min se hin، halankh oh hrgz tm min se nhin hin asl min to oh aise log hin jo tm se khof zdh hin
9.57: Agr oh koei jaee pnah palin ia koei khoh ia ghs bithne ki jgh، to bhag kr aus min ja chhpin
9.58: Ae nbiؐ، an min se bعz log sdqat ki tqsim min tm pr aعtrazat krte hin agr as mal min se anhin kchh de dia jaee to kho sh ho jaein، aor nh dia jaee to bgrne lgte hin
9.59: Kia achha hota kh allh aor rsolؐ ne jo kchh bhi anhin dia tha as pr oh razi rhte aor khte kh "allh hmare lie kafi he، oh apne fzl se hmin bht kchh de ga aor as ka rsol bhi hm pr عnait frmaee ga، hm allh hi ki trf nzr jmaee hoee hin"
9.60: Ih sdqat to drasl fqiron aor mskinon ke lie hin aor aun logon ke lie jo sdqat ke kam pr mamor hon، aor aun ke lie jn ki talif qlb mtlob ho niz ih grdnon ke chhrane aor qrz daron ki mdd krne min aor rah khda min aor msafr noazi min astعmal krne ke lie hin aik frizh he allh ki trf se aor allh sb kchh janne oala aor dana o bina he
9.61: An min se kchh log hin jo apni baton se nbi ko dkh dite hin aor khte hin kh ih shkhs kanon ka kcha he kho، "oh tmhari bhlaei ke lie aisa he، allh pr aiman rkhta he aor ahl aiman pr aعtmad krta he aor srasr rhmt he an logon ke lie jo tm min se aimandar hin aor jo log allh ke rsol ko dkh dite hin an ke lie drdnak sza he"
9.62: Ih log tmhare samne qsmin khate hin takh tmhin razi krin، halankh agr ih momn hin to allh aor rsol as ke ziadh hq dar hin kh ih an ko razi krne ki fkr krin
9.63: Kia anhin mعlom nhin he kh jo allh aor as ke rsol ka mqablh krta he as ke lie dozkh ki aag he js min oh hmishh rhe ga ih bht bri rsoaei he
9.64: Ih mnafq dr rhe hin kh khin mslmanon pr koei aisi sort nazl nh ho jaee jo an ke dlon ke bhid khol kr rkh de ae nbiؐ، an se kho، "aor mzaq araؤ، allh aus chiz ko khol dine oala he js ke khl jane se tm drte ho"
9.65: Agr an se pochho kh tm kia batin kr rhe the، to jht khh din ge kh hm to hnsi mzaq aor dl lgi kr rhe the an se kho، "kia tmhari hnsi dl lgi allh aor aus ki aaiat aor as ke rsol hi ke sath thi?
9.66: Ab عzrat nh trasho، tm ne aiman lane ke bعd kfr kia he، agr hm ne tm min se aik groh ko mعaf kr bhi dia to dosre groh ko to hm zror sza din ge kionkh oh mjrm he"
9.67: Mnafq mrd aor mnafq عortin sb aik dosre ke hm rng hin braei ka hkm dite hin aor bhlaei se mnع krte hin aor apne hath khir se roke rkhte hin ih allh ko bhol gee to allh ne bhi anhin bhla dia iqinaan ih mnafq hi fasq hin
9.68: An mnafq mrdon aor عorton aor kafron ke lie allh ne aatsh dozkh ka oعdh kia he js min oh hmishh rhin ge، ohi an ke lie mozon he an pr allh ki phtkar he aor an ke lie qaem r hne oala عzab he
9.69: Tm logon ke rng dhng ohi hin jo tmhare pish roؤn ke the oh tm se ziadh zor aaor aor tm se brh kr mal aor aolad oale the phr anhon ne dnia min apne hsh ke mze lot lie aor tm ne bhi apne hse ke mze asi trh lote jise anhon ne lote the، aor oisi hi bhson min tm bhi pre jisi bhson min oh pre the، so an ka anjam ih hoa kh dnia aor aakhrt min an ka sb kia dhra zaeع ho gia aor ohi khsare min hin
9.70: Kia ain logon ko apne pish roؤn ki tarikh nhin phnchi? Nohؑ ki qom، عad، smod، abrahimؑ ki qom، mdin ke log aor oh bstian jnhin alt dia gia aun ke rsol an ke pas khli khli nshanian le kr aaee، phr ih allh ka kam nh tha kh an pr zlm krta mgr oh aap hi apne aopr zlm krne oale the
9.71: Momn mrd aor momn عortin، ih sb aik dosre ke rfiq hin، bhlaei ka hkm dite aor braei se rokte hin، nmaz qaem krte hin، zkoaۃ dite hin aor allh aor as ke rsol ki ataعt krte hin ih oh log hin jn pr allh ki rhmt nazl ho kr rhe gi، iqinaan allh sb pr ghalb aor hkim o dana he
9.72: An momn mrdon aor عorton se allh ka oعdh he kh anhin aise bagh de ga jn ke niche nhrin bhti hon gi aor oh an min hmishh rhin ge an sda bhar baghon min an ke lie pakizh qiam gahin hon gi، aor sb se brh kr ih kh allh ki khoshnodi anhin hasl hogi ihi bri kamiabi he
9.73: Ae nbiؐ، kfar aor mnafqin donon ka pori qot se mqablh kro aor an ke sath skhti se pish aaؤ aakhr kar an ka thkana jhnm he aor oh bdtrin jaee qrar he
9.74: Ih log khda ki qsm kha kha kr khte hin kh hm ne oh bat nhin khi، halankh anhon ne zror oh kafranh bat khi he oh aslam lane ke bعd kfr ke mrtkb hoee aor anhon ne oh kchh krne ka aradh kia jse kr nh ske ih an ka sara ghsh asi bat pr he na kh allh aor as ke rsol ne apne fzl se an ko ghni kr dia he! Ab agr ih apni as rosh se baz aa jaein to anhi ke lie bhtr he aor agr ih baz nh aaee to allh an ko nhait drd nak sza de ga، dnia min bhi aor aakhrt min bhi، aor zmin min koei nhin jo ain ka hmaiti aor mddgar ho
9.75: An min se bعz aise bhi hin jnhon ne allh se عhd kia tha kh agr as ne apne fzl se hm ko noaza to hm khirat krin ge aor salh bn kr rhin ge
9.76: Mgr jb allh ne apne fzl se an ko dolt mnd kr dia to oh bkhl pr atr aaee aor apne عhd se aise phre kh anhin as ki proa tk nhin he
9.77: Ntijh ih nkla kh an ki ais bd عhdi ki ojh se jo anhon ne allh ke sath ki، aor as jhot ki ojh se jo oh bolte rhe، allh ne an ke dlon min nfaq btha dia jo as ke hzor an ki pishi ke dn tk an ka pichha nh chhore ga
9.78: Kia ih log jante nhin hin kh allh ko an ke mkhfi raz aor an ki poshidh srgoshian tk mعlom hin aor oh tmam ghib ki baton se pori trh bakhbr he?
9.79: (oh khob janta he aun knjos dolt mndon ko) jo brza o rghbt dine oale ahl aiman ki mali qrbanion pr batin chhantte hin aor an logon ka mzaq arate hin jn ke pas (rah khda min dine ke lie) aus ke soa kchh nhin he jo oh apne aopr mshqt brdasht kr ke dite hin allh ain mzaq arane oalon ka mzaq arata he aor an ke lie drd nak sza he
9.80: Ae nbiؐ، tm khoah aise logon ke lie mعafi ki drkhoast kro ia nh kro، agr tm str mrtbh bhi anhin mعaf krdine ki drkhoast kro ge to allh anhin hrgz mعaf nh kre ga as lie kh anhon ne allh aor as ke rsol ke sath kfr kia he، aor allh fasq logon ko rah njat nhin dkhata
9.81: Jn logon ko pichhe rh jane ki ajazt de di gei thi oh allh ke rsol ka sath nh dine aor ghr bithe rhne pr khosh hoee aor anhin goara nh hoa kh allh ki rah min jan o mal se jhad krin anhon ne logon se kha kh "as skht grmi min nh nklo" an se kho kh jhnm ki aag as se ziadh grm he، kash anhin as ka shعor hota
9.82: Ab chahie kh ih log hnsna km krin aor roein ziadh، as lie kh jo bdi ih kmate rhe hin as ki jza aisi hi he (kh anhin as pr rona chahie)
9.83: Agr allh an ke drmian tmhin oaps le jaee aor aaendh an min se koei groh jhad ke lie nklne ki tm se ajazt mange to saf khh dina kh، "ab tm mire sath hrgz nhin chl skte aor nh miri mعit min ksi dshmn se lr skte ho، tm ne phle bith r hne ko psnd kia tha to ab ghr bithne oalon hi ke sath bithe rho"
9.84: Aor aaendh an min se jo koei mre as ki nmaz jnazh bhi tm hrgz nh prhna aor nh kbhi as ki qbr pr khre hona kionkh anhon ne allh aor as ke rsolؐ ke sath kfr kia he aor oh mre hin as hal min kh oh fasq the
9.85: An ki maldari aor an ki ksrt aolad tm ko dhoke min nh dale allh ne to aradh kr lia he kh ais mal o aolad ke zriعh se an ko asi dnia min sza de aor an ki janin as hal min nklin kh oh kafr hon
9.86: Jb kbhi koei sorۃ as mzmon ki nazl hoei kh allh ko mano aor as ke rsol ke sath jhad kro to tm ne dikha kh jo log an min se sahb mqdrt the ohi tm se drkhoast krne lge kh anhin jhad ki shrkt se mعaf rkha jaee aor anhon ne kha kh hmin chhor dijie kh hm bithne oalon ke sath rhin
9.87: An logon ne ghr bithne oalion min shaml hona psnd kia aor an ke dlon pr thph lga dia gia، as lie an ki smjh min ab kchh nhin aata
9.88: Bkhlaf as ke rsolؐ ne aor an logon ne jo rsolؐ ke sath aiman laee the a pni jan o mal se jhad kia aor ab sari bhlaeian anhi ke lie hin aor ohi flah pane oale hin
9.89: Allh ne an ke lie aise bagh tiar rkhe hin jn ke niche nhrin bh rhi hin، an min oh hmishh rhin ge ih he عzim alshan kamiabi
9.90: Bdoi عrbon min se bhi bht se log aaee jnhon ne عzr kie takh anhin bhi pichhe rh jane ki ajazt di jaee ais trh bith rhe oh log jnhon ne allh aor as ke rsol se aiman ka jhota عhd kia tha an bdoion min se jn logon ne kfr ka triqh akhtiar kia he عnqrib oh drdnak sza se dochar hon ge
9.91: Zعif aor bimar log aor oh log jo shrkt jhad ke lie rah nhin pate، agr pichhe rh jaein to koei hrj nhin jbkh oh khlos dl ke sath allh aor as ke rsolؐ ke ofadar hon aise mhsnin pr aعtraz ki koei gnjaesh nhin he aor allh drgzr krne oala aor rhm frmane oala he
9.92: Asi trh aun logon pr bhi koei aعtraz ka moqع nhin he jnhon ne khod aa kr tm se drkhoast ki thi kh hmare lie soarian bhm phnchaei jaein، aor jb tm ne kha kh min tmhare lie soarion ka antzam nhin krskta to oh mjboraan oaps gee aor hal ih tha kh an ki aankhon se aanso jari the aor anhin as bat ka bra rnj tha kh oh apne khrch pr shrik jhad hone ki mqdrt nhin rkhte
9.93: Albth aعtraz an logon pr he jo maldar hin aor phr bhi tm se drkhoastin krte hin kh anhin shrkt jhad se mعaf rkha jaee anhon ne ghr bithne oalion min shaml hona psnd kia aor allh ne an ke dlon pr thph lga dia، as lie ab ih kchh nhin jante (kh allh ke han an ki rosh ka kia ntijh nklne oala he)
9.94: Tm jb plt kr an ke pas phncho ge to ih trh trh ke عzrat pish krin ge mgr tm saf khh dina kh "bhane nh kro، hm thari ksi bat ka aعtbar nh krin ge allh ne hm ko tmhare halat bta die hin ab allh aor as ka rsol tmhare trz عml ko dikhe ga phr tm as ki trf pltaee jaؤ ge jo khle aor chhpe sb ka janne oala he aor oh tmhin bta de ga kh tm kia kchh krte rhe ho"
9.95: Tmhari oapsi pr ih tmhare samne qsmin khaein ge takh tm an se srf nzr kro to be shk tm an se srf nzr hi kr lo، kionkh ih gndgi hin aor an ka asli mqam jhnm he jo an ki kmaei ke bdle min anhin nsib hogi
9.96: Ih tmhare samne qsmin khaein ge kh takh tm an se razi ho jaؤ halankh agr tm an se razi ho bhi gee to allh hrgz aise fasq logon se razi nh hoga
9.97: Ih bdoi عrb kfr o nfaq min ziadh skht hin aor an ke mعamlh min as amr ke amkanat ziadh hin kh as din ke hdod se na oaqf rhin jo allh ne apne rsol pr nazl kia he allh sb kchh janta he aor hkim o dana he
9.98: An bdoion min aise aise log mojod hin jo rah khda min kchh khrch krte hin to ase apne aopr zbrdsti ki chti smjhte hin aor tmhare hq min zmanh ki grdshon ka antzar kr rhe hin (kh tm ksi chkr min phnso to oh apni grdn se as nzam ki ataعt ka qladh atar phinkin js min tm ne anhin ks dia he) halankh bdi ka chkr khod anhi pr mslt he aor allh sb kchh snta aor janta he
9.99: Aor anhi bdoion min kchh log aise bhi hin jo allh aor roz aakhr pr aiman rkhte hin aor jo kchh khrch krte hin ause allh ke tqrb ka aor rsolؐ ki trf se rhmt ki dعaein line ka zriعh bnate hin han! Oh zror an ke lie tqrb ka zriعh he aor allh zror an ko apni rhmt min dakhl kriga، iqinaan allh drgzr krne oala aor rhm frmane oala he
9.100: Oh mhajr o ansar jnhon ne sb se phle dعot aiman pr lbik khne min sbqt ki، niz oh jo bعd min rastbazi ke sath pichhe aaee، allh an se razi hoa aor oh allh se razi hoee، allh ne an ke lie aise bagh mhia kr rkhe hin jn ke niche nhrin bhti hon gi aor oh an min hmishh rhin ge، ihi عzim alshan kamiabi he
9.101: Tmhare grd o pish jo bdoi rhte hin an min bht se mnafq hin aor asi trh khod mdinh ke bashndon min bhi mnafq mojod hin jo nfaq min taq ho gee hin tm anhin nhin jante، hm an ko jante hin qrib he oh oqt jb hm an ko dohri sza din ge، phr oh ziadh bri sza ke lie oaps laee jaein ge
9.102: Kchh aor log hin jnhon ne apne qsoron ka aعtraf kr lia he an ka عml mkhlot he، kchh nik he aor kchh bd، bعid nhin kh allh an pr phr mhrban ho jaee kionkh oh drgzr krne oala aor rhm frmane oala he
9.103: Ae nbiؐ، tm an ke amoal min se sdqh le kr anhin pak kro aor (niki ki rah min) anhin brhaؤ، aor an ke hq min dعaee rhmt kro kionkh tmhari dعa an ke lie ojh tskin hogi، allh sb kchh snta aor janta he
9.104: Kia ain logon ko mعlom nhin he kh oh allh hi he jo apne bndon ki tobh qbol krta he aor an ki khirat ko qbolit عta frmata he، aor ih kh allh bht mعaf krne oala aor rhim he?
9.105: Aor ae nbiؐ، ain logon se khdo kh tm عml kro، allh aor as ka rsol aor momnin sb dikhin ge kh tmhara trz عml ab kia rhta he phr tm aus ki trf pltaee jaؤ ge jo khle aor chhpe sb ko janta he aor oh tmhin bta de ga kh tm kia krte rhe ho
9.106: Kchh dosr e log hin jn ka mعamlh abhi khda ke hkm pr thira hoa he، chahe anhin sza de aor chahe aun pr az sr no mhrban ho jaee allh sb kchh janta he aor hkim o dana he
9.107: Kchh aor log hin jnhon ne aik msjd bnaei ais ghrz ke lie kh (dعot hq ko) nqsan phnchaein، aor (khda ki bndgi krne ke bjaee) kfr krin، aor ahl aiman min phot dalin، aor (as bzahr عbadt gah ko) aus shkhs ke lie kmin gah bnaein jo as se phle khda aor rsolؐ ke khlaf br sr pikar ho chka he oh zror qsmin kha kha kr khin ge kh hmara aradh to bhlaei ke soa ksi dosri chiz ka nh tha mgr allh goah he kh oh qtعi jhote hin
9.108: Tm hrgz as عmart min khre nh hona jo msjd aol roz se tqoia pr qaem ki gei thi ohi as ke lie ziadh mozon he kh tm as min (عbad t ke lie) khre ho، as min aise log hin jo pak rhna psnd krte hin aor allh ko pakizgi akhtiar krne oale hi psnd hin
9.109: Phr tmhara kia khial he kh bhtr ansan oh he js ne apni عmart ki bniad khda ke khof aor as ki rza ki tlb pr rkhi ho ia oh js ne apni عmart aik oadi ki khokhli be sbat kgr pr athaei aor oh ase le kr sidhi jhnm ki aag min ja gri? Aise zalm logon ko allh kbhi sidhi rah nhin dkhata
9.110: Ih عmart jo anhon ne bnaei he، hmishh an ke dlon min be iqini ki jr bni rhe gi (js ke nklne ki ab koei sort nhin) bjz as ke kh an ke dl hi parh parh ho jaein allh nhait bakhbr aor hkim o dana he
9.111: Hqiqt ih he kh allh ne momnon se an ke nfs aor an ke mal jnt ke bdle khrid lie hin oh allh ki rah min lrte aor marte aor mrte hin an se (jnt ka oعdh) allh ke zme aik pkhth oعdh he toraۃ aor anjil aor qraan min aor kon he jo allh se brh kr apne عhd ka pora krne oala ho? Ps khoshian mnaؤ apne as sode pr jo tm ne khda se chka lia he، ihi sb se bri kamiabi he
9.112: Allh ki trf bar bar pltne oale، aus ke bndgi bja lane oale، aus ki tعrif ke gn gane oale، aus ki khatr zmin min grdsh krne oale، aus ke aage rkoع aor sjde krne oale، niki ka hkm dine oale، bdi se rokne oale، aor allh ke hdod ki hfazt krne oale، (as shan ke hote hin oh momn jo allh se khrid o frokht ka ih mعamlh te krte hin) aor ae nbiؐ an momnon ko khosh khbri de do
9.113: Nbiؐ ko aor aun logon ko jo aiman laee hin، ziba nhin he kh mshrkon ke lie mghfrt ki dعa krin، chahe oh an ke rshth dar hi kion nh hon، jbkh an pr ih bat khl chki he kh oh jhnm ke msthq hin
9.114: Abrahimؑ ne apne bap ke lie jo dعaee mghfrt ki thi oh to aus oعde ki ojh se thi jo as ne apne bap se kia tha، mgr jb as pr ih bat khl gei kh as ka bap khda ka dshmn he to oh as se bizar ho gia، hq ih he kh abrahimؑ bra rqiq alqlb o khdatrs aor brdbar aadmi tha
9.115: Allh ka ih triqh nhin he kh logon ko hdait dine ke bعd phr gmrahi min mbtla kre jb tk kh anhin saf saf bta nh de kh anhin kn chizon se bchna chahie drhqiqt allh hr chiz ka عlm rkhta he
9.116: Aor ih bhi oaqعh he kh allh hi ke qbzh min aasman o zmin ki sltnt he، asi ke akhtiar min zndgi o mot he، aor tmhara koei hami o mddgar aisanhin he jo tmhin as se bcha ske
9.117: Allh ne mعaf kr dia nbiؐ ko aor an mhajrin o ansar ko jnhon ne bri tngi ke oqt min nbiؐ ka sath dia agr chh an min se kchh logon ke dl kji ki trf mael ho chke the (mgr jb anhon ne as kji ka atbaع nh kia blkh nbiؐ ka sath hi dia to) allh ne anhin mعaf kr dia، be shk aus ka mعamlh ain logon ke sath shfqt o mhrbani ka he
9.118: Aor aun tinon ko bhi as ne mعaf kia jn ke mعamlh ko mltoi kr dia gia tha jb zmin apni sari osعt ke baojod an pr tng ho gei aor an ki apni janin bhi an pr bar hone lgin aor anhon ne jan lia kh allh se bchne ke lie koei jaee pnah khod allh hi ke damn rhmt ke soa nhin he، to allh apni mhrbani se an ki trf plta takh oh as ki trf plt aaein، iqinaan oh bra mعaf krne oala aor rhim he
9.119: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، allh se dro aor sche logon ka sath do
9.120: Mdine ke bashndon aor grd o noah ke bdoion ko ih hrgz zbia nh tha kh allh ke rsol ko chhor kr ghr bith rhte aor as ki trf se be proa ho kr apne apne nfs ki fkr min lg jate as lie kh aisa kbhi nh hoga kh allh ki rah min bhok pias aor jsmani mshqt ki koei tklif oh jhilin، aor mnkrin hq ko jo rah nagoar he aus pr koei qdm oh athaein، aor ksi dshmn se (عdaot hq ka) ka koei antqam oh lin aor as ke bdle an ke hq min aik عml salh nh lkha jaee iqinaan allh ke han mhsnon ka hq alkhdmt mara nhin jata he
9.121: Asi trh ih bhi kbhi nh hoga kh (rah khda min) thora ia bht koei khrch oh athaein aor (sعi jhad min) koei oadi oh par krin aor an ke hq min ase lkh nh lia jaee takh allh an ke as achhe karname ka slh anhin عta kre
9.122: Aor ih kchh zrori nh tha kh ahl aiman sare ke sare hi nkl khre hote، mgr aisa kion nh hoa kh an ki aabadi ke hr hsh min se kchh log nkl kr aate aor din ki smjh pida krte aor oaps ja kr apne عlaqe ke bashndon ko khbrdar krte takh oh (ghir mslmanh rosh se) prhiz krte
9.123: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، jng kro aun mnkrin hq se jo tm se qrib hin aor chahie kh oh tmhare andr skhti paein، aor jan lo kh allh mtqion ke sath he
9.124: Jb koei nei sort nazl hoti he to an min se bعz log (mzaq ke tor pr mslmanon se) pochhte hin kh "kho، tm min se ks ke aiman min as se azafh hoa?" (as ka joab ih he kh) jo log aiman laee hin an ke aiman min to fi aloaqع (hr nazl hone oali sort ne) azafh hi kia he aor oh as se dlshad hin
9.125: Albth jn logon ke dlon ko (nfaq ka) rog lga hoa tha aun ki sabq njast pr (hr nei sort ne) aik aor njast ka azafh kr dia aor oh mrte dm tk kfr hi min mbtla rhe
9.126: Kia ih log dikhte nhin kh hr sal aik do mrtbh ih aazmaesh min dale jate hin? Mgr ais pr bhi nh tobh krte hin nh koei sbq lite hin
9.127: Jb koei sort nazl hoti he to ih log aankhon hi aankhon min aik dosre se batin krte hin kh khin koei tm ko dikh to nhin rha he، phr chpke se nkl bhagte hin allh ne an ke dl phir die hin kionkh ih nasmjh log hin
9.128: Dikho! Tm logon ke pas aik rsol aaia he jo khod tm hi min se he، tmhara nqsan min prna as pr shaq he، tmhari flah ka oh hris he، aiman lane oalon ke lie oh shfiq aor rhim he
9.129: Ab agr ih log tm se mnh phirte hin to ae nbiؐ، an se khdo kh "mire lie allh bs krta he، koei mعbod nhin mgr oh، ausi pr min ne bhrosh kia aor oh malk he عrsh عzim ka"

10.1: A l r، ih aus ktab ki aaiat hin jo hkmt o dansh se lbriz he
10.2: Kia logon ke lie ih aik عjib bat ho gei kh hm ne khod aunhi min se aik aadmi ko asharh kia kh (ghflt min pre hoee) logon ko chonka de aor jo man lin an ko khoshkhbri dide kh an ke lie aun ke rb ke pas schi عzt o srfrazi he? (kia ihi oh bat he js pr) mnkrin ne kha kh ih shkhs to khla jadogr he?
10.3: Hqiqt ih he kh tmhara rb ohi khda he js ne aasmanon aor zmin ko chh dnon min pida kia، phr tkht hkomt pr jloh gr hoa aor kaenat ka antzam chla rha he koei shfaعt (sfarsh) krne oala nhin ailّa ih kh as ki ajazt ke bعd shfaعt kre ihi allh tmhara rb he lhaza tm ausi ki عbadt kro phr kia tm hosh min nh aaؤ ge?
10.4: Asi ki trf tm sb ko plt kr jana he، ih allh ka pka oعdh he be shk pidaesh ki abtda ohi krta he، phr ohi dobarh pida kre ga، takh jo log aiman laee aor jnhon ne nik عml kie an ko pore ansaf ke sath jza de، aor jnhon ne kfr ka triqh akhtiar kia oh kholta hoa pani piin aor drdnak sza bhgtin aus ankar hq ki padash min jo oh krte rhe
10.5: Ohi he js ne suorj ko ajiala bnaia aor chand ko chmk di aor chand ke ghtne brhne ki mnzlin thik thik mqrr kr din takh tm aus se brson aor tarikhon ke hsab mعlom kro allh ne ih sb kchh (khil ke tor pr nhin blkh) ba mqsd hi bnaia he oh apni nshanion ko khol khol kr pish kr rha he aun logon ke lie jo عlm rkhte hin
10.6: Iqinaan rat aor dn ke alt phir min aor hr aus chiz min jo allh ne zmin aor aasmanon min pida ki he، nshanian hin aun logon ke lie jo (ghlt bini o ghlt roi se) bchna chahte hin
10.7: Hqiqt ih he kh jo log hm se mlne ki toqع nhin rkhte aor dnia ki zndgi hi pr razi aor mtmen ho gee hin، aor jo log hmari nshanion se ghafl hin
10.8: Aun ka aakhri thkanh jhnm ho ga aun braeion ki padash min jn ka aktsab oh (apne as ghlt عqide aor ghlt trz عml ki ojh se) krte rhe
10.9: Aor ih bhi hqiqt he kh jo log aiman laee (iعni jnhon ne aun sdaqton ko qbol kr lia jo as ktab min pish ki gei hin) aor nik aعmal krte rhe anhin aun ka rb aun ke aiman ki ojh se sidhi rah chlaee ga، nعmt bhri jnton min an ke niche nhrin bhin gi
10.10: Ohan an ki sda ih hogi kh “pak he to ae khda، " aun ki dعa ih hogi kh “slamti ho " aor an ki hr bat ka khatmh as pr hoga kh “sari tعrif allh rb alعalmin hi ke lie he "
10.11: Agr khin allh logon ke sath bra mعamlh krne min bhi atni hi jldi krta jtni oh dnia ki bhlaei mangne min jldi krte hin to an ki mhlt عml kbhi ki khtm kr di gei hoti (mgr hmara ih triqh nhin he) as lie hm aun logon ko jo hm se mlne ki toqع nhin rkhte aun ki srkshi min bhtkne ke lie chhuot de dite hin
10.12: Ansan ka hal ih he kh jb as pr koei skht oqt aata he to khre aor bithe aor lite hm ko pkarta he، mgr jb hm as ki msibt tal dite hin to aisa chl nklta he kh goia as ne kbhi apne ksi bure oqt pr hm ko pkara hi nh tha as trh hd se gzr jane oalon ke lie an ke krtot khoshnma bna die gee hin
10.13: Logo، tm se phle ki qomon ko (jo apne apne zmanh min brsr عroj thin) hm ne hlak kr dia jb anhon ne zlm ki rosh akhtiar ki aor aun ke rsuol aun ke pas khuli khuli nshanian le kr aaee aor anhon ne aiman la kr hi nh dia as trh hm mjrmon ko an ke jraem ka bdlh dia krte hin
10.14: Ab an ke bعd hm ne tm ko zmin min an ki jgh di he takh dikhin tm kise عml krte ho
10.15: Jb anhin hmari saf saf batin sunaei jati hin to oh log jo hm se mlne ki toqع nhin rkhte، khte hin kh “ais ke bjaee koei aor qraan laؤ ia as min kchh trmim kro " ae mhmdؐ، an se kho “mira ih kam nhin he kh apni trf se as min koei tghir o tbّdl kr lon min to bs aus ohi ka piro hon jo mire pas bhiji jati he agr min apne rb ki nafrmani kron to mjhe aik bre holnak dn ke عzab ka dr he"
10.16: Aor kho “agr allh ki mshiّt nh hoti to min ih qraan tmhin kbhi nh snata aor allh tmhin as ki khbr tk nh dita aakhr as se phle min aik عmr tmhare drmian gzar chka hon، kia tm عql se kam nhin lite?
10.17: Phr aus se brh kr zalm aor kon ho ga jo aik jhoti bat ghr kr allh ki trf mnsuob kre ia allh ki oaqعi aaiat ko jhuota qrar de iqinaan mjrm kbhi flah nhin pa skte "
10.18: Ih log allh ke soa aun ki prstsh kr rhe hin jo an ko nh nqsan phncha skte hin nh nfع، aor khte ih hin kh ih allh ke han hmare sfarshi hin ae mhmdؐ، an se kho “kia tm allh ko aus bat ki khbr dite ho jse oh nh aasmanon min janta he nh zmin min?" pak he oh aor bala o brtr he aus shrk se jo ih log krte hin
10.19: Abtdaءan sare ansan aik hi amّt the، bعd min anhon ne mkhtlf عqide aor mslk bna lie، aor agr tire rb ki trf se phle hi aik bat te nh kr li gei hoti to js chiz min oh bahm akhtlaf kr rhe hin as ka fislh kr dia jata
10.20: Aor ih jo oh khte hin kh ais nbiؐ pr as ke rb ki trf se koei nshani kion nh atari gei، to an se kho “ghib ka malk o mkhtar to allh hi he، achha، antzar kro، min bhi tmhare sath antzar krta hon "
10.21: Logon ka hal ih he kh msibt ke bعd jb hm an ko rhmt ka mza chkhate hin to foraan hi oh hmari nshanion ke mعamlh min chal bazian shroع kr dite hin an se kho “allh apni chal min tm se ziadh tiz he، as ke frshte tmhari sb mkّarion ko qlm bnd kr rhe hin "
10.22: Oh allh hi he jo tm ko khshki aor tri min chlata he chnanchh jb tm kshtion min soar ho kr badi moafq pr frhan o shadan sfr kr rhe hote ho aor phr ikaik badi mkhalf ka zor hota he aor hr trf se mojon ke thpire lgte hin aor msafr smjh lite hin kh tofan min ghr gee، aus oqt sb apne din ko allh hi ke lie khals kr ke as se duعaein mangte hin kh “agr to ne hm ko as bla se njat de di to hm shkr gzar bnde bnin ge"
10.23: Mgr jb oh an ko bcha lita he to phr ohi log hq se mnhrf ho kr zmin min bghaot krne lgte hin logo، tmhari ih bghaot aulti tmhare hi khlaf pr rhi he dnia ke chnd rozh mze hin (luot lo)، phr hmari trf tmhin plt kr aana he، aus oqt hm tmhin bta din ge kh tm kia kchh krte rhe ho
10.24: Dnia ki ih zndgi (js ke nshe min mst ho kr tm hmari nshanion se ghflt brt rhe ho) as ki msal aisi he jise aasman se hm ne pani brsaia to zmin ki pidaoar، jse aadmi aor janor sb khate hin، khob ghni ho gei، phr عin aus oqt jbkh zmin apni bhar pr thi aor khitian bni snori khri thin aor an ke malk ih smjh rhe the kh ab hm an se faedh authane pr qadr hin، ikaik rat ko ia dn ko hmara hkm aa gia aor hm ne ase aisa ghart kr ke rkh dia kh goia kl ohan kchh tha hi nhin as trh hm nshanian khol khol kr pish krte hin aun logon ke lie jo sochne smjhne oale hin
10.25: (tm ais na paeidar zndgi ke frib min mbtla ho rhe ho) aor allh tmhin dar alslam ki trf dعot de rha he (hdait aus ke akhtiar min he) js ko oh chahta he sidha rasth dkha dita he
10.26: Jn logon ne bhalaei ka triqh akhtiar kia an ke lie bhalaei he aor mzid fzl an ke chhron pr ruo siahi aor zlّt nh chhaee gi oh jnt ke msthq hin jhan oh hmishh rhin ge
10.27: Aor jn logon ne buraeian kmaein an ki buraei jisi he oisa hi oh bdlh paein ge، zlّt an pr mslّt ho gi، koei allh se an ko bchane oala nh ho ga، an ke chhron pr aisi tariki chhaei hoei ho gi jise rat ke siah prde an pr pre hoee hon، oh dozkh ke msthq hin jhan oh hmishh rhin ge
10.28: Js roz hm an sb ko aik sath (apni عdalt min) aktha krin ge، phr an logon se jnhon ne shrk kia he khin ge kh thir jaؤ tm bhi aor tmhare bnaee hoee shrik bhi، phr hm an ke drmian se ajnbiّt ka prdh hta din ge aor an ke shrik khin ge kh “tm hmari عbadt to nhin krte the
10.29: Hmare aor tmhare drmian allh ki goahi kafi he kh (tm agr hmari عbadt krte bhi the to) hm tmhari as عbadt se balkl be khbr the "
10.30: Aus oqt hr shkhs apne kie ka mza chkh le ga، sb apne malk hqiqi ki trf phir die jaein ge aor oh sare jhot jo anhon ne ghr rkhe the gm ho jaein ge
10.31: Ain se puochho، kon tm ko aasman aor zmin se rzq dita he? Ih smaعt aor binaei ki qotin ks ke akhtiar min hin? Kon be jan min se jandar ko aor jandar min se be jan ko nkalta he? Kon ais nzm عalm ki tdbir kr rha he? Oh zror khin ge kh allh kho، phr tm (hqiqt ke khlaf chlne se) prhiz nhin krte?
10.32: Tb to ihi allh tmhara hqiqi rb he phr hq ke bعd gmrahi ke soa aor kia baqi rh gia? Aakhr ih tm kdhr phraee ja rhe ho?
10.33: (ae nbiؐ، dikho) as trh nafrmani akhtiar krne oalon pr tmhare rb ki bat sadq aa gei kh oh man kr nh din ge
10.34: Ain se puochho، tmhare thiraee hoee shrikon min koei he jo tkhliq ki abtda bhi krta ho aor phr as ka aعadh bhi kre? Kho oh srf allh he jo tkhliq ki abtda bhi krta he aor as ka aعadh bhi، phr tm ih ks aulti rah pr chlaee ja rhe ho?
10.35: Ain se puochho tmhare thiraee hoee shrikon min koei aisa bhi he jo hq ki trf rhnmaei krta ho? Kho oh srf allh he jo hq ki trf rhnmaei krta he phr bhla btaؤ، jo hq ki trf rhnmaei krta he oh ais ka ziadh msthq he kh as ki piroi ki jaee ia oh jo khod rah nhin pata ailّa ih kh as ki rhnmaei ki jaee? Aakhr tmhin ho kia gia he، kise aulte alte fisle krte ho?
10.36: Hqiqt ih he kh ain min se aksr log mhz qias o gman ke pichhe chle ja rhe hin، halan kh gman hq ki zrort ko kchh bhi puora nhin krta jo kchh ih kr rhe hin allh aus ko khob janta he
10.37: Aor ih qraan oh chiz nhin he jo allh ki ohi o tعlim ke bghir tsnif kr lia jaee blkh ih to jo kchh phle aa chka tha as ki tsdiq aor alktab ki tfsil he ais min koei shk nhin kh ih frmanroaee kaenat ki trf se he
10.38: Kia ih log khte hin kh pighmbrؐ ne ase khod tsnif kr lia he? Kho، “agr tm apne as alzam min schّe ho to aik suorۃ as jisi tsnif kr laؤ aor aik khda ko chhor kr js js ko bula skte ho mdd ke lie bula lo"
10.39: Asl ih he kh jo chiz ain ke عlm ki grft min nhin aaei aor js ka maal bhi an ke samne nhin aaia، aus ko ainhon ne (khoamkhoah atkl pchّo) jhtla dia aisi trh to an se phle ke log bhi jhtla chke hin phr dikh lo aun zalmon ka kia anjam huoa
10.40: Ain min se kchh log aiman laein ge aor kchh nhin laein ge aor tira rb aun mfsdon ko khob janta he
10.41: Agr ih tjhe jhtlate hin to khh de kh “mira عml mire lie he aor tmhara عml tmhare lie، jo kchh min krta hon as ki zmh dari se tm bari ho aor jo kchh tm kr rhe ho as ki zmh dari se min bari hon"
10.42: An min bht se log hin jo tiri batin snte hin، mgr kia to bhron ko snaeiga khoah oh kchh nh smjhte hon?
10.43: Ain min bht se log hin jo tjhe dikhte hin، mgr kia to andhon ko rah btaee ga khoah anhin kchh nh suojhta ho?
10.44: Hqiqt ih he kh allh logon pr zlm nhin krta، log khod hi apne auopr zlm krte hin
10.45: (aaj ih dunia ki zndgi min mst hin) aor js roz allh ain ko aktha kre ga to (ihi dunia ki zndgi ainhin aisi mhsuos hogi) goia ih mhz aik ghri bhr aaps min jan phchan krne ko thire the (as oqt thqiq ho jaee ga kh) fi aloaqع skht ghate min rhe oh log jnhon ne allh ki mlaqat ko jhtlaia aor hrgz oh rahi rast pr nh the
10.46: Jn bure ntaej se hm anhin dra rhe hin an ka koei hsh hm tire jite ji dkha din ia as se phle hi tjhe autha lin، bhrhal ainhin aana hmari hi trf he aor jo kchh ih kr rhe hin as pr allh goah he
10.47: Hr amّt ke lie aik rsuol he phr jb ksi amّt ke pas aus ka rsuol aa jata he to as ka fislh puore ansaf ke sath chka dia jata he aor as pr zrh brabr zlm nhin kia jata
10.48: Khte hin agr tmhari ih dhmki schّi he to aakhr ih kb puori ho gi?
10.49: Kho “mire akhtiar min khod apna nfع o zrr bhi nhin، sb kchh allh ki mshiّt pr moqof he hr amّt ke lie muhlt ki aik mdّt he، jb ih mdّt puori ho jati he to ghri bhr ki tqdim o takhir bhi nhin hoti"
10.50: Ain se kho، kbhi tm ne ih bhi socha kh agr allh ka عzab achank rat ko ia dn ko aa jaee (to tm kia kr skte ho?) aakhr ih aisi konsi chiz he js ke lie mjrm jldi mchaein?
10.51: Kia jb oh tm pr aa pre asi oqt tm ase mano ge? Ab bchna chahte ho? Halankh tm khod hi as ke jldi aane ka tqaza kr rhe the!
10.52: Phr zalmon se kha jaee ga kh ab hmishh ke عzab ka mza chkho، jo kchh tm kmate rhe ho as ki padash ke soa aor kia bdlh tm ko dia ja skta he?
10.53: Phr puochhte hin kia oaqعi ih sch he jo tm khh rhe ho? Kho “mire rb ki qsm، ih balkl sch he aor tm atna bl bota nhin rkhte kh ase zhuor min aane se rok do"
10.54: Agr hr aus shkhs ke pas js ne zlm kia he، ruoee zmin ki dolt bhi ho to aus عzab se bchne ke lie oh ase fdih min dine pr aamadh ho jaee ga jb ih log as عzab ko dikh lin ge to dl hi dl min pchhtaein ge mgr an ke drmian puore ansaf se fislh kia jaee ga koei zlm an pr nh ho ga
10.55: Sno! Aasmanon aor zmin min jo kchh he allh ka he sun rkho! Allh ka oعdh schّa he mgr aksr ansan jante nhin hin
10.56: Ohi zndgi bkhshta he aor ohi mot dita he aor asi ki trf tm sb ko pltna he
10.57: Logo! Tmhare pas tmhare rb ki trf se nsiht aa gei he ih oh chiz he jo dlon ke amraz ki shfa he aor jo ase qbol kr lin an ke lie rhnmaei aor rhmt he
10.58: Ae nbiؐ، kho kh “ih allh ka fzl aor as ki mhrbani he kh ih chiz as ne bhiji، as pr to logon ko khoshi mnani chahie، ih aun sb chizon se bhtr he jnhin log smit rhe hin"
10.59: Ae nbiؐ، an se kho “tm logon ne kbhi ih bhi socha he kh jo rzq allh ne tmhare lie atara tha as min se tm ne khod hi ksi ko hram aor ksi ko hlal thira lia!" ain se pochho، allh ne tm ko as ki ajazt di thi? Ia tm allh pr aftra kr rhe ho?
10.60: Jo log allh pr ih jhota aftra bandhte hin an ka kia gman he kh qiamt ke roz an se kia mعamlh ho ga? Allh to logon pr mhrbani ki nzr rkhta he mgr aksr ansan aise hin jo shkr nhin krte
10.61: Ae nbiؐ، tm js hal min bhi hote ho aor qraan min se jo kchh bhi sunate ho، aor logo، tm bhi jo kchh krte ho aus sb ke doran min hm tm ko dikhte rhte hin koei zrh brabr chiz aasman aor zmin min aisi nhin he، nh chhoti nh bri، jo tire rb ki nzr se poshidh ho aor aik saf dftr min drj nh ho
10.62: Suno! Jo allh ke dost hin، jo aiman laee aor jnhon ne tqoia ka roih akhtiar kia،
10.63: An ke lie ksi khof aor rnj ka moqع nhin he
10.64: Dunia aor aakhrt donon zndgion min an ke lie bshart hi bshart he allh ki batin bdl nhin sktin ihi bri kamiabi he
10.65: Ae nbiؐ، jo batin ih log tjh pr bnate hin oh tjhe rnjidh nh krin، عzّt sari ki sari khda ke akhtiar min he، aor oh sb kchh snta aor janta he
10.66: Aagah rho! Aasman ke bsne oale hon ia zmin ke، sb se sb allh ke mmlok hin aor jo log allh ke soa kchh (apne khodsakhth) shrikon ko pkar rhe hin oh nire ohm o gman ke piro hin aor mhz qias aaraeian krte hin
10.67: Oh allh hi he js ne tmhare lie rat bnaei kh as min skon hasl kro aor dn ko roshn bnaia as min nshanian hin aun logon ke lie jo (khle kanon se pighmbr ki dعot ko) snte hin
10.68: Logon ne khh dia kh allh ne ksi ko bita bnaia he sbhan allh! Oh to be niaz he، aasmanon aor zmin min jo kchh he sb as ki mlk he tmhare pas as qol ke lie aakhr kia dlil he? Kia tm allh ke mtعlq oh batin khte ho jo tmhare عlm min nhin hin?
10.69: Ae mhmdؐ، khh do kh jo log allh pr jhote aftra bandhte hin oh hrgz flah nhin pa skte
10.70: Dnia ki chnd rozh zndgi min mze kr lin، phr hmari trf aun ko pltna he phr hm as kfr ke bdle js ka artkab oh kr rhe hin an ko skht عzab ka mzh chkhaein ge
10.71: Ain ko nohؑ ka qsh snaؤ، aus oqt ka qsh jb aus ne apni qom se kha tha kh “ae bradran qom، agr mira tmhare drmian rhna aor allh ki aaiat sna sna kr tmhin ghflt se bidar krna tmhare lie naqabl brdasht ho gia he to mira bhrosh allh pr he، tm apne thiraee hoee shrikon ko sath le kr aik mtfqh fislh kr lo aor jo mnsobh tmhare pish nzr ho as ko khob soch smjh lo takh as ka ko ei phlo tmhari ngah se poshidh nh rhe، phr mire khlaf as ko عml min le aaؤ aor mjhe hrgz mhlt nh do
10.72: Tm ne miri nsiht se mnh mora (to mira kia nqsan kia) min tm se ksi ajr ka tlb gar nh tha، mira ajr to allh ke zmh he aor mjhe hkm dia gia he kh (khoah koei mane ia nh mane) min khod mslm bn kr rhon"
10.73: Anhon ne ase jhtlaia aor ntijh ih hoa kh hm ne ase aor aun logon ko jo as ke sath kshti min the، bcha lia aor anhi ko zmin min janshin bnaia aor an sb logon ko ghrq kr dia jnhon ne hmari aaiat ko jhtlaia tha ps dikh lo kh jnhin mtnbh kia gia tha (aor phr bhi anhon ne man kr nh dia) aun ka kia anjam hoa
10.74: Phr nohؑ ke bعd hm ne mkhtlf pighmbron ko aun ki qomon ki trf bhija aor oh aun ke pas khli khli nshanian le kr aaee، mgr js chiz ko anhon ne phle jhtla dia tha ase phr man kr nh dia as trh hm hd se gzr jane oalon ke dlon pr thph lga dite hin
10.75: Phr an ke bعd hm ne mosiaؑ aor haronؑ ko apni nshanion ke sath frعon aor as ke srdaron ki trf bhija، mgr anhon ne apni braei ka ghmnd kia aor oh mjrm log the
10.76: Ps jb hmare pas se hq an ke samne aaia to anhon ne khh dia kh ih to khla jado he
10.77: Mosiaؑ ne kha: “tm hq ko ih khte ho jbkh oh tmhare samne aagia? Kia ih jado he? Halankh jado gr flah nhin paia krte"
10.78: Aunhon ne joab min kha “kia toas lie aaia he kh hmin au s triqe se phir de js pr hm ne apne bap dada ko paia he aor zmin min braei tm donon ki qaem ho jaee? Tmhare bat to hm manne oale nhin hin"
10.79: Aor frعon ne (apne aadmion se) kha kh “hr mahr fn jadogr ko mire pas hazr kro "
10.80: Jb jado gr aa gee to mosiaؑ ne an se kha “jo kchh tmhin phinkna he phinko"
10.81: Phr jb anhon ne apne aanchhr phink die to mosiaؑ ne kha “ih jo kchh tm ne phinka he ih jado he، allh abhi aise batl kie dita he، mfsdon ke kam ko allh sdhrne nhin dita
10.82: Aor allh apne frmanon se hq ko hq kr dkhata he، khoah mjrmon ko oh ktna hi nagoar ho"
10.83: (phr dikho kh) mosiaؑ ko as ki qom min se chnd nojoanon ke soa ksi ne nh mana، frعon ke dr se aor khod apni qom ke sr br aaordh logon ke dr se (jnhin khof tha kh) frعon an ko عzab min mbtla kre ga aor oaqعh ih he kh frعon zmin min ghlbh rkhta tha aor oh aun logon min se tha jo ksi hd pr rkte nhin hin
10.84: Mosiaؑ ne apni qom se kha kh “logo، agr tm oaqعi allh pr aiman rkhte ho to as pr bhrosh kro agr mslman ho"
10.85: Anhon ne joab dia “hm ne allh hi pr bhrosh kia، ae hmare rb، hmin zalm logon ke lie ftnh nh bna
10.86: Aor apni rhmt se hm ko kafron se njat de"
10.87: Aor hm ne mosiaؑ aor as ke bhaei ko asharh kia kh “msr min chnd mkan apni qom ke lie mhia kro aor apne an mkanon ko qblh thira lo aor nmaz qaem kro aor ahl aiman ko bshart de do"
10.88: Mosiaؑ ne dعa ki “ae hmare rb، to ne frعon aor as ke srdaron ko dnia ki zndgi min zint aor amoal se noaz rkha he ae rb، kia ih as lie he kh oh logon ko tiri rah se bhtkaein? Ae rb، an ke mal ghart kr de aor an ke dlon pr aisi mhr kr de kh aiman nh laein jb tk drdnak عzab nh dikh lin"
10.89: Allh tعalia ne joab min frmaia “tm donon ki dعa qbol ki gei sabt qdm rho aor aun logon ke triqe ki hrgz piroi nh kro jo عlm nhin rkhte"
10.90: Aor hm bni asraeil ko smndr se gzar le gee phr frعon aor as ke lshkr zlm aor ziadti ki ghrz se an ke pichhe chle htia kh jb frعon dobne lga to bol atha "min ne man lia kh khdaond hqiqi aus ke soa koei nhin he js pr bni asraeil aiman laee، aor min bhi sr ataعt jhka dine oalon min se hon"
10.91: (joab dia gia) “ab aiman lata he! Halankh ais se phle tk to nafrmani krta rha aor fsad brpa krne oalon min se tha
10.92: Ab to hm srf tiri lash hi ko bchaein ge takh to bعd ki nslon ke lie nshan عbrt bne agrchh bht se ansan aise hin jo hmari nshanion se ghflt brtte hin"
10.93: Hm ne bni asraeil ko bht achha thkana dia aor nhait عmdh osael zndgi anhin عta kie phr anhon ne bahm akhtlaf nhin kia mgraus oqt jbkh عlm aun ke pas aa chka tha iqinaan tira rb qiamt ke roz aun ke drmian aus chiz ka fislh kr de ga js min oh akhtlaf krte rhe hin
10.94: Ab agr tjhe aus hdait ki trf se kchh bhi shk ho jo hm ne tjh pr nazl ki he to aun logon se pochh le jo phle se ktab prh rhe hin fi aloaqع ih tire pas hq hi aaia he tire rb ki trf se، lhaza to shk krne oalon min se nh ho
10.95: Aor an logon min nh shaml ho jnhon ne allh ki aaiat ko jhtlaia he، ornh to nqsan athane oalon min se hoga
10.96: Hqiqt ih he kh jn logon pr tire rb ka qol rast aagia he an ke samne khoah koei nshani aa jaee
10.97: Oh kbhi aiman la kr nhin dite jb tk kh drd nak عzab samne aata nh dikh lin
10.98: Phr kia aisi koei msal he kh aik bsti عzab dikh kr aiman laei ho aor as ka aiman as ke lie nfع bkhsh sabt hoa ho? Ionsؑ ki qom ke soa (as ki koei nzir nhin) oh qom jb aiman le aaei thi to albth hm ne as pr se dnia ki zndgi min rsoaei ka عzab tal dia tha aor as ko aik mdt tk zndgi se bhrh mnd hone ka moqع de dia tha
10.99: Agr tire rb ki mshit ih hoti (kh zmin min sb momn o frmanbrdar hi hon) to sare ahl zmin aiman le aaee hote phr kia to logon ko mjbor kre ga kh oh momn ho jaein?
10.100: Koei mtnfs allh ke azn ke bghir aiman nhin la skta، aor allh ka triqh ih he kh jo log عql se kam nhin lite oh an pr gndgi dal dita he
10.101: Ain se kho “zmin aor aasmanon min jo kchh he ase aankhin khol kr dikho" aor jo log aiman lana hi nhin chahte an ke lie nshanian aor tnbihin aakhr kia mfid ho skti hin
10.102: Ab ih log ais ke soa aor ks chiz ke mntzr hin kh ohi bre dn dikhin jo ain se phle gzre hoee log dikh chke hin? Ain se kho “achha، antzar kro، min bhi tmhare sath antzar krta hon"
10.103: Phr (jb aisa oqt aata he to) hm apne rsolon ko aor aun logon ko bcha lia krte hin jo aiman laee hon hmara ihi triqh he hm pr ih hq he kh momnon ko bcha lin
10.104: Ae nbiؐ! Khh do kh logo، agr tm abhi tk mire din ke mtعlq ksi shk min ho to sn lo kh tm allh ke soa jn ki bndgi krte ho min an ki bndgi nhin krta blkh srf asi khda ki bndgi krta hon js ke qbze min tmhari mot he mjhe hkm dia gia he kh min aiman lane oalon min se hon
10.105: Aor mjh se frmaia gia he kh to ikso ho kr apne aap ko thik thik ais din pr qaem kr de، aor hrgz hrgz mshrkon min se nh ho
10.106: Aor allh ko chhor kr ksi aisi hsti ko nh pkar jo tjhe nh faedh phncha skti he nh nqsan agr to aisa kre ga to zalmon min se hoga
10.107: Agr allh tjhe ksi msibt min dale to khod as ke soa koei nhin jo as msibt ko tal de، aor agr oh tire hq min ksi bhlaei ka aradh kre to as ke fzl ko phirne oala bhi koei nhin he oh apne bndon min se js ko chahta he apne fzl se noazta he aor oh drgzr krne oala aor rhm frmane oala he
10.108: Ae mhmdؐ، khh do kh “logo، tmhare pas tmhare rb ki trf se hq aa chka he ab jo sidhi rah akhtiar kre as ki rast roi asi ke lie mfid he، aor jo gmrah rhe as ki gmrahi asi ke lie tbah kn he aor min tmhare aopr koei hoalh dar nhin hon"
10.109: Aor ae nbiؐ، tm as hdait ki piroi kie jaؤ jo tmhari trf bzriعh ohi bhiji ja rhi he، aor sbr kro ihan tk kh allh fislh kr de، aor ohi bhtrin fislh krne oala he

11.1: A l r frman he، js ki aaitin pkhth aor mfsl arshad hoei hin، aik dana aor bakhbr hsti ki trf se
11.2: Kh tm bndgi nh kro mgr srf allh ki min aus ki trf se tm ko khbrdar krne oala bhi hon aor bshart dine oala bhi
11.3: Aor ih kh tm apne rb se mعafi chaho aor as ki trf plt aaؤ to oh aik mdt khas tk tm ko achha saman zndgi de ga aor hr sahb fzl ko as ka fzl عta kre ga likn agr tm mnh phirte ho to min tmhare hq min aik bre holnak dn ke عzab se drta hon
11.4: Tm sb ko allh ki trf pltna he aor oh sb kchh krskta he
11.5: Dikho! Ih log apne sinon ko morte hin takh as se chhp jaein khbrdar! Jb ih kpron se apne aap ko dhanpte hin، allh an ke chhpe ko bhi janta he aor khle ko bhi، oh to aun bhidon se bhi oaqf he jo sinon min hin
11.6: Zmin min chlne oala koei jandar aisa nhin he js ka rzq allh ke zme nh ho aor js ke mtعlq oh nh janta ho kh khan oh rhta he aor khan oh sonpa jata he، sb kchh aik saf dftr min drj he
11.7: Aor ohi he js ne aasmanon aor zmin ko chh dnon min pida kia jbkh as se phle as ka عrsh pani pr tha takh tm ko aazma kr dikhe tm min kon bhtr عml krne oala he ab agr ae mhmdؐ، tm khte ho kh logo، mrne ke bعd tm dobarh athaee jaؤ ge، to mnkrin foraan bol athte hin kh ih to srih jado gri he
11.8: Aor agr hm aik khas mdt tk an ki sza ko talte hin to oh khne lgte hin kh aakhr ks chiz ne ause rok rkha he? Sno! Js roz aus sza ka oqt aagia to oh ksi ke phire nh phr ske ga aor ohi chiz an ko aa ghire gi js ka oh mzaq ara rhe hin
11.9: Agr kbhi hm ansan ko apni rhmt se noazne ke bعd phr as se mhrom kr dite hin to oh maios hota he aor nashkri krne lgta he
11.10: Aor agr aus msibt ke bعd jo aus pr aaei thi hm ase nعmt ka mza chkhate hin to khta he mire to sare dldr par ho gee، phr oh phola nhin smata aor akrne lgta he
11.11: As عib se pak agr koei hin to bs oh log jo sbr krne oale aor niko kar hin aor ohi hin jn ke lie drgzr bhi he aor bra ajr bhi
11.12: To ae pighmbrؐ! Khin aisa nh ho kh tm aun chizon min se ksi chiz ko (bian kr ne se) chhor do jo tmhari trf ohi ki ja rhi hin aor ais bat pr dl tng ho kh oh khin ge "as shkhs pr koei khzanh kion nh atara gia" ia ih kh "as ke sath koei frshth kion nh aaia" tm to mhz khbrdar krne oale ho، aage hr chiz ka hoalh dar allh he
11.13: Kia ih khte hin kh pighmbr ne ih ktab khod ghr li he? Kho، "achha ih bat he to as jisi ghri hoei ds sortin tm bna laؤ aor allh ke soa aor jo jo (tmhare mعbod) hin aun ko mdd ke lie bla skte ho to bla lo agr tm (anhin mعbod smjhne min) sche ho
11.14: Ab agr oh (tmhare mعbod) tmhari mdd ko nhin phnchte to jan lo kh ih allh ke عlm se nazl hoei he aor ih kh allh ke soa koei hqiqi mعbod nhin he phr kia tm (as amr hq ke aage) sr tslim khm kr te ho?"
11.15: Jo log bs aisi dnia ki zndgi aor as ki kho sh nmaeion ke talb hote hin an ki kar gzari ka sara phl hm ihin an ko de dite hin aor as min an ke sath koei kmi nhin ki jati
11.16: Mgr aakhrt min aise logon ke lie aag ke soa kchh nhin he (ohan mعlom ho jaee ga kh) jo kchh anhon ne dnia min bnaia oh sb mliamit ho gia aor ab an ka sara kia dhra mhz batl he
11.17: Phr bhla oh shkhs jo apne rb ki trf se aik saf shhadt rkhta tha، as ke bعd aik goah bhi prordgar ki trf se (as shhadt ki taeid min) aa gia، aor phle mosiaؑ ki ktab rhnma aor rhmt ke tor pr aaei hoei bhi mojod thi (kia oh bhi dnia prston ki trh as se ankar krskta he?) aise log to as pr aiman hi laein ge aor ansani grohon min se jo koei as ka ankar kre to as ke lie js jgh ka oعdh he oh dozkh he ps ae pighmbrؐ، tm ais chiz ki trf se ksi shk min nh prna، ih hq he tmhare rb ki trf se mgr aksr log nhin mante
11.18: Aor aus shkhs se brh kr zalm aor kon hoga jo allh pr jhot ghre? Aise log apne rb ke hzor pish hon ge aor goah shhadt din ge kh ih hin oh log jnhon ne apne rb pr jhot ghra tha sno! Khda ki lعnt he zalmon pr
11.19: Aun zalmon pr jo khda ke raste se logon ko rokte hin، as ke raste ko titrha krna chahte hin aor aakhrt ka ankar krte hin
11.20: Oh zmin min allh ko be bs krne oale nh the aor nh allh ke mqablh min koei an ka hami tha anhin ab dohra عzab dia jaee ga oh nh ksi ki sn hi skte the aor nh khod hi anhin kchh sojhta tha
11.21: Ih oh log hin jnhon ne apne aap ko khod ghate min dala aor oh sb kchh an se khoia gia jo anhon ne ghr rkha tha
11.22: Na gzir he kh ohi aakhrt min sb se brh kr ghate min rhin
11.23: Rhe oh log jo aiman laee aor jnhon ne nik عml kie aor apne rb hi ke ho kr rhe، to iqinaan oh jnti log hin aor jnt min oh hmishh rhin ge
11.24: Ain donon friqon ki msal aisi he jise aik aadmi to ho andha bhra aor dosra ho dikhne aor snne oala، kia ih donon iksan ho skte hin? Kia tm (ais msal se) koei sbq nhin lite?
11.25: (aor aise hi halat the jb) hm ne nohؑ ko aus ki qom ki trf bhija tha (aus ne kha) "min tm logon ko saf saf khbrdar krta hon
11.26: Kh allh ke soa ksi ki bndgi nh kro ornh mjhe andishh he kh tm pr aik roz drdnak عzab aaee ga"
11.27: Joab min aus ki qom ke srdar، jnhon ne as ki bat manne se ankar kia tha، bole "hmari nzr min to tm as ke soa kchh nhin ho kh bs aik ansan ho hm jise aor hm dikh rhe hin kh hmari qom min se bs aun logon ne jo hmare han arazl the be soche smjhe tmhari piroi akhtiar kr li he aor hm koei chiz bhi aisi nhin pate js min tm log hm se kchh brhe hoee ho، blkh hm to tmhin jhota smjhte hin"
11.28: As ne kha "ae bradran qom، zra socho to shi kh agr min apne rb ki trf se aik khli shhadt pr qaem tha aor phr as ne mjh ko apni khas rhmt se bhi noaz dia mgr oh tm ko nzr nh aaei to aakhr hmare pas kia zriعh he kh tm manna nh chaho aor hm zbrdsti as ko tmhare sr chpik din?
11.29: Aor ae bradran qom، min ais kam pr tm se koei mal nhin mangta، mira ajr to allh ke zmh he aor min aun logon ko dhke dine se bhi rha jnhon ne miri bat mani he، oh aap hi apne rb ke hzor jane oale hin mgr min dikhta hon kh tm log jhalt brt rhe ho
11.30: Aor ae qom، agr min ain logon ko dhtkar don to khda ki pkr se kon mjhe bchane aaee ga? Tm logon ki smjh min kia atni bat bhi nhin aati?
11.31: Aor min tm se nhin khta kh mire pas allh ke khzane hin، nh ih khta hon kh min ghib ka عlm rkhta hon، nh ih mira dعoia he kh min frshth hon aor ih bhi min nhin khh skta kh jn logon ko tmhari aankhin hqart se dikhti hin anhin allh ne koei bhlaei nhin di an ke nfs ka hal allh hi bhtr janta he agr min aisa khon to zalm hon ga"
11.32: Aakhr kar an logon ne kha kh "ae nohؑ، tm ne hm se jhgra kia aor bht kr lia ab to bs oh عzab le aaؤ js ki tm hmin dhmki dite ho agr sche ho"
11.33: Nohؑ ne joab dia "oh to allh hi laee ga، agr chahe ga، aor tm atna bl bota nhin rkhte kh ase rok do
11.34: Ab agr min tmhari kchh khir khoahi krna bhi chahon to miri khir khoahi tmhin koei faedh nhin de skti jbkh allh hi ne tmhin bhtka dine ka aradh kr lia ho، ohi tmhara rb he aor ausi ki trf tmhin pltna he"
11.35: Ae mhmdؐ، kia ih log khte hin kh ais shkhs ne ih sb kchh khod ghr lia he? An se kho "agr min ne ih khod ghra he to mjh pr apne jrm ki zmh dari he، aor jo jrm tm kr rhe ho as ki zmh dari se min bri hon"
11.36: Nohؑ pr ohi ki gei kh tmhari qom min se jo log aiman la chke bs oh la chke، ab koei manne oala nhin he an ke krtoton pr ghm khana chhoro
11.37: Aor hmari ngrani min hmari ohi ke mtabq aik kshti bnani shroع kr do aor dikho، jn logon ne zlm kia he aun ke hq min mjh se koei sfarsh nh krna، ih sare ke sare ab dobne oale hin
11.38: Nohؑ kshti bna rha tha aor as ki qom ke srdaron min se jo koei as ke pas se gzrta tha oh as ka mzaq arata tha as ne kha "agr tm hm pr hnste ho to hm bhi tm pr hns rhe hin
11.39: عnqrib tmhin khod mعlom ho jaee ga kh ks pr oh عzab aata he jo ause rsoa kr de ga aor ks pr oh bla tot prti he jo tale nh tle gi"
11.40: Ihan tk kh jb hmara hkm aagia aor oh tno r abl pra to hm ne kha "hr qsm ke janoron ka aik aik jora kshti min rkh lo، apne ghr oalon ko bhi soaee aun ashkhas ke jn ki nshan dhi phle ki ja chki he as min soar kra do aor an logon ko bhi btha lo jo aiman laee hin" aor thore hi log the jo nohؑ ke sath aiman laee the
11.41: Nohؑ ne kha "soar ho jaؤ ais min، allh hi ke nam se he as ka chlna bhi aor as ka thirna bhi، mira rb bra ghfor o rhim he"
11.42: Kshti an logon ko lie chli ja rhi thi aor aik aik moj phar ki trh ath rhi thi nohؑ ka bita dor fasle pr tha nohؑ ne pkar kr kha "bita، hmare sath soar ho ja، kafron ke sath nh rh"
11.43: Aus ne plt kr joab dia "min abhi aik phar pr chrha jata hon jo mjhe pani se bcha le ga" nohؑ ne kha، aaj koei chiz allh ke hkm se bchane oali nhin he soaee ais ke kh allh hi ksi pr rhm frmaee" atne min aik moj donon ke drmian hael ho gei aor oh bhi dobne oalon min shaml ho gia
11.44: Hkm hoa "ae zmin، apna sara pani ngl ja aor ae aasman، rk ja" chnanchh pani zmin min bith gia، fislh chka dia gia، kshti jodi pr tk gei، aor khh dia gia kh dor hoei zalmon ki qo m!
11.45: Nohؑ ne apne rb ko pkara kha "ae rb، mira bita mire ghr oalon min se he aor tira oعdh scha he aor to sb hakmon se bra aor bhtr hakm he"
11.46: Joab min arshad hoa "ae nohؑ، oh tire ghr oalon min se nhin he، oh to aik bgra hoa kam he، lhaza to aus bat ki mjh se drkhoast nh kr js ki hqiqt to nhin janta، min tjhe nsiht krta hon kh apne aap ko jahlon ki trh nh bna le"
11.47: Nohؑ ne foraan عrz kia "ae mire rb، min tiri pnah mangta hon ais se kh oh chiz tjh se mangon js ka mjhe عlm nhin agr to ne mjh mعaf nh kia aor rhm nh frmaia to min brbad ho jaؤn ga"
11.48: Hkm hoa "ae nohؑ atr ja، hmari trf se slamti aor brktin hin tjh pr aor an grohon pr jo tire sath hin، aor kchh groh aise bhi hin jn ko hm kchh mdt saman zndgi bkhshin ge phr anhin hmari trf se drd nak عzab phnche ga"
11.49: Ae mhmdؐ، ih ghib ki khbrin hin jo hm tmhari trf ohi kr rhe hin as se phle nh tm an ko jante the aor nh tmhari qom، ps sbr kro، a njam kar mtqion hi ke hq min he
11.50: Aor عad ki trf hm ne an ke bhaei hodؑ ko bhija aus ne kha "ae bradran qom، allh ki bndgi kro، tmhara koei khda aus ke soa nhin he tm ne mhz jhot ghr rkhe hin
11.51: Ae bradran qom، as kam pr min tm se koei ajr nhin chahta، mira ajr to as ke zmh he js ne mjhe pida kia he، kia tm عql se zra kam nhin lite?
11.52: Aor ae miri qom ke logo، apne rb se mعafi chaho، phr as ki trf plto، oh tm pr aasman ke dhane khol de ga aor tmhari mojodh qot pr mzid qot ka azafh kre ga mjrmon ki trh mnh nh phiro"
11.53: Anhon ne joab dia "ae hodؑ، to hmare pas koei srih shhadt le kr nhin aaia he، aor tire khne se hm apne mعbodon ko nhin chhor skte، aor tjh pr hm aiman lane oale nhin hin
11.54: Hm to ih smjhte hin kh tire aopr hmare mعbodon min se ksi ki mar pr gei he" hodؑ ne kha "min allh ki shhadt pish krta hon aor tm goah rho kh ih jo allh ke soa dosron ko tm ne khdaei min shrik thira rkha he as se min bizar hon
11.55: Tm sb ke sb ml kr mire khlaf apni krni min ksr nh atha rkho aor mjhe zra mhlt nh do
11.56: Mira bhrosh allh pr he jo mira rb bhi he aor tmhara rb bhi koei jandar aisa nhin js ki choti as ke hath min nh ho be shk mira rb sidhi r ah pr he
11.57: Agr tm mnh phirte ho to phir lo jo pigham de kr min tmhare pas bhija gia tha oh min tm ko phncha chka hon ab mira rb tmhari jgh dosri qom ko athaee ga aor tm as ka kchh nh bgar sko ge iqinaan mira rb hr chiz pr ngran he"
11.58: Phr jb hmara hkm aagia to hm ne apni rhmt se hodؑ ko aor aun logon ko jo aus ke sath aiman laee the njat de di aor aik skht عzab se bcha lia
11.59: Ih hin عad، apne rb ki aaiat se anhon ne ankar kia، as ke rsolon ki bat nh mani، aor hr jbar dshmn hq ki piroi krte rhe
11.60: Aakhr kar as dnia min bhi an pr phtkar pri aor qiamt ke roz bhi sno! عad ne apne rb se kfr kia، sno! Dor phink die gee عad، hodؑ ki qom ke log
11.61: Aor smod ki trf hm ne an ke bhaei salhؑ ko bhija aus ne kha "ae miri qom ke logo، allh ki bndgi kro، au s ke soa tmhara koei khda nhin he ohi he js ne tm ko zmin se pida kia he aor ihan tm ko bsaia he lhaza tm as se mعafi chaho aor as ki trf plt aaؤ، iqinaan mira rb qrib he aor oh dعaؤn ka joab dine oala he"
11.62: Anhon ne kha "ae salhؑ، as se phle to hmare drmian aisa shkhs tha js se bri toqعat oabsth thin kia to hmin an mعbodon ki prstsh se rokna chahta he jn ki prstsh hmare bap dada krte the? To js triqe ki trf hmin bla rha he as ke bare min hm ko skht shbh he js ne hmin khljan min dal rkha he"
11.63: Salhؑ ne kha "ae bradran qom، tm ne kchh as bat pr bhi ghor kia kh agr min apne rb ki trf se aik saf shhadt rkhta tha، aor phr as ne apni rhmt se bhi mjh ko noaz dia to ais ke bعd allh ki pkr se mjhe kon bchaee ga agr min aus ki nafrmani kron? Tm mire ks kam aa skte ho soaee as ke kh mjhe aor ziadh khsare min dal do
11.64: Aor ae miri qom ke logo، dikho ih allh ki aontni tmhare lie aik nshani he aise khda ki zmin min chrne ke lie aazad chhor do ais se zra tعrz nh krna ornh kchh ziadh dir nh gzre gi kh tm pr khda ka عzab aa jaee ga"
11.65: Mgr anhon ne aontni ko mar dala as pr salhؑ ne aun ko khbrdar kr dia kh "bs ab tin dn apne ghron min aor rh bs lo ih aisi miعad he jo jhoti nh sabt hogi"
11.66: Aakhr kar jb hmare fisle ka oqt aa gia to hm ne apni rhmt se salhؑ ko aor aun logon ko jo as ke sath aiman laee the bcha lia aor aus dn ki rsoaei se an ko mhfoz rkha be shk tira rb hi drasl taqtor aor bala dst he
11.67: Rhe oh log jnhon ne zlm kia tha to aik skht dhmake ne an ko dhr lia aor oh apni bstion min as trh be hs o hrkt pre ke pre rh gee
11.68: Kh goia oh ohan kbhi bse hi nh the sno! Smod ne apne rb se kfr kia sno! Dor phink die gee smod!
11.69: Aor dikho، abrahimؑ ke pas hmare frshte khoshkhbri lie hoee phnche kha tm pr slam ho abrahimؑ ne joab dia tm pr bhi slam ho phr kchh dir nh gzri kh abrahimؑ aik bhna hoa bchhra (an ki ziaft ke lie) le aaia
11.70: Mgr jb dikha kh an ke hath khane pr nhin brhte to oh an se mshtbh ho gia aor dl min an se khof mhsos krne lga aunhon ne kha "dro nhin، hm to lotؑ ki qom ki trf bhije gee hin"
11.71: Abrahimؑ ki bioi bhi khri hoei thi oh ih sn kr hns di phr hm ne as ko ashaqؑ ki aor ashaqؑ ke bعd iعqob ki khoshkhbri di
11.72: Oh boli "haee miri km bkhti! Kia ab mire han aolad hogi jbkh min brhia phons ho gei aor ih mire mian bhi borhe ho chke? Ih to bri عjib bat he"
11.73: Frshton ne kha "allh ke hkm pr tعjb krti ho? Abrahimؑ ke ghr oalo، tm logon pr to allh ki rhmt aor aus ki brktin hin، aor iqinaan allh nhait qabl tعrif aor bri shan oala he"
11.74: Phr jb abrahimؑ ki ghbraht dor ho gei aor (aolad ki bshart se) as ka dl khosh ho gia to as ne qom lot ke mعamle min hm se jhgra shroع kia
11.75: Hqiqt min abrahimؑ bra hlim aor nrm dl aadmi tha aor hr hal min hmari trf rjoع krta tha
11.76: (aakhr kar hmare frshton ne as se kha) "ae abrahimؑ، as se baz aa jaؤ، tmhare rb ka hkm ho chka he aor ab an logon pr oh عzab aakr rhe ga jo ksi ke phire nhin phr skta"
11.77: Aor jb hmare frshte lotؑ ke pas phnche to aun ki aamd se oh bht ghbraia aor dl tng hoa aor khne lga kh aaj bri msibt ka dn he
11.78: (an mhmanon ka aana tha kh) as ki qom ke log be akhtiar as ke ghr ki trf dor pre phle se oh aisi hi bd karion ke khogr the lotؑ ne an se kha "bhaeio، ih miri bitian mojod hin، ih tmhare lie pakizh tr hin kchh khda ka khof kro aor mire mhmanon ke mعamle min mjhe zlil nh kro kia tm min koei bhla aadmi nhin?"
11.79: Anhon ne joab dia "tjhe to mعlom hi he kh tiri bition min hmara koei hsh nhin he aor to ih bhi janta he kh hm chahte kia hin"
11.80: Lotؑ ne kha "kash mire pas atni taqt hoti kh tmhin sidha kr dita، ia koei mzbot shara hi hota kh as ki pnah lita"
11.81: Tb frshton ne as se kha kh "ae lotؑ، hm tire rb ke bhije hoee frshte hin، ih log tira kchh nh bgar skin ge bs to kchh rat rhe apne ahl o عial ko le kr nkl ja aor dikho، tm min se koei shkhs pichhe plt kr nh dikhe mgr tir i bioi (sath nhin jaee gi) kionkh as pr bhi ohi kchh gzrne oala he jo ain logon pr gzrna he an ki tbahi ke lie sbh ka oqt mqrr he sbh hote ab dir hi ktni he!"
11.82: Phr jb hmare fisle ka oqt aa phncha to hm ne as bsti ko tl pt kr dia aor as pr pki hoei mti ke pthr tabr tor brsaee
11.83: Jn min se hr pthr tire rb ke han nshan zdh tha aor zalmon se ih sza kchh dor nhin he
11.84: Aor mdin oalon ki trf hm ne an ke bhaei shعibؑ ko bhija aus ne kha "ae miri qom ke logo، allh ki bndgi kro، as ke soa tmhara koei khda nhin he aor nap tol min kmi nh kia kro aaj min tm ko achhe hal min dikh rha hon، mgr mjhe dr he kh kl tm pr aisa dn aaee ga js ka عzab sb ko ghir le ga
11.85: Aor ae bradran qom، thik thik ansaf ke sath pora napo aor tolo aor logon ko an ki chizon min ghata nh dia kro aor zmin min fsad nh philate phro
11.86: Allh ki di hoei bcht tmhare lie bhtr he agr tm momn ho aor bhr hal min tmhare aopr koei ngran kar nhin hon"
11.87: Anhon ne joab dia "ae shعibؑ، kia tiri nmaz tjhe ih skhati he kh hm an sare mعbodon ko chhor din jn ki pr stsh hmare bap dada krte the? Ia ih kh hm ko apne mal min apne mnsha ke mtabq tsrf krne ka akhtiar nh ho? Bs to hi to aik عali zrf aor rastbaz aadmi rh gia he!"
11.88: Shعibؑ ne kha "bhaeio، tm khod hi socho kh agr min apne rb ki trf se aik khli shhadt pr tha aor phr as ne apne han se mjh ko achha rzq bhi عta kia (to as ke bعd min tmhari gmrahion aor hram khorion min tmhara shrik hal kise hoskta hon?) aor min hrgz ih nhin chahta kh jn baton se min tm ko rokta hon an ka khod artkab kron min to aslah krna chahta hon jhan tk bhi mira bs chle aor ih jo kchh min krna chahta hon as ka sara anhsar allh ki tofiq pr he، ausi pr min ne bhrosh kia aor hr mعamlh min asi ki trf min rjoع krta hon
11.89: Aor ae bradran qom، mire khlaf tmhari ht dhrmi khin ih nobt nh phncha de kh aakhr kar tm pr bhi ohi عzab aa kr rhe jo nohؑ ia hodؑ ia salhؑ ki qom pr aaia tha aor lotؑ ki qom to tm se kchh ziadh dor bhi nhin he
11.90: Dikho! Apne rb se mعafi mango aor as ki trf plt aaؤ، be shk mira rb rhim he aor apni mkhloq se mhbt rkhta he"
11.91: Anhon ne joab dia "ae shعibؑ، tiri bht si batin to hmari smjh hi min nhin aatin aor hm dikhte hin kh to hmare drmian aik be zor aadmi he، tiri bradri nh hoti to hm kbhi ka tjhe sngsar kr chke hote، tira bl bota to atna nhin he kh hm pr bhari ho"
11.92: Shعibؑ ne kha "bhaeio، kia miri bradri tm pr allh se ziadh bhari he kh tm ne (bradri ka to khof kia aor) allh ko balkl ps psht dal dia? Jan rkho kh jo kchh tm kr rhe ho oh allh ki grft se bahr nhin he
11.93: Ae miri qom ke logo، tm apne triqe pr kam kie jaؤ aor min apne triqe pr krta rhon ga، jldi hi tmhin mعlom ho jaee ga kh ks pr zlt ka عzab aata he aor kon jhota he tm bhi antzar kro aor min bhi tmhare sath chshm brah hon"
11.94: Aakhr kar jb hmare fisle ka oqt aa gia to hm ne apni rhmt se shعibؑ aor as ke sathi momnon ko bcha lia aor jn logon ne zlm kia tha an ko aik skht dhmake ne aisa pkra kh oh apni bstion min be hs o hrkt pre ke pre rh gee
11.95: Goia oh kbhi ohan rhe bse hi nh the sno! Mdin oale bhi dor phink die gee js trh smod phinke gee the
