11.97: Mgr anhon ne frعon ke hkm ki piroi ki halankh frعon ka hkm rasti pr nh tha
11.98: Qiamt ke roz oh apni qom ke aage aage hoga aor apni pishoaei min anhin dozkh ki trf le jaee ga kisi bdtr jaee ouruod he ih js pr koei phnche!
11.99: Aor an logon pr dnia min bhi lعnt pri aor qiamt ke roz bhi pre gi kisa bra slh he ih jo ksi ko mle!
11.100: Ih chnd bstion ki srgzsht he jo hm tmhin sna rhe hin an min se bعz ab bhi khri hin aor bعz ki fsl kt chki he
11.101: Hm ne aun pr zlm nhin kia، anhon ne aap hi apne aopr stm dhaia aor jb allh ka hkm aa gia to an ke oh mعbod jnhin oh allh ko chhor kr pkara krte the an ke kchh kam nh aa ske aor anhon ne hlakt o brbadi ke soa anhin kchh faedh nh dia
11.102: Aor tira rb jb ksi zalm bsti ko pkrta he to phr as ki pkr aisi hi hoa krti he، fi aloaqع as ki pkr bri skht aor drd nak hoti he
11.103: Hqiqt ih he kh as min aik nshani he hr aus shkhs ke lie jo عzab aakhrt ka khof kre oh aik dn hoga js min sb log jmع hon ge aor phr jo kchh bhi aus roz hoga sb ki aankhon ke samne hoga
11.104: Hm as ke lane min kchh bht ziadh takhir nhin kr rhe hin، bs aik gni chni mdt as ke lie mqrr he
11.105: Jb oh aaee ga to ksi ko bat krne ki mjal nh hogi، ala ih kh khda ki ajazt se kchh عrz kre phr kchh log as roz bd bkht hon ge aor kchh nik bkht
11.106: Jo bd bkht hon ge oh dozkh min jaein ge (jhan grmi aor pias ki shdt se) oh hanpin ge aor phnkare marin ge
11.107: Aor asi halt min oh hmishh rhin ge jb tk kh zmin o aasman qaem hin، ala ih kh tira rb kchh aor chahe be shk tira rb pora akhtiar rkhta he kh jo chahe kre
11.108: Rhe oh log jo nik bkht nklin ge، to oh jnt min jaein ge aor ohan hmishh rhin ge jb tk zmin o aasman qaem hin، ala ih kh tira rb kchh aor chahe aisi bkhshsh an ko mle gi js ka slslh kbhi mnqtع nh hoga
11.109: Ps ae nbiؐ، to an mعbodon ki trf se ksi shk min nh rh jn ki ih log عbadt kr rhe hin ih to (bs lkir ke fqir bne hoee) ausi trh poja pat kie ja rhe hin js trh phle an ke bap dada krte the، aor hm ain ka hsh ainhin bhrpor din ge bghir as ke kh as min kchh kat ksr ho
11.110: Hm as se phle mosiaؑ ko bhi ktab de chke hin aor as ke bare min bhi akhtlaf kia gia tha (js trh aaj ais ktab ke bare min kia ja rha he jo tmhin di gei he) agr tire rb ki trf se aik bat phle hi te nh kr di gei hoti to ain akhtlaf krne oalon ke drmian kbhi ka fislh chka dia gia hota ih oaqعh he kh ih log as ki trf se shk aor khljan min pre hoee hin
11.111: Aor ih bhi oaqعh he kh tira rb anhin an ke aعmal ka pora pora bdlh de kr rhe ga، iqinaan oh an ki sb hrkton se bakhbr he
11.112: Ps ae mhmdؐ، tm، aor tmhare oh sathi jo (kfr o bghaot se aiman o taعt ki trf) plt aaee hin، thik thik rah rast pr sabt qdm rho jisa kh tmhin hkm dia gia he aor bndgi ki hd se tjaoz nh kro jo kchh tm kr rhe ho as pr tmhara rb ngah rkhta he
11.113: Ain zalmon ki trf zra nh jhkna ornh jhnm ki lpit min aa jaؤ ge aor tmhin koei aisa oli o srprst nh mle ga jo khda se tmhin bcha ske aor khin se tm ko mdd nh phnche gi
11.114: Aor dikho، nmaz qaem kro dn ke donon sron pr aor kchh rat gzrne pr drhqiqt nikian braeion ko dor kr diti hin، ih aik iad dhani he an logon ke lie jo khda ko iad rkhne oale hin
11.115: Aor sbr kr، allh niki krne oalon ka ajr kbhi zaeع nhin krta
11.116: Phr kion nh aun qomon min jo tm se phle gzr chki hin aise ahl khir mojod rhe jo logon ko zmin min fsad brpa krne se rokte? 11.117: Tira rb aisa nhin he kh bstion ko nahq tbah kr de halankh an ke bashnde aslah krne oale hon
11.118: Be shk tira rb agr chahta to tmam ansanon ko aik groh bna skta tha، mgr ab to oh mkhtlf triqon hi pr chlte rhin ge
11.119: Aor be rah roion se srf oh log bchin ge jn pr tire rb ki rhmt he aisi (aazadi antkhab o akhtiar) ke lie hi to as ne anhin pida kia tha aor tire rb ki oh bat pori ho gei jo as ne khi thi kh min jhnm ko jn aor ansan، sb se bhr don ga
11.120: Aor ae mhmdؐ، ih pighmbron ke qse jo hm tmhin snate hin، oh chizin hin jn ke zriعe se hm tmhare dl ko mzbot krte hin an ke andr tm ko hqiqt ka عlm mla aor aiman lane oalon ko nsiht aor bidari nsib hoei
11.121: Rhe oh log jo aiman nhin late، to an se khh do kh tm apne triqe pr kam krte rho aor hm apne triqe pr kie jate hin
11.122: Anjam kar ka tm bhi antzar kro aor hm bhi mntzr hin
11.123: Aasmanon aor zmin min jo kchh chhpa hoa he sb allh ke qbzh qdrt min he aor sara mعamlh asi ki trf rjoع kia jata he ps ae nbiؐ، to as ki bndgi kr aor asi pr bhrosa rkh، jo kchh tm log kr rhe ho tira rb as se be khbr nhin he

12.1: A، l، r ih aus ktab ki aaiat hin jo apna mdعa saf saf bian krti he
12.2: Hm ne ase nazl kia he qraan bna kr عrbi zban min takh tm (ahl عrb) as ko achhi trh smjh sko
12.3: Ae mhmdؐ، hm as qraan ko tmhari trf ohi kr ke bhtrin piraih min oaqعat aor hqaeq tm se bian krte hin، ornh as se phle to (an chizo n se) tm balkl hi be khbr the
12.4: Ih aus oqt ka zkr he jb iosfؑ ne apne bap se kha "aba jan، min ne khoab dikha he kh giarh stare hin aor sorj aor chand hin aor oh mjhe sjdh kr rhe hin"
12.5: Joab min as ke bap ne kha، "bita، apna ih khoab apne bhaeion ko nh snana ornh oh tire drpe aazar ho jaein ge، hqiqt ih he kh shitan aadmi ka khla dshmn he
12.6: Aor aisa hi hoga (jisa to ne khoab min dikha he kh) tira rb tjhe (apne kam ke lie) mntkhb kre ga aor tjhe baton ki th tk phnchna skhaee ga aor tire aopr aor aal iعqobؑ pr apni nعmt asi trh pori kre ga js trh as se phle oh tire bzrgon، abrahimؑ aor ashaqؑ pr kr chka he، iqinaan tira rb عlim aor hkim he"
12.7: Hqiqt ih he kh iosfؑ aor as ke bhaeion ke qsh min ain pochhne oalon ke lie bri nshanian hin
12.8: Ih qsh ion shroع hota he kh as ke bhaeion ne aaps min kha "ih iosfؑ aor as ka bhaei، donon hmare oald ko hm sb se ziadh mhbob hin halankh hm aik pora jtha hin schi bat ih he kh hmare aba jan ba lkl hi bhk gee hin
12.9: Chlo iosfؑ ko qtl kr do ia ase khin phink do takh tmhare oald ki tojh srf tmhari hi trf ho jaee ih kam kr line ke bعd phr nik bn rhna"
12.10: As pr an min se aik bola "iosfؑ ko qtl nh kro، agr kchh krna hi he to ase ksi andhe knoin min dal do koei aata jata qaflh ase nkal le jaee ga"
12.11: As qrardad pr anhon ne ja kr apne bap se kha "aba jan، kia bat he kh aap iosfؑ ke mعamlh min hm pr bhrosh nhin krte halankh hm as ke sche khir khoah hin?
12.12: Kl ase hmare sath bhij d ijie، kchh chr chg le ga aor khil kod se bhi dl bhlaee ga hm as ki hfazt ko mojod hin"
12.13: Bap ne kha "tmhara ase le jana mjhe shaq gzrta he aor mjh ko andishh he kh khin ase bhiria nh phar kha ee jbkh tm as se ghafl ho"
12.14: Anhon ne joab dia "agr hmare hote ase bhr ie ne kha lia، jbkh hm aik jtha hin، tb to hm bre hi nkme hon ge"
12.15: Ais trh asrar kr ke jb oh ause le gee aor anhon ne te kr lia kh ase aik andhe knoin min chhor din، to hm ne iosfؑ ko ohi ki kh "aik oqt aaee ga jb to an logon ko an ki ih hrkt jtaee ga، ih apne fعl ke ntaej se be khbr hin"
12.16: Sham ko oh rote pitte apne bap ke pas aaee
12.17: Aor kha "aba jan، hm dor ka mqablh krne min lg gee the aor iosfؑ ko hm ne apne saman ke pas chhor dia tha kh atne min bhiria aa kr ause kha gia aap hmari bat ka iqin nh krin ge chahe hm sche hi hon"
12.18: Aor oh iosfؑ ke qmis pr jhot mot ka khon lga kr aaee the ih sn kr an ke bap ne kha "blkh tmhare nfs ne tmhare lie aik bre kam ko aasan bna dia achha، sbr kron ga aor bkhobi kron ga، jo bat tm bna rhe ho as pr allh hi se mdd mangi ja skti he"
12.19: Adhr aik qaflh aaia aor aus ne apne sqe ko pani lane ke lie bhija sqe ne jo knoin min dol dala to (iosfؑ ko dikh kr) pkar atha "mbark ho، ihan to aik lrka he" an logon ne as ko mal tjart smjh kr chhpa lia، halankh jo kchh oh kr rhe the khda as se bakhbr tha
12.20: Aakhr kar anhon ne as ko thori si qimt pr chnd drhmon ke عoz bich dala aor oh as ki qimt ke mعamlh min kchh ziadh ke amidoar nh the
12.21: Msr ke js shkhs ne ase khrida as ne apni bioi se kha "ais ko achhi trh rkhna، bعid nhin kh ih hmare lie mfid sabt ho ia hm ase bita bna lin" as trh hm ne iosfؑ ke lie aus srzmin min qdm jmane ki sort nkali aor ase mعamlh fhmi ki tعlim dine ka antzam kia allh apna kam kr ke rhta he، mgr aksr log jante nhin hin
12.22: Aor jb oh apni pori joani ko phncha to hm ne ase qot fislh aor عlm عta kia، ais trh hm nik logon ko jza dite hin
12.23: Js عort ke ghr min oh tha oh aus pr dore dalne lgi aor aik roz droaze bnd kr ke boli "aa ja" iosfؑ ne kha "khda ki pnah، mire rb ne to mjhe achhi mnzlt bkhshi (aor min ih kam kron!) aise zalm kbhi flah nhin paia krte"
12.24: Oh aus ki trf brhi aor iosfؑ bhi as ki trf brhta agr apne rb ki brhan nh dikh lita aisa hoa، takh hm as se bdi aor be hiaei ko dor kr din، dr hqiqt oh hmare chne hoee bndon min se tha
12.25: Aakhr kar iosfؑ aor oh aage pichhe droaze ki trf bhage aor as ne pichhe se iosfؑ ka qmis (khinch kr) phar dia droaze pr donon ne as ke shohr ko mojod paia ase dikhte hi عort khne lgi، "kia sza he as shkhs ki jo tiri ghr oali pr nit khrab kre? Ais ke soa aor kia sza hoskti he kh oh qid kia jaee ia ase skht عzab dia jaee"
12.26: Iosfؑ ne kha "ihi mjhe phansne ki koshsh kr rhi thi" as عort ke apne knbh oalon min se aik shkhs ne (qrine ki) shhadt pish ki kh "agr iosfؑ ka qmis aage se phta ho to عort schi he aor ih jhota
12.27: Aor agr as ka qmis pichhe se phta ho to عort jhoti he aor ih scha"
12.28: Jb shohr ne dikha kh iosfؑ ka qmis pichhe se phta he to as ne kha "ih tm عorton ki chalakian hin، oaqعi br e ghzb ki hoti hin tmhari chalin
12.29: Iosfؑ، as mعamle se drgzr kr aor ae عort، to apne qsor ki mعafi mang، to hi asl min khta kar thi"
12.30: Shhr ki عortin aaps min chrcha krne lgin kh "عziz ki bioi apne nojoan ghlam ke pichhe pri hoei he، mhbt ne as ko be qabo kr rkha he، hmare nzdik to oh srih ghlti kr rhi he"
12.31: As ne jo aun ki ih mkaranh batin snin to aun ko blaoa bhij dia aor an ke lie tkih dar mjls aarasth ki aor ziaft min hr aik ke aage aik chhri rkh di (phr عin as oqt jbkh oh phl kat kat kr kha rhi thin) as ne iosfؑ ko asharh kia kh an ke samne nkl aa jb an عorton ki ngah as pr pri to oh dng rh gein aor apne hath kat bithin aor be sakhth pka r athin "hashallّah، ih shkhs ansan nhin he، ih to koei bzrg frshth he"
12.32: عziz ki bioi ne kha "dikh lia! Ih he ih oh shkhs js ke mعamlh min tm mjh pr batin bnati thin be shk min ne aise rjhane ki koshsh ki thi mgr ih bch nkla agr ih mira khna nh mane ga to qid kia jaee ga aor bht zlil o khoar hoga
12.33: Iosfؑ ne kha "ae mire rb، qid mjhe mnzor he bh nsbt as ke kh min oh kam kron jo ih log mjh se chahte hin aor agr to ne an ki chalon ko mjh se dfع nh kia to min an ke dam min phns jaؤn ga aor jahlon min shaml ho rhon ga
12.34: As ke rb ne as ki dعa qbol ki aor aun عorton ki chalin as se dfع kr din، be shk ohi he jo sb ki snta aor sb kchh janta he
12.35: Phr an logon ko ih sojhi kh aik mdt ke lie ase qid kr din halankh oh (as ki pakdamni aor khod apni عorton ke bre atoar ki) srih nshanian dikh chke the
12.36: Qid khanh min do ghlam aor bhi as ke sath dakhl hoee aik roz aun min se aik ne aus se kha "min ne khoab min dikha he kh min shrab kshid kr rha hon" dosre ne kha "min ne dikha kh mire sr pr rotian rkhi hin aor prnde an ko kha rhe hin" donon ne kha "hmin as ki tعbir btaeie، hm dikhte hin kh aap aik nik aadmi hin"
12.37: Iosfؑ ne kha: "ihan jo khana tmhin mla krta he as ke aane se phle min tmhin ain khoabon ki tعbir bta don ga ih عlm aun عlom min se he jo mire rb ne mjhe عta kie hin oaqعh ih he kh min ne aun logon ka triqh chhor kr jo allh pr aiman nhin late aor aakhrt ka ankar krte hin
12.38: Apne bzrgon، abrahimؑ، ashaqؑ aor iعqobؑ ka triqh akhtiar kia he hmara ih kam nhin he kh allh ke sath ksi ko shrik thiraein dr hqiqt ih allh ka fzl he hm pr aor tmam ansanon pr (kh as ne apne soa ksi ka bndh hmin nhin bnaia) mgr aksr log shkr nhin krte
12.39: Ae zndan ke sathio، tm khod hi socho kh bht se mtfrq rb bhtr hin ia oh aik allh jo sb ghalb he?
12.40: Aus ko chhor kr tm jn ki bndgi kr rhe ho oh as ke soa kchh nhin hin kh bs chnd nam hin jo tm ne aor tmhare aabaؤ ajdad ne rkh lie hin، allh ne an ke lie koei snd nazl nhin ki frman roaei ka aqtdar allh ke soa ksi ke lie nhin he as ka hkm he kh khod as ke soa tm ksi ki bndgi nh kro ihi thith sidha triq zndgi he، mgr aksr log jante nhin hin
12.41: Ae zndan ke sathio، tmhare khoab ki tعbir ih he kh tm min se aik to apne rb (shah msr) ko shrab plaee ga، rha dosra to ase soli pr chrhaia jaee ga aor prnde as ka sr noch noch kr khaein ge fislh ho gia aus bat ka jo tm pochh rhe the"
12.42: Phr aun min se js ke mtعlq khial tha kh oh rha ho jaee ga as se iosfؑ ne kha kh "apne rb (shah msr) se mira zkr krna" mgr shitan ne ase aisa ghflt min dala kh oh apne rb (shah msr) se as ka zkr krna bhol gia aor iosfؑ kei sal qid khane min pra rha
12.43: Aik roz badshah ne kha "min ne khoab min dikha he kh sat moti gaein hin jn ko sat dbli gaein kha rhi hin، aor anaj ki sat balin hri hin aor dosri sat sokhi ae ahl drbar، mjhe as khoab ki tعbir btaؤ agr tm khoabon ka mtlb smjhte ho"
12.44: Logon ne kha "ih to prishan khoabon ki batin hin aor hm as trh ke khoabon ka mtlb nhin jante"
12.45: Aun do qidion min se jo shkhs bch gia tha aor ause aik mdt draz ke bعd ab bat iad aaei، aus ne kha "min aap hzrat ko as ki taoil btata hon، mjhe zra (qid khane min iosfؑ ke pas) bhij dijie"
12.46: As ne ja kr kha "iosfؑ، ae srapa rasti، mjhe as khoab ka mtlb bta kh sat moti gaein jn ko sat dbli gaein kha rhi hin aor sat balin hri hin aor sat sokhi shaid kh min aun logon ke pas jaؤn aor shaid kh oh jan lin"
12.47: Iosfؑ ne kha "sat br s tk lgatar tm log khiti bari krte rho ge as doran min jo fslin tm kato aun min se bs thora sahsh، jo tmhari khorak ke kam aaee، nkalo aor baqi ko as ki balon hi min rhne do
12.48: Phr sat brs bht skht aaein ge aus zmane min oh sb ghlh kha lia jaee ga jo tm aus oqt ke lie jmع kro ge agr kchh bche ga to bs ohi jo tm ne mhfoz kr rkha ho
12.49: As ke bعd phr aik sal aisa aaee ga js min baran rhmt se logon ki friad rsi ki jaee gi aor oh rs nchorin ge"
12.50: Badshah ne kha ase mire pas laؤ mgr jb shahi frstadh iosfؑ ke pas phncha to as ne kha "apne rb ke pas oaps ja aor as se pochh kh aun عorton ka kia mعamlh he jnhon ne apne hath kat lie the? Mira rb to an ki mkari se oaqf hi he"
12.51: As pr badshah ne an عorton se driaft kia "tmhara kia tjrbh he aus oqt ka jb tm ne iosfؑ ko rjhane ki koshsh ki thi?" sb ne ik zban ho kr kha "hashallh، hm ne to aus min bdi ka shaebh tk nh paia" عziz ki bioi bol athi "ab hq khl chka he، oh min hi thi js ne aus ko phslane ki koshsh ki thi، be shk oh balkl scha he"
12.52: (iosfؑ ne kha) "ais se miri ghrz ih thi kh (عziz) ih jan le kh min ne drprdh as ki khiant nhin ki thi، aor ih kh jo khiant krte hin an ki chalon ko allh kamiabi ki rah pr nhin lgata
12.53: Min kchh apne nfs ki braءat nhin kr rha hon، nfs to bdi pr aksata hi he ala ih kh ksi pr mire rb ki rhmt ho، be shk mira rb bra ghfor o rhim he"
12.54: Badshah ne kha "aunhin mire pas laؤ takh min an ko apne lie mkhsos kr lon" jb iosfؑ ne as se gftgo ki to as ne kha "ab aap hmare han qdr o mnzlt rkhte hin aor aap ki amant pr pora bhrosa he"
12.55: Iosfؑ ne kha، "mlk ke khzane mire sprd kijie، min hfazt krne oala bhi hon aor عlm bhi rkhta hon"
12.56: Ais trh hm ne aus srzmin min iosfؑ ke lie aqtdar ki rah hmoar ki oh mkhtar tha kh as min jhan chahe apni jgh bnaee hm apni rhmt se js ko chahte hin noazte hin، nik logon ka ajr hmare han mara nhin jata
12.57: Aor aakhrt ka ajr aun logo n ke lie ziadh bhtr he jo aiman le aaee aor khda trsi ke sath kam krte rhe
12.58: Iosfؑ ke bhaei msr aaee aor as ke han hazr hoee as ne anhin phchan lia mgr oh as se na aashna the
12.59: Phr jb as ne an ka saman tiar kroa dia to chlte oqt an se kha، "apne sotile bhaei ko mire pas lana dikhte nhin ho kh min ks trh pimanh bhr kr dita hon aor kisa achha mhman noaz hon
12.60: Agr tm ase nh laؤ ge to mire pas tmhare lie koei ghlh nhin he blkh tm mire qrib bhi nh phtkna"
12.61: Anhon ne kha، "hm koshsh krin ge kh oald sahb ase bhijne pr r azi ho jaein، aor hm aisa zror krin ge"
12.62: Iosfؑ ne apne ghlamon ko asharh kia kh "ain logon ne ghle ke عoz jo mal dia he oh chpke se an ke saman hi min rkh do" ih iosfؑ ne ais amid pr kia kh ghr phnch kr oh apna oaps paia hoa mal phchan jaein ge (ia ais fiazi pr ahsan mnd hon ge) aor عjb nhin kh phr pltin
12.63: Jb oh apne bap ke pas gee to kha "aba jan، aaendh hm ko ghlh dine se ankar kr dia gia he، lhaza aap hmare bhaei ko hmare sath bhij dijie takh hm ghlh le kr aaein aor as ki hfazt ke hm zmh dar hin"
12.64: Bap ne joab dia "kia min aus ke mعamlh min tm pr oisa hi bhrosh kron jisa ais se phle aus ke bhaei ke mعamlh min kr chka hon? Allh hi bhtr mhafz he aor oh sb se brh kr rhm frmane oala he"
12.65: Phr jb anhon ne apna saman khola to dikha kh an ka mal bhi anhin oaps kr dia gia he ih dikh kr oh pkar athe "aba jan، aor hmin kia chahie، dikhie ih hmara mal bhi hmin oaps de dia gia he bs ab hm jaein ge aor apne ahl o عial ke lie rsd le aaein ge، apne bhaei ki hfazt bhi krin ge aor aik barshtr aor ziadh bhi le aaein ge، atne ghlh ka azafh aasani ke sath ho jaee ga"
12.66: An ke bap ne kha "min as ko hrgz tmhare sath nh bhijon ga jb tk kh tm allh ke nam se mjh ko piman nh de do kh aise mire pa s zror oaps le kr aaؤ ge ala ih kh khin tm ghir hi lie jaؤ" jb anhon ne as ko apne apne piman de die to as ne kha "dikho، hmare as qol pr allh nghban he"
12.67: Phr as ne kha "mire bcho، msr ke daralstnt min aik droaze se dakhl nh hona blkh mkhtlf droazon se jana mgr min allh ki mshit se tm ko nhin bcha skta، hkm aus ke soa ksi ka bhi nhin chlta، asi pr min ne bhrosh kia، aor js ko bhi bhrosh krna ho asi pr kre"
12.68: Aor oaqعh bhi ihi hoa kh jb oh apne bap ki hdait ke mtabq shhr min (mtfrq droazon se) dakhl hoee to as ki ih ahtiati tdbir allh ki mshit ke mqable min kchh bhi kam nh aaski han bs iعqobؑ ke dl min jo aik khtk thi ase dor krne ke lie as ne apni si koshsh kr li be shk oh hmari di hoei tعlim se sahb عlm tha mgr aksr log mعamlh ki hqiqt ko jante nhin hin
12.69: Ih log iosfؑ ke hzor phnche to as ne apne bhaei ko apne pas alg bla lia aor ase bta dia kh "min tira ohi bhaei hon (jo khoia gia tha) ab to aun baton ka ghm nh kr jo ih log krte rhe hin"
12.70: Jb iosfؑ an bhaeion ka saman ldoane lga to as ne apne bhaei ke saman min apna pialh rkh dia phr aik pkarne oale ne pkar kr kha "ae qafle oalo، tm lo g chor ho"
12.71: Anhon ne plt kr pochha "tmhari kia chiz khoei gei? "
12.72: Srkari mlazmon ne kha "badshah ka pimanh hm ko nhin mlta" (aor an ke jmعdar ne kha) "jo shkhs la kr de ga aus ke lie aik barshtr anعam he، as ka min zmh lita hon"
12.73: An bhaeion ne kha "khda ki qsm، to log khob jante ho kh hm as mlk min fsad krne nhin aaee hin aor hm chorian krne oale log nhin hin"
12.74: Aunhon ne kha "achha، agr tmhari bat jhoti nkli to chor ki kia sza he?"
12.75: Aunhon ne kha "aus ki sza? Js ke saman min se chiz nkle oh aap hi apni sza min rkh lia jaee، hmare han to aise zalmon ko sza dine ka ihi triqh he"
12.76: Tb iosfؑ ne apne bhaei se phle aun ki khrjion ki tlashi lini shroع ki، phr apne bhaei ki khrji se gm shdh chiz braamd kr li ais trh hm ne iosfؑ ki taeid apni tdbir se ki aus ka ih kam nh tha kh badshah ke din (iعni msr ke shahi qanon) min apne bhaei ko pkrta ala ih kh allh hi aisa chahe hm js ke drje chahte hin blnd kr dite hin، aor aik عlm rkhne oala aisa he jo hr sahb عlm se bala tr he
12.77: An bhaeion ne kha "ih chori kre to kchh tعjb ki bat bhi nhin، as se phle as ka bhaei (iosfؑ) bhi chori kr chka he" iosfؑ an ki ih bat sn kr pi gia، hqiqt an pr nh kholi bs (zir lb) atna khh kr rh gia kh "bre hi bre ho tm log، (mire mnh dr mnh mjh pr) jo alzam tm lga rhe ho as ki hqiqt khda khob janta he"
12.78: Anhon ne kha "ae srdar zi aqtdar (عziz)، as ka bap bht borha aadmi he، as ki jgh aap hm min se ksi ko rkh lijie، hm aap ko bra hi nik nfs ansan pate hin"
12.79: Iosfؑ ne kha "pnah bkhda، dosre ksi shkhs ko hm kise rkh skte hin js ke pas hm ne apna mal paia he as ko chhor kr dosre ko rkhin ge to hm zalm hon ge"
12.80: Jb oh iosfؑ se maios ho gee to aik goshe min ja kr aaps min mshorh krne lge an min jo sb se bra tha oh bola "tm jante nhin ho kh tmhare oald tm se khda ke nam pr kia عhd o piman le chke hin aor as se phle iosfؑ ke mعamlh min jo ziadti tm kr chke ho oh bhi tm ko mعlom he ab min to ihan se hrgz nh jaؤn ga jb tk kh mire oald mjhe ajazt nh din، ia phr allh hi mire hq min koei fislh frma de kh oh sb se bhtr fislh krne oala he
12.81: Tm ja kr apne oald se kho kh "aba jan، aap ke sahbzade ne chori ki he hm ne ase chori krte hoee nhin dikha، jo kchh hmin mعlom hoa he bs ohi hm bian kr rhe hin، aor ghib ki nghbani to hm nh kr skte the
12.82: Aap aus bsti ke logon se pochh lijie jhan hm the aus qafle se driaft kr lijie js ke sath hm aaee hin hm apne bian min balkl sche hin"
12.83: Bap ne ih dastan sn kr kha "drasl tmhare nfs ne tmhare lie aik aor bri bat ko shl bna dia achha as pr bhi sbr kron ga aor bkhobi kron ga kia bعid he kh allh an sb ko mjh se la mla ee، oh sb kchh janta he aor as ke sb kam hkmt pr mbni hin"
12.84: Phr oh an ki trf se mnh phir kr bith gia aor khne lga kh "ha ee iosf!" oh dl hi dl min ghm se ghta ja rha tha aor as ki aankhin sfid pr gei thin
12.85: Biton ne kha "khdara! Aap to bs iosf hi ko iad kie jate hin nobt ih aa gei he kh as ke ghm min apne aap ko ghla din ge ia apni jan hlak kr dalin ge"
12.86: Aus ne kha "min apni prishani aor apne ghm ki friad allh ke soa ksi se nhin krta، aor allh se jisa min oaqf hon tm nhin ho
12.87: Mire bcho، ja kr iosfؑ aor as ke bhaei ki kchh toh lgaؤ، allh ki rhmt se maios nh ho، as ki rhmt se to bs kafr hi maios hoa krte hin"
12.88: Jb ih log msr ja kr iosfؑ ki pishi min dakhl hoee to anhon ne عrz kia kh "ae srdar ba aqtdar، hm aor hmare ahl o عial skht msibt min mbtla hin aor hm kchh hqir si ponji le kr aaee hin، aap hmin bhr por ghlh عnait frmaein aor hm ko khirat din، allh khirat krne oalon ko jza dita he"
12.89: (ih sn kriosfؑ se nh rha gia) aus ne kha "tmhin kchh ih bhi mعlom he kh tm ne iosfؑ aor aus ke bhaei ke sath kia kia tha jbkh tm nadan the"
12.90: Oh chonk kr bole "kia tm iosfؑ ho?" aus ne kha، "han، min iosfؑ hon aor ih mira bhaei he allh ne hm pr ahsan frmaia hqiqt ih he kh agr koei tqoia aor sbr se kam le to allh ke han aise nik logon ka ajr mara nhin jata"
12.91: Anhon ne kha "bkhda kh tm ko allh ne hm pr fzilt bkhshi aor oaqعi hm khta kar the"
12.92: As ne joab dia، "aaj tm pr koei grft nhin، allh tmhin mعaf kre، oh sb se brh kr rhm frmane oala he
12.93: Jaؤ، mira ih qmis le jaؤ aor mire oald ke mnh pr dal do، aun ki binaei plt aaee gi، aor apne sb ahl o عial ko mire pas le aaؤ"
12.94: Jb ih qaflh (msr se) roanh hoa to an ke bap ne (knعan min) kha "min iosfؑ ki khoshbo mhsos kr rha hon، tm log khin ih nh khne lgo kh min brhape min sthia gia hon"
12.95: Ghr ke log bole "khda ki qsm aap abhi tk apne asi prane khbt min pre hoee hin"
12.96: Phr jb kho sh khbri lane oala aaia to as ne iosfؑ ka qmis iعqobؑ ke mnh pr dal dia aor ika ik as ki binaei عod kr aaei tb as ne kha "min tm se khta nh tha? Min allh ki trf se oh kchh janta hon jo tm nhin jante"
12.97: Sb bol athe "aba jan، aap hmare gnahon ki bkhshsh ke lie dعa krin، oaqعi hm khta kar the"
12.98: Aus ne kha "min apne rb se tmhare lie mعafi ki drkhoast kron ga، oh bra mعaf krne oala aor rhim he"
12.99: Phr jb ih log iosfؑ ke pas phnche to aus ne apne oaldin ko apne sath btha lia aor (apne sb knbe oalon se) kha "chlo، ab shhr min chlo، allh ne chaha to amn chin se rho ge"
12.100: (shhr min dakhl hone ke bعd) as ne apne oaldin ko atha kr apne pas tkht pr bthaia aor sb as ke aage be akhtiar sjde min jhk gee iosfؑ ne kha "aba jan، ih tعbir he mire aus khoab ki jo min ne phle dikha tha، mire rb ne ase hqiqt bna dia as ka ahsan he kh aus ne mjhe qid khane se nkala، aor aap logon ko shra se la kr mjh se mlaia halankh shitan mire aor mire bhaeion ke drmian fsad dal chka tha oaqعh ih he kh mira rb ghir mhsos tdbiron se apni mshit pori krta he، be shk o h عlim aor hkim he
12.101: Ae mire rb، to ne mjhe hkomt bkhshi aor mjh ko baton ki th tk phnchna skhaia zmin o aasman ke bnane oale، to hi dnia aor aakhrt min mira srprst he، mira khatmh aslam pr kr aor anjam kar mjhe salhin ke sath mla"
12.102: Ae mhmdؐ، ih qsh ghib ki khbron min se he jo hm tm pr ohi kr rhe hin ornh tm aus oqt mojod nh the jb iosfؑ ke bhaeion ne aaps min atfaq kr ke sazsh ki thi
12.103: Mgr tm khoah ktna hi chaho ain min se aksr log man kr dine oale nhin hin
12.104: Halankh tm as khdmt pr an se koei ajrt bhi nhin mangte ho ih to aik nsiht he jo dnia oalon ke lie عam he
12.105: Zmin aor aasmanon min ktni hi nshanian hin jn pr se ih log gzrte rhte hin aor zra tojh nhin krte
12.106: An min se aksr allh ko mante hin mgr as trh kh aus ke sath dosron ko shr ik thirate hin
12.107: Kia ih mtmen hin kh khda ke عzab ki koei bla anhin dboch nh le gi ia be khbri min qiamt ki ghri achank an pr nh aa jaee gi?
12.108: Tm an se saf khh do kh "mira rasth to ih he، min allh ki trf blata hon، min khod bhi pori roshni min apna rasth dikh rha hon aor mire sathi bhi، aor allh pak he aor shrk krne oalon se mira koei oasth nhin"
12.109: Ae mhmdؐ، tm se phle hm ne jo pighmbr bhije the oh sb bhi ansan hi the، aor anhi bstion ke rhne oalon min se the، aor aunhi ki trf hm ohi bhijte rhe hin phr kia ih log zmin min chle phre nhin hin kh aun qomon ka anjam anhin nzr nh aaia jo an se phle gzr chki hin? Iqinaan aakhrt ka ghr aun logon ke lie aor ziadh bhtr he jnhon ne (pighmbron ki bat man kr) tqoia ki rosh akhtiar ki kia ab bhi tm log nh smjho ge?
12.110: (phle pighmbron ke sath bhi ihi hota rha he kh oh mdton nsiht krte rhe aor logon ne sn kr nh dia) ihan tk kh jb pighmbr logon se maios ho gee aor logon ne bhi smjh lia kh aun se jhot bola gia tha، to ika ik hmari mdd pighmbron ko phnch gei phr jb aisa moqع aa jata he to hmara qaعdh ih he kh jse hm chahte hin bcha lite hin aor mjrmon pr se to hmara عzab tala hi nhin ja skta
12.111: Agle logon ke an qson min عql o hosh rkhne oalon ke lie عbrt he ih jo kchh qraan min bian kia ja rha he ih bnaoti batin nhin hin blkh jo ktabin as se phle aaei hoei hin anhi ki tsdiq he aor hr chiz ki tfsil aor aiman lane oalon ke lie hdait aor rhmt

13.1: A l m r ih ktab alahi ki aaiat hin، aor jo kchh tmhare rb ki trf se tm pr nazl kia gia he oh عin hq he، mgr (tmhari qom ke) aksr log man nhin rhe hin
13.2: Oh allh hi he js ne aasmanon ko aise sharon ke bghir qaem kia jo tm ko nzr aate ho n، phr oh apne tkht sltnt pr jloh frma hoa، aor aus ne aaftab o mahtab ko aik qanon ka pabnd bnaia ais sare nzam ki hr chiz aik oqt mqrr tk ke lie chl rhi he aor allh hi ais sare kam ki tdbir frma rha he oh nshanian khol khol kr bian krta he، shaid kh tm apne rb ki mlaqat ka iqin kro
13.3: Aor ohi he js ne ih zmin phila rkhi he، as min pharon ke kho nte gar rkhe hin aor dria bha die hin ausi ne hr trh ke phlon ke jore pida kie hin، aor ohi dn pr rat tari krta he an sari chizon min bri nshanian hin aun logon ke lie jo ghor o fkr se kam lite hin
13.4: Aor dikho، zmin min alg alg khte paee jate hin jo aik dosre se mtsl oaqع hin angor ke bagh hin، khitian hin، khjor ke drkht hin jn min se kchh akhre hin aor kchh dohre sb ko aik hi pani sirab krta he mgr mze min hm ksi ko bhtr bna dite hin aor ksi ko kmtr an sb chizon min bht si nshanian hin aun logon ke lie jo عql se kam lite hin
13.5: Ab agr tmhin tعjb krna he to tعjb ke qabl logon ka ih qol he kh "jb hm mr kr mti ho jaein ge to kia hm nee sre se pida kie jaein ge?" ih oh log hin jnhon ne apne rb se kfr kia he ih oh log hin jn ki grdnon min toq pre hoee hin ih jhnmi hin aor jhnm min hmishh rhin ge
13.6: Ih log bhlaei se phle braei ke lie jldi mcha rhe hin halankh an se phle (jo log as rosh pr chle hin an pr khda ke عzab ki) عbrt nak msalin gzr chki hin hqiqt ih he kh tira rb logon ki ziadtion ke baojod an ke sath chshm poshi se kam lita he aor ih bhi hqiqt he kh tira rb skht sza dine oala he
13.7: Ih log jnhon ne tmhari ba t manne se ankar kr dia he، khte hin kh "ais shkhs pr as ke rb ki trf se koei nshani kion nh atri? Tm to mhz khbrdar kr dine oale ho، aor hr qom ke lie aik rhnma he
13.8: Allh aik aik hamlh ke pit se oaqf he jo kchh as min bnta he ase bhi oh janta he aor jo kchh as min kmi ia bishi hoti he as se bhi oh bakhbr rhta he hr chiz ke lie aus ke han aik mqdar mqr rhe
13.9: Oh poshidh aor zahr، hr chiz ka عalm he oh bzrg he aor hr hal min bala tr rhne oala he
13.10: Tm min se koei shkhs khoah zor se ba t kre ia aahsth، aor koei rat ki tariki min chhpa hoa ho ia dn ki roshni min chl rha ho، as ke lie sb iksan hin
13.11: Hr shkhs ke aage aor pichhe as ke mqrr kie hoee ngran lge hoee hin jo allh ke hkm se as ki dikh bhal kr rhe hin hqiqt ih he kh allh ksi qom ke hal ko nhin bdlta jb tk oh khod apne aosaf ko nhin bdl diti aor jb allh ksi qom ki shamt lane ka fislh kr le to phr oh ksi ke tale nhin tl skti، nh allh ke mqable min aisi qom ka koei hami o mdd gar ho skta he
13.12: Ohi he jo tmhare samne bjlian chmkata he jnhin dikh kr tmhin andishe bhi lahq hote hin aor amidin bhi bndhti hin ohi he jo pani se lde hoee badl athata he
13.13: Badlon ki grj as ki hmd ke sath as ki paki bian krti he aor frshte as ki hibt se lrzte hoee aus ki tsbih krte hin oh krkti hoei bjlion ko bhijta he aor (bsa aoqat) aunhin js pr chahta he عin as halt min gra dita he jbkh log allh ke bare min jhgr rhe hote hin fi aloaqع as ki chal bri zbrdst he
13.14: Asi ko pkarna brhq he rhin oh dosri hstian jnhin as ko chhor kr ih log pkarte hin، oh aun ki dعaؤn ka koei joab nhin de sktin aunhin pkarna to aisa he jise koei shkhs pani ki trf hath phila kr aus se drkhoast kre kh to mire mnh tk phnch ja، halankh pani aus tk phnchne oala nhin bs aisi trh kafron ki dعaein bhi kchh nhin hin mgr aik tir be hdf!
13.15: Oh to allh hi he js ko zmin o aasman ki hr chiz toعaan o krhaan sjdh kr rhi he aor sb chizon ke saee sbh o sham aus ke aage jhkte hin
13.16: Ain se pochho، aasman o zmin ka rb kon he? Kho، allh phr an se kho kh jb hqiqt ih he to kia tm ne ause chhor kr aise mعbodon ko apna karsaz thira lia jo khod apne lie bhi ksi nfع o nqsan ka akhtiar nhin rkhte? Kho، kia andha aor aankhon oala brabr hoa krta he? Kia roshni aor tarikian iksan hoti hin? Aor agr aisa nhin to kia ain thiraee hoee shrikon ne bhi allh ki trh kchh pida kia he kh aus ki ojh se ain pr tkhliq ka mعamlh mshtbh ho gia? Kho، hr chiz ka khalq srf allh he aor oh ikta he، sb pr ghalb!
13.17: Allh ne aasman se pani brsaia aor hr ndi nalh apne zrf ke mtabq ase le kr chl nkla phr jb silab atha to sth pr jhag bhi aa gee aor oise hi jhag aun dhaton pr bhi athte hin jnhin zior aor brtn oghirh bnane ke lie log pghlaia krte hin aisi msal se allh hq aor batl ke mعamle ko oazh krta he jo jhag he oh ar jaia krta he aor jo chiz ansanon ke lie nafع he oh zmin min thir jati he as trh allh msalon se apni bat smjhata he
13.18: Jn logon ne apne rb ki dعot qbol kr li he aun ke lie bhlaei he aor jnhon ne ase qbol nh kia oh agr zmin ki sari dolt ke bhi malk hon aor atni hi aor frahm kr lin to oh khda ki pkr se bchne ke lie as sb ko fdih min de dalne pr tia r ho jaein ge ih oh log hin jn se bri trh hsab lia jaee ga aor aun ka thkanh jhnm he، bht hi bra thkana
13.19: Bhla ih ks trh mmkn he kh oh shkhs jo tmhare rb ki ais ktab ko jo as ne tm pr nazl ki he hq janta he، aor oh shkhs jo as hqiqt ki trf se andha he، donon iksan ho jaein? Nsiht to dansh mnd log hi qbol kia krte hin
13.20: Aor aun ka trz عml ih hota he kh allh ke sath apne عhd ko pora krte hin، ause mzbot bandhne ke bعd tor nhin dalte
13.21: Aun ki rosh ih hoti he kh allh ne jn jn roabt ko brqrar rkhne ka hkm dia he anhin brqrar rkhte hin، apne rb se drte hin aor as bat ka khof rkhte hin kh khin an se bri trh hsab nh lia jaee
13.22: Aun ka hal ih hota he kh apne rb ki rza ke lie sbr se kam lite hin، nmaz qaem krte hin، hmare die hoee rzq min se عlanih aor poshidh khrch krte hin، aor braei ko bhlaei se dfع krte hin aakhrt ka ghr anhi logon ke lie he
13.23: Iعni aise bagh jo aun ki abdi qiam gah hon ge oh khod bhi an min dakhl hon ge aor an ke aabaؤ ajdad aor aun ki bioion aor aun ki aolad min se jo jo salh hin oh bhi aun ke sath ohan jaein ge mlaekh hr trf se aun ke astqbal ke lie aaein ge
13.24: Aor aun se khin ge kh "tm pr slamti he، tm ne dnia min js trh sbr se kam lia aus ki bdolt aaj tm ais ke msthq hoee ho" ps kia hi khob he ih aakhrt ka ghr!
13.25: Rhe oh log jo allh ke عhd ko mzbot bandh line ke bعd tor dalte hin، jo aun rabton ko katte hin jnhin allh ne jorne ka hkm dia he، aor jo zmin min fsad philate hin، oh lعnt ke msthq hin aor an ke lie aakhrt min bht bra thkana he
13.26: Allh js ko chahta he rzq ki frakhi bkhshta he aor jse chahta he kh npa tla rzq dita he ih log dnioi zndgi min mgn hin، halankh d nia ki zndgi aakhrt ke mqable min aik mtaع qlil ke soa kchh bhi nhin
13.27: Ih log jnhon ne (rsalt mhmdiؐ ko manne se) ankar kr dia he khte hin "ais shkhs pr ais ke rb ki trf se koei nshani kion nh atri" kho، allh jse chahta he gmrah kr dita he aor oh apni trf aane ka rasth ausi ko dkhata he jo aus ki trf rjoع kre
13.28: Aise hi log hin oh jnhon ne (ais nbi ki dعot ko) man lia aor aun ke dlon ko allh ki iad se atminan nsib hota he khbrdar rho! Allh ki iad hi oh chiz he js se dlon ko atminan nsib hoa krta he
13.29: Phr jn logon ne dعot hq ko mana aor nik عml kie oh khosh nsib hin aor an ke lie achha anjam he
13.30: Ae mhmdؐ، aisi shan se hm ne tm ko rsol bna kr bhija he، aik aisi qom min js se phle bht si qomin gzr chki hin، takh tm ain logon ko oh pigham snaؤ jo hm ne tm pr nazl kia he، ais hal min kh ih apne nhait mhrban khda ke kafr bne hoee hin ain se kho kh ohi mira rb he، aus ke soa koei mعbod nhin he، ausi pr min ne bhrosh kia aor ohi mira mlja o maoia he
13.31: Aor kia ho jata agr koei aisa qraan atar dia jata js ke zor se phar chlne lgte، ia zmin shq ho jati، ia murde qbron se nkl kr bolne lgte? (as trh ki nshanian dkha dina kchh mshkl nhin he) blkh sara akhtiar hi allh ke hath min he phr kia ahl aiman (abhi tk kfar ki tlb ke joab min ksi nshani ke zhor ki aas lga ee bithe hin aor oh ih jan kr) maios nhin ho gee kh agr allh chahta to sare ansanon ko hdait de dita? Jn logon ne khda ke sath kfr ka roih akhtiar kr r kha he aun pr an ke krtoton ki ojh se koei nh koei aaft aati hi rhti he، ia an ke ghr ke qrib khin nazl hoti he ih slslh chlta rhe ga ihan tk kh allh ka oعdh aan pora ho iqinaan allh apne oعde ki khlaf orzi nhin krta
13.32: Tm se phle bhi bht se rsolon ka mzaq araia ja chka he، mgr min ne hmishh mnkr in ko dhil di aor aakhr kar an ko pkr lia، phr dikh lo kh miri sza kisi skht thi
13.33: Phr kia oh jo aik aik mtnfs ki kmaei pr nzr rkhta he (aus ke mqable min ih jsartin ki ja rhi hin kh) logon ne aus ke kchh shrik thira rkhe hin? Ae nbiؐ، ain se kho (agr oaqعi oh khda ke apne bnaee hoee shrik hin to) zra aun ke na m lo kh oh kon hin? Kia tm allh ko aik nei bat ki khbr de rhe ho jse oh apni zmin min nhin janta? Ia tm log bs ionhi jo mnh min aata he khh dalte ho? Hqiqt ih he kh jn logon ne dعot hq ko manne se ankar kia he an ke lie aun ki mkarian khoshnma bna di gei hin aor oh rah rast se rok die gee hin، phr js ko allh gmrahi min phink de ause koei rah dkhane oala nhin he
13.34: Aise logon ke lie dnia ki zndgi hi min عzab he، aor aakhrt ka عzab aus se bhi ziadh skht he koei aisa nhin jo aunhin khda se bchane oala ho
13.35: Khda trs ansanon ke lie js jnt ka oعdh kia gia he as ki shan ih he kh as ke niche nhrin bhh rhi hin، as ke phl daemi hin aor as ka saih lazoal ih anjam he mtqi logon ka aor mnkrin hq ka anjam ih he kh an ke lie dozkh ki aag he
13.36: Ae nbiؐ، jn logon ko hm ne phle ktab di thi oh ais ktab se jo hm ne tm pr nazl ki he، khosh hin aor mkhtlf grohon min kchh log aise bhi hin jo as ki bعz baton ko nhin mante tm saf khh do kh "mjhe to srf allh ki bndgi ka hkm dia gia he aor as se mnع kia gia he kh ksi ko as ke sath shrik thiraؤn lhaza min asi ki trf dعot dita hon aor asi ki trf mira rjoع he"
13.37: Aisi hdait ke sath hm ne ih frman عrbi tm pr nazl kia he ab agr tm ne ais عlm ke baojod jo tmhare pas aa chka he logon ki khoahshat ki piroi ki to allh ke mqable min nh koei tmhara hami o mddgar he aor nh koei as ki pkrse tm ko bcha skta he
13.38: Tm se phle bhi hm bht se rsol bhij chke hin aor aun ko hm ne bioi bchon oala hi bnaia tha aor ksi rsol ki bhi ih taqt nh thi kh allh ke azn ke bghir koei nshani khod la dkhata hr dor ke lie aik ktab he
13.39: Allh jo kchh chahta he mta dita he aor js chiz ko chahta he qaem rkhta he، am alktab ausi ke pas he
13.40: Aor ae nbiؐ، js bre anjam ki dhmki hm ain logon ko de rhe hin aus koei hsh khoah hm tmhare jite ji dkha din ia as ke zhor min aane se phle hm tmhin atha lin، bhr hal tmhara kam srf pigham phncha dina he aor hsab lina hmara kam he
13.41: Kia ih log dikhte nhin hin kh hm ais srzmin pr chle aa rhe hin aor as ka daerh hr trf se tng krte chle aate hin? Allh hkomt kr rha he، koei as ke fislon pr nzr sani krne o ala nhin he، aor ause hsab lite kchh dir nhin lgti
13.42: Ain se phle jo log ho gzre hin oh bhi bri bri chalin chl chke hin، mgr asl fislh kn chal to pori ki pori allh hi ke hath min he oh janta he kh kon kia kchh kmaei kr rha he، aor عnqrib ih mnkrin hq dikh lin ge kh anjam ks ka bkhir hota he
13.43: Ih mnkrin khte hin kh tm khda ke bhije hoee nhin ho kho "mire aor tmhare drmian allh ki goahi kafi he aor phr hr aus shkhs ki goahi jo ktab aasmani ka عlm rkhta he"

14.1: A l r ae mhmdؐ، ih aik ktab he js ko hm ne tmhari trf nazl kia he takh tm logon ko tarikion se nkal kr roshni min laؤ، an ke rb ki tofiq se، aus khda ke raste pr jo zbrdst aor apni zat min aap mhmod he
14.2: Aor zmin aor aasmanon ki sari mojodat ka malk he aor skht tbah kn sza he qbol hq se ankar krne oalon ke lie
14.3: Jo dnia ki zndgi ko aakhrt pr trjih dite hin، jo allh ke raste se logon ko rok rhe hin aor chahte hin kh ih rasth (an ki khoahshat ke mtabq) titrha ho jaee ih log gmrahi min bht dor nkl gee hin
14.4: Hm ne apna pigham dine ke lie jb kbhi koei rsol bhija he، aus ne apni qom hi ki zban min pigham dia he takh oh anhin achhi trh khol kr bat smjhaee phr allh jse chahta he bhtka dita he aor jse chahta he hdait bkhshta he، oh bala dst aor hkim he
14.5: Hm ais se phle mosiaؑ ko bhi apni nshanion ke sath bhij chke hin ase bhi hm ne hkm dia tha kh apni qom ko tarikion se nkal kr roshni min la aor anhin tarikh alahi ke sbq aamoz oaqعat sna kr nsiht kr ain oaqعat min bri nshanian hin hr aus shkhs ke lie jo sbr aor shkr krne oala ho
14.6: Iad kro jb mosiaؑ ne apni qom se kha "allh ke aus ahsan ko iad rkho jo as ne tm pr kia he as ne tm ko frعon oalon se chhraia jo tm ko skht tklifin dite the، tmhare lrkon ko qtl kr dalte the aor tmhari عorton ko zndh bcha rkhte the as min tmhare rb ki trf se tmhari bri aazmaesh thi
14.7: Aor iad rkho، tmhare rb ne khbrdar kr dia tha kh agr shkr gzar bno ge to min tm ko aor ziadh noazon ga aor agr kfran nعmt kro ge to miri sza bht skht he"
14.8: Aor mosiaؑ ne kha kh "agr tm kfr kro aor zmin ke sare rhne oale bhi kafr ho jaein to allh be niaz aor apni zat min aap mhmod he"
14.9: Kia tmhin aun qomon ke halat nhin phnche jo tm se phle gzr chki hin? Qom nohؑ، عad، smod aor aun ke bعd aane oali bht si qomin jn ka shmar allh hi ko mعlom he? Aun ke rsol jb aun ke pas saf saf batin aor khli khli nshanian lie hoee aaee to aunhon ne apne mnh min hath dba lie aor kha kh "js pigham ke sath tm bhije gee ho hm as ko nhin mante aor js chiz ki tm hmin dعot dite ho aus ki trf se hm skht khljan aamiz shk min pre hoee hin"
14.10: Aun ke rsolon ne kha "kia khda ke bare min shk he jo aasmanon aor zmin ka khalq he? Oh tmhin bla r =ha he takh tmhare qsor mعaf kre aor tm ko aik mdt mqrr tk mhlt de" aunhon ne joab dia "tm kchh nhin ho mgr oise hi ansan jise hm hin tm hmin aun hstion ki bndgi se rokna chahte ho jn ki bndgi bap dada se hoti chli aa rhi he achha to laؤ koei srih snd"
14.11: An ke rsolon ne an se kha "oaqعi hm kchh nhin hin mgr tm hi jise ansan likn allh apne bndon min se js ko chahta he noazta he aor ih hmare akhtiar min nhin he kh tmhin koei snd la din snd to allh hi ke azn se aaskti he aor allh hi pr ahl aiman ko bhrosh krna chahie
14.12: Aor hm kion nh allh pr bhrosh krin jbkh hmari zndgi ki rahon min as ne hmari rhnmaei ki he? Jo azitin tm log hmin de rhe ho aun pr hm sbr krin ge aor bhrosa krne oalon ka bhrosa allh hi pr hona chahie"
14.13: Aakhr kar mnkrin ne apne rsolon se khh dia kh "ia to tmhin hmari mlt min oaps aana hoga ornh hm tmhin apne mlk se nkal din ge" tb aun ke rb ne aun pr ohi bhiji kh "hm ain zalmon ko hla k kr din ge
14.14: Aor aun ke bعd tmhin zmin min aabad krin ge ih anعam he aus ka jo mire hzor joab dhi ka khof rkhta ho aor miri oعid se drta ho"
14.15: Aunhon ne fislh chaha tha (to ion aun ka fislh hoa) aor hr jbar dshmn hq ne mnh ki khaei
14.16: Phr as ke bعd aage as ke lie jhnm he ohan ause kch lho ka sa pani pine ko dia jaee ga
14.17: Jse oh zbrdsti hlq se atarne ki koshsh kre ga aor mshkl hi se atar ske ga mot hr trf se as pr chhaei rhe gi mgr oh mrne nh paee ga aor aage aik skht عzab as ki jan ka lago rhe ga
14.18: Jn logon ne apne rb se kfr kia he an ke aعmal ki msal aus rakh ki si he jse aik tofani dn ki aandhi ne ara dia ho oh apne kie ka kchh bhi phl nh pa skin ge ihi prle drje ki gm gshtgi he
14.19: Kia tm dikhte nhin ho kh allh ne aasman o zmin ki tkhliq ko hq pr qaem kia he? Oh chahe to tm logon ko le jaee aor aik nei khlqt tmhari jgh le aaee
14.20: Aisa krna as pr kchh bhi dshoar nhin he
14.21: Aor ih log jb akthe allh ke samne be nqab hon ge to aus oqt ain min se jo dnia min kmzor the o h aun logon se jo bre bne hoee the، khin ge "dnia min hm tmhare tabع the، ab kia tm allh ke عzab se hm ko bchane ke lie bhi kchh krskte ho?"oh joab din ge "agr allh ne hmin njat ki koei rah dkhaei hoti to hm zror tmhin bhi dkha dite ab to iksan he، khoah hm jzع fzع krin ia sbr، bhrhal hmare bchne ki koei sort nhin"
14.22: Aor jb fislh chka dia jaee ga to shitan khe ga "hqiqt ih he kh allh ne jo oعde tm se kie the o h sb sche the aor min ne jtne oعde kie an min se koei bhi pora nh kia mira tm pr koei zor to tha nhin، min ne ais ke soa kchh nhin kia kh apne raste ki trf tmhin dعot di aor tm ne miri dعot pr lbik kha ab mjhe mlamt nh kro، apne aap hi ko mlamt kro ihan nh min tmhari friad rsi kr skta hon aor nh tm mir i as se phle jo tm ne mjhe khdaei min shrik bna rkha tha min as se bri alzmh hon، aise zalmon ke lie drd nak sza iqini he"
14.23: Bkhlaf as ke jo log dnia min aiman laee hin aor jnhon ne nik عml kie hin oh aise baghon min dakhl kie jaein ge jn ke niche nhrin bhti hon gi ohan oh apne rb ke azn se hmishh rhin ge، aor ohan an ka astqbal slamti ki mbark bad se hoga
14.24: Kia tm dikhte nhin ho kh allh ne klmh tibh ko ks chiz se msal di he? As ki msal aisi he jise aik achhi zat ka drkht، js ki jr zmin min ghri jmi hoei he aor shakhin aasman tk phnchi hoei hin
14.25: Hr aan oh apne rb ke hkm se apne phl de rha he ih msalin allh as lie dita he kh log ain se sbq lin
14.26: Aor klmh khbish ki msal aik bd zat drkht ki si he jo zmin ki sth se akhar phinka jata he، aus ke lie koei asthkam nhin he
14.27: Aiman lane oalon ko allh aik qol sabt ki bniad pr dnia aor aakhrt، donon min sbat عta krta he، aor zalmon ko allh bhtka dita he allh ko akhtiar he jo chahe kre
14.28: Tm ne dikha aun logon ko jnhon ne allh ki nعmt paei aor ause kfran nعmt se bdl dala aor (apne sath) apni qom ko bhi hlakt ke ghr min jhonk dia
14.29: Iعni jhnm، js min oh jhlse jaein ge aor oh bd trin jaee qrar he
14.30: Aor allh ke kchh hmsr tjoiz kr lie takh oh anhin allh ke raste se bhtka din ain se kho، achha mze kr lo، aakhrkar tmhin plt kr jana dozkh hi min he

24.24: Oh as dn ko bhol nh jaein jbkh an ki apni zbanin aor an ke apne hath paؤn an ke krtoton ki goahi din ge
24.25: As dn allh oh bdlh anhin bhrpor de ga js ke oh msthq hin aor anhin mعlom ho jaee ga kh allh hi hq he sch ko sch kr dkhane oala
24.26: Khbis عortin khbis mrdon ke lie hin aor khbis mrd khbis عorton ke lie pakizh عortin pakizh mrdon ke lie hin aor pakizh mrd pakizh عorton ke lie an ka damn pak he aun baton se jo bnane oale bnate hin، an ke lie mghfrt he aor rzq krim
24.27: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، apne ghron ke soa dosre ghron min dakhl nh hoa kro jb tk kh ghr oalon ki rza nh le lo aor ghr oalon pr slam nh bhij lo، ih triqh tmhare lie bhtr he toqع he kh tm as ka khial rkho ge
24.28: Phr agr ohan ksi ko nh paؤ to dakhl nh ho jb tk kh tm ko ajazt nh de di jaee، aor agr tm se kha jaee kh oaps chle jaؤ to oaps ho jaؤ، ih tmhare lie ziadh pakizh triqh he، aor jo kchh tm krte ho allh ase khob janta he
24.29: Albth tmhare lie as min koei mzaeqh nhin he kh aise ghron min dakhl ho jaؤ jo ksi ke rhne ki jgh nh hon aor jn min tmhare faede (ia kam) ki koei chiz ho، tm jo kchh zahr krte ho aor jo kchh chhpate ho sb ki allh ko khbr he
24.30: Ae nbiؐ، momn mrdon se kho kh apni nzrin bcha kr rkhin aor apni shrmgahon ki hfazt krin، ih aun ke lie ziadh pakizh triqh he، jo kchh oh krte hin allh aus se bakhbr rhta he
24.31: Aor ae nbiؐ، momn عorton se khh do kh apni nzrin bcha kr rkhin، aor apni shrmgahon ki hfazt krin، aor apna bnaؤ snghar nh dkhaein bjz aus ke jo khod zahr ho jaee، aor apne sinon pr apni aorhnion ke aanchl dale rhin oh apna bnaؤ snghar nh zahr krin mgr ain logon ke samne: shohr، bap، shohron ke bap، apne bite، shohron ke bite، bhaei، bhaeion ke bite، bhnon ke bite، apne mil jol ki عortin، a pne mmlok، oh zirdst mrd jo ksi aor qsm ki ghrz nh rkhte hon، aor oh bche jo عorton ki poshidh baton se abhi oaqf nh hoee hon oh a pne paؤn zmin pr marti hoei nh chla krin kh apni jo zint anhon ne chhpa rkhi ho as ka logon ko عlm ho jaee ae momno، tm sb ml kr allh se tobh kro، toqع he kh flah paؤ ge
24.32: Tm min se jo log mjrd hon، aor tmhare londi ghlamon min se jo salh hon، an ke nkah kr do agr oh ghrib hon to allh apne fzl se aun ko ghni kr de ga، allh bri osعt oala aor عlim he
24.33: Aor jo nkah ka moqع nh paein anhin chahie kh عft maabi akhtiar krin، ihan tk kh allh apne fzl se aun ko ghni kr de aor tmhare mmlokon min se jo mkatbt ki drkhoast krin an se mkatbt kr lo agr tmhin mعlom ho kh an ke andr bhlaei he، aor an ko aus mal min se do jo allh ne tmhin dia he aor apni londion ko a pne dnioi faedon ki khatr qhbh gri pr mjbor nh kro jbkh oh khod pakdamn rhna chahti hon، aor jo koei aun ko mjbor kre to ais jbr ke bعd allh aun ke lie ghfor o rhim he
24.34: Hm ne saf saf hdait dine oali aaiat tmhare pas bhij di hin، aor an qomon ki عbr t nak msalin bhi hm tmhare samne pish kr chke hin jo tm se phle ho gzri hin، aor oh nsihtin hm ne kr di hin jo drne oalon ke lie hoti hin
24.35: Allh aasmanon aor zmin ka nor he (kaenat min) as ke nor ki msal aisi he jise aik taq min chragh rkha hoa ho، chragh aik fanos min ho، fanos ka hal ih ho kh jise moti ki trh chmkta hoa tara، aor oh chragh ziton ke aik aise mbark drkht ke til se roshn kia jata ho jo shrqi ho nh ghrbi، js ka til aap hi aap bhrka prta ho chahe aag as ko nh lge، (ais trh) roshni pr roshni (brhne ke tmam asbab jmع ho gee hon) allh apne nor ki trf js ki chahta he rhnmaei frmata he، oh logon ko msalon se bat smjhata he، oh hr chiz se khob oaqf he
24.36: (aus ke nor ki trf hdait pane oale) aun ghron min paee jate hin jnhin blnd krne ka، aor jn min apne nam ki iad ka allh ne azn dia he
24.37: Aun min aise log sbh o sham aus ki tsbih krte hin jnhin tjart aor khrid o frokht allh ki iad se aor aqamt nmaz o adaee zkoaۃ se ghafl nhin kr diti oh aus dn se drte rhte hin js min dl altne aor dide pthra jane ki nobt aa jaee gi
24.38: (aor oh ih sb kchh as lie krte hin) takh allh an ke bhtrin aعmal ki jza aun ko de aor mzid apne fzl se noaze، allh jse chahta he be hsab dita he
24.39: (as ke brعks) jnhon ne kfr kia an ke aعmal ki msal aisi he jise dsht be aab min srab kh piasa aus ko pani smjhe hoee tha، mgr jb ohan phncha to kchh nh paia، blkh ohan as ne allh ko mojod paia، js ne as ka pora pora hsab chka dia، aor allh ko hsab lite dir nhin lgti
24.40: Ia phr as ki msal aisi he jise aik ghre smndr min andhira، kh aopr aik moj chhaei hoei he، aus pr aik aor moj، aor as ke aopr badl، tariki pr tariki mslt he، aadmi apna hath nkale to ase bhi nh dikhne paee jse allh nor nh bkhshe aus ke lie phr koei nor nhin
24.41: Kia tm dikhte nhin ho kh allh ki tsbih kr rhe hin oh sb jo aasmanon aor zmin min hin aor oh prnde jo pr phila ee ar rhe hin? Hr aik apni nmaz aor tsbih ka triqh janta he، aor ih sb jo kchh krte hin allh as se bakhbr rhta he
24.42: Aasmanon aor zmin ki badshahi allh hi ke lie he aor asi ki trf sb ko pltna he
24.43: Kia tm dikhte nhin ho kh allh badl ko aahsth aahsth chlata he، phr as ke tkron ko bahm jorta he، phr ase smit kr aik ksif abr bna dita he، phr tm dikhte ho kh as ke khol min se barsh ke qtre tpkte chle aate hin aor oh aasman se، aun pharon ki bdolt jo as min blnd hin، aole brsata he، phr jse chahta he an ka nqsan phnchata he aor jse chahta he an se bcha lita he aus ki bjli ki chmk ngahon ko khirh kie diti he
24.44: Rat aor dn ka alt phir ohi kr rha he ais min aik sbq he aankhon oalon ke lie
24.45: Aor allh ne hr jandar aik trh ke pani se pida kia، koei pit ke bl chl rha he to koei do tangon pr aor koei char tangon pr jo kchh oh chahta he pida krta he، oh hr chiz pr qadr he
24.46: Hm ne saf saf hqiqt btane oali aaiat nazl kr di hin، aage srat mstqim ki trf hdait allh hi jse chahta he dita he
24.47: Ih log khte hin kh hm aiman laee allh aor rsolؐ pr aor hm ne ataعt qbol ki، mgr as ke bعd an min se aik groh (ataعt se) mnh mor jata he aise log hrgz momn nhin hin
24.48: Jb an ko blaia jata he allh aor rsol ki trf، takh rsol an ke aaps ke mqdme ka fislh kre to an min se aik friq ktra jata he
24.49: Albth agr hq an ki moafqt min ho to rsol ke pas bre ataعt kish bn kr aa jate hin
24.50: Kia an ke dlon ko (mnafqt ka) rog lga hoa he? Ia ih shk min pre hoee hin? Ia an ko ih khof he kh allh aor as ka rsol an pr zlm kre ga? Asl bat ih he kh zalm to ih log khod hin
24.51: Aiman lane oalon ka kam to ih he kh jb oh allh aor rsol ki trf bla ee jaein takh rsol an ke mqdme ka fislh kre to oh khin kh hm ne sna aor ataعt ki aise hi log flah pane oale hin
24.52: Aor kamiab ohi hin jo allh aor rsol ki frman brdari krin aor allh se drin aor as ki nafrmani se bchin
24.53: Ih (mnafq) allh ke nam se kri kri qsmin kha kr khte hin kh "aap hkm din to hm ghron se nkl khre hon" ain se kho "qsmin nh khaؤ، tmhari ataعt ka hal mعlom he، tmhare krtoton se allh be khbr nhin he"
24.54: Kho، "allh ke mtiع bno aor rsolؐ ke tabع frman bn kr rho likn agr tm mnh phirte ho to khob smjh lo kh rsolؐ pr js frz ka bar rkha gia he aus ka zmh dar oh he aor tm pr js frz ka bar dala gia he aus ke zmh dar tm ho aus ki ataعt kro ge to khod hi hdait paؤ ge ornh rsol ki zmh dari as se ziadh kchh nhin he kh saf saf hkm phncha de"
24.55: Allh ne oعdh frmaia he tm min se aun logon ke sath jo aiman laein aor nik عml krin kh oh an ko ausi trh zmin min khlifh bnaee ga js trh aun se phle gzre hoee logon ko bna chka he، aun ke lie aun ke aus din ko mzbot bniadon pr qaem kr de ga jse allh tعalia ne aun ke hq min psnd kia he، aor aun ki (mojodh) halt khof ko amn se bdl de ga، bs oh miri bndgi krin aor mire sath ksi ko shrik nh krin aor jo as ke bعd kfr kre to aise hi log fasq hin
24.56: Nmaz qaem kro، zkoaۃ do، aor rsolؐ ki ataعt kro، amid he kh tm pr rhm kia jaee ga
24.57: Jo log kfr kr rhe hin a n ke mtعlq as ghlt fhmi min nh rho kh oh zmin min allh ko عajz kr din ge an ka thkana dozkh he aor oh bra hi bra thkana he
24.58: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، lazm he kh tmhare mmlok aor tmhare oh bche jo abhi عql ki hd ko nhin phnche hin، tin aoqat min ajazt le kr tmhare pas aaia krin: sbh ki nmaz se phle، aor dophr ko jbkh tm kpre atar kr rkh dite ho، aor عshaء ki nmaz ke bعd ih tin oqt tmhare lie prde ke oqt hin ain ke bعd oh bla ajazt aaein to nh tm pr koei gnah he nh aun pr، tmhin aik dosre ke pas bar bar aana hi hota he as trh allh tmhare lie apne arshadat ki tozih krta he، aor oh عlim o hkim he
24.59: Aor jb tmhare bche عql ki hd ko phnch jaein to chahe kh ausi trh ajazt likr aaia krin js trh aun ke bre ajazt lite rhe hin ais trh allh apni aaiat tmhare samne kholta he، aor oh عlim o hkim he
24.60: Aor jo عortin joani se gzri bithi hon، nkah ki amidoar nh hon، oh agr apni chadrin atar kr rkh din to aun pr koei gnah nhin، bshrtikh zint ki nmaesh krne oali nh hon tahm oh bhi hiadari hi brtin to aun ke hq min achha he، aor allh sb kchh snta aor janta he
24.61: Koei hrj nhin agr koei andha، ia lngra، ia mriz (ksi ke ghr se kha le) aor nh tmhare aopr ais min koei mzaeqh he kh apne ghron se khaؤ ia apne bap dada ke ghron se، ia apni man nani ke ghron se، ia apne bhaeion ke ghron se، ia apni bhnon ke ghron se، ia apne chchaؤn ke ghron se، ia apni phophion ke ghron se، ia apne mamoؤn ke ghron se، ia apni khalaؤn ke ghron se، ia aun ghron se jn ki knjian tmhari sprdgi min hon، ia apne doston ke ghron se as min bhi koei hrj nhin kh tm log ml kr khaؤ ia alg alg albth jb ghron min dakhl hoa kro to apne logon ko slam kia kro، dعa ee khir، allh ki trf se mqrr fr maei hoei، bri babrkt aor pakizh ais trh allh tعalia tmhare samne aaiat bian krta he، toqع he kh tm smjh bojh se kam lo ge
24.62: Momn to asl min ohi hin jo allh aor aus ke rsol ko dl se manin aor jb ksi ajtmaعi kam ke moqع pr rsolؐ ke sath hon to aus se ajazt lie bghir nh jaein jo log tm se ajazt mangte hin ohi allh aor rsol ke manne oale hin، ps jb oh apne ksi kam se ajazt mangin to jse tm chaho ajazt de dia kro aor aise logon ke hq min allh se dعaee mghfrt kia kro، allh iqinaan ghfor o rhim he
24.63: Mslmano، apne drmian rsolؐ ke blane ko aaps min aik dosre ka sa blana nh smjh bitho allh aun logon ko khob janta he jo tm min aise hin kh aik dosre ki aar lite hoee chpke se stk jate hin rsolؐ ke hkm ki khlaf orzi krne oalon ko drna chahie kh oh ksi ftne min grftar nh ho jaein ia an pr drdnak عzab nh aa jaee
24.64: Khbrdar rho، aasman o zmin min jo kchh he allh ka he tm js rosh pr bhi ho allh aus ko janta he js roz log aus ki trf pltin ge oh aunhin bta de ga kh oh kia kchh kr ke aaee hin oh hr chiz ka عlm rkhta he

25.1: Nhait mtbrk he oh js ne ih frqan apne bnde pr nazl kia takh sare jhan oalon ke lie nzir ho
25.2: Oh jo zmin aor aasmanon ki badshahi ka malk he، js ne ksi ko bita nhin bnaia he، js ke sath badshahi min koei shrik nhin he، js ne hr chiz ko pida kia phr as ki aik tqdir mqrr ki
25.3: Logon ne ause chhor kr aise mعbod bna lie jo ksi chiz ko pida nhin krte blkh khod pida kie jate hin، jo khod apne lie bhi ksi nfع ia nqsan ka akhtiar nhin rkhte، jo nh mar skte hin nh jila skte hin، nh mre hoee ko phr atha skte hin
25.4: Jn logon ne nbiؐ ki bat manne se ankar kr dia he oh khte hin kh ih frqan aik mn ghrt chiz he jse ais shkhs ne aap hi ghr lia he aor kchh dosre logon ne ais kam min as ki mdd ki he bra zlm aor skht jhot he js pr ih log atr aaee hin
25.5: Khte hin ih prane logon ki lkhi hoei chizin hin jnhin ih shkhs nql krta he aor oh aise sbh o sham snaei jati hin
25.6: Ae mhmdؐ، an se kho kh "aise nazl kia he aus ne jo zmin aor aasmanon ka bhid janta he" hqiqt ih he kh oh bra ghfor rhim he
25.7: Khte hin "ih kisa rsol he jo khana khata he aor bazaron min chlta phrta he? Kion nh as ke pas koei frshth bhija gia jo as ke sath rhta aor (nh manne oalon ko) dhmkata?
25.8: Ia aor kchh nhin to ais ke lie koei khzanh hi atar dia jata، ia as ke pas koei bagh hi hota js se ih (atminan ki) rozi hasl krta" aor zalm khte hin "tm log to aik shr zdh aadmi ke pichhe lg gee ho"
25.9: Dikho، kisi kisi عjib hjtin ih log tmhare aage pish kr rhe hin، aise bhke hin kh koei thkane ki bat ain ko nhin sojhti
25.10: Bra babrkt he oh jo agr chahe to an ki tjoiz krdh chizon se bhi ziadh brh chrh kr tm ko de skta he، (aik nhin) bht se bagh jn ke niche nhrin bhti hon، aor bre bre mhl
25.11: Asl bat ih he kh ih log "aus ghri" ko jhtla chke hin aor jo aus ghri ko jhtlaee as ke lie hm ne bhrkti hoei aag mhia kr rkhi he
25.12: Oh jb dor se ain ko dikhe gi to ih aus ke ghzb aor josh ki aaoazin sn lin ge
25.13: Aor jb ih dst o pa bsth aus min aik tng jgh thonse jaein ge to apni mot ko pkarne lgin ge
25.14: (aus oqt an se kha jaee ga kh) aaj aik mot ko nhin bht si moton ko pkaro
25.15: Ain se pochho، ih anjam achha he ia oh aabdi jnt js ka oعdh khdatrs prhizgaron se kia gia he? Jo aun ke aعmal ki jza aor aun ke sfr ki aakhri mnzl ho gi
25.16: Js min aun ki hr khoahsh pori ho gi، js min oh hmishh hmishh rhin ge، js ka عta krna tmhare prordgar ke zme aik oajb alada oعdh he
25.17: Aor oh ohi dn ho ga jb kh (tmhara rb) ain logon ko bhi ghir laee ga aor an ke aun mعbodon ko bhi bula le ga jnhin aaj ih allh ko chhor kr poj rhe hin، phr oh aun se pochhe ga "kia tm ne mire ain bndon kr gmrah kia tha? Ia ih khod rahi rast se bhtk gee the?"
25.18: Oh عrz krin ge "pak he aap ki zat، hmari to ih bhi mjal nh thi kh aap ke soa ksi ko apna mola bnaein mgr aap ne ain ko aor an ke bap dada ko khob samani zndgi dia htia kh ih sbq bhol gee aor shamt zdh ho kr rhe"
25.19: Ion jhtla din ge oh (tmhare mعbod) tmhari aun baton ko jo aaj tm khh rhe ho، phr tm nh apni shamt tal sko ge nh khin se mdd pa sko ge aor jo bhi tm min se zlm kre ase hm skht عzab ka mzh chkhaein ge
25.20: Ae mhmdؐ، tm se phle jo rsol bhi hm ne bhije hin oh sb bhi khana khane oale aor bazaron min chlne phrne oale log hi the drasl hm ne tm logon ko aik dosre ke lie aazmaesh ka zriعh bna dia he kia tm sbr krte ho? Tmhara rb sb kchh dikhta he
25.21: Jo log hmare hzor pish hone ka andishh nhin rkhte oh khte hin "kion nh frshte hmare pas bhije jaein? Ia phr hm apne rb ko dikhin" bra ghmnd le bithe ih apne nfs min aor hd se gzr gee ih apni srkshi min
25.22: Js roz ih frshton ko dikhin ge oh mjrmon ke lie ksi bshart ka dn nh hoga، chikh athin ge kh pnah bkhda
25.23: Aor jo kchh bhi an ka kia dhra he ause le kr hm ghbar ki trh ara din ge
25.24: Bs ohi log jo jnt ke msthq hin aus dn achhi jgh thirin ge aor dophrgzarne ko عmdh mqam paein ge
25.25: Aasman ko chirta hoa aik badl as roz nmodar ho ga aor frshton ke pre ke pre atar die jaein ge
25.26: Aus roz hqiqi badshahi srf rhman ki ho gi aor oh mnkrin ke lie bra skht dn ho ga
25.27: Zalm ansan apna hath chbaee ga aor khe ga "kash min ne rsol ka sath dia hota
25.28: Haee miri km bkhti، kash min ne flan shkhs ko dost nh bnaia hota
25.29: Aus ke bhkaee min aa kr min ne oh nsiht nh mani jo mire pas aaei thi، shitan ansan ke hq min bra hi be ofa nkla"
25.30: Aor rsol khe ga kh "ae mire rb، miri qom ke logon ne as qraan ko nshanh tzhik bna lia tha"
25.31: Ae mhmdؐ، hm ne to asi trh mjrmon ko hr nbi ka dshmn bnaia he aor tmhare lie tmhara rb hi rhnmaei aor mdd ko kafi he
25.32: Mnkrin khte hin "ais shkhs pr sara qraan aik hi oqt min kion nh atar dia gia?" han، aisa as lie kia gia he kh as ko achhi trh hm tmhare zhn nshin krte rhin aor (asi ghrz ke lie) hm ne as ko aik khas trtib ke sath alg alg ajzaء ki shkl di he
25.33: Aor (as min ih mslht bhi he) kh jb kbhi oh tmhare samne koei nrali bat (ia عjib soal) le kr aaee، aus ka thik joab br oqt hm ne tmhin de dia aor bhtrin triqe se bat khol di
25.34: Jo log aondhe mnh jhnm ki trf dhkile jane oale hin an ka moqf bht bra aor an ki rah hd drjh ghlt he
25.35: Hm ne mosiaؑ ko ktab di aor as ke sath as ke bhaei haronؑ ko mddgar ke tor pr lgaia
25.36: Aor aun se kha kh jaؤ aus qom ki trf js ne hmari aaiat ko jhtla dia he aakhr kar aun logon ko hm ne tbah kr ke rkh dia
25.37: Ihi hal qom nohؑ ka hoa jb anhon ne rsolon ki tkzib ki hm ne aun ko ghrq kr dia aor dnia bhr ke logon ke lie aik nshan عbrt bna dia aor an zalmon ke lie aik drdnak عzab hm ne mhia kr rkha he
25.38: Aisi trh عad aor smod aor ashab alrs aor bich ki sdion ke bht se log tbah kie gee
25.39: Aor an min se hr aik ko hm ne (phle tbah hone oalon ki) msalin de de kr smjhaia aor aakhrkar hr aik ko ghart kr dia
25.40: Aor aus bsti pr to ain ka gzr ho chka he js pr bdtrin barsh brsaei gei thi kia anhon ne as ka hal dikha nh ho ga? Mgr ih mot ke bعd dosri zndgi ki toqع hi nhin rkhte
25.41: Ih log jb tmhin dikhte hin to tmhara mzaq bna lite hin (khte hin) "kia ih shkhs he jse khda ne rsol bna kr bhija he?
25.42: Ais ne to hmin gmrah kr ke apne mعbodon se brgshth hi kr dia hota agr hm aun ki عqidt pr jm nh gee hote" achha، oh oqt dor nhin he jb عzab dikh kr ainhin khod mعlom ho jaee ga kh kon gmrahi min dor nkl gia tha
25.43: Kbhi tm ne aus shkhs ke hal pr ghor kia he js ne apni khoahsh nfs ko apna khda bna lia ho? Kia tm aise shkhs ko rahi rast pr lane ka zmh le skte ho?
25.44: Kia tm smjhte ho kh an min se aksr log snte aor smjhte hin? Ih to janoron ki trh hin، blkh aun se bhi gee gzre
25.45: Tm ne dikha nhin kh tmhara rb ks trh saih phila dita he? Agr oh chahta to ase daemi saih bna dita hm ne sorj ko aus pr dlil bnaia
25.46: Phr (jise jise sorj athta jata he) hm as saee ko rfth rfth apni trf smitte chle jate hin
25.47: Aor oh allh hi he js ne rat ko tmhare lie lbas، aor nind ko skoni mot، aor dn ko ji athne ka oqt bnaia
25.48: Aor ohi he jo apni rhmt ke aage aage hoaؤn ko bshart bna kr bhijta he phr aasman se pak pani nazl krta he
25.49: Takh aik mrdh عlaqe ko as ke zriعe zndgi bkhshe aor apni mkhloq min se bht se janoron aor ansanon ko sirab kre
25.50: As krshme ko hm bar bar an ke samne late hin takh oh kchh sbq lin، mgr aksr log kfr aor nashkri ke soa koei dosra roih akhtiar krne se ankar kr dite hin
25.51: Agr hm chahte to aik aik bsti min aik aik nzir atha khra krte
25.52: Ps ae nbiؐ، kafron ki bat hrgz nh mano aor as qraan ko le kr an ke sath jhad kbir kro
25.53: Aor ohi he js ne do smndron ko mla rkha he aik lziz o shirin، dosra tlkh o shor aor donon ke drmian aik prdh hael he aik rkaot he jo anhin gd md hone se roke hoee he
25.54: Aor ohi he js ne pani se aik bshr pida kia، phr as se nsb aor ssral ke do alg slsle chlaee tira rb bra hi qdrt oala he
25.55: As khda ko chhor kr log aun ko poj rhe hin jo nh an ko nfع phncha skte hin nh nqsan، aor aopr se mzid ih kh kafr apne rb ke mqable min hr baghi ka mdd gar bna hoa he
25.56: Ae mhmdؐ، tm ko to hm ne bs aik mbshr aor nzir bna kr bhija he
25.57: Ain se khh do kh "min as kam pr tm se koei aujrt nhin mangta، miri aujrt bs ihi he kh js ka ji chahe oh apne rb ka rasth akhtiar kr le"

26.213: Ps ae mhmdؐ، allh ke sath ksi duosre mعbuod ko nh pkaro، ornh tm bhi sza pane oalon min shaml ho jaؤ ge
26.214: Apne qrib trin rshth daron ko draؤ
26.215: Aor aiman lane oalon min se jo log tmhari piroi akhtiar krin an ke sath toazع se pish aaؤ
26.216: Likn agr oh tmhari nafrmani krin to an se kho kh jo kchh tm krte ho as se min bri alz mh hon
26.217: Aor aus zbrdst aor rhim pr tokl kro
26.218: Jo tmhin as oqt dikh rha hota he jb tm athte ho
26.219: Aor sjdh gzar logon min tmhari nql o hrkt pr ngah rkhta he
26.220: Oh sb kchh snne aor janne oala he
26.221: Logo، kia min tmhin btaؤn kh shiatin ks pr autra krte hin?
26.222: Oh hr jعl saz bdkar pr autra krte hin
26.223: Suni sunaei batin kanon min phonkte hin، aor an min se aksr jhote hote hin
26.224: Rhe shعraء، to an ke pichhe bhke hoee log chla krte hin
26.225: Kia tm dikhte nhin ho kh oh hr oadi min bhtkte hin
26.226: Aor aisi batin khte hin jo krte nhin
26.227: Bjz aun logon ke jo aiman laee aor jnhon ne nik عml kie aor allh ko ksrt se iad kia aor jb an pr zlm kia gia to srf bdlh le lia، aor zlm krne oalon ko عnqrib mعlom ho jaee ga kh oh ks anjam se dochar hote hin

27.1: T s ih aaiat hin qraan aor ktab mbin ki
27.2: Hdait aor bshart aun aiman lane oalon ke lie
27.3: Jo nmaz qaem krte aor zkoaۃ dite hin، aor phr oh aise log hin jo aakhrt pr pora iqin rkhte hin
27.4: Hqiqt ih he kh jo log aakhrt ko nhin mante an ke lie hm ne aun ke krtoton ko khoshnma bna dia he، as lie oh bhtkte phr rhe hin
27.5: Ih oh log hin jn ke lie buri sza he aor aakhrt min ihi sb se ziadh khsare min rhne oale hin
27.6: Aor (ae mhmdؐ) blashbh tm ih qraan aik hkim o عlim hsti ki trf se pa rhe ho
27.7: (ainhin aus oqt ka qsh snaؤ) jb mosiaؑ ne apne ghr oalon se kha kh "mjhe aik aag si nzr aaei he، min abhi ia to ohan se koei khbr le kr aata hon ia koei angara chn lata hon takh tm log grm ho sko"
27.8: Ohan jo phncha to nda aaei kh "mbark he oh jo as aag min he aor jo as ke mahol min he pak he allh، sb jhanon ka prordgar
27.9: Ae mosiaؑ، ih min hon allh، zbrdst aor dana
27.10: Aor phink to zra apni lathi" jonhi kh mosiaؑ ne dikha lathi sanp ki trh bl kha rhi he to pith phir kr bhaga aor pichhe mr kr bhi nh dikha "ae mosiaؑ، dro nhin mire hzor rsol dra nhin krte
27.11: Ailّa ih kh ksi ne qsor kia ho phr agr braei ke bعd aus ne bhalaei se apne fعl ko bdl lia to min mعaf krne oala mhrban hon
27.12: Aor zra apna hath apne griban min to dalo chmkta hoa nkle ga bghir ksi tklif ke ih (do nshanian) no nshanion min se hin frعon aor as ki qom ki trf (le jane ke lie)، oh bre bd krdar log hin"
27.13: Mgr jb hmari khli khli nshanian aun logon ke samne aaein to anhon ne kha ih to khla jado he
27.14: Anhon ne srasr zlm aor ghror ki rah se an nshanion ka ankar kia halankh dl an ke qael ho chke the ab dikh lo kh an mfsdon ka anjam kisa hoa
27.15: (dosri trf) hm ne daؤdؑ o slimanؑ ko عlm عta kia aor anhon ne kha kh shkr he aus khda ka js ne hm ko apne bht se momn bndon pr fzilt عta ki
27.16: Aor daؤdؑ ka oars slimanؑ hoa aor as ne kha "“logo، hmin prndon ki bolian skhaei gei hin aor hmin hr trh ki chizin di gei hin، bishk ih (allh ka) nmaian fzl he"
27.17: Slimanؑ ke lie jn aor ansanon aor prndon ke lshkr jmع kie gee the aor oh pore zbt min rkhe jate the
27.18: (aik mrtbh oh an ke sath koch kr rha tha) ihan tk kh jb ih sb chiontion ki oadi min phnche to aik chionti ne kha "“ae chiontio، apne blon min ghs jaؤ، khin aisa nh ho kh slimanؑ aor as ke lshkr tmhin kchl dalin aor anhin khbr bhi nh ho"
27.19: Slimanؑ as ki bat pr muskrate hoee hns pra aor bola "ae mire rb، mjhe qabo min rkh kh min tire as ahsan ka shkr ada krta rhon jo to ne mjh pr aor mire oaldin pr kia he aor aisa عml salh kron jo tjhe psnd aaee aor apni rhmt se mjh ko apne salh bndon min dakhl kr"
27.20: (aik aor moqع pr) slimanؑ ne prndon ka jaezh lia aor kha “kia bat he kh min flan hud hud ko nhin dikh rha hon kia oh khin ghaeb ho gia he?
27.21: Min ase skht sza don ga، ia zbh kr don ga، ornh ase mire samne mعqol ojh pish krni ho gi
27.22: Kchh ziadh dir nh gzri thi kh aus ne aa kr kha "“min ne oh mعlomat hasl ki hin jo aap ke عlm min nhin hin min saba ke mtعlq iqini atlaع le kr aaia hon
27.23: Min ne ohan aik عort dikhi jo as qom ki hkmran he aus ko hr trh ka saz o saman bkhsha gia he aor as ka tkht bra عzim alshan he
27.24: Min ne dikha he kh oh aor as ki qom allh ke bjaee sorj ke aage sjdh krti he" shitan ne an ke aعmal an ke lie khoshnma bna die aor anhin shahrah se rok dia، as ojh se oh ih sidha rasth nhin pate
27.25: Kh aus khda ko sjdh krin jo aasmanon aor zmin ki poshidh chizin nkalta he aor oh sb kchh janta he jse tm log chhpate ho aor zahr krte ho
27.26: Allh kh js ke soa koei msthqi عbadt nhin، jo عrsh عzim ka malk he
27.27: Slimanؑ ne kha "abhi hm dikhe lite hin kh to ne sch kha he ia to jhot bolne oalon min se he
27.28: Mira ih kht le ja aor ase an logon ki trf dal de، phr alg ht kr dikh kh oh kia rd عml zahr krte hin"
27.29: Mlkh boli "ae ahli drbar، miri trf aik bra ahm kht phinka gia he
27.30: Oh slimanؑ ki janb se he aor allh rhman o rhim ke nam se shroع kia gia he
27.31: Mzmon ih he kh “mire mqable min srkshi nh kro aor mslm ho kr mire pas hazr ho jaؤ"
27.32: (kht suna kr) mlkh ne kha "“ae srdarani qom mire as mعamle min mjhe mshorh do، min ksi mعamlh ka fislh tmhare bghir nhin krti hon"
27.33: Aunhon ne joab dia "hm taqt or aor lrne oale log hin aage fislh aap ke hath min he aap khod dikh lin kh aap ko kia hkm dina he"
27.34: Mlkh ne kha kh "badshah jb ksi mulk min ghs aate hin to ase khrab aor as ke عzt oalon ko zlil kr dite hin ihi kchh oh kia krte hin
27.35: Min ain logon ki trf aik hdih bhijti hon، phr dikhti hon kh mire ailchi kia joab le kr pltte hin"
27.36: Jb oh (mlkh ka sfir) slimanؑ ke han phncha to as ne kha "kia tm log mal se miri mdd krna chahte ho? Jo kchh khda ne mjhe de rkha he oh as se bht ziadh he jo tmhin dia he tmhara hdih tmhi ko mbark rhe
27.37: (ae sfir) oaps ja apne bhijne oalon ki trf hm an pr aise lshkr le kr aaein ge jn ka mqablh oh nh kr skin ge aor hm anhin aisi zlt ke sath ohan se nkalin ge kh oh khoar ho kr rh jaein ge"
27.38: Slimanؑ ne kha "“ae ahl drbar، tm min se kon as ka tkht mire pas lata he qbl as ke kh oh log mtiع ho kr mire pas hazr hon?"
27.39: Jnon min se aik qoi hikl ne عrz kia "min ase hazr kr don ga qbl as ke kh aap apni jgh se athin min as ki taqt rkhta hon aor amantdar hon"
27.40: Js shkhs ke pas ktab ka عlm tha oh bola "min aap ki plk jhpkne se phle ase laee dita hon" jonhi kh slimanؑ ne oh tkht apne pas rkha hoa dikha، oh pkar atha "ih mire rb ka fzl he takh oh mjhe aazmaee kh min shkr krta hon ia kafr nعmt bn jata hon aor jo koei shkr krta he as ka shkr as ke apne hi lie mfid he، ornh koei nashkri kre to mira rb be niaz aor apni zat min aap bzrg he"
27.41: Slimanؑ ne kha "anjan triqe se as ka tkht as ke samne rkh do، dikhin oh shih bat tk phnchti he ia aun logon min se he jo rahi rast nhin pate"
27.42: Mlkh jb hazr hoei to as se kha gia kia tira tkht aisa hi he? Oh khne lgi "ih to goia ohi he hm to phle hi jan gee the aor hm ne sri ataعt jhka dia tha (ia hm mslm ho chke the)"
27.43: Aus ko (aiman lane se) js chiz ne rok rkha tha oh aun mعbodon ki عbadt thi jnhin oh allh ke soa pojti thi، kionkh oh aik kafr qom se thi
27.44: As se kha gia kh mhl min dakhl ho as ne jo dikha to smjhi kh pani ka hoz he aor atrne ke lie as ne apne paenche atha lie slimanؑ ne kha ih shishe ka chkna frsh he as pr oh pkar athi "ae mire rb، (aaj tk) min apne nfs pr bra zlm krti rhi، aor ab min ne slimanؑ ke sath allh rb alعalmin ki ataعt qbol kr li"
27.45: Aor smod ki trf hm ne aun ke bhaei salh ko (ih pigham de kr) bhija kh allh ki bndgi kro، to ikaik oh do mtkhasm friq bn gee
27.46: Salhؑ ne kha "“ae miri qom ke logo، bhlaei se phle buraei ke lie kion jldi mchate ho? Kion nhin allh se mghfrt tlb krte? Shaid kh tm pr rhm frmaia jaee?"
27.47: Anhon ne kha "hm ne to tm ko aor tmhare sathion ko bd shgoni ka nshan paia he" salhؑ ne joab dia "“tmhare nik o bd shgon ka sr rshth to allh ke pas he asl bat ih he kh tm logon ki aazmaesh ho rhi he"
27.48: Aus shhr min no jthe dar the jo mlk min fsad philate aor koei aslah ka kam nh krte the
27.49: Anhon ne aaps min kha "khda ki qsm kha kr عhd kr lo kh hm salhؑ aor as ke ghr oalon pr shb khon marin ge aor phr as ke oli se khh din ge kh hm as khandan ki hlakt ke moqع pr mojod nh the، hm balkl sch khte hin"
27.50: Ih chal to oh chle aor phr aik chal hm ne chli js ki anhin khbr nh thi
27.51: Ab dikh lo kh an ki chal ka anjam kia hoa hm ne tbah kr ke rkh dia aun ko aor an ki pori qom ko
27.52: Oh aun ke ghr khali pre hin aus zlm ki padash min jo oh krte the، as min aik nshan عbrt he aun logon ke lie jo عlm rkhte hin
27.53: Aor bcha lia hm ne aun logon ko jo aiman laee the aor nafrmani se prhiz krte the
27.54: Aor lotؑ ko hm ne bhija iad kro oh oqt jb as ne apni qom se kha "kia tm aankhon dikhte bdkari krte ho?
27.55: Kia tmhara ihi chln he kh عorton ko chhor kr mrdon ke pas shhot rani ke lie jate ho? Hqiqt ih he kh tm log skht jhalt ka kam krte ho"
27.56: Mgr aus ki qom ka joab as ke soa kchh nh tha kh anhon ne kha "nkal do lotؑ ke ghr oalon ko apni bsti se، ih bre pakbaz bnte hin"
27.57: Aakhr kar hm ne bcha lia aus ko aor aus ke ghr oalon ko، bjz aus ki bioi ke js ka pichhe rh jana hm ne te kr dia tha
27.58: Aor brsaei aun logon pr aik brsat، bht hi bri brsat thi oh aun logon ke hq min jo mtnbh kie ja chke the
27.59: (ae nbiؐ) kho، hmd allh ke lie aor slam as ke aun bndon pr jnhin as ne brgzidh kia (ain se pochho) allh bhtr he ia oh mعbod jnhin ih log as ka shrik bna rhe hin?
27.60: Bhla oh kon he js ne aasmanon aor zmin ko pida kia aor tmhare lie aasman se pani brsaia phr as ke zriعh se oh khoshnma bagh agaee jn ke drkhton ka agana tmhare bs min nh tha? Kia allh ke sath koei dosra khda bhi (ain kamon min shrik) he? (nhin)، blkh ihi log rahi rast se ht kr chle ja rhe hin
27.61: Aor oh kon he js ne zmin ko jaee qrar bnaia aor as ke andr dria roan kie aor as min (pharon ki) mikhin gar din aor pani ke do zkhiron ke drmian prde hael kr die? Kia allh ke sath koei aor khda bhi (ain kamon min shrik) he? Nhin، blkh ain min se aksr log nadan hin
27.62: Kon he jo be qrar ki dعa snta he jbkh oh ause pkare aor kon as ki tklif rfع krta he? Aor (kon he jo) tmhin zmin ka khlifh bnata he? Kia allh ke sath koei aor khda bhi (ih kam krne oala) he? Tm log km hi sochte ho
27.63: Aor oh kon he jo khshki aor smndr ki tarikion min tm ko rasth dkhata he aor kon apni rhmt ke aage hoaؤn ko khoshkhbri le kr bhijta he? Kia allh ke sath koei duosra khda bhi (ih kam krta) he? Bht bala o brtr he allh as shrk se jo ih log krte hin
27.64: Aor kon he jo khlq ki abtda krta aor phr as ka aعadh krta he? Aor kon tm ko aasman aor zmin se rzq dita he? Kia allh ke sath koei aor khda bhi (ain kamon min hsh dar) he? Kho kh laؤ apni dlil agr tm sche ho
27.65: Ain se kho، allh ke soa aasmanon aor zmin min koei ghib ka عlm nhin rkhta، aor oh nhin jante kh kb oh athaee jaein ge
27.66: Blkh aakhrt ka to عlm hi ain logon se gm ho gia he، blkh ih as ki trf se shk min hin، blkh ih aus se andhe hin
27.67: Ih mnkrin khte hin "kia jb hm aor hmare bap dada mti ho chke hon ge to hmin oaqعi qbron se nkala jaee ga?
27.68: Ih khbrin hm ko bhi bht di gei hin aor phle hmare aabaء ajdad ko bhi di jati rhi hin، mgr ih bs afsane hi afsane hin jo agle oqton se sunte chle aa rhe hin"
27.69: Kho zra zmin min chl phr kr dikho kh mjrmon ka kia anjam ho chka he
27.70: Ae nbiؐ، ain ke hal pr rnj nh kro aor nh ain ki chalon pr dl tng ho
27.71: Oh khte hin kh "ih dhmki kb puori ho gi agr tm sche ho?"
27.72: Kho kia عjb kh js عzab ke lie tm jldi mcha rhe ho as ka aik hsh tmhare qrib hi aa lga ho
27.73: Hqiqt ih he kh tira rb to logon pr bra fzl frmane oala he mgr aksr log shkr nhin krte
27.74: Bla shbh tira rb khuob janta he jo kchh an ke sine apne andr chhpaee hoee hin aor jo kchh oh zahr krte hin
27.75: Aasman o zmin ki koei poshidh chiz aisi nhin he jo aik oazh ktab min lkhi hoei mojod nh ho
27.76: Ih oaqعh he kh ih qraan bni asraeil ko aksr aun baton ki hqiqt btata he jn min oh akhtlaf rkhte hin
27.77: Aor ih hdait aor rhmt he aiman lane oalon ke lie
27.78: Iqinaan (aisi trh) tira rb ain logon ke drmian bhi apne hkm se fislh kr de ga aor oh zbrdst aor sb kchh janne oala he
27.79: Ps ae nbiؐ، allh pr bhrosa rkho، iqinaan tm srih hq pr ho
27.80: Tm murdon ko nhin sna skte، nh aun bhron tk apni pkar phncha skte ho jo pith phir kr bhage ja rhe hon
27.81: Aor nh andhon ko rasth bta kr bhtkne se bcha skte ho tm to apni bat aunhi logon ko sna skte ho jo hmari aaiat pr aiman late hin aor phr frman brdar bn jate hin
27.82: Aor jb hmari bat puori hone ka oqt aun pr aa phnche ga to hm an ke lie aik janor zmin se nkalin ge jo an se klam kre ga kh log hmari aaiat pr iqin nhin krte the
27.83: Aor zra tsor kro aus dn ka jb hm hr amّt min se aik foj ki foj aun logon ki ghir laein ge jo hmari aaiat ko jhtlaia krte the، phr an ko (an ki aqsam ke lhaz se drjh bdrjh) mrtb kia jaee ga
27.84: Ihan tk kh jb sb aa jaein ge to (an ka rb an se) pochhe ga kh "tm ne miri aaiat ko jhtla dia halankh tm ne an ka عlmi ahath nh kia tha? Agr ih nhin to aor tm kia kr rhe the?"
27.85: Aor an ke zlm ki ojh se عzab ka oعdh an pr pora ho jaee ga، tb oh kchh bhi nh bol skin ge
27.86: Kia an ko sujhaei nh dita tha kh hm ne rat an ke lie skon hasl krne ko bnaei thi aor dn ko roshn kia tha? Asi min bht nshanian thin an logon ke lie jo aiman late the
27.87: Aor kia gzre gi as roz jb kh suor phonka jaee ga aor haol kha jaein ge oh sb jo aasmanon aor zmin min hin، soaee aun logon ke jnhin allh as haol se bchana chahe ga، aor sb kan dbaee as ke hzor hazr ho jaein ge
27.88: Aaj to pharon ko dikhta he aor smjhta he kh khob jme hoee hin، mgr aus oqt ih badlon ki trh ar rhe hon ge، ih allh ki qdrt ka krshmh ho ga js ne hr chiz ko hkmt ke sath astoar kia he oh khob janta he kh tm log kia krte ho
27.89: Jo shkhs bhlaei le kr aaeiga ase aus se ziadh bhtr slh mle ga aor aise log aus dn ke haol se mhfoz hon ge
27.90: Aor jo buraei lie hoee aaee ga، aise sb log aondhe mnh aag min phinke jaein ge kia tm log as ke soa koei aor jza pa skte ho kh jisa kro oisa bhro?
27.91: (ae mhmdؐ، ain se kho) "mjhe to ihi hkm dia gia he kh ais shhr ke rb ki bndgi kron js ne aise hrm bnaia he aor jo hr chiz ka malk he mjhe hkm dia gia he kh min mslm bn kr rhon
27.92: Aor ih qraan prh kr snaؤn" ab jo hdait akhtiar kre ga oh apne hi bhle ke lie hdait akhtiar kre ga aor jo gmrah ho aus se khh do kh min to bs khbrdar kr dine oala hon
27.93: Ain se kho، tعrif allh hi ke lie he، عnqrib oh tmhin apni nshanian dkha de ga aor tm anhin phchan lo ge، aor tira rb be khbr nhin he aun aعmal se jo tm log krte ho

28.2: Ih ktab mbin ki aaiat hin
28.3: Hm mosiaؑ aor frعon ka kchh hal thik thik tmhin sunate hin aise logon ke faede ke lie jo aiman laein
28.4: Oaqعh ih he kh frعon ne zmin min srkshi ki aor as ke bashndon ko grohon min tqsim kr dia an min se aik groh ko oh zlil krta tha، as ke lrkon ko qtl krta aor as ki lrkion ko jita rhne dita tha fi aloaqع oh mfsd logon min se tha
28.5: Aor hm ih aradh rkhte the kh mhrbani krin an logon pr jo zmin min zlil kr ke rkhe gee the aor anhin pishoa bna din aor anhi ko oars bnaein
28.6: Aor zmin min an ko aqtdar bkhshin aor an se frعon o haman aor an ke lshkron ko ohi kchh dkhla din js ka anhin dr tha
28.7: Hm ne mosiaؑ ki man ko asharh kia kh "ais ko dodh pla، phr jb tjhe aus ki jan ka khtrh ho to ase dria min dal de aor kchh khof aor ghm nh kr، hm ase tire hi pas oaps le aaein ge aor as ko pighmbron min shaml krin ge"
28.8: Aa khrkar frعon ke ghr oalon ne ase (dria se) nkal lia takh oh an ka dshmn aor an ke lie sbbi rnj bne، oaqعi frعon aor haman aor as ke lshkr (apni tdbir min) bre ghlt kar the
28.9: Frعon ki bioi ne (as se) kha "ih mire aor tire lie aankhon ki thndk he، ase qtl nh kro، kia عjb kh ih hmare lie mfid sabt ho، ia hm ase bita hi bna lin" aor oh (anjam se) be khbr the
28.10: Audhr mosiaؑ ki man ka dl ara ja rha tha oh as raz ko fash kr bithti agr hm as ki dhars nh bndha dite takh oh (hmare oعde pr) aiman lane oalon min se ho
28.11: Aus ne bche ki bhn se kha as ke pichhe pichhe ja chnanchh oh alg se as ko as trh dikhti rhi kh (dshmnon ko) as ka pth nh chla
28.12: Aor hm ne bchّe pr phle hi duodh pilane oalion ki chhatian hram kr rkhi thin (ih halt dikh kr) aus lrki ne aun se kha "min tmhin aise ghr ka pth btaؤn js ke log as ki prorsh ka zmّh lin aor khir khoahi ke sath ase rkhin?"
28.13: As trh hm mosiaؑ ko as ki man ke pas plta laee takh as ki aankhin thndi hon aor oh ghmgin nh ho aor jan le kh allh ka oعdh scha tha، mgr aksr log as bat ko nhin jante
28.14: Phr jb mosiaؑ apni pori joani ko phnch gia aor as ka nshoonma mkml ho gia to hm ne ase hkm aor عlm عta kia، hm nik logon ko aisi hi jza dite hin
28.15: (aik roz) oh shhr min aise oqt min dakhl hoa jbkh ahli shhr ghflt min the ohan as ne dikha kh do aadmi lr rhe hin aik as ki apni qom ka tha aor duosra as ki dshmn qom se tعlq rkhta tha as ki qom ke aadmi ne dshmn qom oale ke khlaf ase mdd ke lie pkara mosiaؑ ne as ko aik ghonsa mara aor as ka kam tmam kr dia (ih hrkt srzd hote hi) mosiaؑ ne kha "ih shitan ki karfrmaei he، oh skht dshmn aor khla gmrah kn he"
28.16: Phr oh khne lga "ae mire rb، main ne apne nfs pr bra zlm kr dala، miri mghfrt frma de" chnanchh allh ne as ki mghfrt frma di، oh ghfor rhim he
28.17: Mosiaؑ ne عhd kia kh "“ae mire rb، ih ahsan jo to ne mjh pr kia he ais ke bعd ab min kbhi mjrmon ka mdd gar nh bnon ga"
28.18: Duosre roz oh sbh soire drta aor hr trf se khtrh bhanpta hoa shhr min ja rha tha kh ikaik kia dikhta he kh ohi shkhs js ne kl ase mdd ke lie pkara tha aaj phr ase pkar rha he mosiaؑ ne kha "tuo to bra hi bhka huoa aadmi he"
28.19: Phr jb mosiaؑ ne aradh kia kh dshmn qom ke aadmi pr hmlh kre to oh pkar atha "ae mosiaؑ، kia aaj to mjhe ausi trh qtl krne lga he js trh kl aik shkhs ko qtl kr chka he، to as mlk min jbّar bn kr rhna chahta he، aslah nhin krna chahta"
28.20: As ke bعd aik aadmi shhr ke prle sire se daorta hoa aaia aor bola "mosiaؑ، srdaron min tire qtl ke mshore ho rhe hin، ihan se nkl ja، min tira khir khoah hon"
28.21: Ih khbr snte hi mosiaؑ drta aor shmta nkl khra hoa aor as ne dعa ki kh "ae mire rb، mjhe zalmon se bcha"
28.22: (msr se nkl kr) jb mosiaؑ ne madian ka rukh kia to aus ne kha "aumid he kh mira rb mjhe thik raste pr dal de ga"
