28.23: Aor jb oh madian ke knoein pr phncha to aus ne dikha kh bht se log apne janoron ko pani pla rhe hin aor an se alg aik trf do عortin apne janoron ko rok rhi hin mosiaؑ ne ain عorton se pochha "tmhin kia prishani he?" anhon ne kha "hm apne janoron ko pani nhin pla sktin jb tk ih chroahe apne janor nkal kr nh le jaein، aor hmare oald aik bht borhe aadmi hin"
28.24: Ih sn ko mosiaؑ ne an ke janoron ko pani pla dia، phr aik saee ki jgh ja bitha aor bola "prordgar، jo khir bhi to mjh pr nazl kr de min as ka mhtaj hon"
28.25: (kchh dir nh gzri thi kh) an donon عorton min se aik shrm o hia se chlti hoei as ke pas aaei aor khne lgi "mire oald aap ko bula rhe hin takh aap ne hmare janoron ko pani jo plaia he as ka ajr aap ko din" mosiaؑ jb as ke pas phncha aor apna sara qsh ase sunaia to as ne kha "kchh khof nh kro، ab tm zalmon se bch nkle ho"
28.26: An donon عorton min se aik ne apne bap se kha "abّa jan، as shkhs ko nokr rkh lijie، bhtrin aadmi jse aap mlazm rkhin ohi ho skta he jo mzbuot aor amant dar ho"
28.27: As ke bap ne (mosiaؑ se) kha "min chahta hon kh apni ain do bition min se aik ka nkah tmhare sath kr don bshrtikh tm aath sal tk mire han mlazmt kro، aor agr ds sal puore kr do to ih tmhari mrzi he min tm pr skhti nhin krna chahta tm ain shaءallh mjhe nik aadmi paؤ ge"
28.28: Mosia ne joab dia "ih bat mire aor aap ke drmian te ho gei an donon mdton min se jo bhi min puori kr don aus ke bعd phr koei ziadti mjh pr nh ho، aor jo kchh qol qrar hm kr rhe hin allh as pr nghban he"
28.29: Jb mosiaؑ ne mdt pori kr di aor oh apne ahl o عial ko le kr chla to tuor ki janb as ko aik aag nzr aaei aus ne apne ghr oalon se kha "thiro، min ne aik aag dikhi he، shaid min ohan se koei khbr le aaؤn ia as aag se koei angarh hi autha laؤn js se tm tap sko"
28.30: Ohan phncha to oadi ke dahne knare pr mbark khte min aik drkht se pkara gia kh "ae mosiaؑ، min hi allh hon، sare jhan oalon ka malk"
28.31: Aor (hkm dia gia kh) phink de apni lathi jonhi kh mosiaؑ ne dikha kh oh lathi sanp ki trh bl kha rhi he to oh pith phir kr bhaga aor as ne mr kr bhi nh dikha (arshad hoa) "mosiaؑ، plt aa aor khof nh kr، to balkl mhfoz he
28.32: Apna hath griban min dal، chmkta hoa nkle ga bghir ksi tklif ke aor khof se bchne ke lie apna bazo bhinch le ih do roshn nshanian hin tire rb ki trf se frعon aor as ke drbarion ke samne pish krne ke lie، oh bre hi nafrman log hin"
28.33: Mosiaؑ ne عrz kia "mire aaqa، min to an ka aik aadmi qtl kr chka hon، drta hon kh oh mjhe mar dalin ge
28.34: Aor mira bhaei haronؑ mjhe se ziadh zban aaor he، ase mire sath mdd gar ke tor pr bhij takh oh miri taeid kre، mjhe andishh he kh oh log mjhe jhtlaein ge"
28.35: Frmaia "hm tire bhaei ke zriعh se tira hath mzbot krin ge aor tm donon ko aisi stot bkhshin ge kh oh tmhara kchh nh bgar skin ge hmari nshanion ke zor se ghlbh tmhara aor tmhare piroؤn ka hi ho ga"
28.36: Phr jb mosiaؑ aun logon ke pas hmari khuli khuli nshanian le kr phncha to anhon ne kha kh ih kchh nhin he mgr bnaoti jadogr aor ih batin to hm ne apne bap dada ke zmane min kbhi sunin hi nhin
28.37: Mosiaؑ ne joab dia "mira rb aus shkhs ke hal se khob oaqf he jo as ki trf se hdait le kr aaia he aor ohi bhtr janta he kh aakhri anjam ks ka achha hona he، hq ih he kh zalm kbhi flah nhin pate"
28.38: Aor frعon ne kha "ae ahl drbar min to apne soa tmhare ksi khda ko nhin janta haman، zra aintin pkoa kr mire lie aik aonchi عmart to bnoa، shaid kh as pr chrh kr min mosiaؑ ke khda ko dikh skon، min to ase jhuota smjhta hon"
28.39: Aus ne aor as ke lshkron ne zmin min bghir ksi hq ke apni braei ka ghmnd kia aor smjhe kh anhin kbhi hmari trf pltna nhin he
28.40: Aakhr kar hm ne ase aor as ke lshkron ko pkra aor smndr min phink dia ab dikh lo kh an zalmon ka kisa anjam hoa
28.41: Hm ne anhin jhnm ki trf dعot dine oale pish ro bna dia aor qiamt ke roz oh khin se koei mdd nh pa skin ge
28.42: Hm ne ais dnia min an ke pichhe lعnt lga di aor qiamt ke roz oh bri qbaht min mbtla hon ge
28.43: Pchhli nslon ko hlak krne ke bعd hm ne mosiaؑ ko ktab عta ki، logon ke lie bsirton ka saman bna kr، takh shaid log sbq hasl krin
28.44: (ae mhmdؐ) tm aus oqt mghrbi goshe min mojod nh the jb hm ne mosiaؑ ko ih frman shriعt عta kia، aor nh tm shahdin min shaml the
28.45: Blkh as ke bعd (tmhare zmane tk) hm bht si nslin atha chke hin aor an pr bht zmanh gzr chka he tm ahli madian ke drmian bhi mojod nh the kh aun ko hmari aaiat suna rhe hote، mgr (aus oqt ki ih khbrin) bhijne oale hm hin
28.46: Aor tm tor ke damn min bhi aus oqt mojod nh the jb hm ne (mosiaؑ ko phli mrtbh) pkara tha، mgr ih tmhare rb ki rhmt he (kh tm ko ih mعlomat di jar hi hin) takh tm aun logon ko mtnbّh kr do jn ke pas tm se phle koei mtnbّh krne oala nhin aaia، shaid kh oh hosh min aaein
28.47: (aor ih hm ne as lie kia kh) khin aisa nh ho kh aun ke apne kie krtoton ki bdolt koei msibt jb aun pr aaee to oh khin "ae prordgar، tuo ne kion nh hmari trf koei rsol bhija kh hm tiri aaiat ki piroi krte aor ahli aiman min se hote"
28.48: Mgr jb hmare han se hq an ke pas aa gia to oh khne lge "kion nh dia gia ais ko ohi kchh jo mosiaؑ ko dia gia tha?" kia ih log aus ka ankar nhin kr chke hin jo as se phle mosiaؑ ko dia gia tha? Anhon ne kha "donon jadogr hin jo aik duosre ki mdd krte hin" aor kha "hm ksi ko nhin mante"
28.49: (ae nbiؐ،) an se kho، "achha to laؤ allh ki trf se koei ktab jo ain donon se ziadh hdait bkhshne oali ho agr tm sche ho، min asi ki piroi akhtiar kron ga"
28.50: Ab agr oh tmhara ih mtalbh pora nhin krte to smjh lo kh drasl ih apni khoahshat ke piro hin، aor aus shkhs se brh kr kon gmrah ho ga jo khdaei hdait ke bghir bs apni khoahshat ki piroi kre? Allh aise zalmon ko hrgz hdait nhin bkhshta
28.51: Aor (nsiht ki) bat pe dr pe hm anhin phncha chke hin takh oh ghflt se bidar hon
28.52: Jn logon ko as se phle hm ne ktab di thi oh ais (qraan) pr aiman late hin
28.53: Aor jb ih aun ko sunaia jata he to oh khte hin kh "hm ais pr aiman laee، ih oaqعi hq he hmare rb ki trf se، hm to phle hi se mslm hin"
28.54: Ih oh log hin jnhin an ka ajr do bar dia jaee ga aus sabt qdmi ke bdle jo anhon ne dkhaei oh buraei ko bhalaei se dfع krte hin aor jo kchh rzq hm ne anhin dia he as min se khrch krte hin
28.55: Aor jb anhon ne bihodh bat sni to ih khh kr as se knarh ksh ho gee kh "hmare aعmal hmare lie aor tmhare aعmal tmhare lie، tm ko slam he، hm jahlon ka sa triqh akhtiar nhin krna chahte"
28.56: Ae nbiؐ، tm jse chaho ase hdait nhin de skte، mgr allh jse chahta he hdait dita he aor oh an logon ko khob janta he jo hdait qbol krne oale hin
28.57: Oh khte hin "agr hm tmhare sath ais hdait ki piroi akhtiar kr lin to apni zmin se auchk lie jaein ge" kia ih oaqعh nhin he kh hm ne aik pramn hrm ko an ke lie jaee qiam bna dia js ki trf hr trh ke smrat khche chle aate hin، hmari trf se rzq ke tor pr? Mgr an min se aksr log jante nhin hin
28.58: Aor ktni hi aisi bstian hm tbah kr chke hin jn ke log apni mعisht pr atra gee the so dikh lo، oh an ke mskn pre hoee hin jn min an ke bعd km hi koei bsa he، aa khrkar hm hi oars ho kr rhe
28.59: Aor tira rb bstion ko hlak krne oala nh tha jb tk kh an ke mrkz min aik rsuol nh bhij dita jo an ko hmari aaiat sunata aor hm bstion ko hlak krne oale nh the jb tk kh an ke rhne oale zalm nh ho jate
28.60: Tm logon ko jo kchh bhi dia gia he oh mhz dunia ki zndgi ka saman aor as ki zint he، aor jo kchh allh ke pas he oh as se bhtr aor baqi tr he kia tm log عql se kam nhin lite?
28.61: Bhla oh shkhs js se hm ne achha oعdh kia ho aor oh ase pane oala ho kbhi as shkhs ki trh ho skta he jse hm ne srf hiat dnia ka srosaman de dia ho aor phr oh qiamt ke roz sza ke lie pish kia jane oala ho?
28.62: Aor (bhol nh jaein ih log) aus dn ko jb kh oh ain ko pkare ga aor pochhe ga "khan hin mire oh shrik jn ka tm gman rkhte the?"
28.63: Ih qol jn pr chspan ho ga oh khin ge "ae hmare rb، be shk ihi log hin jn ko hm ne gmrah kia tha، ainhin hm ne ausi trh gmrah kia jise hm khod gmrah hoee hm aap ke samne braءt ka azhar krte hin ih hmari to bndgi nhin krte the"
28.64: Phr ain se kha jaee ga kh pkaro ab apne thiraee hoee shrikon ko ih anhin pkarin ge mgr oh ain ko koei joab nh din ge aor ih log عzab dikh lin ge kash ih hdait akhtiar krne oale hote
28.65: Aor (framosh nh krin ih log) oh dn jbkh oh ain ko pkare ga aor pochhe ga kh "jo rsol bhije gee the anhin tm ne kia joab dia tha?"
28.66: Aus oqt koei joab ain ko nh suojhe ga aor nh ih aaps min aik duosre se pochh hi skin ge
28.67: Albth js ne aaj tobh kr li aor aiman le aaia aor nik عml kie ohi ih toqع kr skta he kh ohan flah pane oalon min se ho ga
28.68: Tira rb pida krta he jo kchh chahta he aor (oh khod hi apne kam ke lie jse chahta he) mntkhb kr lita he، ih antkhab ain logon ke krne ka kam nhin he، allh pak he aor bht balatr he aus shrk se jo ih log krte hin
28.69: Tira rb janta he jo kchh ih dlon min chhpaee hoee hin aor jo kchh ih zahr krte hin
28.70: Ohi aik allh he js ke soa koei عbadt ka msthq nhin asi ke lie hmd he dnia min bhi aor aakhrt min bhi، frman roaei asi ki he aor asi ki trf tm sb pltaee jane oale ho
28.71: Ae nbiؐ، ain se kho kbhi tm logon ne ghor kia kh agr allh qiamt tk tm pr hmishh ke lie rat tari kr de to allh ke soa oh konsa mعbod he jo tmhin roshni la de? Kia tm sunte nhin ho?
28.72: Ain se pochho، kbhi tm ne socha kh agr allh qiamt tk tm pr hmishh ke lie dn tari kr de to allh ke soa oh konsa mعbuod he jo tmhin rat la de takh tm as min skon hasl kr sko? Kia tm ko suojhta nhin?
28.73: Ih asi ki rhmt he kh as ne tmhare lie rat aor dn bnaee takh tm (rat min) skon hasl kro aor (dn ko) apne rb ka fzl tlash kro، shaid kh tm shkr gzar bno
28.74: (iad rkhin ih log) oh dn jbkh oh anhin pkare ga phr pochhe ga "khan hin mire oh shrik jn ka tm gman rkhte the?"
28.75: Aor hm hr amّt min se aik goah nkal laein ge phr khin ge kh "laؤ ab apni dlil" as oqt anhin mعlom ho jaee ga kh hq allh ki trf se he، aor gm ho jaein ge an ke oh sare jhot jo anhon ne ghr rkhe the
28.76: Ih aik oaqعh he kh qaron mosiaؑ ki qom ka aik shkhs tha، phr oh apni qom ke khlaf srksh ho gia aor hm ne as ko atne khzane de rkhe the kh an ki knjian taqt or aadmion ki aik jmaعt mshkl se autha skti thi aik dfعh jb as ki qom ke logon ne aus se kha "phol nh ja، allh pholne oalon ko psnd nhin krta
28.77: Jo mal allh ne tjhe dia he as se aakhrt ka ghr bnane ki fkr kr aor dunia min se bhi apna hsh framosh nh kr ahsan kr js trh allh ne tire sath ahsan kia he aor zmin min fsad brpa krne ki koshsh nh kr، allh mfsdon ko psnd nhin krta"
28.78: To aus ne kha "ih sb kchh to mjhe aus عlm ki bna pr dia gia he jo mjh ko hasl he" kia as ko عlm nh tha kh allh as se phle bht se aise logon ko hlak kr chka he jo as se ziadh qot aor jmعit rkhte the? Mjrmon se to an ke gnah nhin pochhe jate
28.79: Aik roz oh apni qom ke samne apne puore thath min nkla jo log hiat dnia ke talb the oh ase dikh kr khne lge "kash hmin bhi ohi kchh mlta jo qaron ko dia gia he، ih to bra nsibe oala he"
28.80: Mgr jo log عlm rkhne oale the oh khne lge "afsos tmhare hal pr، allh ka soab bhtr he aus shkhs ke lie jo aiman laee aor nik عml kre، aor ih dolt nhin mlti mgr sbr krne oalon ko"
28.81: Aakhr kar hm ne ase aor as ke ghr ko zmin min dahnsa dia phr koei as ke hamion ka groh nh tha jo allh ke mqablh min as ki mdd ko aata aor nh oh khod apni mdd aap kr ska
28.82: Ab ohi log jo kl as ki mnzlt ki tmna kr rhe the khne lge "afsos، hm bhol gee the kh allh apne bndon min se js ka rzq chahta he kshadh krta he aor jse chahta he napa tla dita he agr allh ne hm pr ahsan nh kia hota to hmin bhi zmin min dahnsa dita afsos hm ko iad nh rha kh kafr flah nhin paia krte"
28.83: Oh aakhrt ka ghr to hm aun logon ke lie mkhsos kr din ge jo zmin min apni braei nhin chahte aor nh fsad krna chahte hin aor anjam ki bhalaei mtqin hi ke lie he
28.84: Jo koei bhalaei le kr aaee ga as ke lie as se bhtr bhalaei he، aor jo buraei le kr aaee to buraeian krne oalon ko oisa hi bdlh mle ga jise عml oh krte the
28.85: Ae nbiؐ، iqin jano kh js ne ih qraan tm pr frz kia he oh tmhin aik bhtrin anjam ko phnchane oala he ain logon se khh do kh "mira rb khuob janta he kh hdait le kr kon aaia he aor khuli gmrahi min kon mubtla he"
28.86: Tm as bat ke hrgz amidoar nh the kh tm pr ktab nazl ki jaee gi، ih to mhz tmhare rb ki mhrbani se (tm pr nazl hoei he)، ps tm kafron ke mdd gar nh bno
28.87: Aor aisa kbhi nh hone paee kh allh ki aaiat jb tm pr nazl hon to kfّar tmhin aun se baz rkhin apne rb ki trf dعot do aor hrgz mshrkon min shaml nh ho
28.88: Aor allh ke sath ksi duosre mعbuod ko nh pkaro aus ke soa koei mعbuod nhin he hr chiz hlak hone oali he soaee aus ki zat ke frman roaei ausi ki he aor ausi ki trf tm sb pltaee jaؤ ge

29.2: Kia logon ne ih smjh rkha he kh oh bs atna khne pr chhor die jaein ge kh "hm aiman laee " aor an ko aazmaia nh jaee ga?
29.3: Halan kh hm aun sb logon ki aazmaesh kr chke hin jo ain se phle gzre hin allh ko to zror ih dikhna he kh schّe kon hin aor jhote kon
29.4: Aor kia oh log jo buri hrktin kr rhe hin ih smjhe bithe hin kh oh hm se bazi le jaein ge? Bra ghlt hkm he jo oh lga rhe hin
29.5: Jo koei allh se mlne ki toqع rkhta ho (ause mعlom hona chahie kh) allh ka mqrr kia hoa oqt aane hi oala he، aor allh sb kchh sunta aor janta he
29.6: Jo shkhs bhi mjahdh kriga apne hi bhle ke lie kre ga، allh iqinaan dnia jhan oalon se be niaz he
29.7: Aor jo log aiman laein ge aor nik aعmal krin ge aun ki braeian hm an se duor kr din ge aor anhin aun ke bhtrin aعmal ki jza din ge
29.8: Hm ne ansan ko hdait ki he kh apne oaldin ke sath nik slok kre likn agr oh tjh pr zor dalin kh to mire sath ksi aise (mعbuod) ko shrik thiraee jse to (mire shrik ki hisit se) nhin janta to an ki ataعt nh kr miri hi trf tm sb ko plt kr aana he، phr min tm ko bta don ga kh tm kia krte rhe ho
29.9: Aor jo log aiman laee hon ge aor jnhon ne nik aعmal kie hon ge aun ko hm zror salhin min dakhl krin ge
29.10: Logon min se koei aisa he jo khta he kh hm aiman laee allh pr mgr jb oh allh ke mعamlh min staia gia to as ne logon ki dali hoei aazmaesh ko allh ke عzab ki trh smjh lia ab agr tire rb ki trf se fth o nsrt aa gei to ihi shkhs khe ga kh "hm to tmhare sath the" kia dnia oalon ke dlon ka hal allh ko bkhobi mعlom nhin he?
29.11: Aor allh ko to zror ih dikhna hi he kh aiman lane oale kon hin aor mnafq kon
29.12: Ih kafr log aiman lane oalon se khte hin kh tm hmare triqe ki piroi kro aor tmhari khtaؤn ko hm apne auopr le lin ge halankh aun ki khtaؤn min se kchh bhi oh apne aopr line oale nhin hin، oh qtعaan jhot khte hin
29.13: Han zror oh apne bojh bhi athaein ge aor apne bojhon ke sath bht se dosre bojh bhi aor qiamt ke roz iqinaan an se ain aftra prdazion ki bazprs ho gi jo oh krte rhe hin
29.14: Hm ne nohؑ ko as ki qom ki trf bhija aor oh pchas km aik hzar brs aun ke drmian rha aakhr kar aun logon ko tofan ne aa ghira as hal min kh oh zalm the
29.15: Phr nohؑ ko aor kshti oalon ko hm ne bcha lia aor ause dnia oalon ke lie aik nshan عbrt bna kr rkh dia
29.16: Aor abrahimؑ ko bhija jbkh aus ne apni qom se kha "allh ki bndgi kro aor aus se dro ih tmhare lie bhtr he agr tm jano
29.17: Tm allh ko chhor kr jnhin poj rhe ho oh to mhz bt hin aor tm aik jhot ghr rhe ho dr hqiqt allh ke soa jn ki tm prstsh krte ho oh tmhin koei rzq bhi dine ka akhtiar nhin rkhte allh se rzq mango aor ausi ki bndgi kro aor as ka shkr ada kro، asi ki trf tm pltaee jane oale ho
29.18: Aor agr tm jhtlate ho to tm se phle bht si qomin jhtla chki hin، aor rsol pr saf saf pigham phncha dine ke soa koei zmّh dari nhin he"
29.19: Kia ain logon ne kbhi dikha hi nhin he kh allh ks trh khlq ki abtda krta he، phr aus ka aعadh krta he? Iqinaan ih (aعadh to) allh ke lie aasan tr he
29.20: An se kho kh zmin min chlo phro aor dikho kh aus ne ks trh khlq ki abtda ki he، phr allh bar digr bhi zndgi bkhshe ga iqinaan allh hr chiz pr qadr he
29.21: Jse chahe sza de aor js pr chahe rhm frmaee، ausi ki trf tm phire jane oale ho
29.22: Tm nh zmin min عajz krne oale ho nh aasman min، aor allh se bchane oala koei srprst aor mdd gar tmhare lie nhin he
29.23: Jn logon ne allh ki aaiat ka aor as se mlaqat ka ankar kia he oh miri rhmt se maios ho chke hin aor an ke lie drd nak sza he
29.24: Phr aus ki qom ka joab ais ke soa kchh nh tha kh anhon ne kha "qtl kr do aise ia jla dalo ais ko" aakhr kar allh ne ase aag se bcha lia، iqinaan as min nshanian hin aun logon ke lie jo aiman lane oale hin
29.25: Aor aus ne kha "tm ne dnia ki zndgi min to allh ko chhor kr bton ko apne drmian mhbt ka zriعh bna lia he mgr qiamt ke roz tm aik duosre ka ankar aor aik duosre pr lعnt kro ge aor aag tmhara thkana ho gi aor koei tmhara mdd gar nh ho ga"
29.26: Aus oqt lotؑ ne aus ko mana aor abrahimؑ ne kha min apne rb ki trf hjrt krta hon، oh zbrdst he aor hkim he
29.27: Aor hm ne ase ashaqؑ aor iعqobؑ (jisi aolad) عnait frmaei aor as ki nsl min nbot aor ktab rkh di، aor ase dnia min aus ka ajr عta kia aor aakhrt min oh iqinaan salhin min se ho ga
29.28: Aor hm ne lotؑ ko bhija jbkh aus ne apni qom se kha "tm to oh fhsh kam krte ho jo tm se phle dnia oalon min se ksi ne nhin kia he
29.29: Kia tmhara hal ih he kh mardon ke pas jate ho، aor rhzni krte ho aor apni mjlson min bure kam krte ho?" phr koei joab as ki qom ke pas as ke soa nh tha kh anhon ne kha "le aa allh ka عzab agr to schّa he"
29.30: Lotؑ ne kha "ae mire rb، ain mfsd logon ke mqable min miri mdd frma"
29.31: Aor jb hmare frstade abrahimؑ ke pas bshart le kr phnche to anhon ne aus se kha "hm ais bsti ke logon ko hlak krne oale hin، as ke log skht zalm ho chke hin"
29.32: Abrahimؑ ne kha "ohan to lotؑ mojod he" anhon ne kha "hm khob jante hin kh ohan kon kon he hm ause، aor as ki bioi ke soa as ke baqi ghr oalon ko bcha lin ge" as ki bioi pichhe rh jane oalon min se thi
29.33: Phr jb hmare frstade lotؑ ke pas phnche to an ki aamd pr oh skht prishan aor dl tng hoa aunhon ne kha "nh dro aor nh rnj kro hm tmhin aor tmhare ghr oalon ko bcha lin ge، soaee tmhari bioi ke jo pichhe rh jane oalon min se he
29.34: Hm as bsti ke logon pr aasman se عzab nazl krne oale hin aus fsq ki bdolt jo ih krte rhe hin"
29.35: Aor hm ne aus bsti ki aik khuli nshani chhor di he aun logon ke lie jo عql se kam lite hin
29.36: Aor madian ki trf hm ne aun ke bhaei shعib ko bhija aus ne kha "ae miri qom ke logo، allh ki bndgi kro aor rozi aakhr ke amidoar rho aor zmin min mfsd bn kr ziadtian nh krte phro"
29.37: Mgr anhon ne ase jhtla dia aakhr kar aik skht zlzle ne anhin aa lia aor oh apne ghron min pre ke pre rh gee
29.38: Aor عad o smod ko hm ne hlak kia، tm oh mqamat dikh chke ho jhan oh rhte the aun ke aعmal ko shitan ne aun ke lie khoshnma bna dia aor anhin rahi rast se brgshth kr dia halankh oh hosh gosh rkhte the
29.39: Aor qaron o frعon o haman ko hm ne hlak kia mosiaؑ aun ke pas biّnat le kr aaia mgr anhon ne zmin min apni braei ka zعm kia halankh oh sbqt le jane oale nh the
29.40: Aakhr kar hr aik ko hm ne as ke gnah min pkra، phr an min se ksi pr hm ne pthraؤ krne oali hoa bhiji، aor ksi ko aik zbrdst dhmake ne aa lia، aor ksi ko hm ne zmin min dhsa dia، aor ksi ko ghrq kr dia allh aun pr zlm krne oala nh tha، mgr oh khod hi apne aopr zlm kr rhe the
29.41: Jn logon ne allh ko chhor kr duosre srprst bna lie hin aun ki msal mkri jisi he jo apna aik ghr bnati he aor sb ghron se ziadh kmzor ghr mkri ka ghr hi hota he kash ih log عlm rkhte
29.42: Ih log allh ko chhor kr js chiz ko bhi pkarte hin allh ase khob janta he aor ohi zbrdst aor hkim he
29.43: Ih msalin hm logon ki fhmaesh ke lie dite hin، mgr an ko ohi log smjhte hin jo عlm rkhne oale hin
29.44: Allh ne aasmanon aor zmin ko brhq pida kia he، dr hqiqt ais min aik nshani he ahli aiman ke lie
29.45: (ae nbiؐ) tlaot kro as ktab ki jo tmhari trf ohi ke zriعh se bhiji gei he aor nmaz qaem kro، iqinaan nmaz fhsh aor bure kamon se rokti he aor allh ka zkr as se bhi ziadh bri chiz he allh janta he jo kchh tm log krte ho
29.46: Aor ahl ktab se bhs nh kro mgr عmdh triqh se، soaee aun logon ke jo aun min se zalm hon، aor aun se kho kh "hm aiman laee hin aus chiz pr bhi jo hmari trf bhiji gei he aor aus chiz pr bhi jo tmhari trf bhiji gei thi، hmara khda aor tmhara khda aik hi he aor hm ausi ke muslm (frman brdar) hin"
29.47: (ae nbiؐ) hm ne aisi trh tmhari trf ktab nazl ki he، as lie oh log jn ko hm ne phle ktab di thi oh as pr aiman late hin، aor ain logon min se bhi bht se as pr aiman la rhe hin، aor hmari aaiat ka ankar srf kafr hi krte hin
29.48: (ae nbiؐ) tm as se phle koei ktab nhin prhte the aor nh apne hath se lkhte the، agr aisa hota to batl prst log shk min pr skte the
29.49: Drasl ih roshn nshanian hin aun logon ke dlon min jnhin عilm bkhsha gia he، aor hmari aaiat ka ankar nhin krte mgr oh jo zalm hin
29.50: Ih log khte hin kh "kion nh atari gei as shkhs pr nshanian ais ke rb ki trf se?" kho، "nshanian to allh ke pas hin aor min srf khbrdar krne oala hon khol khol kr"
29.51: Aor kia ain logon ke lie ih (nshani) kafi nhin he kh hm ne tm pr ktab nazl ki jo ainhin prh kr sunaei jati he? Dr hqiqt ais min rhmt he aor nsiht he aun logon ke lie jo aiman late hin
29.52: (ae nbiؐ) kho kh "mire aor tmhare drmian allh goahi ke lie kafi he oh aasmanon aor zmin min sb kchh janta he jo log batl ko mante hin aor allh se kfr krte hin ohi khsare min rhne oale hin"
29.53: Ih log tm se عzab jldi lane ka mtalbh krte hin agr aik oqt mqrr nh kr dia gia hota to an pr عzab aa chka hota aor iqinaan (apne oqt pr) oh aa kr rhe ga achank، as hal min kh anhin khbr bhi nh ho gi
29.54: Ih tm se عzab jldi lane ka mtalbh krte hin، halankh jhnm an kafron ko ghire min le chki he
29.55: (aor anhin pth chle ga) aus roz jbkh عzab anhin auopr se bhi dhank le ga aor paؤn ke niche se bhi aor khe ga kh ab chkho mza an krtoton ka jo tm krte the
29.56: Ae mire bndo jo aiman laee ho، miri zmin osiع he، ps tm miri bndgi bja laؤ
29.57: Hr mtnfs ko mot ka mza chkhna he، phr tm sb hmari trf hi plta kr laee jaؤ ge
29.58: Jo log aiman laee hin aor jnhon ne nik عml kie hin an ko hm jnt ki blnd o bala عmarton min rkhin ge jn ke niche nhrin bhti hon gi، ohan oh hmishh rhin ge، kia hi عmdh ajr he عml krne oalon ke lie
29.59: Aun logon ke lie jnhon ne sbr kia he aor jo apne rb pr bhrosh krte hin
29.60: Ktne hi janor hin jo apna rzq athaee nhin phrte، allh aun ko rzq dita he aor tmhara razq bhi ohi he، oh sb kchh sunta aor janta he
29.61: Agr tm ain logon se puochho kh zmin aor aasmanon ko ks ne pida kia he aor chand aor suorj ko ks ne mskhّr kr rkha he to zror khin ge kh allh ne، phr ih kdhr se dhoka kha rhe hin?
29.62: Allh hi he jo apne bndon min se js ka chahta he rzq kshadh krta he aor js ka chahta he tng krta he، iqinaan allh hr chiz ka janne oala he
29.63: Aor agr tm an se pochho ks ne aasman se pani brsaia aor ais ke zriعh se murdh pri hoei zmin ko jila athaia to oh zror khin ge allh ne kho، alhmdllh، mgr aksr log smjhte nhin hin
29.64: Aor ih dnia ki zndgi kchh nhin he mgr aik khil aor dl ka bhlaoa asl zndgi ka ghr to dar aakhrt he، kash ih log jante
29.65: Jb ih log kshti pr soar hote hin to apne din ko allh ke lie khals kr ke aus se duعa mangte hin، phr jb oh ainhin bcha kr khshki pr le aata he to ikaik ih shrk krne lgte hin
29.66: Takh allh ki di hoei njat pr as ka kfran nعmt krin aor (hiat dnia ke) mze lotin achha، عnqrib ainhin mعlom ho jaee ga
29.67: Kia ih dikhte nhin hin kh hm ne aik pr amn hrm bna dia he halankh ain ke grd o pish log auchk lie jate hin? Kia phr bhi ih log batl ko mante hin aor allh ki nعmt ka kfran krte hin?
29.68: Aus shkhs se bra zalm kon ho ga jo allh pr jhot bandhe ia hq ko jhutlaee jb kh oh as ke samne aa chka ho? Kia aise kafron ka thkanh jhnm hi nhin he?
29.69: Jo log hmari khatr mjahdh krin ge anhin hm apne raste dkhaein ge، aor iqinaan allh niko karon hi ke sath he

30.2: Romi qrib ki srzmin min mghlob ho gee hin
30.3: Aor apni ais mghlobit ke bعd chnd sal ke andr oh ghalb ho jaein ge
30.4: Allh hi ka akhtiar he phle bhi aor bعd min bhi aor oh dn oh ho ga jbkh allh ki bkhshi hoei fth pr mslman khoshian mnaein ge
30.5: Allh nsrt عta frmata he jse chahta he، aor oh zbrdst aor rhim he
30.6: Ih oعdh allh ne kia he، allh kbhi apne oعde ki khlaf orzi nhin krta، mgr aksr log nhin jante hin
30.7: Log dunia ki zndgi ka bs zahri phlo jante hin aor aakhrt se oh khod hi ghafl hin
30.8: Kia anhon ne kbhi apne aap min ghor o fkr nhin kia? Allh ne zmin aor aasmanon ko aor aun sari chizon ko jo aun ke drmian hin brhq aor aik mqrّr mdt hi ke lie pida kia he mgr bht se log apne rb ki mlaqat ke mnkr hin
30.9: Aor kia ih log kbhi zmin min chle phre nhin hin kh ainhin aun logon ka anjam nzr aata jo ain se phle gzr chke hin? Oh ain se ziadh taqt rkhte the، aunhon ne zmin ko khob adhira tha aor ause atna aabad kia tha jtna ainhon ne nhin kia he aun ke pas an ke rsol roshn nshanian le kr aaee phr allh an pr zlm krne oala nh tha، mgr oh khod hi apne aopr zlm kr rhe the
30.10: Aa khrkar jn logon ne buraeian ki thin an ka anjam bht bra hoa، as lie kh anhon ne allh ki aaiat ko jhtlaia tha aor oh an ka mzaq arate the
30.11: Allh hi khlq ki abtda krta he، phr ohi as ka aعadh kre ga، phr asi ki trf tm pltaee jaؤ ge
30.12: Aor jb oh saعt brpa ho gi as dn mjrm hak dak rh jaein ge
30.13: An ke thiraee hoee shrikon min koei an ka sfarshi nh ho ga aor oh apne shrikon ke mnkr ho jaein ge
30.14: Js roz oh saعt brpa ho gi، as dn (sb ansan) alg grohon min bt jaein ge
30.15: Jo log aiman laee hin aor jnhon ne nik عml kie hin oh aik bagh min shadan o frhan rkhe jaein ge
30.16: Aor jnhon ne kfr kia he aor hmari aaiat ko aor aakhrt ki mlaqat ko jhtlaia he oh عzab min hazr rkhe jaein ge
30.17: Ps tsbih kro allh ki jbkh tm sham krte ho aor jb sbh krte ho
30.18: Aasmanon aor zmin min ausi ke lie hmd he aor (tsbih kro as ki) tisre phr aor jbkh tm pr zhr ka oqt aata he
30.19: Oh zndh min se murde ko nkalta he aor murde min se zndh ko nkalta he aor zmin ko as ki mot ke bعd zndgi bkhshta he asi trh tm log bhi (halt mot se) nkal lie jaؤ ge
30.20: Aus ki nshanion min se ih he kh as ne tm ko mti se pida kia phr ikaik tm bshr ho kh (zmin min) philte chle ja rhe ho
30.21: Aor as ki nshanion min se ih he kh as ne tmhare lie tmhari hi jns se bioian bnaein takh tm an ke pas skon hasl kro aor tmhare drmian mhbّt aor rhmt pida kr di iqinaan as min bht si nshanian he aun logon ke lie jo ghor o fkr krte hin
30.22: Aor as ki nshanion min se aasmanon aor zmin ki pidaesh، aor tmhari zbanon aor tmhare rngon ka akhtlaf he iqinaan as min bht si nshanian hin danshmnd logon ke lie
30.23: Aor aus ki nshanion min se tmhara rat aor dn ko sona aor tmhara as ke fzl ko tlash krna he iqinaan ais min bht si nshanian hin aun logon ke lie jo (ghor se) sunte hin
30.24: Aor aus ki nshanion min se ih he kh oh tmhin bjli ki chmk dkhata he khof ke sath bhi aor tmع ke sath bhi aor aasman se pani brsata he، phr as ke zriعh se zmin ko as ki mot ke bعd zndgi bkhshta he iqinaan ais min bht si nshanian hin aun logon ke lie jo عql se kam lite hin
30.25: Aor aus ki nshanion min se ih he kh aasman aor zmin as ke hkm se qaem hin phr jonhi kh aus ne tmhin zmin se pkara، bs aik hi pkar min achank tm nkl aaؤ ge
30.26: Aasmanon aor zmin min jo bhi hin aus ke bnde hin، sb ke sb asi ke tabع frman hin
30.27: Ohi he jo tkhliq ki abtda krta he، phr ohi as ka aعadh kre ga aor ih as ke lie aasan tr he aasmanon aor zmin min as ki sft sb se brtr he aor oh zbrdst aor hkim he
30.28: Oh tmhin khod tmhari apni hi zat se aik msal dita he kia tmhare aun ghlamon min se jo tmhari mlkit min hin kchh ghlam aise bhi hin jo hmare die hoee mal o dolt min tmhare sath brabr ke shrik hon aor tm aun se aus trh drte ho js trh aaps min apne hmsron se drte ho? As trh hm aaiat khol kr pish krte hin aun logon ke lie jo عql se kam lite hin
30.29: Mgr ih zalm be smjhe bojhe apne tkhilat ke pichhe chl pre hin ab kon aus shkhs ko rasth dkha skta he jse allh ne bhtka dia ho aise logon ka to koei mdd gar nhin ho skta
30.30: Ps (ae nbiؐ، aor nbiؐ ke piroؤn) ik suo ho kr apna rukh ais din ki smt min jma do، qaem ho jaؤ aus ftrt pr js pr allh tعalia ne ansanon ko pida kia he، allh ki bnaei hoei sakht bdli nhin ja skti، ihi balkl rast aor drst din he، mgr aksr log jante nhin hin
30.31: (qaem ho jaؤ ais bat pr) allh ki trf rjoع krte hoee، aor dro aus se، aor nmaz qaem kro، aor nh ho jaؤ aun mshrkin min se
30.32: Jnhon ne apna apna din alg bna lia he aor grohon min bt gee hin، hr aik groh ke pas jo kchh he asi min oh mgn he
30.33: Logon ka hal ih he kh jb anhin koei tklif phnchti he to apne rb ki trf rjoع kr ke ause pkarte hin، phr jb oh kchh apni rhmt ka zaeqh anhin chkha dita he to ikaik an min se kchh log shrk krne lgte hin
30.34: Takh hmare kie hoee ahsan ki nashkri krin achha، mze kr lo، عnqrib tmhin mعlom ho jaee ga
30.35: Kia hm ne koei snd aor dlil an pr nazl ki he jo shhadt diti ho as shrk ki sdaqt pr jo ih kr rhe hin?
30.36: Jb hm logon ko rhmt ka zaeqh chkhate hin to oh as pr phol jate hin، aor jb an ke apne kie krtoton se an pr koei msibt aati he to ikaik oh maios hone lgte hin
30.37: Kia ih log dikhte nhin hin kh allh hi rzq kshadh krta he js ka chahta he aor tng krta he (js ka chahta he) iqinaan as min bht si nshanian hin aun logon ke lie jo aiman late hin
30.38: Ps (ae momn) rshth dar ko as ka hq de aor mskin o msafr ko (aus ka hq) ih triqh bhtr he aun logon ke lie jo allh ki khoshnodi chahte hon، aor ohi flah pane oale hin
30.39: Jo suod tm dite ho takh logon ke amoal min shaml ho kr oh brh jaee، allh ke nzdik oh nhin brhta، aor jo zkoaۃ tm allh ki khoshnodi hasl krne ke arade se dite ho، asi ke dine oale dr hqiqt apne mal brhate hin
30.40: Allh hi he js ne tm ko pida kia، phr tmhin rzq dia، phr oh tmhin mot dita he، phr oh tmhin zndh kre ga kia tmhare thiraee hoee shrikon min koei aisa he jo an min se koei kam bhi krta ho? Pak he oh aor bht bala o brtr he aus shrk se jo ih log krte hin?
30.41: Khshki aor tri min fsad brpa ho gia he logon ke apne hathon ki kmaei se takh mza chkhaee aun ko an ke bعz aعmal ka، shaid kh oh baz aaein
30.42: (ae nbiؐ) ain se kho kh zmin min chl phr kr dikho phle gzre hoee logon ka kia anjam ho chka he، an min se aksr mshrk hi the
30.43: Ps (ae nbiؐ) apna rukh mzboti ke sath jma do ais din rast ki smt min qbl as ke kh oh dn aaee js ke tl jane ki koei sort allh ki trf se nhin he aus dn log phat kr aik duosre se alg ho jaein ge
30.44: Js ne kfr kia he as ke kfr ka obal asi pr he aor jn logon ne nik عml kia he oh apne hi lie flah ka rasth saf kr rhe hin
30.45: Takh allh aiman lane oalon aor عmli salh krne oalon ko apne fzl se jza de iqinaan oh kafron ko psnd nhin krta
30.46: Aus ki nshanion min se ih he kh oh hoaein bhijta he bshart dine ke lie aor tmhin apni rhmt se bhrh mnd krne ke lie aor as ghrz ke lie kh kshtian as ke hkm se chlin aor tm as ka fzl tlash kro aor as ke shkr gzar bno
30.47: Aor hm ne tm se phle rsuolon ko an ki qom ki trf bhija aor oh an ke pas roshn nshanian le kr aaee، phr jnhon ne jrm kia aun se hm ne antqam lia aor hm pr ih hq tha kh hm momnon ki mdd krin
30.48: Allh hi he jo hoaؤn ko bhijta he aor oh badl athati hin، phr oh ain badlon ko aasman min phila dita he js trh chahta he aor anhin tkrion min tqsim krta he، phr tuo dikhta he kh barsh ke qtre badl se tpke chle aate hin ih barsh jb oh apne bndon min se jn pr chahta he brsata he
30.49: To ikaik oh khosh o khrm ho jate hin halankh as ke nzol se phle oh maios ho rhe the
30.50: Dikho allh ki rhmt ke asrat kh murdh pri hoei zmin ko oh ks trh jila athata he، iqinaan oh murdon ko zndgi bkhshne oala he aor oh hr chiz pr qadr he
30.51: Aor agr hm aik aisi hoa bhij din js ke asr se oh apni khiti ko zrd paein to oh kfr krte rh jate hin
30.52: (ae nbiؐ) tm murdon ko nhin sna skte، nh aun bhron ko apni pkar sna skte ho jo pith phire bhage chle ja rhe hon
30.53: Aor nh tm andhon ko an ki gmrahi se nkal kr rahi rast dkha skte ho tm to srf anhi ko sna skte ho jo hmari aaiat pr aiman late aor sri tslim khm kr dite hin
30.54: Allh hi to he js ne zعf ki halt min tmhari pidaesh ki abtda ki، phr as zعf ke bعd tmhin qot bkhshi، phr as qot ke bعd tmhin zعif aor borha kr dia oh jo kchh chahta he pida krta he aor oh sb kchh janne oala، hr chiz pr qdrt rkhne oala he
30.55: Aor jb oh saعt brpa ho gi to mjrm qsmin kha kha kr khin ge kh hm aik ghri bhr se ziadh nhin thire hin، aisi trh oh dnia ki zndgi min dhoka khaia krte the
30.56: Mgr jo عlm aor aiman se bhrh mnd kie gee the oh khin ge kh khda ke noshte min to tm rozi hshr tk pre rhe ho، so ih ohi rozi hshr he، likn tm jante nh the
30.57: Ps oh dn ho ga js min zalmon ko an ki mعzrt koei nfع nh de gi aor nh an se mعafi mangne ke lie kha jaee ga
30.58: Hm ne ais qraan min logon ko trh trh se smjhaia he tm khoah koei nshani le aaؤ، jn logon ne manne se ankar kr dia he oh ihi khin ge kh tm batl pr ho
30.59: Ais trh thph lga dita he allh aun logon ke dlon pr jo be عlm hin
30.60: Ps (ae nbiؐ) sbr kro، iqinaan allh ka oعdh scha he، aor hrgz hlka nh paein tm ko oh log jo iqin nhin late

31.2: Ih ktab hkim ki aaiat hin
31.3: Hdait aor rhmt niko kar logon ke lie
31.4: Jo nmaz qaem krte hin، zkoaۃ dite hin aor aakhrt pr iqin rkhte hin
31.5: Ihi log apne rb ki trf se rahi rast pr hin aor ihi flah pane oale hin
31.6: Aor ansanon hi min se koei aisa bhi he jo klam dlfrib khrid kr lata he takh logon ko allh ke rasth se عlm ke bghir bhtka de aor as raste ki dعot ko mzaq min ara de aise logon ke lie skht zlil krne oala عzab he
31.7: Ase jb hmari aaiat snaei jati hin to oh bre ghmnd ke sath as trh rkh phir lita he goia kh as ne anhin sna hi nhin، goia kh as ke kan bhre hin achha، mzhdh suna do ase aik drd nak عzab ka
31.8: Albth jo log aiman le aaein aor nik عml krin، aun ke lie nعmt bhri jntin hin
31.9: Jn min oh hmishh rhin ge ih allh ka pkhth oعdh he aor oh zbrdst aor hkim he
31.10: As ne aasmanon ko pida kia bghir stonon ke jo tm ko nzr aaein aus ne zmin min phar jma die takh oh tmhin le kr dhlk nh jaee as ne hr trh ke janor zmin min phila die aor aasman se pani brsaia aor zmin min qsm qsm ki عmdh chizin aga din
31.11: Ih to he allh ki tkhliq، ab zra mjhe dkhaؤ، an dosron ne kia pida kia he? Asl bat ih he kh ih zalm log srih gmrahi min pre hoee hin
31.12: Hm ne lqman ko hkmt عta ki thi kh allh ka shkr gzar ho jo koei shkr kre aus ka shkr aus ke apne hi lie mfid he aor jo koei kfr kre to hqiqt min allh be niaz aor aap se aap mhmod he
31.13: Iad kro jb lqman apne bite ko nsiht kr rha tha to as ne kha "bita! Khda ke sath ksi ko shrik nh krna، hq ih he kh shrk bht bra zlm he"
31.14: Aor hqiqt ih he kh hm ne ansan ko apne oaldin ka hq phchanne ki khod takid ki he aus ki man ne zعf pr zعf autha kr ase apne pit min rkha aor do sal aus ka dodh chhotne min lge (aisi lie hm ne aus ko nsiht ki kh) mira shkr kr aor apne oaldin ka shkr bja la، miri hi trf tjhe pltna he
31.15: Likn agr oh tjh pr dbaؤ dalin kh mire sath to ksi aise ko shrik kre jse to nhin janta to an ki bat hrgz nh man dunia min an ke sath nik brtaؤ krta rh mgr piroi aus shkhs ke raste ki kr js ne miri trf rjoع kia he phr tm sb ko pltna miri hi trf he، aus oqt min tmhin bta don ga kh tm kise عml krte rhe ho
31.16: (aor lqman ne kha tha kh) "bita، koei chiz raei ke danh brabr bhi ho aor ksi chtan min ia aasmanon ia zmin min khin chhpi hoei ho، allh ause nkal laee ga oh barik bin aor bakhbr he
31.17: Bita، nmaz qaem krne ka hkm de، bdi se mnع kr، aor jo msibt bhi pre as pr sbr kr ih oh batin hin jn ki bri takid ki gei he
31.18: Aor logon se mnh phir kr bat nh kr، nh zmin min akr kr chl، allh ksi khod psnd aor fkhr jtane oale shkhs ko psnd nhin krta
31.19: Apni chal min aعtdal akhtiar kr، aor apni aaoaz zra pst rkh، sb aaoazon se ziadh buri aaoaz gdhon ki aaoaz hoti he
31.20: Kia tm log nhin dikhte kh allh ne zmin aor aasmanon ki sari chizin tmhare lie mskhr kr rkhi hin aor apni khli aor chhpi nعmtin tm pr tmam kr di hin? Ais pr hal ih he kh ansanon min se kchh log hin jo allh ke bare min jhgrte hin bghir as ke kh an ke pas koei عilm ho، ia hdait، ia koei roshni dkhane oali ktab
31.21: Aor jb an se kha jata he kh piroi kro aus chiz ki jo allh ne nazl ki he to khte hin kh hm to aus chiz ki piroi krin ge js pr hm ne apne bap dada ko paia he kia ih anhi ki piroi krin ge khoah shitan aun ko bhrkti hoei aag hi ki trf kion nh blata rha ho?
31.22: Jo shkhs apne aap ko allh ke hoalh kr de aor عmlaan oh nik ho، as ne fi aloaqع aik bhrose ke qabl shara tham lia، aor sare mعamlat ka aakhri fislh allh hi ke hath he
31.23: Ab jo kfr krta he as ka kfr tmhin ghm min mbtla nh kre، anhin plt kr aana to hmari hi trf he، phr hm anhin bta din ge kh oh kia kchh kr ke aaee hin iqinaan allh sinon ke chhpe hoee raz tk janta he
31.24: Hm thori mdt anhin dunia min mze krne ka moqع de rhe hin، phr an ko be bs kr ke aik skht عzab ki trf khinch le jaein ge
31.25: Agr tm ain se pochho kh zmin aor aasmanon ko ks ne pida kia he، to ih zror khin ge kh allh ne kho alhmdllh mgr an min se aksr log jante nhin hin
31.26: Aasmanon aor zmin min jo kchh he allh hi ka he، be shk allh be niaz aor aap se aap mhmod he
31.27: Zmin min jtne drkht hin agr oh sb ke sb qlm bn jaein aor smndr (doat bn jaee) jse sat mzid smndr roshnaei mhia krin tb bhi allh ki batin (lkhne se) khtm nh hon gi be shk allh zbrdst aor hkim he
31.28: Tm sare ansanon ko pida krna aor phr dobarh jila authana to (aus ke lie) bs aisa he jise aik mtnfs ko (pida krna aor jila athana) hqiqt ih he kh allh sb kchh sunne aor dikhne oala he
31.29: Kia tm dikhte nhin ho kh allh rat ko dn min prota hoa le aata he aor dn ko rat min? Aus ne suorj aor chand ko mskhr kr rkha he، sb aik oqt mqrr tk chle ja rhe hin، aor (kia tm nhin jante) kh jo kchh bhi tm krte ho allh aus se bakhbr he
31.30: Ih sb kchh as ojh se he kh allh hi hq he aor ase chhor kr jn duosri chizon ko ih log pkarte hin oh sb batl hin، aor (as ojh se kh) allh hi bzrg o brtr he
31.31: Kia tm dikhte nhin ho kh kshti smndr min allh ke fzl se chlti he takh oh tmhin apni kchh nshanian dkhaee? Dr hqiqt as min bht si nshanian hin hr aus shkhs ke lie jo sbr aor shkr krne oala ho
31.32: Aor jb (smndr min) ain logon pr aik moj saebanon ki trh chha jati he to ih allh ko pkarte hin apne din ko balkl asi ke lie khals kr ke، phr jb oh bcha kr anhin khshki tk phncha dita he to an min se koei aqtsad brtta he، aor hmari nshanion ka ankar nhin krta mgr hr oh shkhs jo ghdّar aor nashkra he
31.33: Logo، bcho apne rb ke ghzb se aor dro aus dn se jbkh koei bap apne bite ki trf se bdlh nh de ga aor nh koei bita hi apne bap ki trf se kchh bdlh dine oala hoga fi aloaqع allh ka oعdh scha he ps ih dnia ki zndgi tmhin dhoke min nh dale aor nh dhokh baz tm ko allh ke mعamle min dhoka dine paee
31.34: Aus ghri ka عlm allh hi ke pas he، ohi barsh brsata he، ohi janta he kh maؤn ke piton min kia prorsh pa rha he، koei mtnfs nhin janta kh kl oh kia kmaei krne oala he aor nh ksi shkhs ko ih khbr he kh ks srzmin min as ki mot aani he، allh hi sb kchh janne oala aor bakhbr he

32.2: Ais ktab ki tnzil bla shbh rb alعalmin ki trf se he
32.3: Kia ih log khte hin kh as shkhs ne aise khod ghr lia he? Nhin، blkh ih hq he tire rb ki trf se takh to mtnbh kre aik aisi qom ko js ke pas tjh se phle koei mtnbh krne oala nhin aaia، shaid kh oh hdait pa jaein
32.4: Oh allh hi he js ne aasmanon aor zmin ko aor aun sari chizon ko jo an ke drmian hin chh dnon min pida kia aor as ke bعd عrsh pr jloh frma hoa، aus ke soa nh tmhara koei hami o mdd gar he aor nh koei aus ke aage sfarsh krne oala، phr kia tm hosh min nh aaؤ ge?
32.5: Oh aasman se zmin tk dunia ke mعamlat ki tdbir krta he aor as tdbir ki rodad auopr aus ke hzor jati he aik aise dn min js ki mqdar tmhare shmar se aik hzar sal he
32.6: Ohi he hr poshidh aor zahr ka janne oala، zbrdst، aor rhim
32.7: Jo chiz bhi as ne bnaei khob hi bnaei au s ne ansan ki tkhliq ki abtda gare se ki
32.8: Phr aus ki nsl aik aise st se chlaei jo hqir pani ki trh ka he
32.9: Phr as ko nik suk se drst kia aor as ke andr apni roh phonk di، aor tm ko kan die، aankhin din aor dil die tm log km hi shkr gzar hote ho
32.10: Aor ih log khte hin: "jb hm mti min ral mil chke hon ge to kia hm phr nee sre se pida kie jaein ge?" asl bat ih he kh ih apne rb ki mlaqat ke mnkr hin
32.11: Ain se kho "mot ka oh frshth jo tm pr mqrr kia gia he tm ko pora ka pora apne qbze min le le ga aor phr tm apne rb ki trf plta laee jaؤ ge"
32.12: Kash tm dikho oh oqt jb ih mjrm sr jhkaee apne rb ke hzor khre hon ge (aus oqt ih khh rhe hon ge) "ae hmare rb، hm ne khob dikh lia aor sun lia ab hmin oaps bhij de takh hm nik عml krin، hmin ab iqin aagia he"
32.13: (joab min arshad ho ga) "agr hm chahte to phle hi hr nfs ko as ki hdait de dite mgr miri oh bat puori ho gei jo min ne khi thi kh min jhnّm ko jnon aor ansanon sb se bhr don ga
32.14: Ps ab chkho mza apni ais hrkt ka kh tm ne as dn ki mlaqat ko framosh kr dia، hm ne bhi ab tmhin framosh kr dia he chkho hmishgi ke عzab ka mza apne krtoton ki padash min"
32.15: Hmari aaiat pr to oh log aiman late hin jnhin ih aaiat sna kr jb nsiht ki jati he to sjde min gr prte hin aor apne rb ki hmd ke sath as ki tsbih krte hin aor tkbr nhin krte
32.16: Aun ki pithin bstron se alg rhti hin، apne rb ko khof aor tmع ke sath pkarte hin، aor jo kchh rzq hm ne aunhin dia he as min se khrch krte hin
32.17: Phr jisa kchh aankhon ki thndk ka saman an ke aعmal ki jza min an ke lie chhpa rkha gia he as ki ksi mtnfs ko khbr nhin he
32.18: Bhla khin ih ho skta he kh jo shkhs momn ho oh aus shkhs ki trh ho jaee jo fasq ho? Ih donon brabr nhin ho skte
32.19: Jo log aiman laee hin aor jnhon ne nik عml kie hin aun ke lie to jnton ki qiam gahin hin، ziaft ke tor pr aun ke aعmal ke bdle min
32.20: Aor jnhon ne fsq akhtiar kia he aun ka thkana dozkh he jb kbhi oh as se nklna chahin ge asi min dhkil die jaein ge aor an se kha jaee ga kh chkho ab ausi aag ke عzab ka mza js ko tm jhtlaia krte the
32.21: Aus bre عzab se phle hm aisi dnia min (ksi nh ksi chhote) عzab ka mza ainhin chkhate rhin ge، shaid kh ih (apni baghianh rosh se) baz aa jaein
32.22: Aor aus se bra zalm kon ho ga jse as ke rb ki aaiat ke zriعh se nsiht ki jaee aor phr oh an se mnh phir le aise mjrmon se to hm antqam le kr rhin ge
32.23: Ais se phle hm mosiaؑ ko ktab de chke hin، lhaza ausi chiz ke mlne pr tmhin koei shk nh hona chahie aus ktab ko hm ne bni asraeil ke lie hdait bnaia tha
32.24: Aor jb anhon ne sbr kia aor hmari aaiat pr iqin late rhe to an ke andr hm ne aise pishoa pida kie jo hmare hkm se rhnmaei krte the
32.25: Iqinaan tira rb hi qiamt ke roz aun baton ka fislh kre ga jn min (bni asraeil) bahm akhtlaf krte rhe hin
32.26: Aor kia ain logon ko (ain tarikhi oaqعat min) koei hdait nhin mli kh an se phle ktni qomon ko hm hlak kr chke hin jn ke rhne ki jghon min aaj ih chlte phrte hin? As min bri nshanian hin، kia ih snte nhin hin?
32.27: Aor kia ain logon ne ih mnzr kbhi nhin dikha kh hm aik be aab o giah zmin ki trf pani bha late hin، aor phr asi zmin se oh fsl augate hin js se an ke janoron ko bhi charh mlta he aor ih khod bhi khate hin? To kia anhin kchh nhin sojhta?
32.28: Ih log khte hin kh "ih fislh kb ho ga agr tm sche ho?"
32.29: An se kho "fisle ke dn aiman lana aun logon ke lie kchh bhi nafع nh ho ga jnhon ne kfr kia he aor phr aun ko koei mhlt nh mle gi"
32.30: Achha، ainhin an ke hal pr chhor do aor antzar kro، ih bhi mntzr hin

33.1: Ae nbiؐ! Allh se dro aor kfar o mnafqin ki ataعt nh kro، hqiqt min عlim aor hkim to allh hi he
33.2: Piroi kro aus bat ki js ka asharh tmhare rb ki trf se tmhin kia ja rha he، allh hr aus bat se bakhbr he jo tm log krte ho
33.3: Allh pr tokl kro، allh hi okil hone ke lie kafi he
33.4: Allh ne ksi shkhs ke dhr min do dil nhin rkhe hin، nh as ne tm logon ki aun bioion ko jn se tm zhar krte ho tmhari man bna dia he، aor nh as ne tmhare mnh bole biton ko tmhara hqiqi bita bnaia he ih to oh batin hin jo tm log apne mnh se nkal dite ho، mgr allh oh bat khta he jo mbni br hqiqt he، aor ohi shih triqe ki trf rhnmaei krta he
33.5: Mnh bole biton ko an ke bapon ki nsbt se pkaro، ih allh ke nzdik ziadh mnsfanh bat he aor agr tmhin mعlom nh ho kh an ke bap kon hin to oh tmhare dini bhaei aor rfiq hin na dansth jo bat tm kho as ke lie tm pr koei grft nhin he، likn aus bat pr zror grft he js ka tm dl se aradh kro allh drgzr krne oala aor rhim he
33.6: Blashbh nbi to ahl aiman ke lie aun ki apni zat pr mqdm he، aor nbi ki bioian aun ki maein hin، mgr ktab allh ki ro se عam momnin o mhajrin ki bh nsbt rshth dar aik dosre ke ziadh hqdar hin، albth apne rfiqon ke sath tm koei bhlaei (krna chaho to) kr skte ho ih hkm ktab alahi min lkha hoa he
33.7: Aor (ae nbiؐ) iad rkho aus عhd o piman ko jo hm ne sb pighmbron se lia he، tm se bhi aor nohؑ aor abrahimؑ aor mosiaؑ aor عisiaؑ abn mrim se bhi sb se hm pkhth عhd le chke hin
33.8: Takh sche logon se (an ka rb) an ki schaei ke bare min soal kre، aor kafron ke lie to as ne drd nak عzab mhia kr hi rkha he
33.9: Ae logo، jo aiman laee ho، iad kro allh ke ahsan ko jo (abhi abhi) aus ne tm pr kia he jb lshkr tm pr chrh aaee to hm ne aun pr aik skht aandhi bhij di aor aisi fojin roanh kin jo tm ko nzr nh aati thin allh oh sb kchh dikh rha tha jo tm log as oqt kr rhe the
33.10: Jb oh auopr se aor niche se tm pr chrh aaee jb khof ke mare aankhin pthra gein، klije mnh ko aa gee، aor tm log allh ke bare min trh trh ke gman krne lge
33.11: Aus oqt aiman lane oale khob aazmaee gee aor buri trh hla mare gee
33.12: Iad kro oh oqt jb mnafqin aor oh sb log jn ke dlon min rog tha saf saf khh rhe the kh allh aor aus ke rsolؐ ne jo oعde hm se kie the oh frib ke soa kchh nh the
33.13: Jb aun min se aik groh ne kha kh "ae isrb ke logo، tmhare lie ab thirne ka koei moqع nhin he، plt chlo" jb an ka aik friq ih khh kr nbiؐ se rkhst tlb kr rha tha kh "hmare ghr khtre min hin،" halankh oh khtre min nh the، drasl oh (mhaz jng se) bhagna chahte the
33.14: Agr shhr ke atraf se dshmn ghs aaee hote aor aus oqt anhin ftne ki trf dعot di jati to ih as min ja prte aor mshkl hi se anhin shrik ftnh hone min koei taml hota
33.15: An logon ne as se phle allh se عhd kia tha kh ih pith nh phirin ge، aor allh se kie hoee عhd ki baz prs to honi hi thi
33.16: Ae nbiؐ! An se kho، agr tm mot ia qtl se bhago to ih bhagna tmhare lie kchh bhi nfع bkhsh nh ho ga as ke bعd zndgi ke mze lotne ka thora hi moqع tmhin ml ske ga
33.17: Ain se kho، kon he jo tmhin allh se bcha skta ho agr oh tmhin nqsan phnchana chahe? Aor kon as ki rhmt ko rok skta he agr oh tm pr mhrbani krna chahe? Allh ke mqable min to ih log koei hami o mdd gar nhin pa skte hin
33.18: Allh tm min se aun logon ko khob janta he jo (jng ke kam min) rkaotin dalne oale hin، jo apne bhaeion se khte hin kh "aaؤ hmari trf" jo lraei min hsh lite bhi hin to bs nam gnane ko
33.19: Jo tmhara sath dine min skht bkhil hin khtre ka oqt aa jaee to as trh dide phra phra kr tmhari trf dikhte hin jise ksi mrne oale pr ghshi tari ho rhi ho، mgr jb khtrh gzr jata he to ihi log faedon ke hris bn kr qinchi ki trh chlti hoei zbanin lie tmhare astqbal ko aa jate hin ih log hrgz aiman nhin laee، asi lie allh ne an ke sare aعmal zaeع kr die aor aisa krna allh ke lie bht aasan he
33.20: Ih smjh rhe hin kh hmlh aaor groh abhi gee nhin hin aor agr oh phr hmlh aaor ho jaein to an ka ji chahta he kh aus moqع pr ih khin shra min bdoؤn ke drmian ja bithin aor ohin se tmhare halat pochhte rhin tahm agr ih tmhare drmian rhe bhi to lraei min km hi hsh lin ge
33.21: Dr hqiqt tm logon ke lie allh ke rsolؐ min aik bhtrin nmonh tha، hr aus shkhs ke lie jo allh aor iom aakhr ka amidoar ho aor ksrt se allh ko iad kre
33.22: Aor sche momnon (ka hal aus oqt ih tha kh) jb anhon ne hmlh aaor lshkron ko dikha to pkar athe kh "ih ohi chiz he js ka allh aor as ke rsol ne hm se oعdh kia tha، allh aor aus ke rsolؐ ki bat balkl schّi thi" ais oaqعh ne aun ke aiman aor an ki sprdgi ko aor ziadh brha dia
33.23: Aiman lane oalon min aise log mojod hin jnhon ne allh se kie hoee عhd ko scha kr dkhaia he an min se koei apni nzr pori kr chka aor koei oqt aane ka mntzr he anhon ne apne roie min koei tbdili nhin ki
33.24: (ih sb kchh as lie hoa) takh allh schon ko aun ki schaei ki jza de aor mnafqon ko chahe to sza de aor chahe to an ki tobh qbol kr le، be shk allh ghfor o rhim he
33.25: Allh ne kfar ka mnh phir dia، oh koei faedh hasl kie bghir apne dl ki jln lie ionhi plt gee، aor momnin ki trf se allh hi lrne ke lie kafi ho gia، allh bri qot oala aor zbrdst he
33.26: Phr ahl ktab min se jn logon ne an hmlh aaoron ka sath dia tha، allh an ki grhion se anhin atar laia aor aun ke dlon min aus ne aisa ruعb dal dia kh aaj an min se aik groh ko tm qtl kr rhe ho aor dosre groh ko qid kr rhe ho
33.27: As ne tm ko an ki zmin aor an ke ghron aor an ke amoal ka oars bna dia aor oh عlaqh tmhin dia jse tm ne kbhi pamal nh kia tha allh hr chiz pr qadr he
33.28: Ae nbiؐ، apni bioion se kho، agr tm dnia aor as ki zint chahti ho to aaؤ، min tmhin kchh de dla kr bhle triqe se rkhst kr don
33.29: Aor agr tm allh aor as ke rsolؐ aor dar aakhrt ki talb ho to jan lo kh tm min se jo niko kar hin allh ne an ke lie bra ajr mhia kr rkha he
33.30: Nbiؐ ki bioio، tm min se jo ksi srih fhsh hrkt ka artkab kre gi ase dohra عzab dia jaee ga، allh ke lie ih bht aasan kam he
33.31: Aor tm min se jo allh aor aus ke rsolؐ ki ataعt kre gi aor nik عml kre gi as ko hm dohra ajr din ge aor hm ne as ke lie rzq krim mhia kr rkha he
33.32: Nbiؐ ki bioio، tm عam عorton ki trh nhin ho agr tm allh se drne oali ho to dbi zban se bat nh kia kro kh dl ki khrabi ka mubtla koei shkhs lalch min pr jaee، blkh saf sidhi bat kro
33.33: Apne ghron min tik kr rho aor sabq dor jahlit ki si sj dhj nh dkhati phro nmaz qaem kro، zkoaۃ do aor allh aor aus ke rsolؐ ki ataعt kro allh to ih chahta he kh ahli biti nbiؐ se gndgi ko dor kre aor tmhin pori trh pak kr de
33.34: Iad rkho allh ki aaiat aor hkmt ki baton ko jo tmhare ghron min snaei jati hin be shk allh ltif aor bakhbr he
33.35: Baliqin jo mrd aor jo عortin mslm hin، momn hin، mtiع frman hin، rast baz hin، sabr hin، allh ke aage jhkne oale hin، sdqh dine oale hin، rozh rkhne oale hin، apni shrmgahon ki hfazt krne oale hin، aor allh ko ksrt se iad krne oale hin، allh ne an ke lie mghfrt aor bra ajr mhia kr rkha he
33.36: Ksi momn mrd aor ksi momn عort ko ih hq nhin he kh jb allh aor as ka rsolؐ ksi mعamle ka fislh kr de to phr ase apne aus mعamle min khod fislh krne ka akhtiar hasl rhe aor jo koei allh aor as ke rsolؐ ki nafrmani kre to oh srih gmrahi min pr gia
33.37: Ae nbiؐ، iad kro oh moqع jb tm as shkhs se khh rhe the js pr allh ne aor tm ne ahsan kia tha kh "apni bioi ko nh chhor aor allh se dr" aus oqt tm apne dl min oh bat chhpaee hoee the jse allh kholna chahta tha، tm logon se dr rhe the، halankh allh as ka ziadh hqdar he kh tm as se dro phr jb zidؓ as se apni hajt pori kr chka to hm ne as (mtlqh khaton) ka tm se nkah kr dia takh momnon pr apne mnh bole biton ki bioion ke mعamlh min koei tngi nh rhe jbkh oh an se apni hajt pori kr chke hon aor allh ka hkm to عml min aana hi chahie tha
33.38: Nbi pr ksi aise kam min koei rkaot nhin he jo allh ne as ke lie mqrr kr dia ho ihi allh ki snt an sb anbiaء ke mعamlh min rhi he jo phle gzr chke hin aor allh ka hkm aik qtعi te shdh fislh hota he
33.39: (ih allh ki snt he aun logon ke lie) jo allh ke pighamat phnchate hin aor ausi se drte hin aor aik khda ke soa ksi se nhin drte، aor mhasbh ke lie bs allh hi kafi he
33.40: (logo) mhmdؐ tmhare mardon min se ksi ke bap nhin hin، mgr oh allh ke rsol aor khatm alnbiin hin، aor allh hr chiz ka عlm rkhne oala he
33.41: Ae logo! Jo aiman laee ho، allh ko ksrt se iad kro
33.42: Aor sbh o sham as ki tsbih krte rho
33.43: Ohi he jo tm pr rhmt frmata he aor as ke mlaekh tmhare lie dعaee rhmt krte hin takh oh tmhin tarikion se roshni min nkal laee، oh momnon pr bht mhrban he
33.44: Js roz oh as se mlin ge aun ka astqbal slam se ho ga aor aun ke lie allh ne bra ba عzt ajr frahm kr rkha he
33.45: Ae nbiؐ، hm ne tmhin bhija he goah bna kr، bshart dine oala aor drane oala bna kr
33.46: Allh ki ajazt se aus ki trf dعot dine oala bna kr aor roshn chragh bna kr
33.47: Bshart de do aun logon ko jo (tm pr) aiman laee hin kh an ke lie allh ki trf se bra fzl he
33.48: Aor hrgz nh dbo kfar o mnafqin se، koei proah nh kro an ki azit rsani ki aor bhrosh kr lo allh pr، allh hi as ke lie kafi he kh aadmi apne mعamlat aus ke sprd kr de
33.49: Aae logo jo aiman laee ho، jb tm momn عorton se nkah kro aor phr anhin hath lgane se phle tlaq de do to tmhari trf se an pr koei عdt lazm nhin he js ke pore hone ka tm mtalbh kr sko lhaza anhin kchh mal do aor bhle triqe se rkhst kr do
33.50: Ae nbiؐ، hm ne tmhare lie hlal kr din tmhari oh bioian jn ke mhr tm ne ada kie hin، aor oh عortin jo allh ki عta krdh londion min se tmhari mlkit min aaein، aor tmhari oh chcha zad aor phophi zad aor mamon zad aor khalh zad bhnin jnhon ne tmhare sath hjrt ki he، aor oh momn عort js ne apne aap ko nbiؐ ke lie hbh kia ho agr nbiؐ ase nkah min lina chahe ih rعait khalsۃan tmhare lie he، dosre momnon ke lie nhin he hm ko mعlom he kh عam momnon pr an ki bioion aor londion ke bare min hm ne kia hdod عaed kie hin (tmhin an hdod se hm ne as lie mstsnia kia he) takh tmhare aopr koei tngi nh rhe، aor allh ghfor o rhim he
33.51: Tm ko akhtiar dia jata he kh apni bioion min se js ko chaho apne se alg rkho، jse chaho apne sath rkho aor jse chaho alg rkhne ke bعd apne pas bla lo as mعamlh min tm pr koei mzaeqh nhin he ais trh ziadh mtoqع he kh aun ki aankhin thndi rhin gi aor oh rnjidh nh hon gi، aor jo kchh bhi tm aun ko do ge as pr oh sb razi rhin gi allh janta he jo kchh tm logon ke dlon min he، aor allh عlim o hlim he
33.52: As ke bعd tmhare lie dosri عortin hlal nhin hin، aor nh as ki ajazt he kh an ki jgh aor bioian le aaؤ khoah aun ka hsn tmhin ktna hi psnd ho، albth londion ki tmhin ajazt he allh hr chiz pr ngran he
33.53: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، nbiؐ ke ghron min bla ajazt nh chle aaia kro nh khane ka oqt takte rho han agr tmhin khane pr blaia jaee to zror aaؤ mgr jb khana khalo to mntshr ho jaؤ، batin krne min nh lge rho tmhari ih hrktin nbiؐ ko tklif diti hin، mgr oh shrm ki ojh se kchh nhin khte aor allh hq bat khne min nhin shrmata nbiؐ ki bioion se agr tmhin kchh mangna ho to prde ke pichhe se manga kro، ih tmhare aor an ke dlon ki pakizgi ke lie ziadh mnasb triqh he tmhare lie ih hrgz jaez nhin kh allh ke rsolؐ ko tklif do، aor nh ih jaez he kh an ke bعd an ki bioion se nkah kro، ih allh ke nzdik bht bra gnah he
33.54: Tm khoah koei bat zahr kro ia chhpaؤ، allh ko hr bat ka عlm he
33.55: Azoaj nbiؐ ke lie as min koei mzaeqh nhin he kh an ke bap، an ke bite، an ke bhaei، an ke bhtije، an ke bhanje، an ke mil jol ki عortin aor an ke mmlok ghron min aaein (ae عorto) tmhin allh ki nafrmani se prhiz krna chahie allh hr chiz pr ngah rkhta he
33.56: Allh aor as ke mlaekh nbiؐ pr drod bhijte hin، ae logo jo aiman laee ho، tm bhi an pr drod o slam bhijo
33.57: Jo log allh aor as ke rsolؐ ko azit dite hin an pr dnia aor aakhrt min allh ne lعnt frmaei he aor aun ke lie rsoa kn عzab mhia kr dia he
33.58: Aor jo log momn mrdon aor عorton ko be qsor azit dite hin aunhon ne aik bre bhtan aor srih gnah ka obal apne sr le lia he
33.59: Ae nbiؐ، apni bioion aor bition aor ahl aiman ki عorton se khh do kh apne aopr apni chadron ke plo ltka lia krin ih ziadh mnasb triqh he takh oh phchan li jaein aor nh staei jaein allh tعalia ghfor o rhim he
33.60: Agr mnafqin، aor oh log jn ke dlon min khrabi he، aor oh jo mdinh min hijan angiz afoahin philane oale hin، apni hrkton se baz nh aaee to hm an ke khlaf karoaei krne ke lie tmhin autha khra krin ge، phr oh as shhr min mshkl hi se tmhare sath rh skin ge
33.61: An pr hr trf se lعnt ki bochhar ho gi، jhan khin paee jaein ge pkre jaein ge aor buri trh mare jaein ge
33.62: Ih allh ki snt he jo aise logon ke mعamle min phle se chli aa rhi he، aor tm allh ki snt min koei tbdili nh paؤ ge
33.63: Log tm se pochhte hin kh qiamt ki ghri kb aaee gi kho، aus ka عlm to allh hi ko he tmhin kia khbr، shaid kh oh qrib hi aa lgi ho
33.64: Bhrhal ih iqini amr he kh allh ne kafron pr lعnt ki he aor an ke lie bhrkti hoei aag mhia kr di he
33.65: Js min oh hmishh rhin ge، koei hami o mdd gar nh pa skin ge
33.66: Js roz an ke chhre aag pr alt plt kie jaein ge aus oqt oh khin ge kh "kash hm ne allh aor rsolؐ ki ataعt ki hoti"
33.67: Aor khin ge "ae rb hmare، hm ne apne srdaron aor apne bron ki ataعt ki aor anhon ne hmin rahi rast se be rah kr dia
33.68: Ae rb، an ko dohra عzab de aor an pr skht lعnt kr"
33.69: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، aun logon ki trh nh bn jaؤ jnhon ne mosiaؑ ko azitin di thin، phr allh ne aun ki bnaei hoei baton se aus ki brأt frmaei aor oh allh ke nzdik ba عzt tha
33.70: Ae aiman lane oalo، allh se dro aor thik bat kia kro
33.71: Allh tmhare aعmal drst kr de ga aor tmhare qsoron se drgzr frmaee ga jo shkhs allh aor as ke rsolؐ ki ataعt kre aus ne bri kamiabi hasl ki
33.72: Hm ne as amant ko aasmanon aor zmin aor pharon ke samne pish kia to oh ause athane ke lie tiar nh hoee aor as se dr gee، mgr ansan ne ase atha lia، be shk oh bra zalm aor jahl he
33.73: Ais bar amant ko athane ka lazmi ntijh ih he kh allh mnafq mrdon aor عorton، aor mshrk mrdon aor عorton ko sza de aor momn mardon aor عorton ki tobh qbol kre، allh drgzr frmane oala aor rhim he

34.1: Hmd aus khda ke lie he jo aasmanon aor zmin ki hr chiz ka malk he aor aakhrt min bhi asi ke lie hmd he oh dana aor bakhbr he
34.2: Jo kchh zmin min jata he aor jo kchh aus se nklta he aor jo kchh aasman se atrta he aor jo kchh aus min chrhta he، hr chiz ko oh janta he، oh rhim aor ghfor he
34.3: Mnkrin khte hin kh kia bat he kh qiamt hm pr nhin aa rhi he! Kho، qsm he mire عalm alghib prordgar ki، oh tm pr aa kr rhe gi aus se zrh brabr koei chiz nh aasmanon min chhpi hoei he nh zmin min nh zre se bri aor nh aus se chhoti، sb kchh aik nmaian dftr min drj he
34.4: Aor ih qiamt as lee aaee gi kh jza de allh aun logon ko jo aiman laee hin aor nik عml krte rhe hin aun ke lie mghfrt he aor rzq krim
34.5: Aor jn logon ne hmari aaiat ko nicha dkhane ke lie zor lgaia he، an ke lie bdtrin qsm ka drdnak عzab he
34.6: Ae nbiؐ، عlm rkhne oale khob jante hin kh jo kchh tmhare rb ki trf se tm pr nazl kia gia he oh srasr hq he aor khdaee عziz o hmid ka rasth dkhata he
34.7: Mnkrin logon se khte hin "hm btaein tmhin aisa shkhs jo khbr dita he kh jb tmhare jsm ka zrh zrh mntshr ho chka ho ga as oqt tm nee sre se pida kr die jaؤ ge?
34.8: Nh mعlom ih shkhs allh ke nam se jhot ghrta he he ia ase jnon lahq he" nhin، blkh jo log aakhrt ko nhin mante oh عzab min mbtla hone oale hin aor o hi bri trh bhke hoee hin
34.9: Kia ainhon ne kbhi aus aasman o zmin ko nhin dikha jo ainhin aage aor pichhe se ghire hoee he? Hm chahin to ainhin zmin min dhsa din، ia aasman ke kchh tkre ain pr gra din dr hqiqt as min aik nshani he hr aus bnde ke lie jo khda ki trf rjoع krne oala ho
34.10: Hm ne daؤdؑ ko apne han se bra fzl عta kia tha (hm ne hkm dia kh) ae pharo، as ke sath hm aahngi kro (aor ihi hkm hm ne) prndon ko dia hm ne lohe ko as ke lie nrm kr dia
34.11: As hdait ke sath kh zrhin bna aor an ke hlqe thik andaze pr rkh (ae aal daؤdؑ) nik عml kro، jo kchh tm krte ho aus ko min dikh rha hon
34.12: Aor slimanؑ ke lie hm ne hoa ko mskhr kr dia، sbh ke oqt as ka chlna aik mhine ki rah tk aor sham ke oqt as ka chlna aik mhine ki rah tk hm ne aus ke lie pghle hoee tanbe ka chshmh bha dia aor aise jn as ke tabع kr die jo apne rb ke hkm se as ke aage kam krte the aun min se jo hmare hkm se srtabi krta as ko hm bhrkti hoei aag ka mzh chkhate
34.13: Oh aus ke lie bnate the jo kchh oh chahta، aonchi عmartin، tsoirin، bre bre hoz jise lgn aor apni jgh se nh htne oali bhari digin ae aali daؤdؑ، عml kro shkr ke triqe pr، mire bndon min km hi shkr gzar hin
34.14: Phr jb slimanؑ pr hm ne mot ka fislh nafz kia to jnon ko as ki mot ka pth dine oali koei chiz aus ghn ke soa nh thi jo as ke عsa ko kha rha tha as trh jb slimanؑ gr pra to jnon pr ih bat khl gei kh agr oh ghib ke janne oale hote to as zlt ke عzab min mbtla nh rhte
34.15: Sba ke lie aun ke apne mskn hi min aik nshani mojod thi، do bagh daein aor baein khaؤ apne rb ka dia hoa rzq aor shkr bja laؤ aus ka، mlk he عmdh o pakizh aor prordgar he bkhshsh frmane oala
34.16: Mgr oh mnh mor gee aakhrkar hm ne aun pr bnd tor silab bhij dia aor an ke pchhle do baghon ki jgh do aor bagh anhin die jn min kroe ksile phl aor jhaؤ ke drkht the aor kchh thori si birian
34.17: Ih tha an ke kfr ka bdlh jo hm ne an ko dia، aor nashkre ansan ke soa aisa bdlh hm aor ksi ko nhin dite
34.18: Aor hm ne aun ke aor aun bstion ke drmian، jn ko hm ne brkt عta ki thi، nmaian bstian bsa di thin aor aun min sfr ki msaftin aik andaze pr rkh di thin chlo phro ain raston min rat dn pore amn ke sath
34.19: Mgr anhon ne kha "ae hmare rb، hmare sfr ki msaftin lmbi kr de" anhon ne apne aopr aap zlm kia aakhrkar hm ne anhin afsanh bna kr rkh dia aor anhin balkl ttrbtr kr dala iqinaan as min nshanian hin hr aus shkhs ke lie jo bra sabr o shakr ho
34.20: Aun ke mعamlh min ablis ne apna gman shih paia aor anhon ne ausi ki piroi ki، bjz aik thore se groh ke jo momn tha
34.21: Ablis ko aun pr koei aqtdar hasl nh tha mgr jo kchh hoa oh as lie hoa kh hm ih dikhna chahte the kh kon aakhrt ka manne oala he aor kon as ki trf se shk min pra hoa he tira rb hr chiz pr ngran he
34.22: (ae nbiؐ، ain mshrkin se) kho kh pkar dikho apne aun mعbodon ko jnhin tm allh ke soa apna mعbod smjhe bithe ho oh nh aasmanon min ksi zrh brabr chiz ke malk hin nh zmin min oh aasman o zmin ki mlkit min shrik bhi nhin hin an min se koei allh ka mdd gar bhi nhin he
34.23: Aor allh ke hzor koei shfaعt bhi ksi ke lie nafع nhin ho skti bjz aus shkhs ke js ke lie allh ne sfarsh ki ajazt di ho htia kh jb logon ke dlon se ghbraht dor ho gi to oh (sfarsh krne oalon se) pochhin ge kh tmhare rb ne kia joab dia oh khin ge kh thik joab mla he aor oh bzrg o brtr he
34.24: (ae nbiؐ) ain se pochho، "kon tm ko aasmanon aor zmin se rzq dita he?" kho "allh ab lamhalh hm min aor tm min se koei aik hi hdait pr he ia khli gmrahi min pra hoa he"
34.25: An se kho، "jo qsor hm ne kia ho as ki koei baz prs tm se nh ho gi aor jo kchh tm kr rhe ho as ki koei joab tlbi hm se nhin ki jaee gi"
34.26: Kho، "hmara rb hm ko jmع kre ga، phr hmare drmian thik thik fislh kr de ga oh aisa zbrdst hakm he jo sb kchh janta he"
34.27: Ain se kho، "zra mjhe dkhaؤ to shi oh kon hstian hin jnhin tm ne as ke sath shrik lga rkha he" hrgz nhin، zbrdst aor dana to bs oh allh hi he
34.28: Aor (ae nbiؐ،) hm ne tm ko tmam hi ansanon ke lie bshir o nzir bna kr bhija he، mgr aksr log jante nhin hin
34.29: Ih log tm se khte hin kh oh (qiamt ka) oعdh kb pora ho ga agr tm sche ho?
34.30: Kho tmhare lie aik aise dn ki miعad mqrr he js ke aane min nh aik ghri bhr ki takhir tm kr skte ho aor nh aik ghri bhr phle ase la skte ho
34.31: Ih kafr khte hin kh "hm hrgz ais qraan ko nh manin ge aor nh as se phle aaei hoei ksi ktab ko tslim krin ge" kash tm dikho ain ka hal aus oqt jb ih zalm apne rb ke hzor khre hon ge aus oqt ih aik dosre pr alzam dhrin ge jo log dnia min dba kr rkhe gee the oh bre bnne oalon se khin ge kh "agr tm nh hote to hm momn hote"
34.32: Oh bre bnne oale an dbe hoee logon ko joab din ge "kia hm ne tmhin aus hdait se roka tha jo tmhare pas aaei thi? Nhin، blkh tm khod mjrm the"
34.33: Oh dbe hoee log an bre bnne oalon se khin ge، "nhin، blkh shb o roz ki mkari thi jb tm hm se khte the kh hm allh se kfr krin aor dosron ko as ka hmsr thiraein" aakhrkar jb ih log عzab dikhin ge to apne dlon min pchhtaein ge aor hm ain mnkrin ke glon min toq dal din ge kia logon ko ais ke soa aor koei bdlh dia ja skta he kh jise aعmal aun ke the oisi hi jza oh paein?
34.34: Kbhi aisa nhin hoa kh hm ne ksi bsti min aik khbrdar krne oala bhija ho aor as bsti ke khate pite logon ne ih nh kha ho kh jo pigham tm le kr aaee ho as ko hm nhin mante
34.35: Anhin ne hmishh ihi kha kh hm tm se ziadh mal aolad rkhte hin aor hm hrgz sza pane oale nhin hin
34.36: Ae nbiؐ، ain se kho mira rb jse chahta he kshadh rzq dita he aor jse chahta he npa tla عta krta he، mgr aksr log as ki hqiqt nhin jante
34.37: Ih tmhari dolt aor tmhari aolad nhin he jo tmhin hm se qrib krti ho han mgr jo aiman laee aor nik عml kre ihi log hin jn ke lie aun ke عml ki dhri jza he، aor oh blnd o bala عmarton min atminan se rhin ge
34.38: Rhe oh log jo hmari aaiat ko nicha dkhane ke lie dor dhop krte hin، to oh عzab min mbtla hon ge
34.39: Ae nbiؐ، an se kho، "mira rb apne bndon min se jse chahta he khla rzq dita he aor jse chahta he npa tla dita he jo kchh tm khrch kr dite ho aus ki jgh ohi tm ko aor dita he، oh sb razqon se bhtr razq he
34.40: Aor js dn oh tmam ansanon ko jmع kre ga phr frshton se pochhe ga "kia ih log tmhari hi عbadt kia krte the?"
34.41: To oh joab din ge kh "pak he aap ki zat، hmara tعlq to aap se he nh kh ain logon se drasl ih hmari nhin blkh jnon ki عbadt krte the، an min se aksr anhi pr aiman laee hoee the"
34.42: (aus oqt hm khin ge kh) aaj tm min se koei nh ksi ko faedh phncha skta he nh nqsan aor zalmon se hm khh din ge kh ab chkho as عzab jhnm ka mzh jse tm jhtlaia krte the
34.43: Ain logon ko jb hmari saf saf aaiat snaei jati hin to ih khte hin kh "ih shkhs to bs ih chahta he kh tm ko aun mعbodon se brgshth kr de jn ki عbadt tmhare bap dada krte aaee hin" aor khte hin kh "ih (qraan) mhz aik jhot he ghra hoa" ain kafron ke samne jb hq aaia to anhin ne khh dia kh "ih to srih jado he"
34.44: Halankh nh hm ne ain logon ko phle koei ktab di thi kh ih ase prhte hon aor nh tm se phle an ki trf koei mtnbh krne oala bhija tha
34.45: Ain se phle gzre hoee log jhtla chke hin jo kchh hm ne aunhin dia tha aus ke عshr عshir ko bhi ih nhin phnche hin mgr jb anhon ne mire rsolon ko jhtlaia to dikh lo kh miri sza kisi skht thi
34.46: Ae nbiؐ، ain se kho kh "min tmhin bs aik bat ki nsiht krta hon khda ke lie tm akile akile aor do do ml kr apna dmagh lraؤ aor socho، tmhare sahb min aakhr aisi konsi bat he jo jnon ki ho? Oh to aik skht عzab ki aamd se phle tm ko mtnbh krne oala he"
34.47: Ain se kho، "agr min ne tm se koei ajr manga he to oh tm hi ko mbark rhe mira ajr to allh ke zmh he aor oh hr chiz pr goah he"
34.48: An se kho "mira rb (mjh pr) hq ka alqa krta he aor oh tmam poshidh hqiqton ka janne oala he"
34.49: Kho "hq aagia he aor ab batl ke kie kchh nhin ho skta"
34.50: Kho "agr min gmrah ho gia hon to miri gmrahi ka obal mjh pr he، aor agr min hdait pr hon to aus ohi ki bna pr hon jo mira rb mire aopr nazl krta he، oh sb kchh snta he aor qrib hi he"
34.51: Kash tm dikho ainhin aus oqt jb ih log ghbraee phr rhe hon ge aor khin bch kr nh ja skin ge، blkh qrib hi se pkr lie jaein ge
34.52: Aus oqt ih khin ge kh hm aus pr aiman le aaee halankh ab dor nkli hoei chiz khan hath aaskti he
34.53: Ais se phle ih kfr kr chke the aor bla thqiq dor dor ki korian laia krte the
34.54: Aus oqt js chiz ki ih tmna kr rhe hon ge as se mhrom kr die jaein ge js trh ain ke pish ro hm mshrb mhrom ho chke hon ge ih bre gmrah kn shk min pre hoee the

35.1: Tعrif allh hi ke lie he jo aasmanon aor zmin ka bnane oala aor frshton ko pigham rsan mqrr kr ne oala he، (aise frshte) jn ke do do aor tin tin aor char char bazo hin oh apni mkhloq ki sakht min jisa chahta he azafh krta he iqinaan allh hr chiz pr qadr he
35.2: Allh js rhmt ka droazh bhi logon ke lie khol de ase koei rokne oala nhin aor jse oh bnd kr de ase allh ke bعd phr koei dosra kholne oala nhin oh zbrdst aor hkim he
35.3: Logo، tm pr allh ke jo ahsanat hin anhin iad rkho kia allh ke soa koei aor khalq bhi he jo tmhin aasman aor zmin se rzq dita ho? Koei mعbod aus ke soa nhin، aakhr tm khan se dhoka kha rhe ho?
35.4: Ab agr (ae nbiؐ) ih log tmhin jhtlate hin (to ih koei nei bat nhin)، tm se phle bhi bht se rsol jhtlaee ja chke hin، aor sare mعamlat aakhrkar allh hi ki trf rjoع hone oale hin
35.5: Logo، allh ka oعdh iqinaan brhq he، lhaza dnia ki zndgi tmhin dhoke min nh dale aor nh oh bra dhoke baz tmhin allh ke bare min dhokh dine paee
35.6: Dr hqiqt shitan tmhara dshmn he as lie tm bhi ase apna dshmn hi smjho oh to apne piroؤn ko apni rah pr as lie bla rha he kh oh dozkhion min shaml ho jaein
35.7: Jo log kfr krin ge aun ke lie skht عzab he aor jo aiman laein ge aor nik عml krin ge aun ke lie mghfrt aor bra ajr he
35.8: (bhla kchh thkana he aus shkhs ki gmrahi ka) js ke lie aus ka bra عml khoshnma bna dia gia ho aor oh ause achha smjh rha ho? Hqiqt ih he kh allh jse chahta he gmrahi min dal dita he aor jse chahta he rah rast dkha dita he ps (ae nbiؐ) khoah mkhoah tmhari jan an logon ki khatr ghm o afsos min nh ghle jo kchh ih kr rhe hin allh aus ko khob janta he
35.9: Oh allh hi to he jo hoaؤn ko bhijta he، phr oh badl athati hin، phr hm ase aik aujar عlaqe ki trf le jate hin aor asi zmin ko jila athate hin jo mri pri thi mre hoee ansanon ka ji athna bhi asi trh hoga
35.10: Jo koei عzt chahta ho ause mعlom hona chahie kh عzt sari ki sari allh ki he aus ke han jo chiz aopr chrhti he oh srf pakizh qol he، aor عml salh as ko aopr chrhata he rhe oh log jo bihodh chal bazian krte hin، aun ke lie skht عzab he aor aun ka mkr khod hi ghart hone oala he
35.11: Allh ne tm ko mti se pida kia، phr ntfh se، phr tmhare jore bna die (iعni mrd aor عort) koei عort hamlh nhin hoti aor nh bchh jnti he mgr ih sb kchh allh ke عlm min hota he koei عmr pane oala عmr nhin pata aor nh ksi ki عmr min kchh kmi hoti he mgr ih sb kchh aik ktab min lkha hota he allh ke lie ih bht aasan kam he
35.12: Aor pani ke donon zkhire iksan nhin hin aik mitha aor pias bjhane oala he، pine min khoshgoar، aor dosra skht khari kh hlq chhil de mgr donon se tm tr o tazh gosht hasl krte ho، phnne ke lie zint ka saman nkalte ho، aor asi pani min tm dikhte ho kh kshtian aus ka sinh chirti chli ja rhi hin takh tm allh ka fzl tlash kro aor aus ke shkr gzar bno
35.13: Oh dn ke andr rat ko aor rat ke andr dn ko prota hoa le aata he chand aor sorj ko aus ne mskhr kr rkha he ih sb kchh aik oqt mqrr tk chle ja rha he ohi allh (js ke ih sare kam hin) tmhara rb he badshahi asi ki he ause chhor kr jn dosron ko tm pkarte ho oh aik prkah ke malk bhi nhin hin
35.14: Anhin pkaro to oh tmhari dعaein sn nhin skte aor sn lin to an ka tmhin koei joab nhin de skte aor qiamt ke roz oh tmhare shrk ka ankar kr din ge hqiqt hal ki aisi shih khbr tmhin aik khbrdar ke soa koei nhin de skta
35.15: Logo، tm hi allh ke mhtaj ho aor allh to ghni o hmid he
35.16: Oh chahe to tmhin hta kr koei nei khlqt tmhari jgh le aaee
35.17: Aisa krna allh ke lie kchh bhi dshoar nhin
35.18: Koei bojh athane oala ksi dosre ka bojh nh athaee ga aor agr koei lda hoa nfs apna bojh athane ke lie pkare ga to as ke bar ka aik adnia hsh bhi btane ke lie koei nh aaee ga chahe oh qrib trin rshth dar hi kion nh ho (ae nbiؐ) tm srf anhi logon ko mtnbh kr skte ho jo be dikhe apne rb se drte hin aor nmaz qaem krte hin jo shkhs bhi pakizgi akhtiar krta he apni hi bhlaei ke lie krta he aor pltna sb ko allh hi ki trf he
35.19: Andha aor aankhon oala brabr nhin he
35.20: Nh tarikian aor roshni iksan hin
35.21: Nh thndi chhaؤn aor dhop ki tpsh aik jisi he
35.22: Aor nh znde aor mrde msaoi hin allh jse chahta he snoata he، mgr (ae nbiؐ) tm aun logon ko nhin sna skte jo qbron min mdfon hin
35.23: Tm to bs aik khbrdar krne oale ho
35.24: Hm ne tm ko hq ke sath bhija he bshart dine oala aor drane oala bna kr aor koei amt aisi nhin gzri he js min koei mtnbh krne oala nh aaia ho
35.25: Ab agr ih log tmhin jhtlate hin to ain se phle gzre hoee log bhi jhtla chke hin aun ke pas an ke rsol khle dlael aor shife aor roshn hdaiat dine oali ktab le kr aaee the
35.26: Phr jn logon ne nh mana aun ko min ne pkr lia aor dikh lo kh miri sza kisi skht thi
35.27: Kia tm dikhte nhin ho kh allh aasman se pani brsata he aor phr as ke zriعh se hm trh trh ke phl nkal late hin jn ke rng mkhtlf hote hin pharon min bhi sfid، srkh aor ghri siah dharian paei jati hin jn ke rng mkhtlf hote hin
35.28: Aor asi trh ansanon aor janoron aor moishion ke rng bhi mkhtlf hin hqiqt ih he kh allh ke bndon min se srf عlm rkhne oale log hi aus se drte hin be shk allh zbrdst aor drgzr frmane oala he
35.29: Jo log ktab allh ki tlaot krte hin aor nmaz qaem krte hin، aor jo kchh hm ne aunhin rzq dia he as min se khle aor chhpe khrch krte hin، iqinaan oh aik aisi tjart ke mtoqع hin js min hrgz khsarh nh hoga
35.30: (as tjart min anhon ne apna sb kchh ais lie khpaia he) takh allh aun ke ajr pore ke pore aun ko de aor mzid apne fzl se an ko عta frmaee be shk allh bkhshne oala aor qdrdan he
35.31: (ae nbiؐ) jo ktab hm ne tmhari trf ohi ke zriعh se bhiji he ohi hq he، tsdiq krti hoei aaei he aun ktabon ki jo ais se phle aaei thin be shk allh apne bndon ke hal se bakhbr he aor hr chiz pr ngah rkhne oala he
35.32: Phr hm ne as ktab ka oars bna dia aun logon ko jnhin hm ne (ais orast ke lie) apne bndon min se chn lia ab koei to an min se apne nfs pr zlm krne oala he، aor koei bich ki ras he، aor koei allh ke azn se nikion min sbqt krne oala he، ihi bht bra fzl he
35.33: Hmishh rhne oali jntin hin jn min ih log dakhl hon ge ohan anhin sone ke kngnon aor motion se aarasth kia jaee ga، ohan an ka lbas rishm hoga
