39.18: Jo bat ko ghor se snte hin aor as ke bhtrin phlo ki piroi krte hin ih oh log hin jn ko allh ne hdait bkhshi he aor ihi danshmnd hin
39.19: (ae nbiؐ) aus shkhs ko kon bcha skta he js pr عzab ka fislh chspan ho chka ho? Kia tm ause bcha skte ho jo aag min gr chka ho?
39.20: Albth jo log apne rb se dr kr rhe aun ke lie blnd عmartin hin mnzl pr mnzl bni hoei، jn ke niche nhrin bhh rhi hon gi ih allh ka oعdh he، allh kbhi apne oعde ki khlaf orzi nhin krta
39.21: Kia tm nhin dikhte kh allh ne aasman se pani brsaia، phr as ko soton aor chshmon aor driaؤn ki shkl min zmin ke andr jari kia، phr as pani ke zriعh se oh trh trh ki khitian nkalta he jn ki qsmin mkhtlf hin، phr oh khitian pk kr sokh jati hin، phr tm dikhte ho kh oh zrd pr gein، phr aakhrkar allh aun ko bhs bna dita he dr hqiqt ais min aik sbq he عql rkhne oalon ke lie
39.22: Ab kia oh shkhs js ka sinh allh ne aslam ke lie khol dia aor oh apne rb ki trf se aik roshni pr chl rha he (aus shkhs ki trh ho skta he js ne ain baton se koei sbq nh lia?) tbahi he aun logon ke lie jn ke dl allh ki nsiht se aor ziadh skht ho gee oh khli gmrahi min pre hoee hin
39.23: Allh ne bhtrin klam atara he، aik aisi ktab js ke tmam ajzaء hm rng hin aor js min bar bar mzamin dhraee gee hin ause sn kr aun logon ke rongte khre ho jate hin jo apne rb se drne oale hin، aor phr an ke jsm aor an ke dl nrm ho kr allh ke zkr ki trf raghb ho jate hin ih allh ki hdait he js se oh rah rast pr le aata he jse chahta he aor jse allh hi hdait nh de as ke lie phr koei hadi nhin he
39.24: Ab aus shkhs ki bd hali ka tm kia andazh kr skte ho jo qiamt ke roz عzab ki skht mar apne mnh pr le ga? Aise zalmon se to khh dia jaee ga kh ab chkho mzh aus kmaei ka jo tm krte rhe the
39.25: Ain se phle bhi bht se log asi trh jhtla chke hin aakhr aun pr عzab aise rkh se aaia jdhr an ka khial bhi nh ja skta tha
39.26: Phr allh ne an ko dnia hi ki zndgi min rsoaei ka mzh chkhaia، aor aakhrt ka عzab to as se shdid tr he، kash ih log jante
39.27: Hm ne ais qraan min logon ko trh trh ki msalin di hin kh ih hosh min aaein
39.28: Aisa qraan jo عrbi zban min he، js min koei tirh nhin he، takh ih bre anjam se bchin
39.29: Allh aik msal dita he aik shkhs to oh he js ki mlkit min bht se kj khlq aaqa shrik hin jo ase apni apni trf khinchte hin aor dosra shkhs pora ka pora aik hi aaqa ka ghlam he kia an donon ka hal iksan ho sktahe? Alhmdllh، mgr aksr log nadani min pre hoee hin
39.30: (ae nbiؐ) tmhin bhi mrna he aor ain logon ko bhi mrna he
39.31: Aakhrkar qiamt ke roz tm sb apne rb ke hzor apna apna mqdmh pish kro ge
39.32: Phr aus shkhs se bra zalm aor kon ho ga js ne allh pr jhot bandha aor jb schaei as ke samne aaei to ause jhtla dia kia aise kafron ke lie jhnm min koei thkana nhin he?
39.33: Aor jo shkhs schaei le kr aaia aor jnhon ne as ko sch mana، ohi عzab se bchne oale hin
39.34: Anhin apne rb ke han oh sb kchh mle ga js ki oh khoahsh krin ge ih he niki krne oalon ki jza
39.35: Takh jo bd trin aعmal anhon ne kie the anhin allh an ke hsab se saqt kr de aor jo bhtrin aعmal oh krte rhe aun ke lhaz se aun ko ajr عta frmaee
39.36: (ae nbiؐ) kia allh apne bnde ke lie kafi nhin he? Ih log aus ke soa dosron se tm ko drate hin halankh allh jse gmrahi min dal de ause koei rasth dkhane oala nhin
39.37: Aor jse oh hdait de ause bhtkane oala bhi koei nhin، kia allh zbrdst aor antqam line oala nhin he?
39.38: Ain logon se agr tm pochho kh zmin aor aasmanon ko ks ne pida kia he to ih khod khin ge kh allh ne ain se kho، jb hqiqt ih he to tmhara kia khial he kh agr allh mjhe koei nqsan phnchana chahe to kia tmhari ih dioian، jnhin tm allh ko chhor kr pkarte ho، mjhe aus ke phnchaee hoee nqsan se bcha lin gi? Ia allh mjh pr mhrbani krna chahe to kia ih as ki rhmt ko rok skin gi? Bs an se khh do kh mire lie allh hi kafi he، bhrosh krne oale ausi pr bhrosh krte hin
39.39: An se saf kho kh "ae miri qom ke logo، tm apni jgh apna kam kie jaؤ، min apna kam krta rhon ga، عnqrib tmhin mعlom ho jaee ga
39.40: Kh ks pr rsoa kn عzab aata he aor kse oh sza mlti he jo kbhi tlne oali nhin"
39.41: (ae nbiؐ) hm ne sb ansanon ke lie ih ktab brhq tm pr nazl kr di he ab jo sidha rasth akhtiar kre ga apne lie kre ga aor jo bhtke ga aus ke bhtkne ka obal ausi pr hoga، tm aun ke zmh dar nhin ho
39.42: Oh allh hi he jo mot ke oqt rohin qbz krta he aor jo abhi nhin mra he aus ki roh nind min qbz kr lita he، phr js pr oh mot ka fislh nafz krta he ause rok lita he aor dosron ki rohin aik oqt mqrr ke lie oaps bhij dita he ais min bri nshanian hin aun logon ke lie jo ghor o fkr krne oale hin
39.43: Kia aus khda ko chhor kr ain logon ne dosron ko shfiع bna rkha he? An se kho، kia oh shfaعt krin ge khoah aun ke akhtiar min kchh nh ho aor oh smjhte bhi nh hon?
39.44: Kho، shfaعt sari ki sari allh ke akhtiar min he aasmanon aor zmin ki badshahi ka ohi malk he phr ausi ki trf tm pltaee jane oale ho
39.45: Jb akile allh ka zkr kia jata he to aakhrt pr aiman nh rkhne oalon ke dl krhne lgte hin، aor jb aus ke soa dosron ka zkr hota he to ikaik oh khoshi se khl athte hin
39.46: Kho، khdaia! Aasmanon aor zmin ke pida krne oale، hazr o ghaeb ke janne oale، to hi apne bndon ke drmian aus chiz ka fislh kre ga js min oh akhtlaf krte rhe hin
39.47: Agr ain zalmon ke pas zmin ki sari dolt bhi ho، aor atni hi aor bhi، to ih roz qiamt ke bre عzab se bchne ke lie sb kchh fdie min dine ke lie tiar ho jaein ge ohan allh ki trf se an ke samne oh kchh aaee ga js ka anhon ne kbhi andazh hi nhin kia he
39.48: Ohan apni kmaei ke sare bre ntaej an pr khl jaein ge aor ohi chiz an pr mslt ho jaee gi js ka ih mzaq arate rhe hin
39.49: Ihi ansan jb zra si msibt aise chho jati he to hmin pkarta he، aor jb hm ase apni trf se nعmt de kr aphar dite hin to khta he kh ih to mjhe عlm ki bna pr dia gia he! Nhin، blkh ih aazmaesh he، mgr an min se aksr log jante nhin hin
39.50: Ihi bat an se phle gzre hoee log bhi khh chke hin، mgr jo kchh oh kmate the oh an ke ksi kam nh aaia
39.51: Phr apni kmaei ke bre ntaej anhon ne bhgte، aor ain logon min se bhi jo zalm hin oh عnqrib apni kmaei ke bre ntaej bhgtin ge، ih hmin عajz kr dine oale nhin hin
39.52: Aor kia anhin mعlom nhin he kh allh js ka chahta he rzq kshadh kr dita he aor js ka chahta he tng kr dita he? As min nshanian hin aun logon ke lie jo aiman late hin
39.53: (ae nbiؐ) khh do kh ae mire bndo، jnhon ne apni janon pr ziadti ki he، allh ki rhmt se maios nh ho jaؤ، iqinaan allh sare gnah mعaf kr dita he، oh to ghfor o rhim he
39.54: Plt aaؤ apne rb ki trf aor mtiع bn jaؤ aus ke qbl ais ke kh tm pr عzab aa jaee aor phr khin se tmhin mdd nh ml ske
39.55: Aor piroi akhtiar kr lo apne rb ki bhiji hoei ktab ke bhtrin phlo ki، qbl ais ke kh tm pr achank عzab aaee aor tm ko khbr bhi nh ho
39.56: Khin aisa nh ho kh bعd min koei shkhs khe "afsos miri aus tqsir pr jo min allh ki jnab min krta rha، blkh min to alta mzaq arane oalon min shaml tha"
39.57: Ia khe "kash allh ne mjhe hdait bkhshi hoti to min bhi mtqion min se hota"
39.58: Ia عzab dikh kr khe "kash mjhe aik moqع aor ml jaee aor min bhi nik عml krne oalon min shaml ho jaؤn"
39.59: (aor aus oqt ase ih joab mle kh) "kion nhin، miri aaiat tire pas aa chki thin، phr to ne anhin jhtlaia aor tkbr kia aor to kafron min se tha"
39.60: Aaj jn logon ne khda pr jhot bandhe hin qiamt ke roz tm dikho ge kh an ke mnh kale hon ge kia jhnm min mtkbron ke lie kafi jgh nhin he?
39.61: As ke brعks jn logon ne ihan tqoia kia he an ke asbab kamiabi ki ojh se allh an ko njat de ga، an ko nh koei gznd phnche ga aor nh oh ghmgin hon ge
39.62: Allh hr chiz ka khalq he aor ohi hr chiz pr nghban he
39.63: Zmin aor aasmanon ke khzanon ki knjian ausi ke pas hin aor jo log allh ki aaiat se kfr krte hin ohi ghate min rhne oale hin
39.64: (ae nbiؐ) ain se kho "phr kia ae jahlo، tm allh ke soa ksi aor ki bndgi krne ke lie mjh se khte ho?"
39.65: (ih bat tmhin an se saf khh dini chahie kionkh) tmhari trf aor tm se phle gzre hoee tmam anbiaء ki trf ih ohi bhiji ja chki he kh agr tm ne shrk kia to tmhara عml zaeع ho jaee ga aor tm khsare min rho ge
39.66: Lhaza (ae nbiؐ) tm bs allh hi ki bndgi kro aor shkr gzar bndon min se ho jaؤ
39.67: Ain logon ne allh ki qdr hi nh ki jisa kh as ki qdr krne ka hq he (as ki qdrt kamlh ka hal to ih he kh) qiamt ke roz pori zmin aus ki mthi min ho gi aor aasman as ke dst rast min lpte hoee hon ge pak aor balatr he oh as shrk se jo ih log krte hin
39.68: Aor aus roz sor phonka jaee ga aor oh sb mr kr gr jaein ge jo aasmanon aor zmin min hin soaee aun ke jnhin allh zndh rkhna chahe phr aik dosra sor phonka jaee ga aor ikaik sb ke sb ath kr dikhne lgin ge
39.69: Zmin apne rb ke nor se chmk athe gi، ktab aعmal la kr rkh di jaee gi، anbiaء aor tmam goah hazr kr die jaein ge، logon ke drmian thik thik hq ke sath fislh kr dia jaee ga aor aun pr koei zlm nh hoga
39.70: Aor hr mtnfs ko jo kchh bhi aus ne عml kia tha aus ka pora pora bdlh de dia jaee ga log jo kchh bhi krte hin allh as ko khob janta he
39.71: (ais fislh ke bعd) oh log jnhon ne kfr kia tha jhnm ki trf groh dr groh hanke jaein ge، ihan tk kh jb oh ohan phnchin ge to as ke droaze khole jaein ge aor aus ke karnde an se khin ge "kia tmhare pas tmhare apne logon min se aise rsol nhin aaee the، jnhon ne tm ko tmhare rb ki aaiat snaei hon aor tmhin as bat se draia ho kh aik oqt tmhin ih dn bhi dikhna hoga?" oh joab din ge "han، aaee the، mgr عzab ka fislh kafron pr chpk gia"
39.72: Kha jaee ga، dakhl ho jaؤ jhnm ke droazon min، ihan ab tmhin hmishh rhna he، bra hi bra thkana he ih mtkbron ke lie
39.73: Aor jo log apne rb ki nafrmani se prhiz krte the anhin groh dr groh jnt ki trf le jaia jaee ga ihan tk kh jb oh ohan phnchin ge، aor as ke droaze phle hi khole ja chke hon ge، to aus ke mntzmin an se khin ge kh "slam ho tm pr، bht achhe rhe، dakhl ho jaؤ as min hmishh ke lie"
39.74: Aor oh khin ge "shkr he aus khda ka js ne hmare sath apna oعdh sch kr dkhaia aor hm ko zmin ka oars bna dia، ab hm jnt min jhan chahin apni jgh bna skte hin" ps bhtrin ajr he عml krne oalon ke lie
39.75: Aor tm dikho ge kh frshte عrsh ke grd hlqh bnaee hoee apne rb ki hmd aor tsbih kr rhe hon ge، aor logon ke drmian thik thik hq ke sath fislh chka dia jaee ga، aor pkar dia jaee ga kh hmd he allh rbّ alعalmin ke lie

40.2: Ais ktab ka nzol allh ki trf se he jo zbrdst he، sb kchh janne oala he
40.3: Gnah mعaf krne oala aor tobh qbol krne oala he، skht sza dine oala aor bra sahb fzl he koei mعbod as ke soa nhin، ausi ki trf sb ko pltna he
40.4: Allh ki aaiat min jhgre nhin krte mgr srf oh log jnhon ne kfr kia he ais ke bعd dnia ke mlkon min aun ki chlt phrt tmhin ksi dhoke min nh dale
40.5: Ain se phle nohؑ ki qom bhi jhtla chki he، aor aus ke bعd bht se dosre jthon ne bhi ih kam kia he hr qom apne rsol pr jhpti takh ause grftar kre aun sb ne batl ke hthiaron se hq ko nicha dkhane ki koshsh ki mgr aakhr kar min ne an ko pkr lia، phr dikh lo kh miri sza kisi skht thi
40.6: Aisi trh tire rb ka ih fislh bhi aun sb logon pr chspan ho chka he jo kfr ke mrtkb hoee hin kh oh oasl bjhnm hone oale hin
40.7: عrsh alahi ke haml frshte aor oh jo عrsh ke grd o pish hazr rhte hin، sb apne rb ki hmd ke sath as ki tsbih kr rhe hin oh as pr aiman rkhte hin aor aiman lane oalon ke hq min dعaee mghfrt krte hin oh khte hin: "ae hmare rb، to apni rhmt aor apne عlm ke sath hr chiz pr chhaia hoa he، ps mعaf kr de aor عzab dozkh se bcha le aun logon ko jnhon ne tobh ki he aor tira rasth akhtiar kr lia he
40.8: Ae hmare rb، aor dakhl kr aun ko hmishh rhne oali aun jnton min jn ka to ne aun se oعdh kia he، aor aun ke oaldin aor bioion aor aolad min se jo salh hon (aun ko bhi ohan aun ke sath phncha de) to bla shbh qadr mtlq aor hkim he
40.9: Aor bcha de aun ko braeion se js ko to ne qiamt ke dn braeion se bcha dia aus pr to ne bra rhm kia، ihi bri kamiabi he"
40.10: Jn logon ne kfr kia he، qiamt ke roz aun ko pkar kr kha jaee ga "aaj tmhin jtna shdid ghsh apne aopr aa rha he، allh tm pr aus se ziadh ghzb nak aus oqt hota tha jb tmhin aiman ki trf blaia jata tha aor tm kfr krte the"
40.11: Oh khin ge "ae hmare rb، to ne oaqعi hmin do dfعh mot aor do dfعh zndgi de di، ab hm apne qsoron ka aعtraf krte hin، kia ab ihan se nklne ki bhi koei sbil he?"
40.12: (joab mle ga) "ih halt js min tm mbtla ho، ais ojh se he kh jb akile allh ki trf blaia jata tha to tm manne se ankar kr dite the aor jb aus ke sath dosron ko mlaia jata to tm man lite the ab fislh allh bzrg o brtr ke hath he"
40.13: Ohi he jo tm ko apni nshanian dkhata he aor aasman se tmhare lie rzq nazl krta he، mgr (ain nshanion ke mshahde se) sbq srf ohi shkhs lita he jo allh ki trf rjoع krne oala ho
40.14: (ps ae rjoع krne oalo) allh hi ko pkaro apne din ko aus ke lie khals kr ke، khoah tmhara ih fعl kafron ko ktna hi nagoar ho
40.15: Oh blnd drjon oala، malk عrsh he apne bndon min se js pr chahta he apne hkm se roh nazl kr dita he takh oh mlaqat ke dn se khbrdar kr de
40.16: Oh dn jbkh sb log be prdh hon ge، allh se an ki koei bat bhi chhpi hoei nh ho gi (aus roz pkar kr pochha jaee ga) aaj badshahi ks ki he? (sara عalm pkar athe ga) allh oahd qhar ki
40.17: (kha jaee ga) aaj hr mtnfs ko aus kmaei ka bdlh dia jaee ga jo as ne ki thi aaj ksi pr koei zlm nh ho ga aor allh hsab line min bht tiz he
40.18: Ae nbiؐ، dra do ain logon ko aus dn se jo qrib aa lga he jb klije mnh ko aa rhe hon ge aor log chp chap ghm ke ghont pie khre honge zalmon ka nh koei mshfq dost ho ga aor nh koei shfiع js ki bat mani jaee
40.19: Allh ngahon ki chori tk se oaqf he aor oh raz tk janta he jo sinon ne chhpa rkhe hin
40.20: Aor allh thik thik be lag fislh kriga rhe oh jn ko (ih mshrkin) allh ko chhor kr pkarte hin، oh ksi chiz ka bhi fislh krne oale nhin hin blashbh allh hi sb kchh snne aor dikhne oala he
40.21: Kia ih log kbhi zmin min chle phre nhin hin kh anhin aun logon ka anjam nzr aata jo ain se phle gzr chke hin? Oh ain ziadh taqt or the aor an se ziadh zbrdst aasar zmin min chhor gee hin mgr allh ne an ke gnahon pr anhin pkr lia aor aun ko allh se bchane oala koei nh tha
40.22: Ih an ka anjam as lie hoa kh an ke pas aun ke rsol binat le kr aaee aor anhon ne manne se ankar kr dia aakhr kar allh ne an ko pkr lia، iqinaan oh bri qot oala aor sza dine min bht skht he
40.24: Frعon aor haman aor qaron ki trf apne nshanion aor nmaian sndi mamorit ke sath bhija، mgr anhon ne kha "sahr he، kzab he"
40.25: Phr jb oh hmari trf se hq an ke samne le aaia to anhon ne kha "jo log aiman la kr as ke sath shaml hoee hin an sb ke lrkon ko qtl kro aor lrkian ko jita chhor do" mgr kafron ki chal akart hi gei
40.26: Aik roz frعon ne apne drbarion se kha "chhoro mjhe، min ais mosiaؑ ko qtl kie dita hon، aor pkar dikhe ih apne rb ko mjhe andishh he kh ih tmhara din bdl dale ga، ia mlk min fsad brpa kre ga"
40.27: Mosiaؑ ne kha "min ne to hr aus mtkbr ke mqable min jo iaom alhsab pr aiman nhin rkhta apne r b aor tmhare rb ki pnah le li he"
40.28: As moqع pr aal frعon min se aik momn shkhs، jo apna aiman chhpaee hoee tha، bol atha: "kia tm aik shkhs ko srf ais bna pr qtl kr do ge kh oh khta he mira rb allh he? Halankh oh tmhare rb ki trf se tmhare pas binat le aaia agr oh jhota he to as ka jhot khod asi pr plt pre ga likn agr oh scha he to jn holnak ntaej ka oh tm ko khof dlata he an min se kchh to tm pr zror hi aa jaein ge allh ksi shkhs ko hdait nhin dita jo hd se gzr jane oala aor kzab ho
40.29: Ae miri qom ke logo! Aaj tmhin badshahi hasl he aor zmin min tm ghalb ho، likn agr khda ka عzab hm pr aa gia to phr kon he jo hmari mdd kr ske ga" frعon ne kha "min to tm logon ko ohi raee de rha hon jo mjhe mnasb nzr aati he aor min ausi raste ki trf tmhari rhnmaei krta hon jo thik he"
40.30: Oh shkhs jo aiman laia tha aus ne kha "ae miri qom ke logo، mjhe khof he kh khin tm pr bhi oh dn nh aa jaee jo as se phle bht se jthon pr aa chka he
40.31: Jisa dn qom nohؑ aor عad aor smod aor an ke bعd oali qomon pr aaia tha aor ih hqiqt he kh allh apne bndon pr zlm ka koei aradh nhin rkhta
40.32: Ae qom، mjhe dr he kh khin tm pr friad o fghan ka dn nh aa jaee
40.33: Jb tm aik dosre ko pkaro ge aor bhage bhage phro ge، mgr aus oqt allh se bchane oala koei nh ho ga sch ih he kh jse allh bhtka de ause phr koei rasth dkhane oala nhin hota
40.34: As se phle iosfؑ tmhare pas binat le kr aaee the mgr tm aun ki laei hoei tعlim ki trf se shk hi min pre rhe phr jb aun ka antqal ho gia to tm ne kha ab aun ke bعd allh koei rsol hrgz nh bhije ga" aisi trh allh aun sb logon ko gmrahi min dal dita he jo hd se gzrne oale aor shki hote hin
40.35: Aor allh ki aaiat min jhgre krte hin bghir as ke kh an ke pas koei snd ia dlil aaei ho ih roih allh aor aiman lane oalon ke nzdik skht mbghoz he aisi trh allh hr mtkr o jbar ke dl pr thph lga dita he
40.36: Frعon ne kha "ae haman، mire lie aik blnd عmart bna takh min raston tk phnch skon
40.37: Aasmanon ke raston tk، aor mosiaؑ ke khda ko jhank kr dikhon mjhe to ih mosiaؑ jhota hi mعlom hota he" as trh frعon ke lie as ki bd عmli khoshnma bna di gei aor oh rah rast se rok dia gia frعon ki sari chal bazi (aus ki apni) tbahi ke rasth hi min srf hoei
40.38: Oh shkhs jo aiman laia tha، bola "ae miri qom ke logo، miri bat mano، min tmhin shih rasth btata hon
40.39: Ae qom، ih dnia ki zndgi to chnd rozh he، hmishh ke qiam ki jgh aakhrt hi he
40.40: Jo braei kre ga aus ko atna hi bdlh mle ga jtni aus ne braei ki ho gi aor jo nik عml kre ga، khoah oh mrd ho ia عort، bshrtikh ho oh momn، aise sb log jnt min dakhl hon ge jhan aun ko be hsab rzq dia jaee ga
40.41: Ae qom، aakhr ih kia majra he kh min to tm logon ko njat ki trf blata hon aor tm log mjhe aag ki trf dعot dite ho!
40.42: Tm mjhe as bat ki dعot dite ho kh min allh se kfr kron aor as ke sath aun hstion ko shrik thiraؤn jnhin min nhin janta، halankh min tmhin aus zbrdst mghfrt krne oale khda ki trf bla rha hon
40.43: Nhin، hq ih he aor ais ke khlaf nhin ho skta kh jn ki trf tm mjhe bla rhe ho aun ke lie nh dnia min koei dعot he nh aakhrt min، aor hm sb ko pltna allh hi ki trf he، aor hd se gzrne oale aag min jane oale hin
40.44: Aaj jo kchh min khh rha hon، عnqrib oh oqt aaee ga jb tm ause iad kro ge aor apna mعamlh min allh ke sprd krta hon، oh apne bndon ka nghban he"

46.4: Ae nbiؐ، ain se kho، "kbhi tm ne aankhin khol kr dikha bhi kh oh hstian hin kia jnhin tm khda ko chhor kr pkarte ho? Zra mjhe dkhaؤ to shi kh zmin min anhon ne kia pida kia he، ia aasmanon ki tkhliq o tdbir min an ka kia hsh he ais se phle aaei hoei ktab ia عlm ka koei bqih (ain عqaed ke sbot min) tmhare pas ho to ohi le aaؤ agr tm sche ho"

46.7: Ain logon ko jb hmari saf saf aaiat snaei jati hin aor hq ain ke samne aa jata he to ih kafr log aus ke mtعlq khte hin kh ih to khla jado he
46.8: Kia aun ka khna ih he kh rsol ne aise khod ghr lia he? An se kho، "agr min ne aise khod ghr lia he to tm mjhe khda ki pkr se kchh bhi nh bcha sko ge، jo batin tm bnate ho allh an ko khob janta he، mire aor tmhare drmian ohi goahi dine ke lie kafi he، aor oh bra drgzr krne oala aor rhim he"
46.9: Ain se kho، "min koei nrala rsol to nhin hon، min nhin janta kh kl tmhare sath kia hona he aor mire sath kia، min to srf aus ohi ki piroi krta hon jo mire pas bhiji jati he aor min aik saf saf khbrdar kr dine oale ke soa aor kchh nhin hon"
46.10: Ae nbiؐ، an se kho "kbhi tm ne socha bhi kh agr ih klam allh hi ki trf se hoa aor tm ne ais ka ankar kr dia (to tmhara kia anjam hoga)? Aor ais jise aik klam pr to bni asraeil ka aik goah shhadt bhi de chka he oh aiman le aaia aor tm apne ghmnd min pre rhe aise zalmon ko allh hdait nhin dia krta"
46.11: Jn logon ne manne se ankar kr dia he oh aiman lane oalon ke mtعlq khte hin kh agr as ktab ko man lina koei achha kam hota to ih log as mعamle min hm se sbqt nh le ja skte the chonkh ainhon ne aus se hdait nh paei as lie ab ih zror khin ge kh ih to prana jhot he
46.12: Halankh ais se phle mosiaؑ ki ktab rhnma aor rhmt bn kr aa chki he، aor ih ktab aus ki tsdiq krne oali zban عrbi min aaei he takh zalmon ko mtnbh kr de aor nik rosh akhtiar krne oalon ko bshart de de
46.13: Iqinaan jn logon ne khh dia kh allh hi hmara rb he، phr aus pr jm gee، aun ke lie nh koei khof he aor nh oh ghmgin hon ge

46.15: Hm ne ansan ko hdait ki kh oh apne oaldin ke sath nik br taؤ kre aus ki man ne mshqt atha kr ase pit min rkha aor mshqt atha kr hi as ko jna، aor as ke hml aor dodh chhrane min tis mhine lg gee ihan tk kh jb oh apni pori taqt ko phncha aor chalis sal ka ho gia to as ne kha "ae mire rb، mjhe tofiq de kh min tiri aun nعmton ka shkr ada kron jo to ne mjhe aor mire oaldin ko عta frmaein، aor aisa nik عml kron js se to razi ho، aor miri aolad ko bhi nik bna kr mjhe sukh de، min tire hzor tobh krta hon aor tabع frman (mslm) bndon min se hon"
46.16: Ais trh ke logon se hm aun ke bhtrin aعmal ko qbol krte hin aor an ki braeion se drgzr kr jate hin ih jnti logon min shaml hon ge aus sche oعde ke mtabq jo an se kia jata rha he
46.17: Aor js shkhs ne apne oaldin se kha "auf، tng kr dia tm ne، kia tm mjhe ih khof dlate ho kh min mrne ke bعd phr qbr se nkala jaؤn ga halankh mjh se phle bht si nslin gzr chki hin (aun min se to koei ath kr nh aaia)" man aor bap allh ki dohaei de kr khte hin "are bdnsib، man ja، allh ka oعdh scha he" mgr oh khta he "ih sb agle oqton ki frsodh khanian hin"
46.18: Ih oh log hin jn pr عzab ka fislh chspan ho chka he ain se phle jnon aor ansanon ke jo tole (aisi qmash ke) ho gzre hin aunhi min ih bhi ja shaml hon ge be shk ih ghate min rh jane oale log hin
46.19: Donon grohon min se hr aik ke drje an ke aعmal ke lhaz se hin takh allh an ke kie ka pora pora bdlh an ko de an pr zlm hrgz nh kia jaee ga
46.20: Phr jb ih kafr aag ke samne la khre kie jaein ge to an se kha jaee ga: "tm apne hse ki nعmtin apni dnia ki zndgi min khtm kr chke aor an ka ltf tm ne atha lia، ab jo tkbr tm zmin min ksi hq ke bghir krte rhe aor jo nafrmanian tm ne kin aun ki padash min aaj tm ko zlt ka عzab dia jaee ga"
46.21: Zra ainhin عad ke bhaei (hodؑ) ka qsh snaؤ jbkh aus ne ahqaf min apni qom ko khbrdar kia tha aor aise khbrdar krne oale aus se phle bhi gzr chke the aor as ke bعd bhi aate rhe kh "allh ke soa ksi ki bndgi nh kro، mjhe tmhare hq min aik bre holnak dn ke عzab ka andishh he"
46.22: Anhon ne kha "kia to ais lie aaia he kh hmin bhka kr hmare mعbodon se brgshth kr de? Achha to le aa apna oh عzab js se to hmin drata he agr oaqعi to scha he"
46.23: Aus ne kha kh "ais ka عlm to allh ko he، min srf oh pigham tmhin phncha rha hon jse de kr mjhe bhija gia he mgr min dikh rha hon kh tm log jhalt brt rhe ho"
46.24: Phr jb anhon ne aus عzab ko apni oadion ki trf aate dikha to khne lge "ih badl he jo hm ko sirab kr de ga" "nhin، blkh ih ohi chiz he js ke lie tm jldi mcha rhe the ih hoa ka tofan he js min drdnak عzab chla aa rha he
46.25: Apne rb ke hkm se hr chiz ko tbah kr dale ga" aakhrkar aun ka hal ih hoa kh aun ke rhne ki jghon ke soa ohan kchh nzr nh aata tha ais trh hm mjrmon ko bdlh dia krte hin
46.26: Aun ko hm ne oh kchh dia tha jo tm logon ko nhin dia he aun ko hm ne kan، aankhin aor dl، sb kchh de rkhe the، mgr nh oh kan aun ke ksi kam aaee، nh aankhin، nh dl، kionkh oh allh ki aaiat ka ankar krte the، aor ausi chiz ke phir min oh aa gee js ka oh mzaq arate the
46.27: Tmhare grd o pish ke عlaqon min bht si bstion ko hm hlak kr chke hin hm ne apni aaiat bhij kr bar bar trh trh se aun ko smjhaia، shaid kh oh baz aa jaein
46.28: Phr kion nh aun hstion ne aun ki mdd ki jnhin allh ko chhor kr anhon ne tqrb ali allh ka zriعh smjhte hoee mعbod bna lia tha? Blkh oh to an se khoee gee، aor ih tha aun ke jhot aor aun bnaoti عqidon ka anjam jo anhon ne ghr rkhe the
46.29: (aor oh oaqعh bhi qabl zkr he) jb hm jnon ke aik groh ko tmhari trf le aaee the takh qraan snin jb oh aus jgh phnche (jhan tm qraan prh rhe the) to anhon ne aaps min kha khamosh ho jaؤ phr jb oh prha ja chka to oh khbrdar krne oale bn kr apni qom ki trf plte
46.30: Anhon ne ja kr kha، "ae hmari qom ke logo، hm ne aik ktab sni he jo mosiaؑ ke bعd nazl ki gei he، tsdiq krne oali he apne se phle aaei hoei ktabon ki، rhnmaei krti he hq aor rah rast ki trf
46.31: Ae hmari qom ke logo، allh ki trf blane oale ki dعot qbol kr lo aor as pr aiman le aaؤ، allh tmhare gnahon se drgzr frmaee ga aor tmhin عzab alim se bcha de ga"
46.32: Aor jo koei allh ke daعi ki bat nh mane oh nh zmin min khod koei bl bota rkhta he kh allh ko zch kr de، aor nh as ke koei aise hami o srprst hin kh allh se as ko bcha lin aise log khli gmrahi min pr e hoee hin
46.33: Aor kia ain logon ko ih sjhaei nhin dita kh js khda ne ih zmin aor aasman pida kie hin aor an ko bnate hoee jo nh thka، oh zror as pr qadr he kh murdon ko jla athaee? Kion nhin، iqinaan oh hr chiz ki qdrt rkhta he
46.34: Js roz ih kafr aag ke samne laee jaein ge، aus oqt ain se pochha jaee ga "kia ih hq nhin he?" ih khin ge "han، hmare rb ki qsm (ih oaqعi hq he)" allh frmaee ga، "achha to ab عzab ka mza chkho apne aus ankar ki padash min jo tm krte rhe the"
46.35: Ps ae nbiؐ، sbr kro js trh aoloalعzm rsolon ne sbr kia he، aor an ke mعamlh min jldi nh kro js roz ih log aus chiz ko dikh lin ge js ka ainhin khof dlaia ja rha he to ainhin ion mعlom ho ga kh jise dnia min dn ki aik ghri bhr se ziadh nhin rhe the bat phncha di gei، ab kia nafrman logon ke soa aor koei hlak ho ga?

47.1: Jn logon ne kfr kia aor allh ke raste se roka، allh ne an ke aعmal ko raeigan kr dia

57.1: Allh ki tsbih ki he hr aus chiz ne jo zmin aor aasmanon min he، aor ohi zbrdst dana he
57.2: Zmin aor aasmanon ki sltnt ka malk ohi he، zndgi bkhshta he aor mot dita he، aor hr chiz pr qdrt rkhta he
57.3: Ohi aol bhi he aor aakhr bhi، zahr bhi he aor mkhfi bhi، aor oh hr chiz ka عlm rkhta he
57.4: Ohi he js ne aasmanon aor zmin ko chh dnon min pida kia aor phr عrsh pr jloh frma hoa aus ke عlm min he jo kchh zmin min jata he aor jo kchh as se nklta he aor jo kchh aasman se atrta he aor jo kchh aus min chrhta he oh tmhare sath he jhan bhi tm ho jo kam bhi krte ho ase oh dikh rha he
57.5: Ohi zmin aor aasmanon ki badshahi ka malk he aor tmam mعamlat fisle ke lie ausi ki trf rjoع kie jate hin
57.6: Ohi rat ko dn min aor dn ko rat min dakhl krta he، aor dlon ke chhpe hoee raz tk janta he
57.7: Aiman laؤ allh aor as ke rsol pr aor khrch kro aun chizon min se jn pr as ne tm ko khlifh bnaia he jo log tm min se aiman laein ge aor mal khrch krin ge an ke lie bra ajr he
57.8: Tmhin kia ho gia he kh tm allh pr aiman nhin late halankh rsol tmhin apne rb pr aiman lane ki dعot de rha he aor oh tm se عhd le chka he agr tm oaqعi manne oale ho
57.9: Oh allh hi to he jo apne bnde pr saf saf aaitin nazl kr rha he takh tmhin tarikion se nkal kr roshni min le aaee، aor hqiqt ih he kh allh tm pr nhait shfiq aor mhrban he
57.10: Aakhr kia ojh he kh tm allh ki rah min khrch nhin krte halankh zmin aor aasmanon ki miras allh hi ke lie he tm min se jo log fth ke bعd khrch aor jhad krin ge oh kbhi aun logon ke brabr nhin ho skte jnhon ne fth se phle khrch aor jhad kia he aun ka drjh bعd min khrch aor jhad krne oalon se brh kr he agrchh allh ne donon hi se achhe oعde frmaee hin jo kchh tm krte ho allh as se ba khbr he
57.11: Kon he jo allh ko qrz de? Achha qrz، takh allh ase kei gna brha kr oaps de، aor aus ke lie bhtrin ajr he
57.12: Aus dn jbkh tm momn mrdon aor عorton ko dikho ge kh an ka nor aun ke aage aage aor an ke daein janb dor rha hoga (an se kha jaee ga kh) "aaj bshart he tmhare lie" jntin hongi jn ke niche nhrin bhh rhi hongi، jn min oh hmishh rhin ge ihi he bri kamiabi
57.13: Aus roz mnafq mrdon aor عorton ka hal ih hoga kh oh momnon se khin ge zra hmari trf dikho takh hm tmhare nor se kchh faedh athaein، mgr an se kha jaee ga pichhe ht jaؤ، apna nor khin aor tlash kro phr an ke drmian aik dioar hael kr di jaee gi js min aik droazh hoga aus droaze ke andr rhmt hogi aor bahr عzab
57.14: Oh momnon se pkar pkar kr khin ge kia hm tmhare sath nh the? Momn joab din ge han، mgr tm ne apne aap ko khod ftne min dala، moqع prsti ki، shk min pre rhe، aor jhoti toqعat tmhin frib diti rhin، ihan tk kh allh ka fislh aa gia، aor aakhr oqt tk oh bra dhoke baz tmhin allh ke mعamlh min dhoka dita rha
57.15: Lhaza aaj nh tm se koei fdih qbol kia jaee ga aor nh aun logon se jnhon ne khla khla kfr kia tha tmhara thkana jhnm he، ohi tmhari khbr giri krne oali he aor ih bdtrin anjam he
57.16: Kia aiman lane oalon ke lie abhi oh oqt nhin aaia kh aun ke dl allh ke zkr se pghlin aor aus ke nazl krdh hq ke aage jhkin aor oh aun logon ki trh nh ho jaein jnhin phle ktab di gei thi، phr aik lmbi mdt aun pr gzr gei to an ke dl skht ho gee aor aaj an min se aksr fasq bne hoee hin?
57.17: Khob jan lo kh، allh zmin ko aus ki mot ke bعd zndgi bkhshta he، hm ne nshanian tm ko saf saf dkha di hin، shaid kh tm عql se kam lo
57.18: Mrdon aor عorton min se jo log sdqat dine oale hin aor jnhon ne allh ko qrz hsn dia he، aun ko iqinaan kei gna brha kr dia jaee ga aor an ke lie bhtrin ajr he
57.19: Aor jo log allh aor as ke rsolon pr aiman laee hin ohi apne rb ke nzdik sdiq aor shhid hin، aun ke lie aun ka ajr aor aun ka nor he aor jn logon ne kfr kia he aor hmari aaiat ko jhtlaia he oh dozkhi hin
57.20: Khob jan lo kh ih dnia ki zndgi as ke soa kchh nhin kh aik khil aor dl lgi aor zahri tip tap aor tmhara aaps min aik dosre pr fkhr jtana aor mal o aolad min aik dosre se brh jane ki koshsh krna he as ki msal aisi he jise aik barsh ho gei to as se pida hone oali nbatat ko dikh kr kasht kar khosh ho gee phr ohi khiti pk jati he aor tm dikhte ho kh oh zrd ho gei phr oh bhs bn kr rh jati he ais ke brعks aakhrt oh jgh he jhan skht عzab he aor allh ki mghfrt aor as ki khoshnodi he dnia ki zndgi aik dhoke ki tti ke soa kchh nhin
57.21: Doro aor aik dosre se aage brhne ki koshsh kro apne rb ki mghfrt aor aus ki jnt ki trf js ki osعt aasman o zmin jisi he، jo mhia ki gei he aun logon ke lie jo allh aor aus ke rsolon pr aiman laee hon ih allh ka fzl he، jse chahta he عta frmata he، aor allh bre fzl oala he
57.22: Koei msibt aisi nhin he jo zmin min ia tmhare apne nfs pr nazl hoti ho aor hm ne as ko pida krne se phle aik ktab min lkh nh rkha ho aisa krna allh ke lie bht aasan kam he
57.23: (ih sb kchh as lie he) takh jo kchh bhi nqsan tmhin ho as pr tm dl shksth nh ho aor jo kchh allh tmhin عta frmaee as pr phol nh jaؤ allh aise logon ko psnd nhin krta jo apne aap ko bri chiz smjhte hin aor fkhr jtate hin
57.24: Jo khod bkhl krte hin aor dosron ko bkhl pr aksate hin ab agr koei ro grdani krta he to allh be niaz aor stodh sfat he
57.25: Hm ne apne rsolon ko saf saf nshanion aor hdaiat ke sath bhija، aor aun ke sath ktab aor mizan nazl ki takh log ansaf pr qaem hon، aor loha atara js min bra zor he aor logon ke lie mnafع hin ih as lie kia gia he kh allh ko mعlom ho jaee kh kon aus ko dikhe bghir as ki aor aus ke rsolon ki mdd krta he iqinaan allh bri qot oala aor zbrdst he
57.26: Hm ne nohؑ aor abrahimؑ ko bhija aor aun donon ki nsl min nbot aor ktab rkh di phr an ki aolad min se ksi ne hdait akhtiar ki aor bht se fasq ho gee
57.27: Aun ke bعd hm ne pe dr pe apne rsol bhije، aor an sb ke bعd عisiaؑ abn mrim ko mbعos kia aor aus ko anjil عta ki aor jn logon ne as ki piroi akhtiar ki aun ke dlon min hm ne trs aor rhm dal dia aor rhbanit anhon ne khod aijad krli، hm ne ause aun pr frz nhin kia tha، mgr allh ki khoshnodi ki tlb min anhon ne aap hi ih bdعt nkali aor phr as ki pabndi krne ka jo hq tha ase ada nh kia aun min se jo log aiman laee hoee the aun ka ajr hm ne an ko عta kia، mgr an min se aksr log fasq hin
57.28: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، allh se dro aor as ke rsolؐ pr aiman laؤ، allh tmhin apni rhmt ka dohra hsh عta frmaee ga aor tmhin oh nor bkhshe ga js ki roshni min tm chlo ge، aor tmhare qsor mعaf kr de ga، allh bra mعaf krne oala aor mhrban he
57.29: (tm ko ih rosh akhtiar krni chahie) takh ahl ktab ko mعlom ho jaee kh allh ke fzl pr aun ka koei ajarh nhin he، aor ih kh allh ka fzl as ke apne hi hath min he، jse chahta he عta frmata he، aor oh bre fzl oala he

58.1: Allh ne sn li aus عort ki bat jo a pne shohr ke mعamlh min tm se tkrar kr rhi he aor allh se friad kie jati he allh tm donon ki gftgo sn rha he، oh sb kchh snne aor dikhne oala he
58.2: Tm min se jo log apni bioion se zhar krte hin an ki bioian an ki maein nhin hin، an ki maein to ohi hin jnhon ne an ko jna he ih log aik skht napsndidh aor jhoti bat khte hin، aor hqiqt ih he kh allh bra mعaf krne oala aor drgzr frmane oala he
58.3: Jo log apni bioion se zhar krin phr apni aus bat se rjoع krin jo anhon ne khi thi، to qbl as ke kh donon aik dosre ko hath lgaein، aik ghlam aazad krna hoga ais se tm ko nsiht ki jati he، aor jo kchh tm krte ho allh as se bakhbr he
58.4: Aor jo shkhs ghlam nh paee oh do mhine ke pe dr pe roze rkhe qbl as ke kh donon aik dosre ko hath lgaein aor jo as pr bhi qadr nh ho oh 60 mskinon ko khana khlaee ih hkm as lie dia ja rha he kh tm allh aor aus ke rsol pr aiman laؤ ih allh ki mqrr ki hoei hdin hin، aor kafron ke lie drdnak sza he
58.5: Jo log allh aor as ke rsol ki mkhalft krte hin oh asi trh zlil o khoar kr die jaein ge js trh an se phle ke log zlil o khoar kie ja chke hin hm ne saf saf aaiat nazl kr di hin، aor kafron ke lie zlt ka عzab he
58.6: Aus dn (ih zlt ka عzab hona he) jb allh an sb ko phr se zndh kr ke athaee ga aor anhin bta de ga kh oh kia kchh kr ke aaee hin oh bhol gee hin mgr allh ne an sb ka kia dhra gn gn kr mhfoz kr rkha he aor allh aik aik chiz pr shahd he
58.7: Kia tm ko khbr nhin he kh zmin aor aasmanon ki hr chiz ka allh ko عlm he? Kbhi aisa nhin hota kh tin aadmion min koei srgoshi ho aor an ke drmian chotha allh nh ho، ia panch aadmion min srgoshi ho aor an ke andr chhta allh nh ho khfih bat krne oala khoah ais se km hon ia ziadh، jhan khin bhi oh hon، allh an ke sath hota he phr qiamt ke roz oh an ko bta de ga kh anhon ne kia kchh kia he allh hr chiz ka عlm rkhta he
58.8: Kia tm ne dikha nhin aun logon ko jnhin srgoshian krne se mnع kr dia gia tha phr bhi oh ohi hrkt kie jate hin js se anhin mnع kia gia tha? Ih log chhp chhp kr aaps min gnah aor ziadti aor rsol ki nafrmani ki batin krte hin، aor jb tmhare pas aate hin to tmhin aus triqe se slam krte hin js trh allh ne tm pr slam nhin kia he aor apne dlon min khte hin kh hmari ain baton pr allh hmin عzab kion nhin dita aun ke lie jhnm hi kafi he ausi ka oh aindhn bnin ge bra hi bra anjam he aun ka
58.9: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، jb tm aaps min poshidh bat kro to gnah aor ziadti aor rsol ki nafrmani ki batin nhin blkh niki aor tqoia ki batin kro aor aus khda se drte rho js ke hzor tmhin hshr min pish hona he
58.10: Kana phosi to aik shitani kam he، aor oh as lie ki jati he kh aiman lane oale log aus se rnjidh hon، halankh be azn khda oh anhin kchh bhi nqsan nhin phncha skti، aor momnon ko allh hi pr bhrosh rkhna chahie
58.11: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، jb tm se kha jaee kh apni mjlson min kshadgi pida kro to jgh kshadh kr dia kro، allh tmhin kshadgi bkhshe ga aor jb tm se kha jaee kh ath jaؤ to ath jaia kro tm min se jo log aiman rkhne oale hin aor jn ko عlm bkhsha gia he، allh an ko blnd drje عta frmaee ga، aor jo kchh tm krte ho allh ko as ki khbr he
58.12: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، jb tm rsol se tkhlih min bat kro to bat krne se phle kchh sdqh do ih tmhare lie bhtr aor pakizh tr he albth agr tm sdqh dine ke lie kchh nh paؤ to allh ghfor o rhim he
58.13: Kia tm dr gee as bat se kh tkhlih min gftgo krne se phle tmhin sdqat dine honge? Achha، agr tm aisa nh kro aor allh ne tm ko as se mعaf kr dia to nmaz qaem krte rho، zkoaۃ dite rho aor allh aor as ke rsol ki ataعt krte rho tm jo kchh krte ho allh as se bakhbr he
58.14: Kia tm ne dikha nhin aun logon ko jnhon ne dost bnaia he aik aise groh ko jo allh ka mghzob he? Oh nh tmhare hin nh aun ke، aor oh jan bojh kr jhoti bat pr qsmin khate hin
58.15: Allh ne an ke lie skht عzab mhia kr rkha he، bre hi bre krtot hin jo oh kr rhe hin
58.16: Aunhon ne apni qsmon ko dhal bna rkha he js ki aar min oh allh ki rah se logon ko rokte hin، ais pr an ke lie zlt ka عzab he
58.17: Allh se bchane ke lie nh an ke mal kchh kam aaein ge nh an ki aolad oh dozkh ke iar hin، asi min oh hmishh rhin ge
58.18: Js roz allh an sb ko athaee ga، oh as ke samne bhi ausi trh qsmin khaein ge js trh tmhare samne khate hin aor apne nzdik ih smjhin ge kh as se an ka kchh kam bn jaee ga khob jan lo، oh prle drje ke jhote hin
58.19: Shitan aun pr mslt ho chka he aor a us ne khda ki iad aun ke dl se bhla di he oh shitan ki parti ke log hin khbrdar ho، shitan ki parti oale hi khsare min rhne oale hin
58.20: Iqinaan zlil trin mkhloqat min se hin oh log jo allh aor as ke rsol ka mqablh krte hin
58.21: Allh ne lkh dia he kh min aor mire rsol ghalb ho kr rhin ge fi aloaqع allh zbrdst aor zor aaor he
58.22: Tm kbhi ih nh paؤ ge kh jo log allh aor aakhrt pr aiman rkhne oale hin oh aun logon se mhbt krte hon jnhon ne allh aor as ke rsol ki mkhalft ki he، khoah oh aun ke bap hon، ia aun ke bite، ia aun ke bhaei ia aun ke ahl khandan ih oh log hin jn ke dlon min allh ne aiman sbt kr dia he aor apni trf se aik roh عta kr ke an ko qot bkhshi he oh an ko aisi jnton min dakhl kre ga jn ke niche nhrin bhti hon gi an min oh hmishh rhin ge allh an se razi hoa aor oh allh se razi hoee oh allh ki parti ke log hin khbrdar rho، allh ki parti oale hi flah pane oale hin

59.1: Allh hi ki tsbih ki he hr aus chiz ne jo aasmanon aor zmin min he، aor ohi ghalb aor hkim he
59.2: Ohi he js ne ahl ktab kafron ko phle hi hmle min aun ke ghron se nkal bahr kia tmhin hrgz ih gman nh tha kh oh nkl jaein ge، aor oh bhi ih smjhe bithe the kh aun ki grhian anhin allh se bcha lin gi mgr allh aise rkh se aun pr aaia jdhr aun ka khial bhi nh gia tha aus ne aun ke dlon min rعb dal dia ntijh ih hoa kh oh khod apne hathon se bhi apne ghron ko brbad kr rhe the aor momnon ke hathon bhi brbad kroa rhe the ps عbrt hasl kro ae didh bina rkhne oalo!
59.3: Agr allh ne aun ke hq min jla otni nh lkh di hoti to dnia hi min oh anhin عzab de dalta، aor aakhrt min to an ke lie dozkh ka عzab he hi
59.4: Ih sb kchh as lie hoa kh anhon ne allh aor as ke rsol ka mqablh kia، aor jo bhi allh ka mqablh kre allh as ko sza dine min bht skht he
59.5: Tm logon ne khjoron ke jo drkht kate ia jn ko apni jron pr khra rhne dia، ih sb allh hi ke azn se tha aor (allh ne ih azn as lie dia) takh fasqon ko zlil o khoar kre
59.6: Aor jo mal allh ne aun ke qbze se nkal kr apne rsol ki trf plta die، oh aise mal nhin hin jn pr tm ne apne ghore aor aont doraee hon، blkh allh apne rsolon ko js pr chahta he tslt عta frma dita he، aor allh hr chiz pr qadr he
59.7: Jo kchh bhi allh ain bstion ke logon se apne rsol ki trf plta de oh allh aor rsol aor rshth daron aor itamia aor msakin aor msafron ke lie he takh oh tmhare maldaron hi ke drmian grdsh nh krta rhe jo kchh rsolؐ tmhin de oh le lo aor js chiz se oh tm ko rok de as se rk jaؤ allh se dro، allh skht sza dine oala he
59.8: (niz oh mal) aun ghrib mhajrin ke lie he jo apne ghron aor jaedadon se nkal bahr kie gee hin ih log allh ka fzl aor as ki khoshnodi chahte hin aor allh aor aus ke rsolؐ ki hmait pr kmr bsth rhte hin ihi rastbaz log hin
59.9: (aor oh aun logon ke lie bhi he) jo ain mhajrin ki aamd se phle hi aiman la kr daralhjrt min mqim the ih aun logon se mhbt krte hin jo hjrt kr ke ain ke pas aaee hin aor jo kchh bhi aun ko didia jaee aus ki koei hajt tk ih apne dlon min mhsos nhin krte aor apni zat pr dosron ko trjih dite hin khoah apni jgh khod mhtaj hon hqiqt ih he kh jo log apne dl ki tngi se bcha lie gee ohi flah pane oale hin
59.10: (aor oh aun logon ke lie bhi he) jo ain aglon ke bعd aaee hin، jo khte hin kh "ae hmare rb، hmin aor hmare aun sb bhaeion ko bkhsh de jo hm se phle aiman laee hin aor hmare dlon min ahl aiman ke lie koei bghz nh rkh، ae hmare rb، to bra mhrban aor rhim he"
59.11: Tm ne dikha nhin aun logon ko jnhon ne mnafqt ki rosh akhtiar ki he? Ih apne kafr ahl ktab bhaeion se khte hin "agr tmhin nkala gia to hm tmhare sath nklin ge، aor tmhare mعamlh min hm ksi ki bat hrgz nh manin ge، aor agr tm se jng ki gei to hm tmhari mdd krin ge" mgr allh goah he kh ih log qtعi jhote hin
59.12: Agr oh nkale gee to ih an ke sath hrgz nh nklin ge، aor agr aun se jng ki gei to ih aun ki hrgz mdd nh krin ge، aor agr ih an ki mdd krin bhi to pith phir jaein ge aor phr khin se koei mdd nh paein ge
59.13: Ain ke dlon min allh se brh kr tmhara khof he، as lie kh ih aise log hin jo smjh bojh nhin rkhte
59.14: Ih kbhi akthe ho kr (khle midan min) tmhara mqablh nh krin ge، lrin ge bhi to qlعh bnd bstion min bith kr ia dioaron ke pichhe chhp kr ih aaps ki mkhalft min bre skht hin tm ainhin aktha smjhte ho mgr an ke dl aik dosre se phte hoee hin ain ka ih hal ais lie he kh ih be عql log hin
59.15: Ih aunhi logon ke mannd hin jo ain se thori hi mdt phle apne kie ka mza chkh chke hin aor ain ke lie drdnak عzab he
59.16: Ain ki msal shitan ki si he kh phle oh ansan se khta he kh kfr kr، aor jb ansan kfr kr bithta he to oh khta he kh min tjh se bri alzmh hon، mjhe to allh rb alعalmin se dr lgta he
59.17: Phr donon ka anjam ih hona he kh hmishh ke lie jhnm min jaein، aor zalmon ki ihi jza he
59.18: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، allh se dro، aor hr shkhs ih dikhe kh aus ne kl ke lie kia saman kia he allh se drte rho، allh iqinaan tmhare aun sb aعmal se bakhbr he jo tm krte ho
59.19: Aun logon ki trh nh ho jaؤ jo allh ko bhol gee to allh ne aunhin khod apna nfs bhla dia، ihi log fasq hin
59.20: Dozkh min jane oale aor jnt min jane oale kbhi iksan nhin ho skte jnt min jane oale hi asl min kamiab hin
59.21: Agr hm ne ih qraan ksi phar pr bhi atar dia hota to tm dikhte kh oh allh ke khof se dba ja rha he aor phta prta he ih msalin hm logon ke samne as lie bian krte hin kh oh (apni halt pr) ghor krin
59.22: Oh allh hi he js ke soa koei mعbod nhin، ghaeb aor zahr hr chiz ka janne oala، ohi rhman aor rhim he
59.23: Oh allh hi he js ke soa koei mعbod nhin oh badshah he nhait mqds، srasr slamti، amn dine oala، nghban، sb pr ghalb، apna hkm bzor nafz krne oala، aor bra hi ho kr rhne oala pak he allh aus shrk se jo log kr rhe hin
59.24: Oh allh hi he jo tkhliq ka mnsobh bnane oala aor as ko nafz krne oala aor as ke mtabq sort gri krne oala he as ke lie bhtrin nam hin hr chiz jo aasmanon aor zmin min he aus ki tsbih kr rhi he، aor oh zbrdst aor hkim he

60.1: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، agr tm miri rah min jhad krne ke lie aor miri rza joei ki khatr (otn chhor kr ghron se) nkle ho to mire aor apne dshmnon ko dost nh bnaؤ tm aun ke sath dosti ki trh dalte ho، halankh jo hq tmhare pas aaia he aus ko manne se oh ankar kr chke hin aor aun ki rosh ih he kh rsol ko aor khod tm ko srf ais qsor pr jla otn krte hin kh tm apne rb، allh pr aiman laee ho tm chhpa kr aun ko dostanh pigham bhijte ho، halankh jo kchh tm chhpa kr krte ho aor jo عlanih krte ho، hr chiz ko min khob janta hon jo shkhs bhi tm min se aisa kre oh iqinaan rah rast se bhtk gia
60.2: Aun ka roih to ih he kh agr tm pr qabo pa jaein to tmhare sath dshmni krin aor hath aor zban se tmhin aazar din oh to ih chahte hin kh tm ksi trh kafr ho jaؤ
60.3: Qiamt ke dn nh tmhari rshth darian ksi kam aaein gi nh tmhari aolad aus roz allh tmhare drmian jdaei dal de ga، aor o hi tmhare aعmal ka dikhne oala he
60.4: Tm logon ke lie abrahimؑ aor aus ke sathion min aik achha nmonh he kh aunhon ne apni qom se saf khh dia "hm tm se aor tmhare ain mعbodon se jn ko tm khda ko chhor kr pojte ho qtعi bizar hin، hm ne tm se kfr kia aor hmare aor tmhare drmian hmishh ke lie عdaot ho gei aor bir pr gia jb tk tm allh oahd pr aiman nh laؤ" mgr abrahimؑ ka apne bap se ih khna (ais se mstsnia he) kh "min aap ke lie mghfrt ki drkhoast zror kron ga، aor allh se aap ke lie kchh hasl kr lina mire bs min nhin he" (aor abrahimؑ o ashab abrahimؑ ki dعa ih thi kh) "ae hmare rb، tire hi aopr hm ne bhrosa kia aor tiri hi trf hm ne rjoع kr lia aor tire hi hzor hmin pltna he
60.5: Ae hmare rb، hmin kafron ke lie ftnh nh bna de aor ae hmare rb، hmare qsoron se drgzr frma، be shk to hi zbrdst aor dana he"
60.6: Ainhi logon ke trz عml min tmhare lie aor hr aus shkhs ke lie achha nmonh he jo allh aor roz aakhr ka amidoar ho ais se koei mnhrf ho to allh be niaz aor apni zat min aap mhmod he
60.7: Bعid nhin kh allh kbhi tmhare aor aun logon ke drmian mhbt dal de jn se aaj tm ne dshmni mol li he allh bri qdrt rkhta he aor oh ghfor o rhim he
60.8: Allh tmin as bat se nhin rokta kh tm an logon ke sath niki aor ansaf ka brtaؤ kro jnhon ne din ke mعamlh min tm se jng nhin ki he aor tmhin tmhare ghron se nhin nkala he allh ansaf krne oalon ko psnd krta he
60.9: Oh tmhin js bat se rokta he oh to ih he kh tm aun logon se dosti kro jnhon ne tm se din ke mعamlh min jng ki he aor tmhin tmhare ghron se nkala he aor tmhare akhraj min aik dosre ki mdd ki he aun se jo log dosti krin ohi zalm hin
60.10: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، jb momn عortin hjrt kr ke tmhare pas aaein to (an ke momn hone ki) janch prtal kr lo، aor an ke aiman ki hqiqt allh hi bhtr janta he phr jb tmhin mعlom ho jaee kh oh momn hin to anhin kfar ki trf oaps nh kro nh oh kfar ke lie hlal hin aor nh kfar an ke lie hlal an ke kafr shohron ne jo mhr aun ko die the oh anhin phir do aor an se nkah kr line min tm pr koei gnah nhin jbkh tm aun ke mhr aun ko ada kr do aor tm khod bhi kafr عorton ko apne nkah min nh roke rho jo mhr tm ne apni kafr bioion ko die the oh tm oaps mang lo aor jo mhr kafron ne apni mslman bioion ko die the anhin oh oaps mang lin ih allh ka hkm he، oh tmhare drmian fislh krta he aor allh عlim o hkim he
60.11: Aor agr tmhari kafr bioion ke mhron min se kchh tmhin kfar se oaps nh mle aor phr tmhari nobt aaee to jn logon ki bioian adhr rh gei hin aun ko atni rqm ada kr do jo aun ke die hoee mhron ke brabr ho aor aus khda se dr te rho js pr tm aiman laee ho
60.12: Ae nbiؐ، jb tmhare pas momn عortin biعt krne ke lie aaein aor as bat ka عhd krin kh oh allh ke sath ksi chiz ko shrik nh krin gi، chori nh krin gi، zna nh krin gi، apni aolad ko qtl nh krin gi، apne hath paؤn ke aage koei bhtan ghr kr nh laein gi، aor ksi amr mعrof min tmhari nafrmani nh krin gi، to an se biعt le lo aor aun ke hq min allh se dعaee mghfrt kro، iqinaan allh drgzr frmane oala aor rhm krne oala he
60.13: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، aun logon ko dost nh bnaؤ jn pr allh ne ghzb frmaia he، jo aakhrt se asi trh maios hin js trh qbron min pre hoee kafr maios hin

61.1: Allh ki tsbih ki he hr aus chiz ne jo aasmanon aor zmin min he، aor oh ghalb aor hkim he

61.14: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، allh ke mddgar bno، js trh عisia abn mrimؑ ne hoarion ko khtab kr ke kha tha: "kon he allh ki trf (blane) min mira mddgar?" aor hoarion ne joab dia tha: "hm hin allh ke mddgar" aus oqt bni asraeil ka aik groh aiman laia aor dosre groh ne ankar kia phr hm ne aiman lane oalon ki aun ke dshmnon ke mqable min taeid ki aor ohi ghalb ho kr rhe

62.1: Allh ki tsbih kr rhi he hr oh chiz jo aasmanon min he aor hr oh chiz jo zmin min he badshah he، qdos he، zbrdst aor hkim he
62.2: Ohi he js ne amion ke andr aik rsol khod aunhi min se athaia، jo aunhin aus ki aaiat snata he، aun ki zndgi snoarta he، aor aun ko ktab aor hkmt ki tعlim dita he halankh ais se phle oh khli gmrahi min pre hoee the
62.3: Aor (as rsol ki bعst) aun dosre logon ke lie bhi he jo abhi aun se nhin mle hin
62.4: Allh zbrdst aor hkim he ih as ka fzl he، jse chahta he dita he، aor oh bra fzl frmane oala he
62.5: Jn logon ko toraۃ ka haml bnaia gia tha mgr anhon ne as ka bar nh atha ia، aun ki msal aus gdhe ki si he js pr ktabin ldi hoei hon ais se bhi ziadh bri msal he aun logon ki jnhon ne allh ki aaiat ko jhtla dia he aise zalmon ko allh hdait nhin dia krta
62.6: Ain se kho، "ae logo jo ihodi bn gee ho، agr tmhin ih ghmnd he kh baqi sb logon ko chhor kr bs tm hi allh ke chhite ho to mot ki tmna kro agr tm apne ais zعm min sche ho"
62.7: Likn ih hrgz as ki tmna nh krin ge apne krtoton ki ojh se jo ih kr chke hin، aor allh ain zalmon ko khob janta he
62.8: Ain se kho، "js mot se tm bhagte ho oh to tmhin aa kr rhe gi phr tm as ke samne pish kie jaؤ ge jo poshidh o zahr ka janne oala he، aor oh tmhin bta de ga kh tm kia kchh krte rhe ho
62.9: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، jb pkara jaee nmaz ke lie jmعh ke dn to allh ke zkr ki trf doro aor khrid o frokht chhor do، ih tmhare lie ziadh bhtr he agr tm jano
62.10: Phr jb nmaz pori ho jaee to zmin min phil jaؤ aor allh ka fzl tlash kro aor allh ko ksrt se iad krte rho، shaid kh tmhin flah nsib ho jaee
62.11: Aor jb anhon ne tjart aor khil tmasha hote dikha to as ki trf lpk gee aor tmhin khra chhor dia an se kho، jo kchh allh ke pas he oh khil tmashe aor tjart se bhtr he aor allh sb se bhtr rzq dine oala he

63.1: Ae nbiؐ، jb ih mnafq tmhare pas aate hin to khte hin "hm goahi dite hin kh aa p iqinaan allh ke rsol hin" han، allh janta he kh tm zror aus ke rsol ho، mgr allh goahi dita he kh ih mnafq qtعi jhote hin
63.2: Anhon ne apni qsmon ko dhal bna rkha he aor ais trh ih allh ke raste se khod rkte aor dnia ko rokte hin kisi bri hrktin hin jo ih log kr rhe hin
63.3: Ih sb kchh as ojh se he kh an logon ne aiman la kr phr kfr kia as lie an ke dlon pr mhr lga di gei، ab ih kchh nhin smjhte
63.4: Ainhin dikho to ain ke jse tmhin bre shandar nzr aaein bolin to tm an ki batin snte rh jaؤ mgr asl min ih goia lkri ke knde hin jo dioar ke sath chn kr rkh die gee hon hr zor ki aaoaz ko ih apne khlaf smjhte hin ih pke dshmn hin، an se bch kr rho، allh ki mar an pr، ih kdhr alte phraee ja rhe hin
63.5: Aor jb ain se kha jata he kh aaؤ takh allh ka rsol tmhare lie mghfrt ki dعa kre، to sr jhtkte hin aor tm dikhte ho kh oh bre ghmnd ke sath aane se rkte hin
63.6: Ae nbiؐ، tm chahe an ke lie mghfrt ki dعa kro ia nh kro، an ke lie iksan he، allh hrgz anhin mعaf nh kre ga، allh fasq logon ko hrgz hdait nhin dita
63.7: Ih ohi log hin jo khte hin kh rsol ke sathion pr khrch krna bnd kr do takh ih mntshr ho jaein halankh zmin aor aasmanon ke khzanon ka malk allh hi he، mgr ih mnafq smjhte nhin hin
63.8: Ih khte hin kh hm mdine oaps phnch jaein to jo عzt oala he oh zlil ko ohan se nkal bahr kre ga halankh عzt to allh aor as ke rsolؐ aor momnin ke lie he، mgr ih mnafq jante nhin hin
63.9: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، tmhare mal aor tmhari aoladin tm ko allh ki iad se ghafl nh kr din jo log aisa krin ohi khsare min rhne oale hin
63.10: Jo rzq hm ne tmhin dia he as min se khrch kro qbl as ke kh tm min se ksi ki mot ka oqt aa jaee aor aus oqt oh khe kh "ae mire rb، kion nh to ne mjhe thori si mhlt aor de di kh min sdqh dita aor salh logon min shaml ho jata"
63.11: Halankh jb ksi ki mhlt عml pori hone ka oqt aa jata he to allh aus ko hrgz mzid mhlt nhin dita، aor jo kchh tm krte ho، allh as se bakhbr he

64.1: Allh ki tsbih kr rhi he hr oh chiz jo aasmanon min he aor hr oh chiz jo zmin min he asi ki badshahi he aor asi ke lie tعrif he aor oh hr chiz pr qadr he
64.2: Ohi he js ne tm ko pida kia، phr tm min se koei kafr he aor koei momn، aor allh oh sb kchh dikh rha he jo tm krte ho
64.3: As ne zmin aor aasmanon ko brhq pida kia he، aor tmhari sort bnaei aor bri عmdh bnaei he، aor asi ki trf aakhrkar tmhin pltna he
64.4: Zmin aor aasmanon ki hr chiz ka ase عlm he jo kchh tm chhpate ho aor jo kchh tm zahr krte ho sb as ko mعlom he، aor oh dlon ka hal tk janta he
64.5: Kia tmhin aun logon ki koei khbr nhin phnchi jnhon ne ais se phle kfr kia aor phr apni shamt aعmal ka mzh chkh lia? Aor aage aun ke lie aik drdnak عzab he
64.6: Ais anjam ke msthq oh as lie hoee kh aun ke pas aun ke rsol khli khli dlilin aor nshanian le kr aate rhe، mgr aunhon ne kha "kia ansan hmin hdait din ge?" as trh anhon ne manne se ankar kr dia aor mnh phir lia، tb allh bhi an se be proa ho gia aor allh to he hi be niaz aor apni zat min aap mhmod
64.7: Mnkrin ne bre dعoe se kha he kh oh mrne ke bعd hrgz dobarh nh athaee jaein ge an se kho "nhin، mire rb ki qsm tm zror athaee jaؤ ge، phr zror tmhin btaia jaee ga kh tm ne (dnia min) kia kchh kia he، aor aisa krna allh ke lie bht aasan he"
64.8: Ps aiman laؤ allh pr، aor aus ke rsol pr، aor aus roshni pr jo hm ne nazl ki he jo kchh tm krte ho allh as se bakhbr he
64.9: (ais ka pta tmhin as roz chl jaee ga) jb ajtmaع ke dn oh tm sb ko aktha kre ga oh dn hoga aik dosre ke mqable min logon ki har jit ka jo allh pr aiman laia he aor nik عml krta he، allh as ke gnah jhar de ga aor ase aisi jnton min dakhl kre ga jn ke niche nhrin bhti hon gi ih log hmishh hmishh an min rhin ge ih bri kamiabi he
64.10: Aor jn logon ne kfr kia he aor hmari aaiat ko jhtlaia he oh dozkh ke bashnde hon ge js min oh hmishh rhin ge aor oh bdtrin thkana he
64.11: Koei msibt kbhi nhin aati mgr allh ke azn hi se aati he jo shkhs allh pr aiman rkhta ho allh as ke dl ko hdait bkhshta he، aor allh ko hr chiz ka عlm he
64.12: Allh ki ataعt kro aor rsol ki taعt kro likn agr tm ataعt se mnh morte ho to hmare rsol pr saf saf hq phncha dine ke soa koei zmh dari nhin he
64.13: Allh oh he js ke soa koei khda nhin، lhaza aiman lane oalon ko allh hi pr bhrosa rkhna chahie
64.14: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، tmhari bioion aor tmhari aolad min se bعz tmhare dshmn hin، an se hoshiar rho aor agr tm عfo o drgzr se kam lo aor mعaf kr do to allh ghfor o rhim he
64.15: Tmhare mal aor tmhari aolad to aik aazmaesh hin، aor allh hi he js ke pas bra ajr he
64.16: Lhaza jhan tk tmhare bs min ho allh se drte rho، aor sno aor ataعt kro، aor apne mal khrch kro، ih tmhare hi lie bhtr he jo apne dl ki tngi se mhfoz rh gee bs ohi flah pane oale hin
64.17: Agr tm allh ko qrz hsn do to oh tmhin kei gna brha kr de ga aor tmhare qsoron se drgzr frmaee ga، allh bra qdrdan aor brdbar he
64.18: Hazr aor ghaeb hr chiz ko janta he، zbrdst aor dana he

65.1: Ae nbiؐ، jb tm log عorton ko tlaq do to aunhin aun ki عdt ke lie tlaq dia kro aor عdt ke zmane ka thik thik shmar kro، aor allh se dro jo tmhara rb he (zmanh عdt min) nh tm aunhin aun ke ghron se nkalo aor nh oh khod nklin، ala ih kh oh ksi srih braei ki mrtkb hon ih allh ki mqrr krdh hdin hin، aor jo koei allh ki hdon se tjaoz kre ga oh apne aopr khod zlm kre ga tm nhin jante، shaid as ke bعd allh (moafqt ki) koei sort pida kr de
65.2: Phr jb oh apni (عdt ki) mdt ke khatmh pr phnchin to ia anhin bhle triqe se (apne nkah min) rok r kho، ia bhle triqe pr aun se jda ho jaؤ aor do aise aadmion ko goah bna lo jo tm min se sahb عdl hon aor (ae goah bnne oalo) goahi thik thik allh ke lie ada kro ih batin hin jn ki tm logon ko nsiht ki jati he، hr aus shkhs ko jo allh aor aakhrt ke dn pr aiman rkhta ho jo koei allh se drte hoee kam kre ga allh aus ke lie mshklat se nklne ka koei rasth pida kr de ga
65.3: Aor ase aise raste se rzq de ga jdhr aus ka gman bhi nh jata ho jo allh pr bhrosa kre as ke lie oh kafi he allh apna kam pora kr ke rhta he allh ne hr chiz ke lie aik tqdir mqrr kr rkhi he
65.4: Aor tmhari عorton min se jo hiz se maios ho chki hon an ke mعamlh min agr tm logon ko koei shk lahq he to (tmhin mعlom ho kh) an ki عdt tin mhine he aor ihi hkm aun ka he jnhin abhi hiz nh aaia ho aor hamlh عorton ki عdt ki hd ih he kh aun ka ozع hml ho jaee jo shkhs allh se dre aus ke mعamlh min oh sholt pida kr dita he
65.5: Ih allh ka hkm he jo aus ne tmhari trf nazl kia he jo allh se dre ga allh as ki braeion ko as se dor kr de ga aor as ko bra ajr de ga
65.6: Aun ko (zmanh عdt min) ausi jgh rkho jhan tm rhte ho، jisi kchh bhi jgh tmhin misr ho aor anhin tng krne ke lie an ko nh staؤ aor agr oh hamlh hon to an pr aus oqt tk khrch krte rho jb tk an ka ozع hml nh ho jaee phr agr oh tmhare lie (bche ko) dodh plaein to an ki ajrt anhin do، aor bhle triqe se (ajrt ka mعamlh) bahmi gft o shnid se te kr lo likn agr tm ne (ajrt te krne min) aik dosre ko tng kia to bche ko koei aor عort dodh pla le gi
65.7: Khoshhal aadmi apni khoshhali ke mtabq nfqh de، aor js ko rzq km dia gia ho oh ausi mal min se khrch kre jo allh ne ase dia he allh ne js ko jtna kchh dia he as se ziadh ka oh ause mklf nhin krta bعid nhin kh allh tng dsti ke bعd frakh dsti bhi عta frma de
65.8: Ktni hi bstian hin jnhon ne apne rb aor as ke rsolon ke hkm se srtabi ki to hm ne an se skht mhasbh kia aor an ko bri trh sza di
65.9: Anhon ne apne kie ka mza chkh lia aor aun ka anjam kar ghata hi ghata he
65.10: Allh ne (aakhrt min) an ke lie skht عzab mhia kr rkha he ps allh se dro ae sahb عql logo jo aiman laee ho allh ne tmhari trf aik nsiht nazl kr di he
65.11: Aik aisa rso l jo tm ko allh ki saf saf hdait dine oali aaiat snata he takh aiman lane oalon aor nik عml krne oalon ko tarikion se nkal kr roshni min le aaee jo koei allh pr aiman laee aor nik عml kre، allh ause aisi jnton min dakhl kre ga jn ke niche nhrin bhti hon gi ih log an min hmishh hmishh rhin ge allh ne aise shkhs ke lie bhtrin rzq rkha he
65.12: Allh oh he js ne sat aasman bnaee aor zmin ki qsm se bhi aunhi ke mannd an ke drmian hkm nazl hota rhta he (ih bat tmhin as lie btaei ja rhi he) takh tm jan lo kh allh hr chiz pr qdrt rkhta he، aor ih kh allh ka عlm hr chiz pr mhit he

66.1: Ae nbiؐ، tm kion aus chiz ko hram krte ho jo allh ne tmhare lie hlal ki he? (kia as lie kh) tm apni bioion ki khoshi chahte ho? Allh mعaf krne oala aor rhm frmane oala he
66.2: Allh ne tm logon ke lie apni qsmon ki pabndi se nklne ka triqh mqrr kr dia he allh tmhara molia he، aor ohi عlim o hkim he
66.3: (aor ih mعamlh bhi qabl tojh he kh) nbiؐ ne aik bat apni aik bioi se raz min khi thi phr jb aus bioi ne (ksi aor pr) oh raz zahr kr dia، aor allh ne nbiؐ ko ais (afshaee raz) ki atlaع de di، to nbiؐ ne as pr ksi hd tk (aus bioi ko) khbrdar kia aor ksi hd tk as se drgzr kia phr jb nbiؐ ne ause (afshaee raz ki) ih bat btaei to aus ne pochha aap ko ais ki ks ne khbr di? Nbiؐ ne kha، "mjhe aus ne khbr di jo sb kchh janta he aor khob bakhbr he"
66.4: Agr tm donon allh se tobh krti ho (to ih tmhare lie bhtr he) kionkh tmhare dl sidhi rah se ht gee hin، aor agr nbi ke mqablh min tm ne bahm jthh bndi ki to jan rkho kh allh aus ka molia he aor aus ke bعd jbril aor tmam salh ahl aiman aor sb mlaekh as ke sathi aor mddgar hin
66.5: Bعid nhin kh agr nbiؐ tm sb bioion ko tlaq dide to allh ase aisi bioian tmhare bdle min عta frma de jo tm se bhtr hon، schi mslman، ba aiman، ataعt gzar، tobh gzar، عbadt gzar، aor rozh dar، khoah shohr didh hon ia bakrh
66.6: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، bchaؤ apne aap ko aor apne ahl o عial ko aus aag se js ka aindhn ansan aor pthr hon ge js pr nhait tnd kho aor skht gir frshte mqrr hon ge jo kbhi allh ke hkm ki nafrmani nhin krte aor jo hkm bhi anhin dia jata he ase bja late hin
66.7: (aus oqt kha jaee ga kh) ae kafro، aaj mعzrtin pish nh kro، thin to oisa hi bdlh dia ja rha he jise tm عml kr rhe the
66.8: Ae logo jo aiman laee ho، allh se tobh kro، khals tobh، bعid nhin kh allh tmhari braeian tm se dor kr de aor tmhin aisi jnton min dakhl frma de jn ke niche nhrin bhh rhi hon gi ih oh dn hoga jb allh apne nbi ko aor aun logon jo as ke sath aiman laee hin rsoa nh kre ga aun ka nor aun ke aage aage aor an ke daein janb dor rha hoga aor oh khh rhe hon ge kh ae hmare rb، hmara nor hmare lie mkml kr de aor hm se drgzr frma، to hr chiz pr qdrt rkhta he
66.9: Ae nbiؐ، kfar aor mnafqin se jhad kro aor an ke sath skhti se pish aaؤ an ka thkana jhnm he aor oh bht bra thkana he
66.10: Allh kafron ke mعamle min nohؑ aor lotؑ ki bioion ko btor msal pish krta he oh hmare do salh bndon ki zojit min thin، mgr anhon ne apne an shohron se khiant ki aor oh allh ke mqablh min an ke kchh bhi nh kam aa ske donon se khh dia gia kh jaؤ aag min jane oalon ke sath tm bhi chli jaؤ
66.11: Aor ahl aiman ke mعamlh min allh frعon ki bioi ki msal pish krta he jbkh as ne dعa ki "ae mire rb، mire lie apne han jnt min aik ghr bna de aor mjhe frعon aor as ke عml se bcha le aor zalm qom se mjh ko njat de"
66.12: Aor عmran ki biti mrimؑ ki msal dita he js ne apni shrmgah ki hfazt ki thi، phr hm ne as ke andr apni trf se roh phonk di، aor as ne apne rb ke arshadat aor as ki ktabon ki tsdiq ki aor oh ataعt gzar logon min se thi

67.1: Nhait bzrg o brtr he oh js ke hath min kaenat ki sltnt he، aor oh hr chiz pr qdrt rkhta he
67.2: Js ne mot aor zndgi ko aijad kia takh tm logon ko aazma kr dikhe tm min se kon bhtr عml krne oala he، aor oh zbrdst bhi he aor drgzr frmane oala bhi
67.3: Js ne th br th sat aasman bnaee tm rhman ki tkhliq min ksi qsm ki be rbti nh paؤ ge phr plt kr dikho، khin tmhin koei khll nzr aata he?
67.4: Bar bar ngah doraؤ tmhari ngah thk kr namrad plt aaee gi
67.5: Hm ne tmhare qrib ke aasman ko عzim alshan chraghon se aarasth kia he aor aunhin shiatin ko mar bhgane ka zriعh bna dia he ain shitanon ke lie bhrkti hoei aag hm ne mhia kr rkhi he
67.6: Jn logon ne apne rb se kfr kia an ke lie jhnm ka عzab he aor oh bht hi bra thkana he
67.7: Jb oh aus min phinke jaein ge to aske dharne ki holnak aaoaz snin ge aor oh josh kha rhi hogi
67.8: Shdt ghzb se phti jati ho gi hr bar jb koei anboh as min dala jaee ga، aus ke karnde aun logon se pochhin ge "kia tmhare pas koei khbrdar krne oala nhin aaia tha?"
67.9: Oh joab din ge "han، khbrdar krne oala hmare pas aaia tha، mgr hm ne ase jhtla dia aor kha allh ne kchh bhi nazl nhin kia he، tm bri gmrahi min pre hoee ho"
67.10: Aor oh khin ge "kash hm snte ia smjhte to aaj ais bhrkti hoei aag ke sza oaron min nh shaml hote"
67.11: As trh oh apne qsor ka khod aعtraf kr lin ge، lعnt he an dozkhion pr
67.12: Jo log be dikhe apne rb se drte hin، iqinaan aun ke lie mghfrt he aor bra ajr
67.13: Tm khoah chpke se bat kro ia aonchi aaoaz se (allh ke lie iksan he)، oh to dlon ka hal tk janta he
67.14: Kia ohi nh jane ga js ne pida kia he? Halankh oh barik bin aor bakhbr he
67.15: Ohi to he js ne tmhare lie zmin ko tabع kr rkha he، chlo aus ki chhati pr aor khaؤ khda ka rzq، ausi ke hzor tmhin dobarh zndh ho kr jana he
67.16: Kia tm ais se be khof ho kh oh jo aasman min he tmhin zmin min dhnsa de aor ikaik ih zmin jhkole khane lge?
67.17: Kia tm ais se be khof ho kh oh jo aasman min he tm pr pthraؤ krne oali hoa bhij de? Phr tmhin mعlom ho jaee ga kh miri tnbih kisi hoti he
67.18: Ain se phle gzre hoee log jhtla chke hin phr dikh lo kh miri grft kisi skht thi
67.19: Kia ih lo g apne aopr arne oale prndon ko pr philaee aor skirte nhin dikhte? Rhman ke soa koei nhin jo anhin thame hoee ho ohi hr chiz ka nghban he
67.20: Btaؤ، aakhr oh konsa lshkr tmhare pas he jo rhman ke mqable min tmhari mdd kr skta he? Hqiqt ih he kh mnkrin dhoke min pre hoee hin
67.21: Ia phr btaؤ، kon he jo tmhin rzq de skta he agr rhman apna rzq rok le? Drasl ih log sr kshi aor hq se griz pr are hoee hin
67.22: Bhla socho، jo shkhs mnh aondhaee chl rha ho oh ziadh shih rah pane oala he ia oh jo sr athaee sidha aik hmoar srk pr chl rha ho?
67.23: Ain se kho allh hi he js ne tmhin pida kia، tm ko snne aor dikhne ki taqtin din aor sochne smjhne oale dl die، mgr tm km hi shkr ada krte ho
67.24: Ain se kho، allh hi he js ne tmhin zmin min philaia aor asi ki trf tm smite jaؤ ge
67.25: Ih khte hin "agr tm sche ho to btaؤ ih oعdh kb pora hoga?"
67.26: Kho، "ais ka عlm to allh ke pas he، min to bs saf saf khbrdar kr dine oala hon"
67.27: Phr jb ih aus chiz ko qrib dikh lin ge to aun sb logon ke chhre bgr jaein ge jnhon ne ankar kia he، aor aus oqt an se kha jaee ga kh ihi he oh chiz js ke lie tm tqaze kr rhe the
67.28: Ain se kho، kbhi tm ne ih bhi socha kh allh khoah mjhe aor mire sathion ko hlak kr de ia hm pr rhm kre، kafron ko drdnak عzab se kon bcha le ga?
67.29: Ain se kho، oh bra rhim he، asi pr hm aiman laee hin، aor ausi pr hmara bhrosa he، عnqrib tmhin mعlom ho jaee ga kh srih gmrahi min pra hoa kon he
67.30: Ain se kho، kbhi tm ne ih bhi socha kh agr tmhare knoؤn ka pani zmin min atr jaee to kon he jo ais pani ki bhti hoei sotin tmhin nkal kr la de ga?

68.1: Noon. Qalam ki qasam hai aur us cheez ki bhi jo woh likhte hain.
68.2: Tum apne Rubb ke fazl se deewane nahin ho.
68.3: Aur beshak tumhare liye ek lagataar milne wala ajar hai.
68.4: Aur beshak tum azeem akhlaaq par ho.
68.5: To anqareeb tum bhi dekh loge aur woh bhi dekhenge.
68.6: Ke tum mein se kaun deewana hai.
68.7: Beshak tumhara Rubb unhein behtar jaanta hai jo uski raah se bhatak gaye hain, aur woh unhein bhi jaanta hai jo hidayat par hain.
68.8: To jhootay ki baat na maano.
68.9: Woh chahte hain ke tum kuch jhuko to woh bhi jhuk jaayen.
68.10: Aur kisi aise shakhs ki baat na maano jo bahut kasmein khata ho aur zaleel ho.
68.11: Chughalkhor, idhar udhar baatein phailane wala.
68.12: Bhalaai se rokne wala, hadd se badhne wala, gunaahgar.
68.13: Zatiyat mein dakhal dene wala, iske bawajood ke badnasib hai.
68.14: Sirf is liye ke uske paas maal aur bete hain.
68.15: Jab uske saamne hamari aayatein padhi jaati hain to kehta hai: 'Yeh to sirf purani kahaniyaan hain.'
68.16: Hum uski naak pakad kar kheench lenge.
68.17: Jaise ke humne bagh walon ko aazmaya, jab unhon ne iraada kiya ke subah subah phal tod lenge.
68.18: Aur unhon ne Allah ki marzi ka zikar na kiya.
68.19: To tere Rubb ki taraf se, jab woh soye hue thay, ek aafat aayi.
68.20: Aur woh bagh kat gaya jaise ke kaata gaya ho.
68.21: Phir unhon ne subah subah ek dusre ko pukara.
68.22: Ke chalo apne bagh ki taraf agar phal todna hai.
68.23: To woh nikle aapas mein aahista aahista baat karte hue.
68.24: Ke aaj kisi mohtaj ko kuch na dena.
68.25: Aur woh subah jaldi chalein, jabke woh is faislay par puqaar thay.
68.26: Phir jab us bagh ko dekha to kehne lage: Hum gumrah ho gaye hain.
68.27: Balki hum sab kuch se mehroom kar diye gaye hain.
68.28: Un mein se ek ne kaha: Kya maine tumse nahi kaha tha ke Allah ki tasbeeh karo?
68.29: Unhon ne kaha: Paak hai hamara Rubb, beshak hum zalim thay.
68.30: Phir woh ek dusre ki taraf rujoo hue, ek dusre ko malamat karte hue.
68.31: Unhon ne kaha: Afsoos hai hum par, shayad hamara Rubb humein iska badla de de. Hum apne Rubb ki taraf rujoo karte hain.
68.32: Aisi hi saza hoti hai. Aur aakhirat ka azaab to sabse bada hai, kaash woh jaante.
68.33: Beshak muttaqiyon ke liye unke Rubb ke paas naemat bhari jannatein hain.
68.34: Kya hum muslimanon ko mujrim banayenge?
68.35: Tumhein kya ho gaya hai, kaise faislay karte ho?
68.36: Kya tumhare paas koi kitaab hai jisme tum padhtay ho?
68.37: Ke tumhare liye usme woh sab kuch hai jo tum chahte ho?
68.38: Ya tumse hamne qayamat tak ke liye kasmein le li hain, jo na tootne wali hain?
68.39: Poochho inmein se kaun iska zimmedar hai?
68.40: Kya inke paas koi shareek hain? To le aayein apne shareekon ko agar sachay hain.
68.41: Us din jab parda hata diya jaayega, aur unhein sajda karne ko kaha jaayega, to woh sajda nahi kar sakenge.
68.42: Unki aankhein jhuki hongi, zaleel honge, aur woh sajda karne ko bulaaye jaayenge jabke woh tandurust thay.
68.43: Ab chhodo mujhe aur jhoot ko jhutlane walon ko. Hum unhein dheere dheere aise tareeqay se pakdenge ke unhein pata bhi na chale.
68.44: Main unhein mohalat deta hoon, meri chaal bohot mazboot hai.
68.45: Kya tum unse koi ajar maangte ho ke woh uske bojh tale dab gaye hain?
68.46: Kya unke paas ghaib ka ilm hai ke woh likhte hain?
68.47: To apne Rubb ke faislay ka intezar karo, aur machhli wale (Yunus a.s.) ki tarah na ho jao jab usne gham mein pukara.
68.48: Agar uske Rubb ka fazl us tak na pahuncha hota to woh nindaa shuda (malamat shuda) haal mein chhootey maidan mein phaink diya jata.
68.49: Magar uske Rubb ne use chuna aur usko salehon mein se bana diya.
68.50: Aur in kafiron ke liye aisa waqt aane wala hai ke jab woh is Quran ke samne jhukein ge aur kehne lagenge: 'Kaash humein hidayat milti.'
68.51: Aur kafir jab Quran sunte hain to tumhe nazar se gira dena chahte hain, aur kehte hain ke woh deewana hai.
68.52: Halaanke yeh to sirf sab jahan walon ke liye naseehat hai.

69.25: Aor js ka namh aعmal aus ke baein hath min dia jaee ga oh khe ga "kash mira aعmal namh mjhe nh dia gia hota

69.28: Aaj mira mal mire kchh kam nh aaia
69.29: Mira sara aqtdar khtm ho gia"

71.1: Hm ne nohؑ ko as ki qom ki trf bhija (as hdait ke sath) kh apni qom ke logon ko khbrdar kr de qbl as ke kh an pr aik drdnak عzab aaee
71.2: A s ne kha "ae miri qom ke logo، min tmhare lie aik saf saf khbrdar krdine oala (pighmbr) hon
71.3: (tm ko aagah krta hon) kh allh ki bndgi kro aor as se dro aor miri ataعt kro
71.4: Allh tmhare gnahon se drgzr frmaee ga aor tmhin aik oqt mqrr tk baqi rkhe ga hqiqt ih he kh allh ka mqrr kia hoa oqt jb aa jata he to phr tala nhin jata kash tmhin ais ka عlm ho"
71.5: Aus ne عrz kia "ae mire rb، min ne apni qom ke logon ko shb o roz pkara
71.6: Mgr miri pkar ne aun ke frar hi min azafh kia
71.7: Aor jb bhi min ne aun ko blaia takh to aunhin mعaf kr de، anhon ne kanon min anglian thons lin aor apne kpron se mnh dhank lie aor apni rosh pr ar gee aor bra tkbr kia

71.10: Min ne kha apne rb se mعafi mango، be shk oh bra mعaf krne oala he
71.11: Oh tm pr aasman se khob barshin brsaee ga
71.12: Tmhin mal aor aolad se noaze ga، tmhare lie bagh pida kre ga aor tmhare lie nhrin jari kr de ga
71.13: Tmhin kia ho gia he kh allh ke lie tm ksi oqar ki toqع nhin rkhte?
71.14: Halankh aus ne trh trh se tmhin bnaia he
71.15: Kia dikhte nhin ho kh allh ne ks trh sat aasman th br th bnaee
71.16: Aor aun min chand ko nor aor sorj ko chragh bnaia?
71.17: Aor allh ne tm ko zmin se عjib trh agaia
71.18: Phr oh tmhin aisi zmin min oaps le jaee ga aor ais se ikaik tm ko nkal khra kre ga
71.19: Aor allh ne zmin ko tmhare lie frsh ki trh bchha dia
71.20: Takh tm as ke andr khle raston min chlo"
71.21: Nohؑ ne kha، "mire rb، aunhon ne miri bat rd kr di aor aun (reison) ki piroi ki jo mal aor aolad pa kr aor ziadh namrad ho gee hin
71.22: Ain logon ne bra bhari mkr ka jal phila rkha he
71.23: Ainhon ne kha hrgz nh chhoro apne mعbodon ko، aor nh chhoro oadّ aor suoaع ko، aor nh iaghuos aor iaعuoq aor nasr ko
71.24: Anhon ne bht logon ko gmrah kia he، aor to bhi ain zalmon ko gmrahi ke soa ksi chiz min trqi nh de"
71.25: Apni khtaؤn ki bna pr hi oh ghrq kie gee aor aag min jhonk die gee، phr anhon ne apne lie allh se bchane oala koei mddgar nh paia
71.26: Aor nohؑ ne kha، "mire rb، ain kafron min se koei zmin pr bsne oala nh chhor
71.27: Agr to ne ain ko chhor dia to ih tire bndon ko gmrah krin ge aor ain ki nsl se jo bhi pida hoga bdkar aor skht kafr hi hoga
71.28: Mire rb، mjhe aor mire oaldin ko aor hr as shkhs ko jo mire ghr min momn ki hisit se dakhl hoa he، aor sb momn mrdon aor عorton ko mعaf frma de، aor zalmon ke lie hlakt ke soa ksi chiz min azafh nh kr"

72.1: Ae nbiؐ، kho، miri trf ohi bhiji gei he kh jnon ke aik groh ne ghor se sna phr (ja kr apni qom ke logon se) kha: "hm ne aik bra hi عjib qraan sna he
72.2: Jo rah rast ki trf rhnmaei krta he ais lie hm aus pr aiman le aaee hin aor ab hm hrgz apne rb ke sath ksi ko shrik nhin krin ge"
72.3: Aor ih kh "hmare rb ki shan bht aعlia o arfع he، aus ne ksi ko bioi ia bita nhin bnaia he"
72.4: Aor ih kh "hmare nadan log allh ke bare min bht khlaf hq batin khte rhe hin"
72.5: Aor ih kh "hm ne smjha tha kh ansan aor jn kbhi khda ke bare min jhot nhin bol skte"
72.6: Aor ih kh "ansanon min se kchh log jnon min se kchh logon ki pnah manga krte the، ais trh aunhon ne jnon ka ghror aor ziadh brha dia"
72.7: Aor ih kh "ansanon ne bhi ohi gman kia jisa tmhara gman tha kh allh ksi ko rsol bna kr nh bhije ga"
72.8: Aor ih kh "hm ne aasman ko ttola to dikha kh oh phre daron se pta pra he aor shhabon ki barsh ho rhi he"
72.9: Aor ih kh "phle hm sn gn line ke lie aasman min bithne ki jgh pa lite the، mgr ab jo chori chhpe snne ki koshsh krta he oh apne lie ghat min aik shhab saqb lga hoa pata he"
72.10: Aor ih kh "hmari smjh min nh aata tha kh aaia zmin oalon ke sath koei bra mعamlh krne ka aradh kia gia he ia aun ka rb aunhin rah rast dkhana chahta he"
72.11: Aor ih kh "hm min se kchh log salh hin aor kchh as se frotr hin، hm mkhtlf triqon min bte hoee hin"
72.12: Aor ih kh "hm smjhte the kh nh zmin min hm allh ko عajz kr skte hin aor nh bhag kr ause hra skte hin"
72.13: Aor ih kh "hm ne jb hdait ki tعlim sni to hm as pr aiman le aaee ab jo koei bhi apne rb pr aiman le aaee ga ase ksi hq tlfi ia zlm ka khof nh hoga"
72.14: Aor ih kh "hm min se kchh mslm (allh ke ataعt gzar) hin aor kchh hq se mnhrf to jnhon ne aslam (ataعt ka rasth) akhtiar kr lia anhon ne njat ki rah dhond li
72.15: Aor jo hq se mnhrf hin oh jhnm ka aindhn bnne oale hin"
72.16: Aor (ae nbiؐ، kho، mjh pr ih ohi bhi ki gei he kh) log agr rah rast pr sabt qdmi se chlte to hm aunhin khob sirab krte
72.17: Takh as nعmt se an ki aazmaesh krin aor jo apne rb ke zkr se mnh more ga as ka rb ase skht عzab min mbtla kr de ga
72.18: Aor ih kh msjdin allh ke lee hin، lhaza aun min allh ke sath ksi aor ko nh pkaro
72.19: Aor ih kh jb allh ka bndh aus ko pkarne ke lee khra hoa to log aus pr tot prne ke lee tiar ho gee
72.20: Ae nbiؐ، kho kh "min to apne rb ko pkarta hon aor as ke sath ksi ko shrik nhin krta"
72.21: Kho، "min tm logon ke lee nh ksi nqsan ka akhtiar rkhta hon nh ksi bhlaei ka"
72.22: Kho، "mjhe allh ki grft se koei nhin bcha skta aor nh min aus ke damn ke soa koei jaee pnah pa skta hon
72.23: Mira kam as ke soa kchh nhin he kh allh ki bat aor as ke pighamat phncha don ab jo bhi allh aor as ke rsol ki bat nh mane ga as ke lie jhnm ki aag he aor aise log as min hmishh rhin ge"
72.24: (ih log apni ais rosh se baz nh aaein ge) ihan tk kh jb aus chiz ko dikh lin ge js ka ain se oعdh kia ja rha he to anhin mعlom ho jaee ga kh ks ke mddgar kmzor hin aor ks ka jtha tعdad min km he
72.25: Kho، "min nhin janta kh js chiz ka oعdh tm se kia ja rha he oh qrib he ia mira rb as ke lie koei lmbi mdt mqrr frmata he
72.26: Oh عalm alghib he، apne ghib pr ksi ko mtlع nhin krta
72.27: Soaee aus rsol ke jse aus ne (ghib ka koei عlm dine ke lie) psnd kr lia ho، to aus ke aage aor pichhe oh mhafz lga dita he
72.28: Takh oh jan le kh anhon ne apne rb ke pighamat phncha die، aor oh aun ke pore mahol ka ahath kie hoee he aor aik aik chiz ko as ne gn rkha he"

73.16: (phr dikh lo kh jb) frعon ne aus rsol ki bat nh mani to hm ne as ko bri skhti ke sath pkr lia
73.17: Agr tm manne se ankar kro ge to aus dn kise bch jaؤ ge jo bchon ko borha kr de ga

73.20: Ae nbiؐ، tmhara rb janta he kh tm kbhi do thaei rat ke qrib aor kbhi aadhi rat aor kbhi aik thaei rat عbadt min khre rhte ho، aor tmhare sathion min se bhi aik groh ih عml krta he allh hi rat aor dn ke aoqat ka hsab rkhta he، ause mعlom he kh tm log aoqat ka thik shmar nhin kr skte، lhaza as ne tm pr mhrbani frmaei، ab jtna qraan aasani se prh skte ho prh lia kro ause mعlom he kh tm min kchh mriz honge، kchh dosre log allh ke fzl ki tlash min sfr krte hin، aor kchh aor log allh ki rah min jng krte hin ps jtna qraan baaasani prha ja ske prh lia kro، nmaz qaem kro، zkoaۃ do aor allh ko achha qrz dite rho jo kchh bhlaei tm apne lie aage bhijo ge ase allh ke han mojod paؤ ge، ohi ziadh bhtr he aor as ka ajr bht bra he allh se mghfrt mangte rho، be shk allh bra ghfor o rhim he
